description_en:
Glam up your nails with the elegant Steel Gray shade of **Flormar Nail Enamel** 417. This nail enamel boasts a superior, easy-to-apply, and long-lasting formulation that provides an extra shine to your nails, staying vibrant even through busy days. Choose the perfect shade from over 200 available colors to match every look.

â­ Delivers a classic, deep Steel Gray color perfect for everyday wear.
â­ 11 ml bottle equipped with a precisely designed applicator for even and easy application.
â­ Quick-drying formula provides a brilliant, long-lasting shine.
â­ Ideal for both fingernails and toenails for a professional manicure and pedicure at home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Gently roll the bottle between your hands to mix the polish. Do not shake.
â­ Open the cap, dip the brush into the polish, and apply a thin layer to your nails, avoiding the cuticle area.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry completely before applying a second coat for enhanced coverage and shine.
â­ Use nail polish remover to clean up any smudges around the nails.
â­ Tightly close the bottle after each use to prevent drying.
â­ Let your nails air dry completely.
â­ Apply a top coat for extended color and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic Acid / Neopentyl Glycol / Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Colors CI 77891, CI 77499, CI 77510

#Flormar #NailEnamel #SteelGrayNails #NailPolish #SaudiBeauty #NailCare #OOTDSaudi #Manicure #Pedicure #GrayVibes

description_en:
Discover unparalleled brilliance with **Flormar Nail Enamel 058**, where a unique formula meets effortless application for exceptional shine. The vibrant shades of **Flormar Nail Enamel 058** remain brilliant and long-lasting, offering a vast selection of special shades with glossy and matte finishes to complement every look.

â­ Long-lasting color and shine thanks to its unique formula.
â­ Full coverage even with a single coat.
â­ Keeps the glossy finish intact without chipping or flaking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 058**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Dip the applicator attached to the cap into the enamel, then remove excess liquid.
â­ Apply a thin coat on your nails and wait for it to dry.
â­ For a more intense color effect, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the lid tightly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 058**:
â­ High-quality nail polish formula.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC78 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ù…Ù…ÙŠØ² ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Add a touch of elegance and allure to your nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC78**. This pigment-rich polish delivers full coverage with exceptional color in a single coat, giving you a long-lasting, shiny, and eye-catching look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC78**

â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat. Allow to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat for added protection and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC78**

â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3. +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). [34000014.00]

title_en: Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 101 - Beige
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ Ù…ÙƒÙŠØ§Ø¬ Ø¨ÙŠØ±ÙÙƒØª ÙƒÙØ±Ø¬ 101 - Ø¨ÙŠØ¬
description_en:
Discover the secret to a captivating look with **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 101 - Beige**. Its luxurious velvet texture and classic beige shade complement all skin types, offering you flawless coverage that lasts up to 12 hours. Enriched with SPF 15, it provides effective protection against harmful UV rays and expertly conceals blemishes and acne scars for a smooth, even-toned complexion. Infused with nourishing oils like olive and almond oil, it bestows your skin with exceptional radiance and a lightweight, soft feel. Being a water-based foundation, it blends effortlessly with your fingers or a makeup brush, leaving an attractive, matte finish.

â­ Maximum coverage for soft, supple skin.
â­ Even complexion and luminous look lasting 12 hours.
â­ Protects from UV rays with SPF 15 formula.
â­ Hides blemishes and scars for radiant skin.
â­ Hydrating formula keeps skin moisturized all day.
â­ Easy to blend for a perfected look.
â­ Not tested on animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 101 - Beige**

â­ Pour a small amount into your palm.
â­ Dot it across your forehead, cheeks, nose, chin, and entire face.
â­ Gently blend with your fingers to create a perfect makeup base.
â­ For enhanced coverage, use a beauty sponge or foundation brush.
â­ When using a brush, avoid quick strokes to prevent patchy or uneven color.
â­ For a uniform finish, move the brush in one preferred direction.
â­ Complete your look by applying translucent powder for a flawless final touch.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 101 - Beige**

â­ Water-based formula enriched with essential oils like olive oil and almond oil.

#Flormar #Foundation #FaceMakeup #Beige #FullCoverage #HealthySkin #WaterBasedFoundation #SunProtection #SaudiMakeup #Beauty

title_en: Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder - 04 Pleasure
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø®ÙÙŠÙØ© Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ²Ù† - 04 Ø¨Ù„ÙŠØ¬Ø±
description_en:
Experience the revolutionary **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder** in shade 04 Pleasure. This unique product blends the comfort of a powder with the intense pigmentation of a lipstick, delivering a velvety matte finish and a bold, lasting color.

Its feather-light formula glides on smoothly, transforming from powder to cream for effortless, even application. Enjoy comfortable wear and soft, hydrated lips all day long.

â­ Powder-to-cream texture: Seamless application for ultimate comfort.
â­ Intense color payoff: Delivers a bold and beautiful look.
â­ Lightweight and comfortable: Feels like you're wearing nothing.
â­ Matte finish: Achieve a modern, sophisticated appearance.
â­ Smooth and even application: Flawless coverage without feathering.
â­ Long-lasting wear: Color that stays put for hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**:
â­ Apply the lip powder directly onto your lips using the applicator provided.
â­ Start from the center of your lips and move outwards for even color distribution.
â­ For a more intense look, apply a second layer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Lightweight Lip Powder**:
â­ Innovative powder-to-cream formula.
â­ High-quality pigments.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients.

#Flormar #LipMakeup #LiquidLipstick #LipPowder #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #LipCare #MatteLips #BoldColor #SaudiOnlineShopping

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Flormar Perf Cov. Foundation 103 Creamy Beige**. This foundation offers incredible coverage that lasts up to 12 hours, giving your skin a smooth and flawless appearance. Its unique formula, enriched with almond oil and olive oil extracts, enhances your skin's health and provides deep hydration. Additionally, **Flormar Perf Cov. Foundation 103 Creamy Beige** protects your skin from harmful UV rays with its SPF 15 protection factor, making it the perfect choice for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Perf Cov. Foundation 103 Creamy Beige**
â­ Dispense a small amount of product onto your hand.
â­ Use a foundation brush or sponge to collect and apply the product.
â­ Start application in the center of the face and blend outwards towards the edges for even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Perf Cov. Foundation 103 Creamy Beige**
â­ Almond Oil
â­ Olive Oil Extracts
â­ SPF 15 Protection
â­ Soft and Rich Texture
â­ Suitable for all skin types

title_en: Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo - 020 Assertive

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**, the ultimate solution for a smudge-proof lipstick that offers rich, long-lasting pigmentation.

Indulge in a luxurious experience with its creamy and smooth texture, making application effortless thanks to the comfortable sponge applicator. Unlike traditional matte lipsticks, **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo** does not dry out your lips due to its rich and moisturizing formula, making it incredibly lightweight for all-day comfort. Available in 16 diverse shades to express your unique style.

For a flawless, long-lasting effect, wait 1 minute with your lips apart after application for the product to dry and settle!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**:
â­ Smooth a thin layer over lips with a sponge applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**:
â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polybutene, Dimethicone, Isocetyl Stearate, Isohexadecane, Kaolin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Synthetic Beeswax, Glyceryl Behenate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Aroma (Flavour), Propylene Carbonate, Ppg-15 Stearyl Ether, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid. +/- (May Contain): Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake).

#Flormar #Lipstick #LipMakeup #LiquidLipstick #LipTattoo #LongLastingMakeup #SaudiMakeup #FlormarSaudi #DailyMakeup #FullLips

shortdescription_en: Flormar's long-lasting liquid lipstick, smudge-proof with rich pigmentation & moisturizing formula. Lightweight & comfortable.

title_en: Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 004 - Pink | Chic Autumn Touch
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ùƒ Ù…Ø§Øª Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ 004 - ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ | Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø©ç§‹ÙŠØ© Ø£Ù†ÙŠÙ‚Ø©
description_en:
Discover the magic of color with **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 004 - Pink**. This color, inspired by autumn vibes, gives you a chic and modern look, perfect for daily use thanks to its matte formula that highlights your lips' beauty without shine. The **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 004 - Pink** comes in an elegant and compact glass case, easy to carry and apply. It features high pigmentation that gives you a rich color in a single swipe, with a high-quality brush ensuring even and comfortable distribution. Enriched with moisturizing oils that protect your lips from dryness and nourish them deeply for an attractive and healthy appearance. Make the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 004 - Pink** an indispensable addition to your beauty routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 004 - Pink**
â­ Before use, moisturize your lips or apply a primer if needed.
â­ Define the edges of your lips with the brush to create a clear outline.
â­ Carefully fill in the spaces within the lips, avoiding exceeding the defined outer line.
â­ For fuller lips, you can draw a line slightly larger than your lip's natural border.
â­ Wipe off any excess product with a tissue for better control and to prevent smudging.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 004 - Pink**
â­ Grape Seed Oil for lip nourishment.
â­ Avocado Oil for deep hydration and protection against dryness.
â­ Vitamin E as an antioxidant to enhance lip health.
â­ Fast-drying liquid formula in a rich matte pink shade.
â­ High-quality materials for a precise and durable applicator brush.

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation**, your ultimate solution for makeup that lasts up to 12 hours! With its soft and rich texture, **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation** will help your skin look incredibly smooth. Enriched with almond oil and olive oil extracts, it promotes healthy-looking skin and protects it from harmful UV rays with SPF 15. This foundation is suitable for all skin types, providing perfect coverage and a natural finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation**:
â­ Dispense a small amount of product onto your hand.
â­ Apply the foundation using a foundation brush or sponge.
â­ Start application in the center of the face and blend outwards towards the edges for even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation**:
â­ Almond Oil.
â­ Olive Oil Extracts.
â­ SPF 15 Sun Protection.
â­ Soft and Rich Formula.

#Flormar #Foundation #Makeup #FullCoverage #HealthySkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia #SaudiMakeup #Skincare #FlawlessFinish

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆØ¬ ÙƒÙŠØ³ Ù…ÙŠ ØªØ§ØªÙˆ ÙƒØ±Ø§Ù…ÙŠÙ„ 19 - Ø«Ø¨Ø§Øª ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Discover your lips' true beauty with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 019 Caramel**, the ultimate liquid lipstick offering intense pigmentation and unparalleled longevity.

â­ **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 019 Caramel** features a long-lasting, smudge-proof formula that stays put, ensuring a flawless look for hours.
â­ Its smooth, creamy texture glides effortlessly onto the lips, thanks to the convenient sponge applicator, providing an easy and enjoyable application experience.
â­ Unlike traditional matte lipsticks, this rich formula doesn't dry out your lips, instead, it keeps them feeling comfortable and hydrated all day.
â­ It boasts an incredibly lightweight feel on the lips, making it feel like you're wearing nothing at all.
â­ Available in 16 diverse color options to match every look and style.
â­ For the most flawless and long-lasting effect, apply a thin layer and wait for 1 minute with your lips apart for the product to fully dry and set!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 019 Caramel**
â­ Smooth a thin layer over lips with a sponge applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo 019 Caramel**
â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polybutene, Dimethicone, Isocetyl Stearate, Isohexadecane, Kaolin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Synthetic Beeswax, Glyceryl Behenate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Aroma (Flavour), Propylene Carbonate, Ppg-15 Stearyl Ether, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid. +/- (May Contain): Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake).

description_en:
Achieve professional, salon-quality shine with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**. This gel-based nail polish delivers exceptional luminosity and flawless coverage from the very first coat. Its rich burgundy shade complements a wide range of skin tones, offering a sophisticated and captivating look. The unique jelly consistency provides a superior glossy finish without the need for additional lighting, ensuring your nails look healthy and vibrant. Enjoy effortless application thanks to the specially designed thick brush for an optimal experience. For intensified color and a more voluminous jelly effect, a second coat is recommended, giving your nails that perfect, freshly manicured appearance right at home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**
â­ Apply the first coat to clean, dry nails.
â­ Begin application from the base of the nail towards the tip in a single, even stroke.
â­ Wait approximately one minute for the first coat to dry completely.
â­ For richer color and an enhanced jelly effect, apply a second coat.
â­ Avoid touching anything with your nails until the polish is fully dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**
â­ Advanced gel-based formula.
â­ High-quality pigments for rich color and perfect coverage.
â­ Ingredients that provide superior jelly-like shine.
â­ Thick brush applicator designed for easy and even application.
â­ Fast-drying formula ensuring long-lasting wear.

#Flormar #NailPolish #JellyLook #Burgundy #ShinyNails #SaudiBeauty #NailCare #SaudiStyle #FlormarSaudi #NailEnamel

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with the **Flormar Perf Cov. Foundation 105 Porcelain Ivory**. This foundation offers a fresh-looking makeup for up to 12 hours, with a soft and rich texture that leaves your skin feeling smooth. Enriched with almond oil and olive oil extracts, the **Flormar Perf Cov. Foundation 105 Porcelain Ivory** promotes healthy-looking skin. Plus, it provides protection against harmful UV rays with SPF 15. Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Perf Cov. Foundation 105 Porcelain Ivory**:
â­ Dispense a small amount of product onto your hand.
â­ Collect the product with a foundation brush or sponge.
â­ Apply the foundation starting from the center of your face, blending outward towards the edges for an even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Perf Cov. Foundation 105 Porcelain Ivory**:
â­ Almond Oil
â­ Olive Oil Extracts
â­ SPF 15
â­ Blendable formula for perfect coverage
â­ Suitable for all skin types

description_en:
Discover unparalleled radiance with **Flormar Nail Polish 306 Lost In Bordeaux**. This legendary nail polish boasts a special formula that delivers exceptional shine and effortless application. Whether you're seeking a glossy, matte, or glitter finish, **Flormar Nail Polish 306 Lost In Bordeaux** offers a diverse range of captivating colors that are long-lasting.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Polish 306 Lost In Bordeaux**:
â­ Shake well before use to ensure even consistency.
â­ Apply one thin coat of your preferred nail enamel color.
â­ For a more intense effect, apply a second thin coat after the first has dried.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Polish 306 Lost In Bordeaux**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose.
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer.
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol.
â­ Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer.
â­ Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol.
â­ Silica, Benzophenone-1.
â­ Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Mica.
â­ May Contain: Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides).

description_en:
Achieve a naturally radiant and vibrant look with **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-101 Coral**. This pressed powder blush is expertly formulated to mimic the natural flush of your face, brightening your complexion and making it appear fresher and more alive. Discover the secret to a healthy, luminous glow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-101 Coral**
â­ Apply the blush to your cheekbones using a blusher brush.
â­ Blend softly for a natural and seamless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Blush-On Cbl-101 Coral**
â­ Talc, Mica, Boron Nitride, Lauroyl Lysine, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Cellulose, Magnesium Stearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Isostearyl Isostearate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Diisostearyl Malate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tin Oxide, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Palmitic Acid, Benzoic Acid.
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 12085 (Red 36), Ci 75470 (Carmine).

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ - ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ Ø±Ù‚Ù… 219
description_en:
Elevate your lip look with the Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil, expertly designed for effortless and precise lip shaping.

The **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil** boasts a smooth texture that dries quickly, offering a non-greasy feel and superior resistance to sweat and humidity. Its advanced polymer formulation creates strong films, making it waterproof and long-lasting. This provides a perfect base for your lipstick, ensuring it stays put without smudging, even in hot weather. Prevent lipstick from bleeding into fine lines with this innovative formula.

â­ Provides long-lasting lip makeup.
â­ Water, sweat, and humidity-resistant.
â­ Available in various shades to suit all your looks.
â­ Prevents lipstick bleeding.
â­ Smooth texture that dries quickly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil**:
â­ For best results, start by applying a thin layer of hydrating lip balm to moisturize your lips.
â­ Use the pencil tip to create defined, natural-looking lines; avoid overly sharp tips.
â­ Outline your lips with a swift, continuous motion to achieve a perfect shape.
â­ After defining, fill in with your favorite lipstick or gloss for a radiant finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil**:
â­ Waterproof polymer formulation.
â­ Moisturizing lip ingredients.
â­ High-quality pigments.
â­ Long-lasting fixing agents.

#Flormar #Lipliner #Lipstick #LipMakeup #Waterproof #Beauty #SaudiBeauty #KSA #Riyadh #Jeddah

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ ØºÙŠØ± Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹ 53 Nude In Town
description_en:
Discover the perfect pout with **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 53 Nude In Town**. This exquisite liquid lipstick delivers a rich, vibrant color payoff with a long-lasting, velvety matte finish, ensuring you shine with confidence all day long. Experience its silky-smooth texture that glides effortlessly onto your lips without any dryness, providing unparalleled comfort. The **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 53 Nude In Town** is your go-to for a sophisticated and captivating makeup look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 53 Nude In Town**
â­ Start by applying a thin layer of lip balm and allow it to fully absorb.
â­ Use the precise applicator to outline your upper and lower lips.
â­ Fill in your lips completely for a full, opaque matte color.
â­ For extra definition, consider lining your lips with a matching lip liner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 53 Nude In Town**
â­ Lightweight liquid formula infused with high-pigment color.
â­ Moisturizing agents to ensure lip softness and hydration.
â­ Long-wear ingredients for lasting color.
â­ Non-drying formula for comfortable wear throughout the day.

#Flormar #LiquidLipstick #MatteLips #LipMakeup #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #LipstickLover #MakeupGoals #LongLastingLipstick #FlormarBeauty

description_en:
Achieve stunning nails with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl18**, a polish designed for effortless application and exceptional shine. Its unique formula delivers rich color and full coverage in a single coat, maintaining its glossy finish without chipping or flaking.

â­ Easy to apply with its special formula.
â­ Superior long-lasting shine.
â­ Full coverage with one coat.
â­ Maintains a flawless glossy finish.
â­ Vibrant and attractive blue shade.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl18**
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Dip the brush into the polish, removing excess liquid.
â­ Apply a thin coat to your nails and let it dry.
â­ For more intense color, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the bottle tightly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl18**
â­ High-quality nail polish formula.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 413 - ØªØ±Ùˆ Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ùƒ - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ
description_en:
Discover everyday elegance with **Flormar Nail Enamel 413** in the enchanting Tree Bark shade, adding a brilliant shine and a polished finish to your nails. Its highly pigmented formula delivers rich, long-lasting color, making it perfect for both your daily looks and special occasions. This nail enamel features a quick-dry formula and an easy-to-use applicator brush, ensuring a professional result every time.

**Product Features:**
â­ Shade 413 boasts a classic and elegant Tree Bark color.
â­ Highly pigmented formula for perfect coverage.
â­ Long-lasting wear without chipping, providing a smooth, polished look for days.
â­ Quick-dry formula for enhanced convenience.
â­ Gives nails extra shine and keeps them strong and healthy.
â­ Suitable for everyday use, adding attractiveness to your hands.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 413**:
â­ Ensure your nails are clean and dry before application.
â­ Use the attached applicator brush to apply a thin, even coat.
â­ Apply the polish in one direction for best results.
â­ Allow nails to dry completely.
â­ Close the cap tightly after each use to preserve the formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 413**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Polyvinyl Butyral, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Phtalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Mek, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone, Tin Oxide, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate.
â­ +/- (May Contain): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 15850 (D&C Red No. 6), CI 15880 (D&C Red No. 34), CA 19140 (FD&C Yellow No. 5), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 15850 (D&C Red No. 7), CI 77266 [Nano] (D&C Black No. 2), CI 47005 (FD&C Yellow No. 10), CI 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), CI 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), CI 77000 (Aluminum Powder), CI 60725 (D&C Violet No. 2).

title_en: Flormar Pressed Powder - Multiple Shades
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø§Øª Ù…ØªØ¹Ø¯Ø¯Ø©
description_en:
Discover Flormar Pressed Powder, the ideal face powder that blends instantly into your skin for a flawless, natural finish that lasts all day without caking. This lightweight powder features a clay powder formula, giving your skin a glowing and silky texture. It contains natural ingredients that ensure a radiant, bright, and silky-smooth finish. You can apply the wonderful **Flormar** powder dry or wet to achieve the perfect look you desire. **Flormar Powder** is known for its ease of application and its soft, velvety results that effectively reduce skin shine, making your face look vibrant and healthy. This face powder provides a light, powdery texture for a natural, matte finish, with a silky-smooth feel and medium to high coverage. Its hypoallergenic formula prevents skin irritation and allergies, and it is designed to cover skin blemishes and dark circles with a luminous and even finish. It's a wonderful pressed powder that gives your makeup a silky-smooth touch while reducing shine throughout the day, making it an ideal choice for many.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Pressed Powder**:
â­ Use a powder brush and gently sweep it across the powder's surface.
â­ Gently press the brush to remove any excess product.
â­ Lightly apply the powder onto your skin, focusing on oily areas like the T-Zone and hairline.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Pressed Powder**:
â­ Clay Powder
â­ Natural Ingredients
â­ Hypoallergenic Formula

title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC43 - Brown Shimmer
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± 43 - Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹
description_en:
Discover the beauty of your nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC43 - Brown Shimmer**, a shade that combines elegance and allure. **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC43 - Brown Shimmer** features a unique formula that gives your nails exceptional, long-lasting shine without chipping. Whether you're getting ready for a special occasion or want to add a sophisticated touch to your everyday look, this polish will give you a perfect appearance in minutes. The elegant bottle is easy to carry and use, with a high-quality brush ensuring even, lump-free application in a single stroke.

Product Features:
â­ Superior shine that enhances your nails and complements your outfit.
â­ Rich and attractive colors from Flormar's wide range to suit all tastes.
â­ Innovative formula ensures long-lasting color without chipping or peeling.
â­ Brush engineered for complete nail coverage in one stroke.
â­ Quick-drying to save time and achieve a ready-to-go look instantly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC43 - Brown Shimmer**:
â­ Ensure your nails are thoroughly cleaned from any previous polish using nail polish remover and a cotton pad.
â­ Trim and file your nails if necessary, then soak your hands in warm water to relax and prepare them.
â­ Push back cuticles and dry your hands thoroughly.
â­ Use a cotton pad to remove any moisturizer residue from your nails; this step is crucial for polish adhesion.
â­ You can apply a base coat to protect your nails and add extra vitality.
â­ Apply one coat of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC43 - Brown Shimmer** for perfect coverage.
â­ If you desire a deeper color or extra opacity, apply a second coat after the first has dried.
â­ Wait for the polish to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC43 - Brown Shimmer**:
â­ Advanced nail polish formula for superior shine and long-lasting wear.
â­ High-quality pigments for rich, attractive color.
â­ Innovative ingredients that prevent chipping and extend polish life.
â­ High-efficiency brush for easy and precise application.

description_en:
Let your nails dazzle with a captivating touch with **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD16**. This stunning nail polish comes in vibrant shades that give your nails an irresistible, attractive look, perfect for special occasions like weddings, proms, and Halloween parties. **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD16** is distinguished by its unique formula that combines intense color and brilliant shine, along with nourishing and moisturizing properties for your nails. It dries super fast, giving you an elegant look that lasts longer. Each bottle comes with a precise brush that helps you apply the polish professionally and with ease.

Product Features:
â­ Adds a captivating touch to your overall appearance.
â­ Safe and nourishing for nail skin.
â­ Easy application thanks to the integrated brush.
â­ Lasts for long periods without fading.
â­ Dries completely in just one minute.
â­ Deeply nourishes and moisturizes nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD16**:
â­ Ensure nails are clean and any old polish is removed using nail polish remover.
â­ Trim and shape your nails as desired.
â­ Apply a base coat of clear nail polish and let it dry for two minutes.
â­ Apply the first coat of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD16** smoothly and precisely.
â­ After one minute of drying, apply a second coat to enhance color and durability.
â­ Let your nails dry completely and enjoy the stunning result.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD16**:
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer
â­ Acrylates Copolymer
â­ Stearalkonium Hectorite
â­ Benzophenone-1
â­ Silica
â­ May Contain (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).

**Flormar Extreme Tattoo Gel Pencil** delivers a smooth, intensely pigmented look with just one application. Its water-resistant formula ensures long-lasting wear, perfectly complementing your makeup from day to night with its versatile tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Extreme Tattoo Gel Pencil**
â­ Apply along the lash line, starting from the inner corner of the eye and working outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Extreme Tattoo Gel Pencil**
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate, hydrogenated polyisobutene, synthetic wax, mica, isododecane, polybutene, calcium sodium borosilicate, calcium aluminum borosilicate, ethylene/propylene copolymer, silica silylate, silica, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, copernicia cerifera cera (carnauba wax), tin oxide.

description_en:
Achieve perfectly sculpted and natural-looking brows with **Flormar Extreme Eye Brow Tattoo Gel 01 Glitzy Brown**. This unique gel formula delivers rich, intense color with just one effortless application. Its water-resistant formula ensures your brows stay defined and flawless all day long, perfectly completing your makeup from day to night. The **Flormar Extreme Eye Brow Tattoo Gel 01 Glitzy Brown** allows you to precisely shape and define your brows with ease, for a professional finish every time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Extreme Eye Brow Tattoo Gel 01 Glitzy Brown**:
â­ Apply the pencil along the lash line starting from the inner corner of the eye, working outwards.
â­ Draw fine strokes to mimic natural brow hairs for a realistic effect.
â­ Brush through the brows with a spoolie to blend the color and ensure a seamless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Extreme Eye Brow Tattoo Gel 01 Glitzy Brown**:

description_en: Experience unparalleled elegance with the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 11 - Purple**. This liquid lipstick offers a modern matte finish and a silky-smooth texture that lasts. Perfectly suited for all your daily and special occasions, this rich purple shade captures the warmth of autumn and adds a unique, captivating touch to your lips. Its advanced formula ensures high coverage with a single swipe, while keeping your lips hydrated and protected from dryness thanks to its nourishing oils. The sleek, compact glass packaging makes it easy and convenient to carry in your bag.

description_en:
Elevate your look with the **Flormar Precious Curl Mascara**. This exceptional mascara is designed to lift, define, and volumize your lashes, creating a captivating, wide-eyed effect. Its advanced formula and innovative brush work together to deliver intensely black, perfectly curled, and clump-free lashes that last all day.

The **Flormar Precious Curl Mascara** features an attractive purple packaging and a comfortable, easy-to-hold design, making it an essential addition to your makeup collection. Experience beautifully defined, voluminous lashes that enhance your natural beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Precious Curl Mascara**
â­ Sit in front of a mirror and hold the wand with its convex curve side up to coat lashes from inner to outer corner.
â­ Turn the wand and use the concave side to hug your lashes, curling them upwards.
â­ Use the tip of the brush to coat the bottom lashes for a flawless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Precious Curl Mascara**
â­ Enriched with thickening waxes and polymers for enhanced volume.
â­ Contains carbon black for deep, intense color payoff.
â­ Formulated with safe ingredients for lash and eye care.
â­ Clump-free and flake-proof formula.

#Flormar #Mascara #Makeup #Lashes #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #EyeMakeup #VoluminousLashes

description_en:
Achieve an irresistible nail look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC73**. This enamel features rich pigments offering complete coverage in a single coat, giving your nails a shiny, captivating, and long-lasting appearance.

â­ Rich pigments for full coverage.
â­ Bright, captivating, and long-lasting color.
â­ Smooth, easy-to-apply liquid formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC73**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat. Allow to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply the top coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC73**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). description_en:
Achieve dramatic lashes with **Flormar Mascara Precious Curl Waterproof**! This sweat, moisture, and waterproof mascara provides long-lasting coverage, with its creamy formula that applies effortlessly to give you voluminous, curled lashes. You can build multiple layers with **Flormar Mascara Precious Curl Waterproof** to achieve your desired look, making it your perfect choice for a look that lasts from morning to night.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Mascara Precious Curl Waterproof**:
â­ Start from the base of your lashes and sweep upwards with zig-zag motions.
â­ Apply additional coats for desired volume and curl.
â­ For best results, use on clean, dry lashes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Mascara Precious Curl Waterproof**:
â­ Creamy formula for easy application and smooth distribution.
â­ Waterproof, sweat, and moisture-resistant ingredients.
â­ Delivers intense volume and perfect curl to lashes.

#Flormar #Mascara #Makeup #Lashes #Waterproof #LashVolume #LashCurl #EyeMakeup #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve voluminous, defined lashes with the **Flormar Open Up Waterproof Mascara**, expertly crafted for dramatic, long-lasting lashes that resist water, sweat, and humidity.

**Product Features:**
â­ Waterproof Formula: Prevents smudging and flaking, even in humid conditions.
â­ Volumizing Brush: Designed to grip lashes from root to tip for enhanced volume and definition.
â­ Lengthening Effect: Elongates and extends the appearance of your lashes.
â­ Vitamin E: May contain Vitamin E to nourish and strengthen lashes.
â­ High Coverage: Delivers rich, intense color for a dramatic look.
â­ Creates volumized, dramatic-looking lashes.
â­ Long-lasting wear that resists water, sweat, and humidity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Open Up Waterproof Mascara**:
â­ Start at the base of your lashes and wiggle the brush upwards in a zig-zag motion to coat each lash from root to tip.
â­ Apply additional coats for more dramatic volume and definition as desired.
â­ Ensure thorough removal at the end of the day with an oil-based makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Open Up Waterproof Mascara**:
â­ May contain Water, Waxes, Film-forming agents, Pigments.
â­ May contain Vitamin E.

#Flormar #Mascara #EyeMakeup #VoluminousLashes #WaterproofMascara #SaudiBeauty #RiyadhMakeup #Beauty #LongLashes #ProMakeup

description_en:
Discover superior shine and effortless application with **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd07 - Shiny Peach**. Its unique formula delivers rich color and long-lasting brilliance, offering full coverage even with a single coat. Enjoy a glossy finish that resists chipping and flaking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd07 - Shiny Peach**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Uncap and dip the applicator into the enamel.
â­ Remove excess liquid before application.
â­ Apply a thin coat to your nails and wait for it to dry.
â­ For more intense color, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the lid tightly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd07 - Shiny Peach**:
â­ High-quality nail polish formula.

description_en:
For flawless, perfect, and enchanting lips, add the **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo** in a captivating purple shade to your collection.

This lipstick delivers a dense and saturated color with an ultra-creamy texture that provides superior comfort. Its innovative no-smudge formula ensures your lips look brilliant and stay that way for long hours without fading. The **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo** comes with an easy-to-use sponge applicator, making application quick and effortless.

This lip tattoo provides a perfect, flawless effect, making your lips charmingly attractive. Boost your personality and add a subtle yet noticeable effect to your look.

â­ Intense, saturated color with a single swipe.
â­ Creamy, soft, and lightweight texture on the lips.
â­ Long-lasting, smudge-proof formula.
â­ Comes with a sponge applicator for easy and precise application.
â­ Delivers an attractive and distinct lip look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**
â­ Prep your lips by gently exfoliating them for ultimate smoothness.
â­ Consider applying a lip primer to enhance color longevity.
â­ Apply the lipstick with focus and precision as you normally would.
â­ Keep your lips parted for one minute after application to allow the color to dry and set completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**
â­ Aluminum Starch
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Cetyl Alcohol

#Flormar #Lipstick #LipTattoo #Makeup #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #LipCare #LongLastingLipstick #KissMeMore #Cosmetics

Achieve flawless, perfect, and charming lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**. This lipstick boasts a creamy texture that delivers dense, rich color that lasts for hours without smudging, leaving your lips soft and alluring. It comes with an easy-to-use sponge applicator for ultimate comfort and precision.

â­ Intense, saturated color for captivating lips.
â­ Creamy, smooth texture for a soft feel.
â­ Long-lasting, smudge-proof, and transfer-resistant formula.
â­ Convenient sponge applicator for effortless application.
â­ Enhances your lips for a subtle yet noticeable, attractive look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**:
â­ Prep your lips by gently exfoliating them.
â­ You can prime your lips to enhance longevity.
â­ Apply **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo** as you would any other lipstick.
â­ Wait for 1 minute with your lips apart for the product to dry and set.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**:
â­ Aluminum Starch.
â­ Synthetic Beeswax.
â­ Ozokerite.
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± 11 - Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹
description_en:
Discover the brilliance and rich color with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC11 - Rich Brown**. Flormar, a trusted brand with over 70 years of experience, offers unparalleled quality in the cosmetic industry. This elegant brown shade is perfect for your everyday or special occasions, whether you choose to wear white, black, or a combination.

**Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC11** features a high-gloss finish that lasts long without chipping, thanks to its innovative formula. Achieve a perfect and attractive nail look in minutes with the high-quality brush that ensures complete and easy coverage without clumps. Whether you're preparing for a surprise event or want to add a touch of elegance to your day, this nail polish is your ideal choice.

â­ High-gloss finish for a stunning look.
â­ Vivid, shiny colors inspired by Flormar's long-standing expertise.
â­ Long-lasting formula that prevents chipping and bubbles.
â­ Professionally designed brush for easy application and perfect coverage.
â­ Elegant and practical bottle for easy carrying and use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC11**
â­ Clean your nails from any previous polish residue using a gentle nail polish remover and a cotton pad.
â­ Trim and file your nails for the ideal shape.
â­ Soak your hands in warm water to relax them, then dry them carefully.
â­ Gently push back cuticles and ensure the nail surface is free of any moisturizer with a cotton pad.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional) to add vibrancy and protect your nails.
â­ Apply one coat of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC11** for great coverage, or an additional coat to enhance color and opacity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC11**
â­ High-quality formula for long-lasting shine.
â­ Rich pigments for superior color payoff.
â­ Innovative ingredients that prevent chipping.
â­ Quick-drying solvents for a short drying time.
â­ Additives to enhance adhesion and durability.

#Flormar #NailPolish #Manicure #NailCare #Makeup #Beauty #Brown #GlossyNails #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover sophistication with **Flormar Nail Enamel 012**, a legendary nail polish that's easy to apply and exceptionally shiny thanks to its unique formula. Flormar's extensive collection offers endless options of brilliant and long-lasting colors. **Flormar Nail Enamel 012** provides lasting color and shine, with full coverage even in a single coat, maintaining its glossy finish without chipping or flaking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 012**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Uncap the enamel, dip the applicator into the polish, and drip excess liquid back into the bottle.
â­ Apply a thin coat to your nails and wait for it to dry.
â­ For a more intense effect, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the lid tightly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 012**:
â­ Nail polish with a unique formula.

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect, and charming lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Babe 01 - Nude**. This liquid lipstick delivers dense and saturated color with a creamy, soft-touch texture. The **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Babe 01 - Nude** boasts a no-smudge formula that stays brilliant for long hours, and its convenient sponge applicator ensures effortless application, leaving your lips irresistibly attractive and enhancing your beauty.

â­ Delivers dense and saturated color.
â­ Extremely soft and creamy texture.
â­ Long-lasting, no-smudge formula.
â­ Easy application with the included sponge applicator.
â­ Provides a charming and distinctive lip look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Babe 01 - Nude**:
â­ Prep your lips by gently exfoliating them.
â­ You can prime your lips to increase longevity.
â­ Apply the lipstick evenly on the lips.
â­ Wait for 1 minute for the product to dry and set completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Babe 01 - Nude**:
â­ Aluminum Starch
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Cetyl Alcohol

description_en:
Elevate your nail game with **Flormar Nail Enamel 426 - Red**. This exquisite nail enamel boasts a unique formula that provides a quick application and instant shine, giving your nails a radiant and captivating appearance. Its creamy texture glides on smoothly for flawless coverage and long-lasting color, featuring an easy-to-use brush for a hassle-free, salon-quality finish every time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 426 - Red**
â­ Shake the bottle well before application.
â­ Cleanse and thoroughly dry your nails.
â­ Apply a thin coat of the enamel, starting from the base of the nail to the tip.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry completely before applying a second coat for deeper color and full coverage.
â­ Ensure the cap is tightly closed after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 426 - Red**
â­ High-pigment formula for rich, vibrant color payoff.
â­ Creamy texture that glides effortlessly for a smooth application.
â­ Long-lasting ingredients to maintain shine and finish.
â­ Specially designed applicator brush for even coverage and ease of use.
â­ Quick-dry formula for time-saving application.

description_en:
Express your style with **Flormar Nail Enamel**, shade 320 - Rose Taboo Bright. This vibrant pink lacquer offers a beautifully matte finish thatâ€™s both girly and sassy, complementing all skin tones. Its quick-drying, long-lasting formula ensures your nails stay stunning with a flawless, salon-quality look. The smooth texture and expertly designed applicator make application effortless, providing perfect coverage in just a few strokes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Dip the brush into the enamel for a thin layer.
â­ Apply to the nail in three clean strokes.
â­ Wait approximately 5 minutes for the coat to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat for more intense color and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ High-quality liquid formula for rich, consistent color.
â­ Quick-drying ingredients for immediate results.
â­ Enhanced gel-like texture for better coverage in one coat.
â­ Specially designed applicator brush for easy application.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 011 - Ø¥Ø´Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ù„Ø§ Ù…Ø«ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù‡Ø§
description_en:
Discover the perfect shade that gives your hands a radiant look with **Flormar Nail Enamel 011**. This nail enamel offers a brilliant shine and long-lasting wear thanks to its fade-resistant, chip-resistant, and break-resistant formula. Enjoy an easy and comfortable application with its specially designed brush for full coverage with rich color and high pigmentation. **Flormar Nail Enamel 011** is your ideal choice for all occasions, as it is cruelty-free, non-toxic, and quick-drying, making it safe and gentle on your nails. Add this beauty to your collection and enjoy stunning nails for days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 011**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use to ensure color uniformity.
â­ Clean and dry your nails thoroughly before application.
â­ Apply the first coat of polish in a straight line from the base to the tip, then to the sides.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry completely before applying the second coat for the best result and a deeper color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 011**:
â­ High-quality formula providing rich color and excellent pigmentation.
â­ Precisely designed brush for a smooth and even application.
â­ Quick-drying formula for convenience and speed.
â­ Resistant to fading, chipping, and breaking to ensure lasting wear.
â­ Cruelty-free and not tested on animals.
â­ Non-toxic and safe for nails.

description_en:
Achieve a professional gel manicure effect at home with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 06 Amaranth**. This exquisite nail enamel delivers ultra-shimmer and intense color to your nails, all without the need for LED light. Featuring a specially designed brush for effortless application, you'll notice stunning results from the very first coat. For maximum gloss and volume, we recommend applying two coats of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 06 Amaranth**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 06 Amaranth**:
â­ Applying in two coats enables a fantastic gloss and volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 06 Amaranth**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1, Diacetone Alcohol, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Mek, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Ci 77000 (Aluminum Powder), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). description_en:
Discover the magic of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Doll 06**, the liquid lipstick that offers rich color and superior, smudge-proof wear. Its smooth and creamy texture glides effortlessly onto your lips, providing long-lasting hydration and a comfortable feel, unlike traditional matte lipsticks. Incredibly lightweight, express your style with 16 different color options to suit every look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Doll 06**
â­ Smooth a thin layer over lips using the integrated sponge applicator.
â­ Wait 1 minute with lips apart after application for the product to dry and settle for a flawless, long-lasting effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Doll 06**
â­ Rich formula that hydrates the lips.
â­ Smooth, creamy texture for easy application.
â­ Long-lasting wear without smudging.
â­ Incredibly lightweight for unparalleled comfort.
â­ Available in 16 diverse color options.

description_en:
Achieve a perfect gel manicure effect without the need for LED light with Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel. This polish boasts ultra shimmer and intense color, adding vibrant depth to your nails. Its specially designed brush ensures an easy and even application for a flawless finish. For maximum gloss and volume, applying two coats of **Flormar Jelly Look** nail polish will make your nails appear extra shiny and volumized, replicating a professional salon look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look**:
â­ Applying two coats especially enables a fantastic gloss and volume for your nails.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1, Diacetone Alcohol, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Mek, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone. +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Ci 77000 (Aluminum Powder), Ci 60725 (Violet 2).

Discover captivating color and superior durability with **Flormar Nail Enamel 048**. This enamel boasts a unique formula for easy application and exceptional, long-lasting shine. Experience rich, glossy color with multiple shade options to suit every occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 048**
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Dip the applicator attached to the cap into the enamel, removing excess liquid.
â­ Apply a thin coat to your nails and allow it to dry.
â­ For a more intense effect, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the lid tightly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 048**
â­ High-quality nail polish formula.

description_en:
Make your look shine with **Flormar Nail Enamel 321**, the perfect classic red shade that commands attention and grants you unparalleled confidence. **Flormar Nail Enamel 321** is more than just a color; it's an expression of elegance and allure, adding an instant touch of glamour to any occasion, especially evening party looks. Its quick-drying and easy-to-apply formula ensures a smooth, glossy, long-lasting finish without staining your nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Clean your nails thoroughly and dry them.
â­ Apply a base coat for extra protection.
â­ Using the included brush, apply a thin, even coat of polish.
â­ Wait two minutes before applying a second coat for a deeper color if desired.
â­ You can add a top coat for protection and enhanced shine.
â­ To remove, use an appropriate nail polish remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Film-forming agents such as nitrocellulose, resins.
â­ Plasticizers.
â­ Dyes and pigments.
â­ Opalescent pigments.
â­ Adhesive polymers.
â­ Thickening agents.
â­ Ultraviolet stabilizers.
â­ Aqua.

description_en:
Achieve a warm, golden-kissed complexion with **Flormar Bronzing Powder 09 Sun Goddess**. This silky-smooth powder blends effortlessly onto your skin, imparting a natural-looking sun-kissed glow and a radiant, bronzed finish that lasts. Perfect for enhancing your features and adding a healthy, luminous touch. Elevate your natural beauty with **Flormar Bronzing Powder 09 Sun Goddess**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Bronzing Powder 09 Sun Goddess**:
â­ Using a bronzer brush, apply the powder to the areas of your face where the sun naturally hits, such as the cheekbones, forehead, nose, and chin.
â­ Blend well with the brush for an even distribution and a seamless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Bronzing Powder 09 Sun Goddess**:
â­ Silky-smooth powder.
â­ Natural bronzing pigments.
â­ Easy-to-blend formula.
â­ Long-lasting wear.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

Achieve flawless nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC62**, offering rich pigment and complete coverage from the first coat. Its high-pigment formula ensures a shiny, eye-catching look that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC62**

description_en:
Add a touch of elegance and sophistication to your look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC20**. This nail polish features a rich pigment formula that provides your nails with complete coverage and vibrant color from the first layer. Enjoy a shiny, eye-catching color that lasts, giving you unparalleled confidence throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC20**

â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat. Allow to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat to enhance shine and longevity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC20**

â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). Discover the perfect shade with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Nml Fc03**.

If you want to set the tone with your nails and achieve a lasting effect, **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Nml Fc03** is your ideal choice. This nail polish offers rich pigments and full coverage in a single coat, giving your nails a shiny look and long-lasting, eye-catching colors for hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Nml Fc03**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails over the base coat and allow it to dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Nml Fc03**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.

description_en:
Experience ultimate brilliance with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl42**, featuring a unique formula for effortless application and an extra-shiny finish. Enjoy rich color and full coverage with just one coat, ensuring the stunning glossy finish remains intact without chipping or flaking. **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl42** is your go-to for nails that look fabulous and last.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl42**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Remove the cap and dip the attached applicator into the nail enamel.
â­ Drip any excess liquid back into the bottle.
â­ Apply a thin coat of enamel to your nails and allow it to dry.
â­ For a more intense effect, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the lid tightly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl42**:
â­ Nail polish.

description_en:
Achieve a stunning look with **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD21**, in its vibrant and glossy red shade, adding a captivating touch to your nails for any occasion. This nail polish features a unique formula that combines rich color with deep nail nourishment, giving them an attractive appearance that lasts long and dries super-fast in just one minute. The bottle comes with a professional brush for easy and precise application.

Product Features:
â­ Imparts a rich, glossy red color to your nails.
â­ Dries super-fast within one minute.
â­ Deeply nourishes and moisturizes nails.
â­ Long-lasting without fading or chipping.
â­ Easy application thanks to the integrated brush.
â­ Harmless for your skin, providing a radiant look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD21**:
â­ Clean your nails thoroughly with nail polish remover.
â­ Shape and trim your nails as desired.
â­ Apply a base coat and wait two minutes for it to dry.
â­ Apply the first coat of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD21**.
â­ After one minute of the first coat drying, apply a second coat to enhance color and shine.
â­ Enjoy beautiful nails in no time.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD21**:
â­ High-quality liquid formula.
â­ Vibrant red color pigments.
â­ Nourishing ingredients to strengthen nails.
â­ Quick-drying agents.
â­ Free from harmful skin ingredients.

title_en: Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara Waterproof - Black: All-Day Voluminous & Defined Lashes
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù…Ø³ÙƒØ±Ø© Ø§ÙƒØ³10 Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ…Ø© Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯: Ø±Ù…ÙˆØ´ ÙƒØ«ÙŠÙØ© ÙˆÙ…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯Ø© Ø·ÙˆØ§Ù„ Ø§Ù„ÙŠÙˆÙ…
description_en:
Achieve dramatically long and voluminous lashes with **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara**.

This waterproof mascara features a formula enriched with olive oil that strengthens and lengthens lashes, giving you a dramatic and captivating look. With its non-flaking and non-clumping formula that lasts up to 12 hours, **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara** ensures a perfect look that lasts. Easy to apply thanks to its silky smooth texture and its specially designed curvy brush that separates lashes and provides perfect lift.

â­ Dramatically long and voluminous lashes.
â­ Waterproof formula that doesn't smudge or budge.
â­ Enriched with olive oil to strengthen and lengthen lashes.
â­ Silky texture for a smooth, clump-free application.
â­ Specially designed brush to separate and define lashes.
â­ Lasts all day without the need for frequent touch-ups.
â­ Perfect for everyday and special occasions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara**:
â­ For best results, use a high-quality lash primer before mascara to protect your lashes.
â­ Apply a smooth coat of mascara from roots to tips with a wriggling motion to separate lashes and avoid clumps.
â­ If you want to apply multiple coats, apply them while the mascara is still wet.
â­ Allow the mascara to dry for about 10 seconds and avoid blinking during this time.
â­ Use an oil-based makeup remover to effectively remove the waterproof mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara**:
â­ Olive Oil: To strengthen, lengthen, and nourish lashes.
â­ Wax: Provides long-lasting length and definition to lashes.
â­ Quick-Drying Formula: For easy application of multiple coats.

shortdescription_en: Get long, voluminous lashes with Flormar X10 Mascara. Waterproof, enriched with olive oil, long-lasting.

title_en: Flormar Baked Blush 104 Caramel
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø®Ø¯ÙˆØ¯ Ù…Ø®Ø¨ÙˆØ² 104 ÙƒØ§Ø±Ø§Ù…ÙŠÙ„
description_en:
Discover a natural radiance with **Flormar Baked Blush 104 Caramel**. Enjoy a velvety, buildable flush of color that gives your cheeks a healthy, long-lasting glow. Its unique baked formula glides on smoothly, while Vitamin E provides protection and nourishment to your skin.

â­ Delivers a natural, buildable color for glowing cheeks.
â­ Baked formula ensures a silky, lightweight texture that blends easily.
â­ Provides a natural finish that complements your complexion.
â­ Long-lasting wear to maintain your radiance all day.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E as an antioxidant for skin protection.
â­ Easy to blend for a natural, attractive look.
â­ Adds a subtle shimmer for captivating radiance.
â­ The peachy bronze shade flatters various skin tones, especially warmer undertones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Baked Blush 104 Caramel**
â­ Swirl your brush over the blush to pick up the product.
â­ Tap off any excess powder from the brush.
â­ Apply the blush to the apples of your cheeks, blending upwards towards your temples.
â­ You can layer the product for a more intense color payoff.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Baked Blush 104 Caramel**
â­ Talc, Mica, Mineral Oil, Magnesium Stearate.
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene.
â­ Vitamin E, Fragrance.
â­ May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 (CI 15850).

title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC41 â€“ Captivating Color Touch
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC41 â€“ Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø³Ø§Ø­Ø±Ø©
description_en:
Give your nails the perfect tone and a lasting effect with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC41**. This polish features rich pigments that provide complete coverage in an eye-catching color, even with a single layer. Achieve a shiny look and enjoy long-lasting, captivating colors on your nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC41**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat. Allow to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, then apply a top coat for protection and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC41**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2).

Achieve an irresistible nail look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC26**. It features rich pigments offering complete coverage in a single coat, giving you a lasting effect and vibrant color that endures. Enjoy captivating shades that impart exceptional shine to your nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC26**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat. Allow drying.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC26**:
â­ Rich formula with high pigments.
â­ Provides full coverage.
â­ Offers long-lasting shine.
â­ Features a smooth, easy-to-apply liquid formula.

description_en:
Discover the captivating Fouchea shade with **Flormar Nail Enamel 125**. This legendary nail enamel boasts a unique formula for effortless application and exceptional, long-lasting shine. It offers full coverage even with a single coat, maintaining its glossy finish without chipping or flaking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 125**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Dip the attached applicator into the nail enamel, and drip excess liquid back into the bottle.
â­ Apply a thin, even coat to your nails and wait for it to dry completely.
â­ For a more intense color, apply a second coat after the first has dried.
â­ Close the lid tightly after each use to preserve the product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 125**:
â­ Professional nail enamel formula providing rich color and superior shine.

description_en:
Discover the perfect shine with **Flormar Nail Enamel 400**. This bright white enamel offers a rich, vibrant shade that complements all skin tones, with an ultra-glossy finish. Quick-dry technology ensures easy, long-lasting application without chipping. The flat, carefully designed brush provides full coverage in a single stroke. **Flormar Nail Enamel 400** is your ideal choice for a professional and attractive nail look.

â­ Features an ultra-shiny, long-lasting finish.
â­ Quick-dry formula for user convenience.
â­ Full coverage in one stroke thanks to the flat applicator brush.
â­ Rich and vibrant pigments for a vivid color.
â­ Chip-resistant and long-wearing.
â­ Elegant 11 ml compact bottle.
â­ **Flormar Nail Enamel 400** is not tested on animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin coat to nails and allow to dry for 5 minutes.
â­ For a more intense and glossy look, apply a second layer as desired.
â­ Use acetone on a cotton pad to clean the nail sides for a neat finish.
â­ Apply a top coat to enhance shine and durability.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Contains high-quality pigments.
â­ Quick-dry formula.
â­ Ingredients that provide ultra-shine.

description_en:
Achieve a professional gel manicure effect at home with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Jl60 Cherry Pop**. This formula delivers ultra shimmer and intense color to your nails without the need for an LED lamp. Its special brush ensures an easy and smooth application. For maximum gloss and volume, apply two coats. Enjoy stunningly shiny and voluminous nails with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Jl60 Cherry Pop**
â­ Apply the first coat for a touch of color and shine.
â­ For a fantastic gel-like gloss and volume, especially apply in two coats.
â­ Follow usage guidelines for the best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish Jl60 Cherry Pop**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate.
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer.
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates Copolymer.
â­ Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica.
â­ Benzophenone-1, Diacetone Alcohol, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate.
â­ Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer.
â­ Mek, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake).

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect, and charming lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Creamy 02 - Nude**. This lipstick delivers dense, saturated color with a creamy, soft finish, providing a stunning look that lasts for hours thanks to its innovative no-smudge formula. It comes with a convenient sponge applicator for effortless and comfortable application.

â­ Dense and rich color with a creamy, soft finish.
â­ No-smudge formula ensures a perfect look for long hours.
â­ Easy and comfortable sponge applicator.
â­ Enhances your personality and gives your lips a noticeable touch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Creamy 02 - Nude**:
â­ Prepare your lips by gently exfoliating them.
â­ You can use a lip primer to increase longevity.
â­ Apply the lipstick as usual, ensuring your lips are parted.
â­ Wait for 1 minute for the product to dry and set.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Creamy 02 - Nude**:
â­ Aluminum Starch.
â­ Synthetic Beeswax.
â­ Ozokerite.
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.

description_en: Start with a flawless canvas using the **Flormar Illuminat Primer Makeup Base 01**. This base boasts a soft texture, delivering a matte finish and a smooth appearance that helps diminish early signs of aging. Ideal for oily skin, it targets T-zones to even out fine lines, cover pores and wrinkles, promoting a youthful and vibrant complexion. It perfectly preps the skin for long-lasting makeup, leaving it radiant. Infused with Acai berry and Green tea extracts, the **Flormar Illuminat Primer Makeup Base 01** rejuvenates and protects the skin with its antioxidant properties, maintaining suppleness and preventing damage. Silicone gel ensures an even spread, while silicone powder makes it sweat-resistant for enduring radiance.

description_en:
Achieve stunning nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC24**, designed to give you rich color and complete coverage in just one stroke. Enjoy a long-lasting formula that provides a captivating shine, making your look unforgettable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC24**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails over a base coat.
â­ Allow to dry completely.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, then apply a top coat for added protection and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC24**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose.
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate.
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer.
â­ Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica.
â­ Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate.
â­ Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer.
â­ Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2).

description_en:
Achieve a professional salon look with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish JL54 Terracotta**. Experience a luxurious gel manicure effect without the need for LED light, as this enamel delivers ultra-shimmer and intense color to your nails with its unique formula. The specially designed brush simplifies the application process with precision and ease, ensuring stunning results from the first coat. For unparalleled color depth and shine, apply two coats of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish JL54 Terracotta**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish JL54 Terracotta**
â­ For the best results, apply two even coats of the polish to your nails.
â­ Enjoy the intense gloss and volume it provides.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish JL54 Terracotta**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1, Diacetone Alcohol, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, MEK, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Ci 77000 (Aluminum Powder), Ci 60725 (Violet 2).

description_en:
Achieve perfectly sculpted, long-lasting eyebrows with **Flormar Extreme Eye Brow Tattoo Gel 06 Onyx**. This waterproof gel pencil delivers intense, smooth color in a single application, ensuring your makeup stays flawless from day to night.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Extreme Eye Brow Tattoo Gel 06 Onyx**:
â­ Apply along the lash line, starting from the inner corner of the eye and working outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Extreme Eye Brow Tattoo Gel 06 Onyx**:
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate, hydrogenated polyisobutene, synthetic wax, mica, isododecane, polybutene, calcium sodium borosilicate, calcium aluminum borosilicate, ethylene/propylene copolymer, silica silylate, silica, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, copernicia cerifera cera (carnauba wax), tin oxide. +/- (may contain): ci 77491 (iron oxides), ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

description_en:
Discover unparalleled shine with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl01**, the legendary nail polish known for its unique formula, easy application, and exceptional shine. It offers vibrant color and perfect coverage even with a single coat, maintaining a long-lasting glossy finish without chipping or flaking. Enjoy timeless elegance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl01**

â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Dip the attached applicator into the nail enamel.
â­ Drip excess liquid back into the bottle.
â­ Apply a thin coat of enamel on your nails and let it dry.
â­ For a more intense effect, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the lid tightly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl01**

â­ High-quality nail polish with a glossy formula.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 472 - Ù†ÙˆØ¯ ÙƒØ±Ø§Ù…ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ø§ØªÙŠÙ‡
description_en:
Discover natural beauty with **Flormar Nail Enamel 472**. This classic caramel latte shade offers a sophisticated and luminous finish that lasts. Its unique formula ensures effortless application and quick-drying results, providing a flawless look without smudging, even after a second coat. **Flormar Nail Enamel 472** is perfect for those seeking perfectly groomed, elegant nails with a subtle, natural touch. Presented in a sleek glass bottle with a brush designed for even, streak-free coverage in a single stroke. Its beautiful opaque shade looks great with just one coat, but two coats truly accentuate the color's depth, preventing fading or chipping.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before application.
â­ Ensure nails are clean before applying.
â­ Apply one coat of the nail enamel.
â­ For enhanced color depth and longer wear, applying two coats of **Flormar Nail Enamel** is recommended.
â­ Use a base coat and a topcoat to further increase the longevity of the nail polish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Features a rich caramel latte pigmentation.
â­ Formulated without harmful substances.
â­ Provides extra shine to the nails.
â­ Quick-drying and smudge-resistant.
â­ Long-lasting wear.

#Flormar #NailPolish #Manicure #StrongNails #NailCare #BeautifulNails #Makeup #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah
