title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø²ÙŠØ© ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± 03 ÙƒÙˆØ¨ÙŠØ± Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø² - Ù„Ø¥Ø´Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ©
description_en:
**Flormar Bronzing Powder** in shade 03 Copper Bronze delivers a natural, sun-kissed glow to your complexion. Its silky-smooth texture allows for effortless blending, enhancing your skin with a radiant, warm bronze finish. Perfect for sculpting and adding a healthy flush. Suitable for all skin types and offers long-lasting wear.

â­ Provides a natural, sun-kissed glow.
â­ Silky-smooth texture for easy, seamless blending.
â­ Enhances your complexion with a radiant, warm bronze finish.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for all skin types.
â­ Long-lasting wear for a perfect look throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Bronzing Powder**:
â­ Using a bronzer brush, apply the powder to the areas of your face where the sun naturally hits, such as the high points of your cheeks, forehead, bridge of the nose, and chin. Blend well with circular motions for a natural, even distribution of color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Bronzing Powder**:
â­ Mica
â­ Talc
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Magnesium Stearate
â­ Silica
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)
â­ Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)

#Flormar #BronzingPowder #FaceMakeup #NaturalTan #FaceGlow #SaudiBeauty #MakeupKSA #Cosmetics #Skincare #Beauty

Discover exceptional shine with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC64**. This nail polish offers rich pigments that provide complete coverage to your nails in a single stroke, giving them a glossy and captivating look that lasts. Perfect for transforming your nail's appearance and adding a professional touch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC64**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat.
â­ Allow drying.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat for protection and shine.

â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose

description_en:
Discover superior shine and long-lasting color with **Flormar Nail Polish** in the enchanting Snow White shade. Easy to apply and featuring a special formula, it guarantees dazzling, long-lasting nails.

â­ Effortless application with its unique formula.
â­ Provides exceptional shine for a professional look.
â­ Available in a wide range of colors for diverse styles.
â­ Long-lasting to maintain your nail's beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Polish**

â­ Shake well before use to ensure color consistency.
â­ Apply one thin coat of your preferred shade.
â­ For a more intense and deeper effect, apply a second thin coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Polish**

â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol.
â­ Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1.
â­ Polyethylene Terephthalate, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polybutylene Terephthalate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Titanium Dioxide [Nano].
â­ Ethylene/Va Copolymer, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Polyurethane-11.
â­ Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Tin Oxide.
â­ +/- (May Contain): Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Red 6 Lake (Ci 15850), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140).

title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC42 - Gray

description_en:
Discover the magic of color with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC42 - Gray**. Flormar, a trusted brand with over 70 years of experience, offers exceptional quality in cosmetics. This elegant gray shade is perfect for adding a modern touch to your look, whether paired with black, white, or a combination outfit. The chic bottle makes it incredibly easy to carry and apply. Featuring a quick-dry formula, it gives your nails a stunning look in minutes, perfect for sudden events or adding sparkle to your day.

â­ **Product Features:**
â­ High-gloss finish that enhances your nails and complements your outfit.
â­ Vivid and shiny colors from Flormar's wide range, expertly crafted for unparalleled brilliance.
â­ Long-lasting wear thanks to its innovative formula that prevents chipping and peeling.
â­ Crack-free appearance providing your nails with a natural, long-lasting gloss.
â­ High-quality brush engineered for complete coverage in a single stroke, ensuring smooth, drag-free application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC42 - Gray**:
â­ Thoroughly clean your nails from any previous polish using nail polish remover and a cotton pad.
â­ Trim and file your nails if needed, then soak your hands in warm water to relax them.
â­ Push back cuticles and dry your hands.
â­ Use a cotton pad to remove any moisturizer from your nails.
â­ Apply a base coat to protect your nails and add extra vitality to the polish.
â­ Apply one coat of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC42 - Gray** for the desired color, or a second coat for a more intense look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC42 - Gray**:
â­ [Actual ingredients will be listed here upon availability]

description_en:
Discover a dazzling look with Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC36 - Gray, a trusted brand with over 70 years of experience in the cosmetic industry. This nail polish offers a super-glossy finish and vibrant, long-lasting colors, making it perfect for all your occasions. The Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC36 - Gray comes in an elegant, easy-to-carry bottle, featuring a quick-dry formula that gives your nails a perfect look in minutes. Enjoy chip-free and bubble-free polish thanks to the high-quality brush that provides complete coverage in a single stroke, ensuring an even application without clumps.

â­ Lustrous finish that enhances your outfit.
â­ Vivid and shiny colors from a wide selection.
â­ Innovative formula that lasts long without chipping.
â­ A glossy, flawless look for extended periods.
â­ High-quality brush for easy application and full coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC36 - Gray**:
â­ Clean your nails thoroughly of any previous polish using nail polish remover and a cotton pad.
â­ Trim and file your nails if necessary, then soak your hands in warm water to relax them.
â­ Dry your hands, push back cuticles, and remove any moisturizer from your nails with a cotton pad.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional) to add life and protection to your nails.
â­ Apply one coat of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC36 - Gray**, or a second coat for more intensity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC36 - Gray**:
â­ Enjoy a high-quality nail polish experience with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC36 - Gray**.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± ÙƒÙˆÙŠÙƒ Ø¯Ø±Ø§ÙŠ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Qd22 - Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± ÙØ§ØªÙ†
description_en:
Discover exceptional color with the **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd22 - Captivating Red**, designed to give your nails a stunning look for all your special occasions, from weddings to Halloween parties. This unique enamel combines rich red color with superior shine, featuring nourishing properties to ensure healthy, attractive, and long-lasting nails. Its innovative formula dries quickly and comes with a precise brush for easy and professional application.

â­ Adds a captivating and attractive finish.
â­ Completely safe for your skin.
â­ Easy to apply with the integrated brush.
â­ Long-lasting to maintain your nail beauty.
â­ Dries in just one minute.
â­ Nourishes and deeply moisturizes nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd22 - Captivating Red**:
â­ Ensure any old nail polish is removed using nail polish remover.
â­ Trim and shape your nails for the desired look.
â­ Apply a base coat and let it dry for a few minutes.
â­ Apply the first coat of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd22 - Captivating Red**.
â­ After the first coat dries in one minute, apply a second coat to enhance color and opacity.
â­ Wait another minute to enjoy your new, stunning nail look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel Qd22 - Captivating Red**:
â­ High-quality liquid formula.
â­ Rich red pigments and glossy color.
â­ Nourishing ingredients for nails.
â­ Quick-drying agents.
â­ Precision application brush.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 344 - Ø§Ù„Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙŠØ¯: ØªØ£Ù„Ù‚ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Give your nails a touch of elegance and sophistication with **Flormar Nail Enamel 344 - Nude Shade**. This exquisite enamel imparts the perfect color to your hands, offering a radiant shine that makes it your go-to product for any occasion. Thanks to its innovative formula, it boasts exceptional durability, resistance to fading and peeling, a smooth texture, and chip resistance, ensuring a glamorous look for days. The carefully designed brush ensures easy, drip-free application, providing full coverage in a single stroke. **Flormar Nail Enamel 344 - Nude Shade** is not just a nail polish; it's a testament to quality with multiple ISO certifications and an affordable price, making it an indispensable addition to your beauty collection.

â­ Features cruelty-free status, having not been tested on animals.
â­ Long-lasting wear ensures a glamorous look for days without worry.
â­ Rich in pigments for excellent color payoff.
â­ Comes with a well-designed applicator for full coverage and one-stroke application.
â­ Quick-dry formula dries in a jiffy.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Non-toxic and safe to wear on nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 344 - Nude Shade**
â­ Shake the bottle well before application.
â­ Clean and gently dry your nails.
â­ Apply a first coat of your favorite shade with a straight line from the base to the tip, then work on the sides similarly.
â­ Let the first coat dry completely before applying a second coat for enhanced color and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 344 - Nude Shade**
â­ Store the product in a cool and dry place.
â­ Keep the product away from children to avoid choking hazards.
â­ Keep the product away from direct sunlight and heat.
â­ Shake the bottle well before each use for optimal results.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ In case of accidental ingestion, seek medical advice immediately.

description_en:
Achieve stunning nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC23**. This nail polish offers rich pigments and full coverage in just one layer, giving you a glossy, eye-catching color that lasts. Its advanced formula ensures a professional look every time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC23**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat. Allow drying.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat for protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC23**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2).

Discover sophisticated perfection with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl41 - Nude**. This nail polish offers a unique experience with its innovative formula, ensuring easy application and exceptional, long-lasting shine.

The nail enamel provides rich color and full coverage even with a single coat, maintaining its attractive gloss without chipping or flaking. Achieve an elegant and vibrant look that lasts all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl41 - Nude**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin coat of the enamel to your nails.
â­ Wait for it to dry completely before applying a second coat for more intense coverage.
â­ Close the lid tightly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl41 - Nude**:
â­ Nail polish.

description_en:
Achieve a perfect finish with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC30**. This richly pigmented nail enamel delivers full coverage in a vibrant, shiny color with just one coat, ensuring a captivating look that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC30**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat.
â­ Allow drying.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat for added shine and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC30**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer.
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer.
â­ Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol.
â­ Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1.
â­ Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer.
â­ Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake).
â­ Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake).
â­ Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake).
â­ Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2).

title_en: Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel JL04 Scarlet - Professional Gel Shine
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø¬ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙƒ JL04 Ø³ÙƒØ§Ø±Ù„Øª - Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† Ø¬Ù„ Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ
description_en:
Experience exceptional brilliance with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**. This innovative polish delivers a luxurious gel manicure effect without the need for an LED lamp, bestowing your nails with rich color and ultra shimmer. Its specially designed brush ensures an easy application for a professional finish every time. One coat imparts a touch of radiance, while two coats of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel** provide intensified color, enhanced shine, and a noticeable volume that highlights your nail's beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**

â­ For the best results, applying two coats of the enamel is recommended.
â­ The two coats enable a fantastic gloss and volume, giving your nails a polished gel appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**

â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Acrylates Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Benzophenone-1, Diacetone Alcohol, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Mek, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminium Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Ci 77000 (Aluminum Powder), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). [0414072.03]

title_en: Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W10 - Flawless Matte Finish for Shine-Free Skin
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¬Ø§ÙØ© W10 - ØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù†
description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect skin with **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W10**. Compact powder is an essential part of every woman's daily makeup routine, providing a smooth and even complexion with a flawless matte finish. This special oil-free formula is designed to give you superior shine control and naturally conceal imperfections. Perfect for everyday use, whether dry or wet, it offers customizable coverage and a flawless look all day long. **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W10** is your perfect companion for achieving a naturally perfect look every time.

â­ Delivers a smooth, matte finish for even-toned skin.
â­ Deeply hydrates the skin to restore its natural radiance.
â­ Blends seamlessly with the skin without caking.
â­ Keeps skin oil-free and prevents dryness, providing a natural look.
â­ Available in five natural shades, ideal for all skin types.
â­ Can be used dry or wet for versatile coverage.
â­ Features a sleek, portable compact with a soft sponge and built-in mirror.
â­ Long-lasting formula that easily hides dark spots, acne, and imperfections.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W10**
â­ Use the dry sponge for a smooth powder finish.
â­ Gently dab the compact over the face and neck for even application.
â­ Dampen the sponge applicator for a stronger base application.
â­ Start applying from the center of your face and blend outwards towards the edges.
â­ Wash and rinse the sponge after use, and ensure it's clean and dry before placing it back in the compact.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Wet&Dry Compact Powder W10**
â­ Natural ingredients for deep hydration.
â­ Oil-free formula for shine control.

description_en:
Elevate your eye makeup with the **Flormar Vinyl Waterproof Dipliner**, delivering a glossy and bold finish that captivates. This waterproof, smudge-free formula ensures long-lasting wear for hours, making your eyes look prettier, more elegant, and striking.

âœ¨ Product Features:
â­ Waterproof and long-lasting without smudging.
â­ Rich dark color shade for a shiny and bold eye look.
â­ Fine, felt-tip brush for precise lines and trendy shapes.
â­ Incredibly comfortable and easy to wear, ensuring a smooth, clump-free application.
â­ Versatile for creating various styles like winged tips or cat-eye looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Vinyl Waterproof Dipliner**:
â­ Start from the center of the upper lash line, moving towards the outer corner.
â­ Draw a connected line, keeping your hand steady for an even result.
â­ Fill in any gaps with small, precise strokes.
â­ Repeat the process for the other eye to achieve a symmetrical look.
â­ Allow the eyeliner a moment to dry for a perfect, polished finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Vinyl Waterproof Dipliner**:
â­ Advanced liquid formula.
â­ Rich black pigments.
â­ Waterproof ingredients for ultimate staying power.
â­ Quick-drying components.

#Flormar #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #WaterproofMakeup #SaudiBeauty #ProMakeup #BoldEyes #GulfMakeup #Elegance #FlormarMakeup

title_en: Flormar Waterproof Eyeliner Pencil - Deep Black 105
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø§ÙŠÙ„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ 105
description_en:
Discover an unparalleled eye look with **Flormar Waterproof Eyeliner Pencil**. Flormar, founded in Turkey, offers a global brand with a wide range of over 800 products to meet all your beauty needs. At Flormar, we believe that color diversity is key to expressing every unique culture and background.

The **Flormar Waterproof Eyeliner Pencil** empowers you to define your eyelids, waterlines, and even your brows with ultimate precision. You can also effortlessly create a captivating smoky eye look, as it features rich pigmentation, is waterproof and smudge-proof, and lasts up to 12 hours. Enriched with Vitamin E to moisturize your eyes and give them a youthful appearance.

â­ Available in various highly pigmented colors.
â­ Contains Vitamin E for eye area hydration.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof.
â­ Does not fade for up to 12 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Waterproof Eyeliner Pencil**:
â­ To line your eyelids and waterline, gently glide the pencil across the desired area. Prep your eyes with moisturizer and concealer before starting.
â­ For beginners, keep your upper eyelid flat and draw with small strokes along the lash line, you can gradually build the thickness.
â­ Always start from the inner corner of the eye and move towards the outer edge.
â­ For a winged liner look, draw a diagonal line from the wing tip to the middle of the upper lash line, then fill in the gaps.
â­ For a smoky look, glide the pencil across the upper lash line and blend the color across the entire eyelid with a blending brush.
â­ For brows, draw a defined line above and below the eyebrows, focusing on defining the tail end of the brow. Fill in gaps with light, upward strokes; always hold the pencil sideways and avoid using its pointed tip to fill in your brows.
â­ Set your brows with clear brow gel or clear mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Waterproof Eyeliner Pencil**:
â­ Formula rich in high pigmentation.
â­ Contains Vitamin E.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof formula.

#Flormar #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #Beauty #ProfessionalMakeup #AttractiveEyes #Waterproof #TikTokMakeup #RiyadhMakeup #SaudiArabia

shortdescription_en: Flormar waterproof & smudge-proof eyeliner lasts 12 hours, with rich pigment & Vitamin E for captivating, comfortable eyes.

title_en: Flormar Eyeliner Pen Black - Precision & All-Day Shine
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø§ÙŠÙ„Ø§ÙŠÙ†Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ø§Ø³ÙˆØ¯ - Ø¯Ù‚Ø© ÙˆÙ„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Achieve the perfect finish for your eyes with **Flormar Eyeliner Pen Black**. This highly pigmented eyeliner is water-resistant and smudge-proof, ensuring a flawless look all day long. It features a soft brush with a fine tip that makes it easy to draw precise, adjustable lines for any desired look, from subtle and natural to bold winged liner. Its advanced, water-based formula, enriched with silica and vitamin F, brings out your eyes' natural beauty and lasts up to 12 hours without fading or smudging.

â­ Highly pigmented for rich color payoff from the first stroke.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof for long-lasting wear.
â­ Fine brush applicator for easy application and sharp lines.
â­ Lasts up to 12 hours without smudging or fading.
â­ Enhances eyes naturally.
â­ User-friendly for both beginners and professionals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Eyeliner Pen Black**:
â­ Apply eye cream under your eyes and wait for absorption.
â­ Apply concealer on eyelids and under eyes as a perfect base.
â­ Set concealer with compact powder.
â­ If desired, apply and blend eyeshadow well.
â­ Start applying eyeliner from the inner corner to the outer edge of your eye.
â­ For beginners, start with small lines and strokes that can be connected.
â­ For a winged look, keep your eyelid as flat as possible.
â­ Draw a line from the wing tip down to the upper lash line.
â­ Fill in the wing with color.
â­ For first-time users, outline with an eyeliner pencil and then go over it with the **Flormar Eyeliner Pen Black**.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Eyeliner Pen Black**:
â­ Silica
â­ Carbon Black (Pigment)
â­ Vitamin F
â­ Water-based formulation

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined brows with the **Flormar Extreme Brow Tattoo Gel Pen 04 Intense Blue**. This gel pencil delivers a smooth, intensely pigmented look with a single swipe, making it your go-to for precise and captivating brow definition.

Thanks to its water-resistant formula, the **Flormar Extreme Brow Tattoo Gel Pen 04 Intense Blue** maintains its effect all day without smudging or fading. It flawlessly complements your makeup, adding vibrant tones from day to night. Enjoy bold, long-lasting brow definition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Extreme Brow Tattoo Gel Pen 04 Intense Blue**:
â­ Apply along the lash line, starting from the inner corner of the eye and working outwards for precise brow definition.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Extreme Brow Tattoo Gel Pen 04 Intense Blue**:
â­ Advanced formula for long-lasting wear and rich color payoff.
â­ Water-resistant ingredients ensure smudge-proof, enduring hold.
â­ A blend of waxes and polymers for a smooth application.

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect, and charming lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Candy 11**. This lipstick delivers a dense, saturated color with a magical finish that lasts for long hours, thanks to its smudge-proof formula. It boasts a lightweight, creamy texture that leaves your lips feeling exceptionally soft. The included sponge applicator ensures precise and comfortable application. **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Candy 11** provides a perfect, no-smudge effect, enhancing your personality with a subtle yet noticeable touch on your lips.

â­ Delivers intense, rich color that lasts.
â­ Lightweight, creamy, and soft texture for ultimate comfort.
â­ Smudge-proof formula ensures a stable and attractive look.
â­ Comes with a sponge applicator for easy and precise application.
â­ Enhances your lips' beauty with a distinctive and noticeable effect.

description_en:
Indulge your lips with rich color and an irresistible look with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Doll 06**. Achieve perfect, enchanting lips that last for long hours with its innovative formula, providing dense color and an ultra-smooth creamy texture. It comes with a sponge applicator for superior ease and precision during application, ensuring a smudge-free finish. This product is perfect for boosting your personality and adding a distinctive touch of beauty to your lips.

âœ¨ Product Features:
â­ Dense and rich color for an attractive lip appearance.
â­ Extremely soft, creamy, and lightweight texture.
â­ Long-lasting hold for many hours without smudging.
â­ Easy application thanks to the integrated sponge applicator.
â­ Leaves lips with a saturated and moisturized look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Doll 06**:
â­ Prepare your lips by gently exfoliating them for the best results.
â­ You can use a lip primer to increase color longevity.
â­ Apply the lipstick with ease using the included applicator.
â­ Keep your lips slightly parted for 1 minute to allow the product to dry and set.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Doll 06**:
â­ Aluminum Starch
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Cetyl Alcohol

description_en:
Discover the perfect shade with **Flormar Nail Enamel 305**, designed to give your hands a radiant and glossy finish. This nail enamel is incredibly easy to apply and is your ideal choice for any occasion. Its unique formula ensures long-lasting color, resistance to fading and chipping, a smooth texture, and durability against breakage. The expertly designed brush prevents drips and ensures a smooth, comfortable application. **Flormar Nail Enamel 305** holds international quality certifications like ISO, making it a high-quality product at an affordable price.

Product Features:
â­ Cruelty-free and not tested on animals.
â­ Long-lasting wear for a captivating look for days.
â­ Richly pigmented for excellent color payoff.
â­ Well-designed applicator brush for easy, one-coat coverage.
â­ Quick-dry formula dries in the blink of an eye.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Non-toxic and safe for nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 305**
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Clean and gently dry your nails.
â­ Apply a coat of your favorite color in a straight line from cuticle to tip, then apply to the sides evenly.
â­ Let the first coat dry, then apply a second coat for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 305**
â­ (Note: Specific ingredient list not provided in original data, but similar products typically include: Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Sucrose Stearate, etc.)

shortdescription_en: Give your nails long-lasting, glossy color with Flormar Nail Enamel 305. Easy to apply, resistant to fading and chipping. Perfect for every occasion!

title_en: Flormar Nail Enamel - Shade 425 - Soft Purple
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± - Ø§Ù„Ø¸Ù„ 425 - Ø¨Ù†ÙØ³Ø¬ÙŠ Ù†Ø§Ø¹Ù…
description_en:
Give your nails a magical touch with **Flormar Nail Enamel**, shade 425 in Soft Purple. Enjoy a rich, long-lasting color with exceptional shine that makes your look stand out on all occasions. Its easy-to-apply formula ensures you achieve a professional finish as if you were at a beauty salon, and thanks to its soft brush, you can spread the color smoothly and precisely.

âœ¨ Key Features of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Shade 425: Soft Purple, an elegant color that suits all skin tones and looks.
â­ Bottle Size: 11 ml, a perfect quantity for frequent use.
â­ Brush: Soft and easy to use for a smooth and precise application.
â­ Shine: Long-lasting and maintains nail brilliance.
â­ Versatile: Suitable for fingernails and toenails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ Gently roll the bottle between your hands to mix the polish well; avoid shaking.
â­ Open the cap, dip the brush into the polish, and apply a thin layer to the nails.
â­ Avoid contact with the skin surrounding the nails for a perfect result.
â­ For increased color intensity and shine, apply a second coat after the first has dried.
â­ Allow nails to air dry completely.
â­ You can add a top coat to enhance the color's longevity and shine.
â­ After use, close the bottle tightly to prevent drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel**:
â­ High-quality formula that ensures vibrant and shiny color.
â­ (Note: It is recommended to refer to the product label for a complete list of ingredients.)

#Flormar #NailPolish #Manicure #NailMakeup #BeautifulShades #PurpleColor #Beauty #NailCare #SaudiArabia #Cosmetics

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙŠØª Ø¸Ù„Ø§Ù„ Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ¯ 01 - Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙŠØ¯
description_en:
Discover the beauty of your eyes with the **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette 01 - Nude**. This stunning palette offers 10 highly concentrated neutral shades to give you endless looks, from a natural everyday look to a dramatic smoky eye. With its smooth and easily blendable formula, it ensures a long-lasting semi-matte to pearly finish, highlighting your eyes with an elegant touch. The **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette 01 - Nude** is safe and suitable for daily use, featuring a sturdy and sleek packaging that fits perfectly into your makeup kit.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette 01 - Nude**:
â­ Use a clean, dry makeup brush.
â­ Apply the eyeshadow onto the brush, patting off any excess.
â­ Begin applying the shadow to your lids, blending for the desired look.
â­ Mix different shades to create unique finishes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette 01 - Nude**:
â­ 10 highly pigmented neutral shades.
â­ Smooth, blendable pressed powder formula.
â­ Provides a semi-matte to pearly finish.
â­ High-quality ingredients, safe for daily use.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± 69 - Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Achieve an unparalleled nail look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Fc69**. This polish features rich pigments that provide complete coverage in a single coat, giving you a captivating shine that lasts. Enjoy vibrant, eye-catching colors that make your nails the center of attention.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Fc69**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat.
â­ Allow to dry completely.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat for color protection and added shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Fc69**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). [34000014.00]

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect nails with **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD23** in its beautiful nude shade. Its unique formula allows for easy application and exceptional long-lasting shine. **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD23** provides full coverage with rich color and attractive gloss, maintaining its finish without chipping. Enjoy a wide range of colors and choices, from glossy to matte, from Flormar for an unforgettable look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD23**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin coat to your nails and wait for it to dry.
â­ For a deeper color, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the cap tightly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Quick Dry Nail Enamel QD23**:
â­ Unique nail polish formula.
â­ High-quality ingredients for color and shine.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø¬ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙƒ JL46 - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø£Ù„ÙˆØ§Ù† Ø²Ø§Ù‡ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Experience brilliance and sophistication with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl46**. Its unique formula ensures easy application and exceptional, long-lasting shine, giving your nails a radiant and rich look. Enjoy a vibrant wildlife green shade that inspires vitality with a super glossy finish. It provides full coverage even with a single coat and maintains its glossy finish without chipping or flaking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl46**

â­ Shake the bottle well before use to ensure color consistency.
â­ Remove the brush from the bottle and wipe off any excess liquid on the bottle neck.
â­ Apply a thin, even layer of polish to each nail.
â­ For a deeper color and perfect coverage, apply a second coat after the first one dries.
â­ Close the bottle tightly after use to maintain product quality.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel Jl46**

â­ Advanced nail polish formula providing rich color and superior shine.
â­ High-quality ingredients ensuring color stability and preventing chipping.
â­ Vibrant wildlife green pigment inspired by nature.

title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC30 - Glossy White
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC30 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø¨ÙŠØ¶ Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹
description_en:
Achieve an elegant and radiant look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC30** in its pristine white shade and superior gloss. With 70 years of experience in the cosmetics industry, **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC30** is your perfect choice for all occasions, whether casual or formal. The nail enamel features a quick-drying formula to ensure perfect nails in minutes, complemented by a high-quality brush that provides even, clump-free coverage in a single stroke.

âœ¨ Product Features:
â­ Superior shine that enhances your nails' beauty and elevates your style.
â­ Vibrant and attractive colors from a wide selection to suit all tastes.
â­ Innovative formula that lasts long without chipping or fading, for a stunning look for days.
â­ Crack-free and bubble-free, giving your nails a healthy and attractive appearance.
â­ Professional brush for easy and even application, ensuring complete coverage in one stroke.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC30**:
â­ Start by removing any previous nail polish with a gentle remover and a cotton pad.
â­ Trim and file your nails, and tidy up any excess cuticle for the best look.
â­ Soak your hands in warm water to relax them, then dry thoroughly.
â­ Use a cotton pad to remove any moisturizer residue from the nails for optimal adhesion.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional) to protect your nails and add vitality to the color.
â­ Apply one coat of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC30**. For more intense color, you can add a second coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC30**:
â­ Innovative formula for glossy color and long-lasting wear.
â­ High-quality pigments for vibrant and lively colors.
â­ Quick-drying ingredients for ease of use.

#Flormar #NailPolish #Manicure #Makeup #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Khobar #GlossyNails

description_en:
Discover perfection with the **Flormar W.P Lipliner Pencil 211**, your ultimate choice for precise lip definition. This waterproof, sweat, and humidity-resistant pencil delivers a natural, captivating look that lasts. Formulated with polymers, the **Flormar W.P Lipliner Pencil 211** creates a strong film that prevents lipstick from smudging or bleeding into fine lines, even in hot weather. Its smooth texture dries quickly, providing comfort and continuous beauty.

â­ Long-lasting lip makeup that is water and sweat resistant.
â­ Prevents lipstick from smudging and maintains its perfect shape.
â­ Glides on smoothly for a comfortable feel.
â­ Available in a variety of shades to match all your looks.
â­ Product not engaged in animal testing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar W.P Lipliner Pencil 211**
â­ For best results, start by applying a light coat of lip balm to moisturize and plump your lips.
â­ Use a slightly blunt tip of the lipliner for more natural-looking outlines.
â­ Sketch the outer lines of your lips with a swift, continuous motion to create a perfect shape.
â­ After defining your lips, apply your favorite lipstick or lip gloss to complete your look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar W.P Lipliner Pencil 211**
â­ Strong polymer formula for water resistance and long-lasting wear.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to maintain lip softness.
â­ Rich and stable colors.

#Flormar #Lipliner #LipMakeup #LipPencil #Waterproof #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhBeauty #Cosmetics #LipCare #FlormarSaudi

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø²Ø± Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© 02 Ø±ÙˆØ² Ø¬ÙˆÙ„Ø¯ - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ø¯ÙØ¡ Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Achieve a healthy-looking glow with Flormar Bronzing Powder in shade 02 Rosegold. This bronzer is designed to add natural warmth and dimension to your face, offering a buildable medium coverage for a customized sunkissed look. Its smooth, natural finish blends seamlessly, making it suitable for all skin types. The convenient compact with a mirror ensures easy application anywhere.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Bronzing Powder 02 Rosegold**:
â­ Swirl your brush over the bronzer to pick up the product.
â­ Tap off any excess powder.
â­ Apply the bronzer to areas where the sun naturally hits your face, such as your forehead, cheeks, and jawline.
â­ Blend the bronzer well for a natural-looking finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Bronzing Powder 02 Rosegold**:
â­ Rosegold Shade: Adds a subtle flush of color and natural-looking warmth.
â­ Natural Finish: Blends seamlessly for a believable sun-kissed look.
â­ Medium Coverage: Build it up from a light wash to a more noticeable bronzed effect.

â­ Compact with Mirror: Designed for convenient on-the-go application.

description_en:
Discover an irresistible nail look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC32**, your ultimate solution for rich, long-lasting color. This enamel boasts powerful pigments that deliver full coverage in a single coat, giving your nails an eye-catching shine and a captivating look that lasts for hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC32**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat. Allow to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, then apply a top coat for added protection and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC32**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC04 - Nude
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± 04 - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ¯
description_en:
Discover vibrant color and unmatched elegance with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC04 - Nude**. Flormar, a trusted brand with over 70 years of cosmetic industry experience, delivers exceptional quality to give your nails a sophisticated touch. This neutral nude shade is the perfect choice for all your occasions, whether you're wearing black, white, or a combination. It comes in a chic and portable bottle and features a quick-dry formula to give you gorgeous nails in minutes, even for a sudden party. Enjoy a flawless, long-lasting look.

â­ Provides intense shine that enhances your look and complements your outfits.
â­ Vivid and glossy colors from Flormar's wide range, each shade expertly crafted for brilliance.
â­ Stays on for days with its innovative, chip-resistant formula.
â­ Offers a long-lasting, crack-free, glossy finish, unlike many nail polishes that develop flaws quickly.
â­ High-quality brush engineered for complete coverage in a single stroke, ensuring smooth, streak-free application for a professional finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC04 - Nude**
â­ Clean your nails of any previous polish using nail polish remover and a cotton pad.
â­ Trim and file your nails if needed for a perfect shape.
â­ Soak your hands in warm water to relax them after filing, then dry thoroughly and push back cuticles.
â­ Use a cotton pad to remove any moisturizer from your nails; this step is crucial for vitality and protection.
â­ Your nails are now ready for this beautiful color.
â­ A single coat is usually sufficient, but you can add a second for more depth and intensity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC04 - Nude**
â­ Contains an innovative formula that ensures rich color and long-lasting shine.
â­ Free from harmful ingredients that may cause chipping or color fading.
â­ High-quality ingredients provide a perfect finish and easy application.

description_en:
When it comes to first impressions, our hands always take the forefront. Discover the beauty of your hands and nails with **Flormar Nail Enamel 423**, the perfect product to give you a captivating and radiant look. Thanks to its unique formula, **Flormar Nail Enamel 423** is easy to apply and boasts exceptional, long-lasting shine, making it your ultimate choice for attractive nails on every occasion.

â­ **Flormar Nail Enamel** is cruelty-free and non-toxic.
â­ Specially crafted formula with a long-lasting shiny effect.
â­ Proven quality with multiple ISO certifications.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 423**

â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Uncap the nail enamel. Dip the applicator into the enamel and drip any excess liquid back into the bottle.
â­ Apply a thin coat on your nails and wait for it to dry.
â­ For a more intense color, apply a second coat.
â­ Close the lid tightly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 423**

â­ Special formula providing superior shine and durability.
â­ High-quality raw materials for performance assurance.
â­ Carefully selected ingredients for nail safety.

#Flormar #NailEnamel #Manicure #SaudiBeauty #Cosmetics #BeautifulNails #NailCare #SaudiShopping #SaudiDeals #BeautySalon

title_en: Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil 231 - Perfect Long-Lasting Finish
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ 231 - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù†Ù‡Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ØªØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Discover precision and radiance with the **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil 231**. Designed to give you perfect definition that lasts all day, this waterproof and sweat-resistant pencil ensures your lipstick stays in place without smudging or fading. Its smooth texture provides a comfortable feel and dries quickly, making it an ideal base for full, attractive lips even in hot weather. Enjoy perfectly defined lips with every use.

â­ Provides long-lasting lip make-up
â­ Water, sweat, and humidity-resistant
â­ Smooth texture and easy application
â­ Prevents lipstick from smudging or bleeding into fine lines
â­ Ideal for shaping lips and giving them a plumper look

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil 231**
â­ Start with a light layer of lip balm to maintain lip moisture.
â­ Use the pencil tip to draw soft, natural outer lines; avoid excessive sharpness.
â­ Draw with a continuous, swift stroke to achieve a perfect shape.
â­ After lining your lips, apply your favorite lipstick or lip gloss shade.
â­ Enjoy beautifully defined lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Water-Proof Lipliner Pencil 231**
â­ A strong polymer formulation ensures water resistance and long-lasting hold.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients keep lips soft.
â­ A moisture-proof formula prevents lipstick smudging.

#Flormar #LipLiner #Lips #LipMakeup #RiyadhMakeup #JeddahMakeup #GulfMakeup #DefinedLips #HighQualityMakeup #LipCare

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ùƒ Ù…Ø§Øª Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ 007 - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù…Ø®Ù…Ù„ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø®Ø±ÙŠÙ
description_en:
Discover velvety beauty with the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 007**. This autumn-inspired shade brings an unparalleled chic and sophisticated look, making it the perfect choice for those who prefer a matte finish over gloss for their daily style. Shine with captivating lips that express your unique personality.

â­ The **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 007** comes in an elegant, compact glass case, making it your ideal companion wherever you go.
â­ It offers rich color in a single swipe, with high staying power for a long-lasting look.
â­ Its high-quality brush ensures easy and precise application without clumping or breaking.
â­ Enriched with advanced oils that deeply nourish and moisturize lips, giving you a healthy and attractive appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 007**
â­ Before application, it's recommended to moisturize your lips or use a primer to prepare them.
â­ Start by precisely defining the outer lip line to achieve a perfect shape.
â­ Lip lining helps to easily fill in gaps and ensure accurate lip definition.
â­ To naturally enhance your lips, you can draw a line slightly outside your natural lip edge.
â­ When applying color to the inner part of the lips, use short strokes and be careful not to go beyond the defined outer line.
â­ Wipe off any excess product from the brush with a tissue for better control and to prevent dripping.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 007**
â­ Formula enriched with moisturizing and nourishing lip oils.
â­ High-quality pigments providing long-lasting, velvety matte color.
â­ Free from ingredients that may cause lip dryness.

#Flormar #LiquidLipstick #Matte #Lips #Makeup #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Dammam

description_en:
Experience unparalleled volume with **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara Volume**. This revolutionary mascara is expertly crafted to give your lashes up to 10 times more volume in a single coat. Its buttery-smooth formula, enriched with nourishing olive oil, works to strengthen and condition your lashes, promoting a healthier and more captivating look. The ergonomic wand with its curvy bristles ensures effortless application and perfect lash lifting, delivering clump-free, voluminous lashes that last. The sturdy yet lightweight packaging makes **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara Volume** your ideal travel companion and daily essential.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara Volume**:
â­ For best results, prep lashes with a mascara primer, or apply directly.
â­ Coat lashes with a wriggling motion from roots to tips.
â­ Apply multiple coats before previous coats dry for added intensity.
â­ Apply mascara at the end of your eye makeup routine.
â­ Allow the formula to dry for 15 seconds between coats.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara Volume**:
â­ Olive Oil: Nourishes and strengthens lashes.
â­ Buttery-smooth Formula: For easy application and glide.
â­ Safe and Durable Materials: Ensures product quality.

#Flormar #Mascara #VoluminousLashes #EyeMakeup #LongLashes #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #DailyMakeup

description_en:
Achieve a professional gel manicure effect without LED light with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 35 Cyrstal Blue**. This nail enamel delivers ultra shimmer and intense color to your nails, thanks to its unique formula and special application brush.

â­ Creates a gel manicure effect instantly.
â­ Ultra-shiny finish and exceptional color intensity.
â­ Specially designed brush for easy application.
â­ Visibly stunning results from the first coat, with enhanced shine and volume with two coats.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Polish 35 Cyrstal Blue**:
â­ For a fantastic gloss and volume, the application especially in two coats is recommended.

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect, and charming lips with the Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo in enchanting black. This product delivers a dense and saturated color thanks to its creamy texture that ensures superior softness. Its no-smudge formula keeps your lips looking brilliant for long hours. It comes with a built-in sponge applicator for easy and comfortable application.

â­ Provides lips with a dense and rich color.
â­ Creamy, soft, and lightweight texture.
â­ No-smudge formula ensures long-lasting wear.
â­ Integrated sponge applicator for ease of use.
â­ Gives lips an intense and saturated look with maximum color payoff.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**:
â­ Prepare your lips by gently exfoliating them.
â­ You can apply a lip primer to increase longevity.
â­ Apply the lipstick as you normally would.
â­ Wait for 1 minute after application for the product to dry and set.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo**:
â­ Aluminum Starch
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Cetyl Alcohol

title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC08 - Long-Lasting Glossy Finish
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC08 - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù†Ù‡Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹Ø© ØªØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Discover endless beauty with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC08**, offering rich color and superior long-lasting shine to your nails. Specially designed to complement all your outfits and occasions, from everyday looks to special evenings.

Stand out with an elegant touch with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC08**. It features a quick-drying formula and a high-quality brush that ensures perfect coverage and an even layer without clumps, giving you a professional look in minutes.

â­ Provides intense shine and dazzling brilliance.
â­ Available in vibrant and diverse colors to suit your taste.
â­ Innovative formula ensures long-lasting wear without chipping.
â­ Easy-to-use brush for smooth and precise application.
â­ Quick drying for instant results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC08**:
â­ Clean your nails thoroughly from any previous polish using nail polish remover and a cotton pad.
â­ Trim and file your nails to your desired shape.
â­ Soak your hands in warm water to moisturize the skin around the nails.
â­ Push back any excess cuticle around the nails.
â­ Wipe off any remaining moisturizer from your nails with a cotton pad.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional) to protect your nails and add vibrancy.
â­ Apply one coat of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC08**, and you can add a second coat for increased intensity and color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC08**:
â­ High-quality formula for optimal results.
â­ Safe and tested colorants.
â­ Glossifying agents for exceptional shine.
â­ Quick-drying ingredients for greater convenience.

description_en:
Give your nails an exceptional look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Fc49**. It features a rich pigment formula that provides full coverage in a single, captivating, and long-lasting color. Achieve mesmerizing shine and vibrant, eye-catching colors that stay with you.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Fc49**
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat.
â­ Allow to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat and wait 2 minutes.
â­ Apply a top coat for extra shine and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish Fc49**
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). [34000014.00]

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ù…Ø³ÙƒØ±Ø© Ø§ÙƒØ³10 ÙÙˆÙ„ÙŠÙˆÙ… 001: ÙƒØ«Ø§ÙØ© ÙˆØ±ÙØ¹ Ù„Ø±Ù…ÙˆØ´ ØªØ®Ø·Ù Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù†Ø¸Ø§Ø±
description_en:
Achieve stunning lashes with **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara 001 Volum**. This innovative mascara delivers up to 10x volume with a special sculpting brush, adding exceptional density and depth to your eye makeup. The **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara 001 Volum** provides intense volume with long-lasting hold thanks to its waterproof formula, ensuring your makeup remains flawless in all conditions. It also works to lengthen your lashes with its unique composition. Enriched with olive oil, it nourishes and prevents lash dryness, keeping them healthy and vibrant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara 001 Volum**:
â­ Apply the mascara from the roots to the tips of your lashes with a zigzag motion.
â­ For extra volume, apply a second coat after the first layer has slightly dried.
â­ Use the tip of the brush to reach the smaller lashes in the corners of your eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar X10 Sculpting Mascara 001 Volum**:
â­ Olive Oil (for nourishment and hydration)
â­ Waterproof Formula (for long-lasting wear)
â­ Volume-building ingredients (for fuller lashes)
â­ Lash-lengthening ingredients

title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC01 - Professional Long-Lasting Shine
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± 01 - Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Discover elegance and beauty with Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC01, where quality meets innovation to give you exceptional nails. With over 70 years of experience, Flormar offers this luxurious polish that enhances your style for every occasion. Its unique formula ensures intense shine and vibrant colors that last long without chipping or fading, featuring a carefully designed brush for easy and even application. Whether you're preparing for a surprise date or a special event, Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC01 will give your nails a perfect look in minutes.

â­ Features intense shine that adds a sophisticated touch to your look.
â­ Vivid and glossy colors that highlight your nail beauty and complement your outfits.
â­ Innovative formula ensures long-lasting color without chipping.
â­ No cracks or bubbles observed, maintaining a perfect nail appearance.
â­ High-quality brush for full coverage and easy application without clumps.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC01**:
â­ Remove any previous nail polish using a suitable remover and a cotton pad.
â­ Trim your nails to the desired shape and soak your hands in warm water to moisturize the skin.
â­ Dry your hands thoroughly and remove any excess cuticle around the nail.
â­ Use a cotton pad to remove any moisturizer from the nail surface to ensure polish adhesion.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional) to protect your nails and add vibrancy to the color.
â­ Apply one coat of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC01** for perfect coverage, or add a second coat for more intensity.
â­ Allow nails to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC01**:
â­ High-quality ingredients to ensure the best results.
â­ Quick-drying and chip-resistant formula.
â­ Rich and glossy colors.

description_en:
Discover the magic of color with the **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette 04 - Metalic**.

The **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette 04 - Metalic** offers 10 rich and intense shades, designed to give you endless looks. Its soft, pressed formula is easy to blend and apply, allowing you to highlight your eyes' beauty with a professional, long-lasting touch. Enjoy a semi-matte or pearly finish that adds a captivating shimmer to your eyes. It comes in a sleek and practical compact, perfect for your personal collection or as a special gift.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette 04 - Metalic**:
â­ Choose your favorite brush and pick up a small amount of shadow.
â­ Start applying the shadow on the eyelid and blend for the desired coverage.
â­ Mix colors to create new shades and varied looks.
â­ Use lighter shades for everyday makeup and darker shades for evening events.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette 04 - Metalic**:
â­ 10 highly concentrated shades with a metallic finish.
â­ Pressed powder formula, easy to apply and blend.
â­ High-quality ingredients safe for the skin.
â­ Provides a shiny, long-lasting effect.

#Flormar #Eyeshadow #EyeMakeup #SaudiMakeup #GulfMakeup #MakeupAddict #BeautyProducts #EyeshadowPalette #ProfessionalMakeup #PressedPowder

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¬ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙƒ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Jl13 - Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Revitalize your nails with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel** JL13, a gel-based nail polish that delivers a professional, distinctive jelly-like shine. Its unique formula and rich pigmentation ensure flawless coverage from the first coat. The captivating shade complements all skin tones, making it your go-to for attractive, healthy-looking nails. Enjoy an easy and quick application that dries in just 60 seconds, with a specially designed thick brush for even coverage. **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel** is your perfect solution for achieving salon-quality manicures at home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**

â­ Apply the first coat to clean, dry nails.
â­ Start from the base of the nail and stroke towards the tip in one motion.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry completely for one minute.
â­ For deeper color and extra shine, apply a second coat.
â­ Avoid moving your hands until the polish is completely dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**

â­ Innovative gel formula for a glossy finish.
â­ Rich pigmentation for intense color.
â­ Quick-drying ingredients.
â­ Thick applicator brush.

#Flormar #NailPolish #JellyLook #Manicure #Nails #ShinyNails #Beauty #SaudiMakeup #NailCare #HealthyNails

description_en:
Begin your journey to unparalleled lashes with **Flormar Open Up HD Mascara**. This innovative mascara is expertly crafted to separate each lash individually, bestowing a stunning visual definition that enhances your eyes' allure. Infused with Vitamin E, **Flormar Open Up HD Mascara** nourishes and protects your lashes with its potent antioxidant and nutritious properties, bolstering their strength and delivering a long, voluminous look that reflects lash health. Enjoy a long-lasting effect without clumps, as its unique formula ensures perfect lashes all day long.

â­ **Lash Separating**: Separates each lash one by one for a more defined and emphasized look.
â­ **Long & Voluminous**: Provides an impressively longer and fuller appearance to your lashes.
â­ **Vitamin E Enriched**: Protects, moisturizes, and strengthens lashes with its antioxidant and nourishing benefits.
â­ **Clump-Free Formula**: Prevents clumping, ensuring smooth, easy application and long-lasting hold.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Open Up HD Mascara**
â­ Start applying from the base of your lashes, sweeping upwards towards the tips.
â­ Utilize zig-zag motions for complete and perfect coverage of every lash.
â­ Repeat as needed to achieve your desired volume and length.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Open Up HD Mascara**
â­ Vitamin E: Acts as a protective antioxidant shield and deeply nourishes lashes.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC65 - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù†Ù‡Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹Ø© ÙˆØ¬Ø°Ø§Ø¨Ø©
description_en:
Achieve captivating nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC65**. This unique polish delivers rich pigments and full coverage in just one coat, giving your nails a shiny, eye-catching, and long-lasting look. Perfect for setting the tone of your nails with a professional finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC65**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat.
â­ Allow to dry completely.
â­ Apply a second coat and wait 2 minutes before applying a top coat for maximum durability and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC65**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose.
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer.
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol.
â­ Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer.
â­ Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol.
â­ Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano].
â­ Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate.
â­ Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer.
â­ Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone.
â­ Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides).

#Flormar #NailPolish #Manicure #ShinyNails #SaudiBeauty #NailCare #KSAFashion #BoldColors #OnlineShopping #FlormarProducts

description_en:
Achieve a refreshed makeup look for up to 12 hours with **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 104 Vanille Clat**. Its soft and rich texture will help your skin appear smooth and flawless. Infused with almond oil and olive oil extracts, **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 104 Vanille Clat** nourishes your skin for a healthy glow. With SPF 15 protection, it shields your skin from harmful UV rays, making it the perfect choice for all skin types. Experience impeccable, long-lasting coverage with this innovative foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 104 Vanille Clat**
â­ Dispense a small amount of product onto your hand.
â­ Collect the product using a foundation brush or sponge.
â­ Apply the foundation starting from the center of your face, blending outwards towards the edges.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Perfect Coverage Foundation 104 Vanille Clat**
â­ Almond Oil.
â­ Olive Oil Extracts.
â­ SPF 15 Protection.
â­ Soft and Rich Texture.
â­ Suitable for All Skin Types.

description_en:
Achieve a captivating and irresistible look with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Peach 04**. This lip product features a rich formula that imparts a dense, saturated color to your lips, boasting an ultra-smooth, lightweight creamy texture. **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Peach 04** ensures unparalleled long-lasting wear without smudging, maintaining your lips' brilliant and attractive appearance for hours. It comes with an innovative sponge applicator for precise and comfortable application, delivering a flawless finish.

â­ Rich and intense color that highlights your lips' beauty.
â­ Soft, creamy, and lightweight formula for a comfortable feel.
â­ Long-lasting, smudge-proof wear.
â­ Easy and precise application with the built-in applicator.
â­ Provides a perfect and attractive lip look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Peach 04**
â­ Prep your lips by gently exfoliating them.
â­ You can apply a lip primer to increase the longevity of the lipstick.
â­ Apply the lipstick just like you would apply any other lipstick.
â­ Wait 1 minute with your lips apart after application for the product to dry and settle completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Peach 04**
â­ Aluminum Starch
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Cetyl Alcohol

#Flormar #Lipstick #LipMakeup #Makeup #LipTattoo #SaudiMakeup #PerfectLips #Beauty #Cosmetics #ModernMakeup

description_en:
Say goodbye to complicated nail polish removal! **Flormar Easy & Go Nail Polish Remover** offers an innovative solution for cleaning your nails in a single swipe. Forget wet wipes and tedious rubbing; with this unique formula, all you need to do is dip your finger into the pre-soaked sponge inside the jar, and the nail polish will disappear instantly. An easy and fast experience that leaves your nails clean and ready to shine with a fresh look.

â­ **Flormar Easy & Go Nail Polish Remover** is the ultimate solution for quick and easy nail polish removal.
â­ Enriched with nourishing orchid extracts to promote nail health.
â­ Innovative technology saves you time and effort.
â­ 75ml bottle size is sufficient for multiple uses.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Easy & Go Nail Polish Remover**:
â­ Ensure your nails are clean from any dust or dirt.
â­ Dip your finger inside the bottle and penetrate the sponge.
â­ Wait a few seconds and pull your finger out.
â­ For best results, gently twist your finger inside the sponge.
â­ Repeat the process for each finger.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Easy & Go Nail Polish Remover**:
â­ Nail polish remover enhanced with orchid extracts.
â­ Gentle formula for nails and skin.

#Flormar #NailPolishRemover #NailCare #Manicure #MessFree #BeautifulNails #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiArabia #Beauty

description_en:
Achieve the perfect salon-finish manicure at home with **Flormar Nail Enamel 424**. This high-quality nail enamel boasts an easy-to-apply, long-lasting formula that delivers extra shine, staying vibrant for days without fading or chipping. Its expertly designed brush ensures a smooth, drip-free application, making it your ideal companion for any occasion. Discover superior quality and beauty that combines excellent performance with an accessible price.

â­ Cruelty-free and not tested on animals.
â­ Long-lasting for a captivating look that endures.
â­ Richly pigmented for vibrant color in a single stroke.
â­ Well-designed applicator for full coverage and comfortable application.
â­ Quick-drying formula dries in the blink of an eye.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Non-toxic and safe for nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel 424**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use to ensure product consistency.
â­ Cleanse and gently dry your nails before application.
â­ Apply a thin layer of your chosen color, starting from the base of the nail to the tip.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry completely before applying a second coat for enhanced color and longevity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Nail Enamel 424**:
â­ Nitrocellulose.
â­ Butyl Acetate.

#Flormar #NailPolish #Manicure #Nails #Beauty #NailCare #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #Makeup

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect, and charming lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Garnet 12 - Purple**. This lipstick offers a dense and saturated color with a creamy texture that leaves your lips feeling soft and looking brilliantly smooth for long hours without any smudging. Its integrated sponge applicator ensures effortless and comfortable application, delivering a perfect, no-fail effect that enhances your natural beauty for a captivating and bold look.

â­ Intense, rich color that lasts.
â­ Soft, creamy, and lightweight texture.
â­ Smudge-proof formula for a perfect look all day.
â­ Convenient sponge applicator for easy application.
â­ Delivers an attractive and saturated lip appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Garnet 12 - Purple**:
â­ Prep your lips by exfoliating with a nourishing lip balm or scrub.
â­ Apply a thin layer of lip primer to increase longevity.
â­ Apply **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Garnet 12 - Purple** as you would any liquid lipstick.
â­ Wait for 1 minute with your lips apart after application for the product to dry and set.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Garnet 12 - Purple**:
â­ Aluminum Starch.
â­ Synthetic Beeswax.
â­ Ozokerite.
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect, and charming lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Intense 09**. This lip tattoo delivers a dense, rich color with a creamy texture that leaves your lips ultra-soft. Its innovative no-smudge formula ensures a brilliant look that lasts for hours. It comes with a special sponge applicator for easy and comfortable application, making it the ultimate choice to enhance your lips' beauty and allure. **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Intense 09** boosts your personality and adds a subtle yet noticeable effect to your lips, providing a perfect, impeccable finish.

Features:
â­ Long-lasting wear, keeping lips beautiful for hours.
â­ Extremely soft, creamy, and lightweight texture.
â­ Easy and comfortable sponge applicator ensures hassle-free application.
â­ Delivers an intense and saturated look with maximum color payoff.
â­ Leaves no smudge and retains its liquid texture on the lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Intense 09**:
â­ Prep your lips by exfoliating using a nourishing lip scrub or a natural sugar scrub, gently massaging in a slow circular motion.
â­ You can prime your lips to increase the longevity of the product.
â­ Apply the long-wear lipstick just like you would apply any other lipstick.
â­ Wait 1 minute with your lips apart after application for the product to dry and settle.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Intense 09**:
â­ Aluminum Starch
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Cetyl Alcohol

description_en:
Unveil captivating eye looks with the **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette Smoky 02 - Silver**. This exquisite palette features 10 highly concentrated shades of classic neutrals, perfect for creating versatile and long-lasting eye makeup. Its pressed powder formula ensures easy application and seamless blending for a semi-matte to pearly finish.

â­ 10 richly pigmented neutral shades.
â­ Easy-to-apply pressed powder formula with smooth blendability.
â­ Delivers a semi-matte to pearly finish that enhances your eyes.
â­ Long-lasting wear for a professional look.
â­ Sleek and sturdy design, perfect for your makeup kit.
â­ Safe and hygienic for everyday use.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette**:
â­ Use a clean, dry makeup brush.
â­ Apply a small amount of shadow to the brush and tap off excess product.
â­ Begin applying the shadow to your lids to define your eyes.
â­ Blend colors to create different makeup variations.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Eyeshadow Palette**:
â­ 10 ultra-pigmented neutral shades.
â­ Pressed powder formulation.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ùƒ Ù…Ø§Øª Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ 002 - Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø© Ù…Ø®Ù…Ù„ÙŠØ© Ù„Ø¥Ø·Ù„Ø§Ù„Ø© Ù„Ø§ ØªÙÙ‚Ø§ÙˆÙ…
description_en:
Discover the autumn allure with the **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick 002**, your perfect choice for a daily matte, velvety finish. This lipstick bestows an elegant touch with its color that embodies the warmth of autumn, making it an essential addition to your makeup collection.

**Product Features:**

â­ The **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick** comes in attractive, compact glass cases, making it elegant and convenient to carry.
â­ It offers high color pigmentation, providing full coverage with a single swipe, making it easy to achieve perfectly shaped lips.
â­ The high-quality, sturdy brush is designed for precise and comfortable application, and it's durable, unlike other products that may break easily.
â­ Enriched with advanced oils, it deeply moisturizes your lips and protects them from dryness, giving you a radiant and healthy look all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick**:

â­ Exfoliate and moisturize your lips, or apply a primer if needed before application.
â­ Outline your lip edges with the lipstick brush to create a clear outer line.
â­ Lip lining helps define the shape and makes it easier to fill in the rest of the space accurately.
â­ You can overdraw your lips slightly beyond their natural size to create a bold and attractive look.
â­ When applying color inside the lips, use short strokes and be careful not to go beyond the defined line.
â­ Wipe off any excess liquid from the brush with a tissue for optimal control over application and to prevent dripping.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Silk Matte Liquid Lipstick**:

â­ Moisturizing Coconut Oil.
â­ Nourishing Shea Butter.
â­ Antioxidant Vitamin E.
â­ Advanced oils for lip protection and hydration.

#Flormar #Lipstick #LipMakeup #MatteLipstick #LiquidLipstick #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #Chic #FlormarKSA #MakeupAddict

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¬ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙƒ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹Ø© Ù„Ø¬Ù…Ø§Ù„ ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚
description_en:
Elevate your nail game with **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**.

This gel-based nail polish offers an exceptional shine and healthy-looking finish, perfect for fair to medium skin tones, with a shade that acts as a radiant nude for dusky complexions. Its highly pigmented formula ensures a flawless appearance from the first coat, and you can enhance the jelly effect with a second layer for added depth and brilliance.

Designed for effortless application, **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel** features a thick brush and a sturdy slanted handle for precise strokes. It dries in just 60 seconds, allowing you to achieve salon-quality manicures at home with this innovative and travel-friendly formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**

â­ Apply the first coat to clean, dry nails.
â­ Start from the base of the nail and stroke towards the tip.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry for about a minute.
â­ For more intense color and shine, apply a second coat.
â­ Avoid moving your hands until the polish is completely dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Jelly Look Nail Enamel**

â­ Rich gel formula.
â­ Ingredients for superior shine.
â­ Quick-drying components.
â­ High-quality pigments.
â­ Blend of durable polymers.

#Flormar #NailPolish #JellyNails #NailCare #NailEnamel #SaudiBeauty #NailGoals #FlormarKSA #Manicure #BeautySaudi

description_en:
Achieve a captivating look with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC34**. This premium nail polish boasts a rich pigment formula that delivers complete coverage in a single coat, ensuring a vibrant and long-lasting finish. Choose **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC34** for a brilliant shine and eye-catching colors that exude confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC34**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails over a base coat.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry completely.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then add a top coat for protection and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC34**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Benzophenone-1, etc.
â­ (May Contain): Various colorants including Ci 77891, Ci 15850, Ci 77491, etc.

description_en:
Achieve an exceptional eye look with the **Flormar Graphic Eyeliner Black**. This eyeliner features a specially designed slanted tip to create diverse looks with fantastic finishes. It's your ultimate solution for clearly defined eyes, offering a quick-drying, smudge-free, and water-resistant formula for long-lasting wear. Easily control the line thickness to match your desired style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Graphic Eyeliner Black**:
â­ Start from the inner corner of the eye.
â­ Draw a thin line along the upper lash line.
â­ Gradually extend the line towards the outer corner.
â­ Control the thickness of the line as desired for different looks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Graphic Eyeliner Black**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Butylene Glycol, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Coco-Glucoside, Citric Acid, Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate, Ammonium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate.
â­ +/- (May Contain): Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2).

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect, and enchanting lips with **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Rosa 07**. This liquid lipstick delivers a dense, saturated color with a creamy, soft finish for all-day comfort.

Its innovative no-smudge formula ensures your lips look brilliant for extended hours, while the precise sponge applicator allows for an easy and comfortable application. **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Rosa 07** provides a perfect, flawless effect, making your lips charmingly attractive and enhancing your beauty and personality.

â­ Rich and saturated color for captivating lips.
â­ Soft, creamy, and lightweight texture for unparalleled comfort.
â­ Easy and convenient application with the included sponge applicator.
â­ Long-lasting and smudge-proof to keep your lips beautiful for hours.
â­ Delivers a perfect look with a noticeable effect.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Rosa 07**
â­ Prep your lips by gently exfoliating them.
â­ A lip primer can be used to increase color longevity.
â­ Apply the lipstick evenly using the attached sponge.
â­ Keep your lips apart for one minute after application for the product to dry and set.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Kiss Me More Lip Tattoo Rosa 07**
â­ Aluminum Starch
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Cetyl Alcohol

#Flormar #Lipstick #Makeup #Lips #LipTattoo #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #LipCare #LongLastingLipstick #DailyMakeup
