description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Cream 21 Aloe Vera Gel**, a refreshing and nourishing treatment. Crafted with 95% pure aloe vera gel, it deeply moisturizes dry skin, protecting and aiding in its regeneration. Perfect for soothing irritated skin and leaving it feeling soft and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Aloe Vera Gel**

â­ Apply generously to dry areas of your skin.
â­ Distribute evenly and massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Enjoy instantly hydrated, smooth, and supple skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Aloe Vera Gel**

â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Aqua, Allantoin.
â­ Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, DMDM Hydantoin, Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Triethanolamine, Parfum.
â­ Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort with **Cream 21 Lotion Dry Skin 600 ml**. Specially formulated for dry and sensitive skin, this product provides deep hydration, alleviating itchiness and irritation caused by dryness. Enriched with natural Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, **Cream 21 Lotion Dry Skin 600 ml** works to soften your skin, leaving it with a long-lasting silky texture and restoring its natural vitality and radiance. Forget dry skin discomfort and enjoy skin that feels soft, hydrated, and protected all day long.

â­ Provides superior, long-lasting hydration for dry skin.
â­ Enriched with natural Aloe Vera and Vitamin E to promote skin health.
â­ Absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue.
â­ Dermatologically approved for safety and efficacy.
â­ Protects skin from dryness, imparting a healthy and attractive appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Lotion Dry Skin 600 ml**
â­ Squeeze the essential amount of lotion into your palm.
â­ Rub your palms together to slightly warm the lotion.
â­ Apply the lotion evenly to your skin, concentrating on dry areas.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Best used after showering for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Lotion Dry Skin 600 ml**
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Cetearyl Isononanoate
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
â­ Aloe Vera Extract (not explicitly listed but benefits mentioned)
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)

#Cream21 #DrySkinLotion #SkinHydration #Skincare #AloeVera #VitaminE #SoftSkin #DeepMoisture #DailyCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience soft, moisturized skin with **Cream 21 Body Lotion Dry Skin 250 ml**. This ideal lotion for dry skin provides deep hydration and combats annoying winter dryness with its rich formula infused with Vitamin E, Almond Oil, Aloe Vera, and Glycerin.

â­ Nourishes and moisturizes skin for up to 24 hours.
â­ Non-greasy and fast-absorbing formula.
â­ Protects skin from free radicals and delays signs of aging.
â­ Suitable for both men and women.
â­ Dermatologically tested for efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Body Lotion Dry Skin 250 ml**

â­ Cleanse your skin thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Gently pat your skin dry with a clean towel.
â­ Take an adequate amount of lotion into your palms.
â­ Gently massage the lotion all over your body, focusing on dry and sensitive areas.
â­ Wait a few minutes before getting dressed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Body Lotion Dry Skin 250 ml**

â­ Almond Oil
â­ Castor Seed Oil
â­ Aloe Vera
â­ Glycerin
â­ Vitamin E
â­ High-quality, non-greasy formula.

**Creme 21** Skin Beautifying Oil is a luxurious, vitamin-rich blend crafted with pure Californian almond oil and Vitamin E, designed to deeply nourish your skin and impart an even, healthy radiance. This effective oil works to rehydrate the skin and strengthen its natural moisture barrier, helping to reduce imperfections and improve skin texture for a smoother feel. Enjoy deep, long-lasting moisturization that keeps your skin hydrated and revitalized for a healthy, glowing appearance.

Product Features:
â­ Contains pure Californian almond oil and Vitamin E for enhanced skin nourishment.
â­ Helps to improve skin tone and reduce imperfections, leaving the skin glowing.
â­ Provides long-lasting hydration, strengthening the skinâ€™s natural moisture barrier.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21**:
â­ Pour a small amount of the oil onto your palm.
â­ Gently massage the oil onto clean, dry skin in circular motions.
â­ Focus on areas that need extra nourishment, and allow the oil to absorb for a glowing, even-toned finish.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21**:
â­ Pure Californian Almond Oil.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Blend of nourishing and moisturizing oils.

It deeply nourishes and moisturizes, ensuring an even skin tone and superior softness.

â­ Firms and revitalizes skin with Vitamin E and CoQ10.
â­ Effectively reduces stretch marks, fine lines, and uneven texture.

â­ Promotes an even skin tone and improves skin smoothness.
â­ Deeply hydrates, leaving skin soft and silky.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Skin Perfector Oil**:
â­ Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage in circular motions, focusing on desired areas.
â­ Use twice daily for optimal results.
â­ Allow the oil to absorb completely before dressing.
â­ Use regularly for smoother, firmer, and more radiant skin.

â­ Blend of nourishing and moisturizing natural oils.

description_en:
Discover softness and protection with **Creme 21 Vitamin Protect Hand Wash 250 ml**. This unique hand wash combines pro-vitamin B5, vitamin E, tea tree oil, and holy basil to offer superior antibacterial protection and deep nourishment for your hands. Its pH-balanced formula maintains the skin's natural moisture, preventing dryness, making it ideal for all skin types and dermatologically tested.

Enriched with vitamins and antibacterial agents, **Creme 21 Vitamin Protect Hand Wash 250 ml** effectively cleanses, moisturizes, and protects your skin. Vitamin E acts as a potent antioxidant to reduce inflammation, while pro-vitamin B5 helps retain moisture and shields the skin from irritation for lasting hydration and protection.

Free from parabens, SLS, harmful ingredients, and microplastics, **Creme 21 Vitamin Protect Hand Wash 250 ml** is a safe and healthy choice for daily use. With nearly 50 years of expertise, the brand delivers dermatologically tested, cruelty-free products formulated with natural ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Vitamin Protect Hand Wash 250 ml**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Pump a small amount of the hand wash onto your hands.
â­ Lather and gently massage it over your hands, including between your fingers and under your nails.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with water.
â­ Dry your hands with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21 Vitamin Protect Hand Wash 250 ml**
â­ Enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E.
â­ Contains Tea Tree Oil and Holy Basil.
â­ pH-balanced formula.
â­ Free from Parabens, SLS, Microplastics, and Silicone.

#Creme21 #HandWash #VitaminE #Skincare #SoftHands #SkinProtection #Moisturizing #Antibacterial #DailyCare #SaudiArabia

This luxurious soap bar, in a convenient 3+1 pack (125 gm), is infused with Pro-Vitamin B5 and Rose Water to deeply hydrate and revitalize your skin. Enjoy a gentle cleansing experience that leaves your skin feeling soft, supple, and refreshed for hours.

â­ Enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5 for intense hydration.
â­ Contains Rose Water to soothe and calm the skin.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft, supple, and refreshed.
â­ Gentle formula, perfect for daily use.
â­ Refreshing scent for a clean feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Aqua Soft Moisturising Cream Soap**:
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Lather the soap between your hands or with a loofah.
â­ Gently apply to your body and rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21 Aqua Soft Moisturising Cream Soap**:
â­ Pro-Vitamin B5
â­ Rose Water
â­ Gentle Cleansing Agents
â­ Glycerin
â­ Refreshing Fragrance

#Creme21 #MoisturisingSoap #SoftSkin #Skincare #DeepHydration #RoseWater #VitaminB5 #BeautyProducts #SkinLove #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Clara Multi Hair Styler Device C18** is your all-in-one styling solution for all hair types, perfect for crafting professional waves and stunning blow-out looks with unparalleled brilliance. This innovative device features 6 interchangeable attachments, meticulously designed to deliver exceptional results with every use.

â­ Styling Concentrator for precise, directed airflow.
â­ Blow Dryer for quick and efficient drying.
â­ Auto-Wrap Curlers (Left & Right) for perfect curls.
â­ Round Brush for volume and body.
â­ Oval Brush for smoothing and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clara Multi Hair Styler Device C18**:
â­ Select the attachment that best suits your desired look.
â­ Adjust heat and air levels (Low, Medium, High) to match your hair type.
â­ Utilize the cool shot button for setting your style.
â­ Section your hair for optimal styling.
â­ Style your hair as desired.
â­ Finish with Clara products for a perfect, polished look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clara Multi Hair Styler Device C18**:
â­ Features 3 Heat & Air Levels to accommodate all hair types.
â­ Includes a Cold Air shot button for style setting.
â­ Equipped with a removable filter for easy cleaning.
â­ 1500W power rating to minimize hair damage.
â­ Ionic generator for anti-frizz, promoting smooth and shiny hair.
â­ Lightweight and effortless to use design.

#Clara #HairStyler #HairDryer #HairBrush #HairCurler #HealthyHair #ShinyHair #HairCare #Hairstyles #SaudiArabia

title_en: Clara C013 Slim Hot Brush
title_ar: ÙƒÙ„Ø§Ø±Ø§ C013 ÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø­Ø±Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© Ù†Ø­ÙŠÙØ©
description_en:
Effortlessly achieve salon-quality hairstyles with the **Clara C013 Slim Hot Brush**. This innovative 3-in-1 smart brush is perfect for styling blowouts, curls, and straight hair, saving you time and effort. The **Clara C013 Slim Hot Brush** features a unique 360-degree heating design for faster, more effective styling. Its advanced ionic technology combats frizz and leaves your hair smooth and shiny. Designed for comfort and safety, it includes an anti-slip handle and a heat-resistant layer on top to prevent accidental burns, ensuring a secure grip and peace of mind.

â­ Ionic technology to prevent frizz and enhance shine.
â­ 360-degree heating element for quicker styling.
â­ 3 adjustable heat settings (150-180-200Â°C).
â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Ergonomic, slip-resistant handle for comfortable use.
â­ Heat-resistant layer for maximum hand protection.
â­ Auto-shutoff feature after 60 minutes for enhanced safety.
â­ 360-degree swivel cord for tangle-free styling.
â­ Quiet operation for a more pleasant styling experience.
â­ Delivers 3x smoother hair from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clara C013 Slim Hot Brush**
â­ Ensure your hair is completely dry before use.
â­ Section your hair for easier and more efficient styling.
â­ Select the appropriate temperature setting for your hair type.
â­ Gently glide the brush through each section of your hair from root to tip.
â­ Repeat the process until you achieve your desired look.
â­ Allow your hair to cool and apply hairspray or finishing products as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clara C013 Slim Hot Brush**
â­ High-quality heat-resistant outer casing.
â­ Advanced heating bristles.
â­ Electronic ionic generator.
â­ Anti-slip plastic handle.
â­ 360-degree swivel power cord.
â­ Temperature control panel.

#Clara #HotBrush #HairStyling #HealthyHair #SmoothHair #Hairstyles #HairCare #Beauty #SaudiArabia #KSA

description_en:
Experience life without allergy symptoms with **Clara** 10 mg tablets. **Clara** is designed to relieve symptoms of seasonal and perennial allergic rhinitis, such as sneezing, runny nose, and itchy eyes. It is also effective in treating chronic idiopathic urticaria.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clara**:
â­ Adults (including elderly): One tablet (10 mg) once daily.
â­ Children over 12 years: One tablet (10 mg) once daily.
â­ Children aged 2 to 12 years:
  - Body weight over 30 kg: One tablet (10 mg) once daily.
  - Body weight 30 kg or below: Not recommended.
â­ Children under 2 years: Not recommended.
â­ Swallow the tablet whole with a drink of water. Can be taken with or without food.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Do not use after the expiry date.
â­ Store in the original package.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clara**:
â­ Active Ingredient: Loratadine 10 mg.
â­ Other ingredients include Lactose Monohydrate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Maize Starch, Magnesium Stearate.

#Allergy #Loratadine #Clara #AllergyRelief #HayFever #NasalCongestion #ItchyEyes #RunnyNose #NoseHealth #SaudiPharmacy

description_en:
**Clara Hot Brush & Styler Hair Dryer** is the revolutionary styling tool you need to transform your hair. Its innovative 2-in-1 design combines powerful drying with enchanting styling capabilities in a single device. Enjoy rapid hair drying while adding unparalleled volume and shine thanks to its hot and cold air technology. The **Clara Hot Brush & Styler Hair Dryer** is designed to deliver salon-quality results in the comfort of your home, saving you time and effort with every use. Achieve healthy, frizz-free, and perfectly styled hair every time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clara Hot Brush & Styler Hair Dryer**
â­ Ensure hair is damp (not soaking wet) for optimal results.
â­ Select the appropriate heat setting for your hair type.
â­ Section your hair and begin styling from roots to ends.
â­ Use the cool shot button to set your style.
â­ Clean the brush regularly after unplugging it.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clara Hot Brush & Styler Hair Dryer**
â­ High-quality insulating materials for safe use.
â­ Durable bristles designed for gentle styling.
â­ Powerful motor for optimal airflow.
â­ Ergonomic handle for a comfortable grip.
â­ 360-degree swivel cord for freedom of movement.

#HairDryer #HotBrush #HairStyling #HealthyHair #Hairstyles #Clara #HairCare #BeautyProducts #HomeSalon #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve dream-like curls in no time with the **Clara Auto-Curler Device - Grey**. This practical curling tool offers a heatless exterior, ensuring no burns. The curling roller is coated with ceramic oil to give your hair a smooth and shining finish effortlessly.

â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Two buttons to choose from: left or right direction.
â­ 3 heat degrees (150-180-210).
â­ Reverse feature to prevent hair from getting stuck.
â­ Auto stop feature after 60 min to ensure safety.
â­ 360-degree cord for easy and flexible user experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clara Auto-Curler Device**:
â­ Section your hair. Make sure it's free of hair styling products to get a satisfying look.
â­ Use the preferred button to roll out the side by pressing on it.
â­ Hold until you hear the beep-tone for better results.
â­ For best results, leave the hair to cool before combing and styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clara Auto-Curler Device**:
â­ Ceramic oil-coated curling barrel.
â­ High-quality insulation materials for safety.
â­ Easy-to-use control buttons.
â­ Durable power cord with 360-degree swivel.

description_en:
Achieve effortless, stunning curls with the **Clara Auto-Curler Device**. This intelligent hair curler is designed to give you perfect waves in minutes, all while protecting your hair's health and shine thanks to its ceramic oil-infused barrel for a professional finish at home. Forget about accidental burns; its user-friendly design ensures safety for both your hair and hands. Ideal for all hair types, allowing you to shine with a captivating look every day.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Adjustable rotation direction (left/right) for symmetrical waves.
â­ 3 heat settings (150-180-210Â°C) to suit your hair's needs.
â­ Anti-tangle feature prevents hair from getting stuck for a smooth styling experience.
â­ Auto shut-off function after 60 minutes ensures complete safety.
â­ 360-degree swivel cord provides unparalleled flexibility and freedom of movement.

ğŸ”¹ **Usage Instructions for **Clara Auto-Curler Device**:**
â­ Ensure your hair is clean and free from styling products for optimal results.
â­ Divide your hair into even sections.
â­ Select your preferred curling direction (left or right) using the designated buttons.
â­ Place a section of hair into the device and wait for the beep to ensure a perfectly formed curl.
â­ Allow the curl to cool slightly before combing or styling for long-lasting waves.

ğŸ”¹ **Ingredients of **Clara Auto-Curler Device**:**
â­ Ceramic oil-infused curling barrel for shine and hair protection.
â­ Automatic rotation mechanism for ease of use.
â­ Heat and direction control buttons.
â­ Overheat protection system and automatic shut-off.

#HairCurler #Curls #HairStyling #HealthyHair #Clara #CurlingIron #QuickHairstyles #HairCare #CeramicCurler #ShinyHair

description_en:
Discover **Clara Syrup**, your ultimate solution for adults and children battling seasonal and everyday allergies. Enjoy a life free from sneezing, runny nose, itchy eyes, and scratchy throat with 24-hour non-drowsy relief. **Clara Syrup** allows you to engage in daily activities and sleep peacefully, reclaiming the simple joys of life. Experience the refreshing peach flavor of **Clara Syrup**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clara Syrup**:
â­ Suitable for adults and children over 2 years old.
â­ Follow the dosage prescribed by your doctor or as indicated on the packaging.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clara Syrup**:
â­ Loratadine (active ingredient).
â­ Other ingredients include peach-flavored excipients.

description_en:
Achieve perfect, effortless curls in minutes with the **Clara Auto-Curler Device** in a stunning pink hue. This innovative device is designed for ease of use, featuring a ceramic oil-infused barrel that nourishes your hair, leaving it smooth, shiny, and free from heat damage. Experience salon-quality curls at home with ultimate safety and convenience.

â­ Achieve beautifully styled curls in no time.
â­ Easy to use with a burn-free exterior.
â­ Ceramic oil-infused barrel for smooth, shining hair.
â­ Suitable for all hair types.
â­ Two buttons to choose from: left or right curl direction for versatile styling.
â­ 3 adjustable heat settings (150-180-210) to cater to different hair needs.
â­ Anti-tangle feature to prevent hair from getting stuck.
â­ Auto shut-off after 60 minutes for enhanced safety.
â­ 360-degree swivel cord for a tangle-free and flexible user experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clara Auto-Curler Device**:
â­ Section your hair into manageable portions.
â­ Ensure your hair is clean and free from styling products for optimal results.
â­ Select your preferred curl direction by pressing the designated buttons.
â­ Place a section of hair into the curler and wait for the beep (typically 8-12 seconds, depending on the heat setting).
â­ Allow curls to cool completely before brushing or styling to maintain their shape.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clara Auto-Curler Device**:
â­ Heat-resistant ceramic inner barrel.
â­ Nourishing ceramic oil coating.
â­ High-quality, heat-resistant plastic exterior casing.
â­ Silent, high-performance electric motor.
â­ Safe and durable electrical wiring.

#Clara #HairCurler #HairStyling #CurlingIron #ShinyHair #HairGoals #BeautyTools #HairCare #Fashion #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
**Clara Hair Straightener** is your ultimate solution for easy and professional hair styling at home. It combines advanced straightening technology with a cold air feature to speed up the styling process, minimizing hair damage and delivering stunning results. Thanks to its negative ion feature, the device eliminates flyaways, leaving your hair smooth, shiny, and with perfect roots.

â­ The device's plate is coated with platinum material to protect hair from damage and reduce frizz.
â­ Cold air technology to speed up styling and quickly set your hairstyle.
â­ 3 adjustable heat settings (180-200-220) to suit all hair types and styling needs.
â­ Automatic shut-off feature after 60 minutes for maximum safety.
â­ 360-degree swivel cord for a flexible and comfortable styling experience without tangles.
â­ Sleek and modern design that makes it a great addition to your hair care routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clara Hair Straightener**
â­ Ensure hair is completely dry before starting.
â­ Divide hair into thin sections.
â­ Slowly glide the straightener through each section from roots to ends.
â­ Use the appropriate temperature for your hair type.
â­ The cold air feature can be used after styling to set the look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clara Hair Straightener**
â­ Platinum-coated ceramic plates.
â­ Advanced heating system.
â­ Negative ion generator.
â­ Temperature control technology.
â­ Heat-resistant plastic casing.

#Clara #HairStraightener #HairIron #HairStyling #SmoothHair #ShinyHair #HairCare #Hairstyles #Makeup #SaudiFashion

description_en:
Experience unparalleled smoothness with the **Clara Hair Brush Set**. This premium collection is meticulously designed to offer an exceptional styling experience, focusing on your hair's health and beauty.

The **Clara Hair Brush Set** includes high-quality brushes with gentle bristles and ergonomic handles, perfect for detangling, smoothing, and adding volume to your hair. Whether your hair is straight, curly, or wavy, this set effectively caters to all styling needs.

â­ A variety of brushes to meet all styling needs.
â­ Gentle bristles that minimize hair breakage and promote healthier hair.
â­ Ergonomic handles designed for comfort and a better grip.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, from fine to thick.
â­ Portable and travel-friendly design for on-the-go styling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clara Hair Brush Set**
â­ Detangling: Use the appropriate brush to gently work through knots, starting from the ends.
â­ Styling: Employ the designated styling brush to achieve your desired look.
â­ Gentle Brushing: Maintain gentle strokes to minimize hair damage.
â­ For Wet Hair: Opt for brushes specifically designed for wet hair to reduce the risk of damage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clara Hair Brush Set**
â­ High-quality bristles designed to be gentle on hair.
â­ Durable and comfortable handles for ease of use.
â­ Specially designed to cater to different hair types.

#HairBrush #HairStyling #HairCare #HealthyHair #Beauty #Style #HairTreatment #HairProducts #HairGoals #SaudiArabia

title_ar: ÙƒÙ„ÙŠØ± Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù„Ù„Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ù†Ø¸Ù Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ 350 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Introducing **Clear Men Shampoo Deep Cleanse**, the ultimate solution for a healthy scalp and flake-free hair. Specifically formulated for men seeking a thorough and effective cleansing experience, **Clear Men Shampoo Deep Cleanse** powerfully removes dirt, oil, and impurities, leaving your scalp feeling refreshed and revitalized. Say goodbye to dandruff and itchiness with this potent formula that targets the problem at its source, ensuring a healthy scalp and vibrant, attractive hair.

Product Features:
â­ Deeply cleanses the scalp and hair.
â­ Effectively fights dandruff and itchiness.
â­ Refreshing formula provides a cooling, revitalizing sensation.
â­ Hydrates the scalp and maintains hair's smoothness.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, especially oily or dandruff-prone hair.
â­ Long-lasting freshness throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Men Shampoo Deep Cleanse**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Pour an adequate amount of shampoo into your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp and hair until a rich lather forms.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Men Shampoo Deep Cleanse**:
â­ Water (Aqua): Provides the base for the formula.
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate: A powerful cleansing agent.
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine: A gentle cleanser derived from coconut oil.
â­ Zinc Pyrithione: An effective anti-dandruff ingredient.
â­ Menthol: Provides a cooling and refreshing sensation.
â­ Glycerin: A moisturizing agent.
â­ Citric Acid: For pH adjustment.
â­ Fragrance (Parfum): Adds a refreshing scent.

description_en:
Indulge your hair with **Clear Female Shampoo Soft & Shiny 600ml**, specially formulated to give you incredibly soft and healthy-looking shiny hair. Its advanced formula deeply nourishes your scalp and hair, leaving it looking vibrant and healthy with every wash.

Enjoy smooth, dandruff-free, and manageable hair thanks to the comprehensive care benefits of **Clear Female Shampoo Soft & Shiny 600ml**. Perfect for daily use on all hair types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Female Shampoo Soft & Shiny 600ml**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Pour a small amount of shampoo into your palms and lather.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and hair, focusing on the roots.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with a Clear conditioner suitable for your hair type.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Female Shampoo Soft & Shiny 600ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water): The primary solvent.
â­ Zinc Pyrithione: The active ingredient for dandruff control.
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5): Moisturizes and strengthens hair.
â­ Glycerin: A humectant that retains moisture in the hair.
â­ Fragrance (Parfum): For a refreshing and attractive scent.

#ClearShampoo #HairCare #SoftHair #ShinyHair #AntiDandruff #HealthyScalp #HairMoisture #HealthyHair #HairProducts #WomensBeauty

description_en:
Achieve incredibly soft and shiny hair with **Clear Shampoo Soft & Shiny**. Experience up to 5x more softness with a unique formula that removes tangles and leaves your hair feeling smooth and manageable. Formulated with the innovative Nutrium 10, **Clear Shampoo Soft & Shiny** activates your scalp's natural protection layer, providing effective dandruff defense and maintaining scalp health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Shampoo Soft & Shiny**:
â­ Start by applying 2-3 pumps of the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into your scalp and hair to ensure complete coverage and optimal effectiveness.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly to ensure no shampoo residue is left.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Shampoo Soft & Shiny**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Dimethiconol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethicone, Zinc Pyrithione, Perfume, Sodium chloride, Carbomer, PPG-9, Sodium Salicylate, Citric acid, Sodium hydroxide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Zinc Sulphate, Poloxamer 407, Laureth-23, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium benzoate, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Laureth-4, Lysine HCl, PEG-4, Cellulose Gum, Xanthan gum, Panthenol, Potassium sorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pyridoxine HCl, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Pantolactone, Sodium Sulphate, Butylphenyl Methyl Propional, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalol, Alfa Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Citronellol, CI 17200.

#Clear #Shampoo #SoftHair #ShinyHair #HairCare #HairLoss #Dandruff #ScalpHealth #HairMoisture #HairBeauty

description_en:
Product Description:

Meet the daily challenge with **Clear** Men 3in1 Active Clean Shampoo + Face & Body wash. Specially formulated for men, it's your all-in-one solution for Head-to-Toe freshness. Infused with powerful Activated Charcoal, **Clear** is tough on dandruff but gentle on your skin. It deeply cleanses pores, leaving your scalp refreshed and healthy, and your face and body skin moisturized and revitalized. With **Clear**, you can focus on your career without worrying about odor or dandruff.

Product Features:

â­ Unique liquid gel, triple-action formula provides a powerful cleanse and comprehensive care from Head to Toe.
â­ Dandruff-free hair powered by Activated Charcoal.
â­ Clean, moisturized face for healthy, attractive skin.
â­ Refreshed body with an Activated Charcoal blend that effectively removes dirt and impurities.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear** Men Complete Care 3in1:

â­ Apply to wet hair, scalp, and body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if desired.
â­ For best results, daily use is recommended.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with plenty of water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear** Men Complete Care 3in1:

â­ Activated Charcoal for deep cleansing and impurity removal.
â­ Gentle formula for the skin.

#Clear #MensShampoo #HairCare #BodyCare #FaceCare #ActivatedCharcoal #AntiDandruff #Freshness #Cleanliness #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience the purifying power of activated charcoal with **Clear Men Shampoo Activated Charcoal (3-in-1)**. Specifically formulated for men, this shampoo deeply cleanses both scalp and hair, leaving you with an immediate sense of freshness and ultimate comfort. Featuring the innovative Nutrium 10, **Clear Men Shampoo Activated Charcoal (3-in-1)** enhances your scalp's natural protective layer, offering effective dandruff protection and promoting healthy hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Men Shampoo Activated Charcoal (3-in-1)**
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into scalp and hair to lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Men Shampoo Activated Charcoal (3-in-1)**
â­ Activated Charcoal: For its purifying and detoxifying properties.
â­ Nutrium 10: To boost scalp health and fight dandruff.
â­ Moisturizing agents: To nourish hair, leaving it soft and shiny.

**Caution & Warnings:** For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

description_en:
Experience all-day freshness and say goodbye to dandruff with **Clear Shampoo Shower Fresh**! Specially formulated for men, this shampoo delivers superior freshness and cleanliness. Its innovative Nutrium 10 formula activates your scalp's natural protection layer, effectively fighting dandruff. Enjoy the invigorating citrus scent and sophisticated woody notes for unparalleled confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Shampoo Shower Fresh**:
â­ Start by applying 2-3 pumps of the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into your scalp and hair for maximum effect.
â­ Rinse thoroughly to ensure no shampoo residue remains.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use regularly.
â­ If shampoo gets into your eyes, rinse them well with water immediately.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Shampoo Shower Fresh**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Zinc Pyrithione, Dimethiconol, Perfume, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium chloride, Carbomer, Menthol, Sodium Salicylate, Citric acid, Sodium hydroxide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Zinc Sulphate, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Sodium benzoate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, TEA-Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Laureth-23, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, Climbazole, Laureth-4, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Cellulose Gum, PPG-9, PEG-4, Propylene glycol, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Passiflora Edulis Fruit Extract, Xanthan gum, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium sorbate, Panthenol, Alcohol Denat., Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Glucose, Sodium sulfate, Lactic acid, Trideceth-9, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Pantolactone, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Disodium EDTA, Caramel, Sodium bisulfite, Linalol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methyl Propional, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Geraniol, Alfa Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, CI 42090, CI 47005.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Clear Men Cool Sport Menthol Shampoo - 350 ml**. This shampoo is specially formulated for men to deliver a deep, cooling cleansing experience while effectively fighting dandruff. It removes excess oil, sweat, and impurities, leaving your scalp feeling cool and revitalized, perfect for your active lifestyle.

â­ Fights dandruff and reduces scalp itching.
â­ Provides an instant cooling and refreshing sensation.
â­ Deeply cleanses the scalp and hair from dirt and oil.
â­ Offers a revitalizing scent and long-lasting freshness.
â­ Strengthens hair and maintains scalp health.
â­ Suitable for daily use.
â­ Specifically formulated for men's scalp needs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Men Cool Sport Menthol Shampoo - 350 ml**
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Pour a small amount of shampoo into your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp and hair, focusing on the scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Men Cool Sport Menthol Shampoo - 350 ml**
â­ Water (Aqua).
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate.
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Zinc Pyrithione.
â­ Menthol.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Fragrance (Parfum).
â­ Citric Acid.

#Clear #MensShampoo #HairCare #HealthyScalp #AntiDandruff #Freshness #Cooling #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Discover the purifying power of **Clear Men Shampoo Deep Cleanse & Anti-Dandruff 600ml**, specially formulated for men to combat dandruff and provide long-lasting freshness.

**Clear Men Shampoo Deep Cleanse & Anti-Dandruff 600ml** features an effective formula that works to remove dirt, oil, and impurities accumulated on the scalp, giving you a feeling of superior cleanliness and refreshment. It targets dandruff at its source, helping to reduce itching and flaking, for a healthy and attractive scalp.

â­ Effectively removes dirt, oil, and buildup.
â­ Fights dandruff from the source and reduces itching.
â­ Provides a refreshing and cooling sensation to the scalp.
â­ Hydrates the scalp and maintains hair smoothness.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, especially oily and dandruff-prone.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Men Shampoo Deep Cleanse & Anti-Dandruff 600ml**:
â­ Wet your hair and scalp thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Pour an adequate amount of shampoo into your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp, creating a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary for a deeper cleanse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Men Shampoo Deep Cleanse & Anti-Dandruff 600ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Zinc Pyrithione
â­ Menthol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Fragrance

title_ar: ÙƒÙ„ÙŠØ± Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙØ­Ù… Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø´Ø· ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø«ÙˆÙ„ - 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the power of **Clear Deep Cleanse Shampoo with Charcoal + Mint** for a profoundly clean scalp and an invigorating sensation. Specially formulated for men, this shampoo deeply cleanses your scalp, promoting health and freshness. **Clear Deep Cleanse Shampoo with Charcoal + Mint** is powered by Nutrium 10, a rich blend of nutrients and botanical actives that works to activate your scalp's natural protective layer, keeping you dandruff-proof.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Deep Cleanse Shampoo with Charcoal + Mint**:

â­ Start by applying 2â€“3 pumps of the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into your scalp and hair to ensure the active ingredients work effectively.
â­ Rinse thoroughly to make sure no shampoo residue is left in your hair.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use regularly.
â­ If shampoo gets into the eyes, rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Deep Cleanse Shampoo with Charcoal + Mint**:

â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Zinc Pyrithione, Dimethiconol, Perfume, Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Carbomer, Sodium Salicylate, Sodium hydroxide, Menthol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric acid, Zinc Sulphate, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium benzoate, Glycerin, TEA-Sulfate, Laureth-23, Poloxamer 407, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, PPG-9, Phenoxyethanol, Climbazole, Propylene glycol, Laureth-4, Cellulose Gum, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf O, PEG-4, Xanthan gum, Tocopheryl Acetate, Charcoal Powder, Potassium sorbate, Panthenol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Iodopropynyl Butyl Carbamate, Glucose, Lactic acid, Trideceth-9, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Pantolactone, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Caramel, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methyl Propional, Linalol, Coumarin, Citronellol, Citral, Geraniol, Cinnamal.

#ClearShampoo #DeepCleanse #Charcoal #Mint #MensHaircare #ScalpHealth #AntiDandruff #FreshFeeling #HaircareSaudi #ClearSaudi

Experience ultimate freshness with **Clear** Cool Sport Menthol Shampoo for Men, designed to invigorate your scalp and hair with a refreshing icy sensation. Formulated with Nutrium 10, it activates the scalp's natural protective layer, providing robust dandruff defense and leaving your hair clean and revitalized with a stimulating menthol scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear**:
â­ Begin by applying 2â€“3 pumps of **Clear** to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into your scalp and hair for maximum effect.
â­ Rinse well to ensure no shampoo residue remains.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Zinc Pyrithione, Dimethiconol, Perfume, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Sodium chloride, Climbazole, Menthol, Sodium Salicylate, Citric acid, Sodium hydroxide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Zinc Sulphate, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Sodium benzoate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, TEA-Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Laureth-23, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, Phenoxyethanol, PPG-9, Laureth-4, Cellulose Gum, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf O, PEG-4, Propylene glycol, Xanthan gum, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium sorbate, Panthenol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Glucose, Sodium sulfate, Lactic acid, Trideceth-9, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Pantolactone, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Caramel, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methyl Propional, Coumarin, Citronellol, Citral, Geraniol, CI 42090, CI 47005.

Experience ultimate freshness with **Clear Men Shampoo Activated Charcoal (3 in 1)**. This 3-in-1 shampoo is specifically designed to cater to men's scalp and hair needs, providing a sensation of supreme cleanliness and freshness. Its innovative formula with activated charcoal deeply cleanses the scalp, eliminating dirt and excess oil, leaving your hair and scalp refreshed and healthy. Enjoy multiple benefits for stronger, more vibrant hair with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Men Shampoo Activated Charcoal (3 in 1)**

â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp and hair.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Men Shampoo Activated Charcoal (3 in 1)**

â­ Activated Charcoal for deep cleansing.
â­ Nourishing ingredients to promote hair and scalp health.
â­ Balanced formula for complete care.

description_en:
Give your hair the care it deserves with **Clear** Men Shampoo, specially formulated to combat hair fall due to breakage and promote strength. Its advanced formula deeply cleanses the scalp and nourishes the roots, protecting your hair from daily stress and providing a healthier, fuller look with regular use.

âœ¨ Features of **Clear** Men Shampoo:
â­ Effective protection against hair fall caused by breakage.
â­ Nourishes the scalp and promotes hair health from the roots.
â­ Delivers visibly stronger, fuller, and thicker hair.
â­ Moisturizes hair and protects it from dryness and external damage.
â­ Ideal for daily use for a complete care routine.
â­ Refreshing fragrance for a clean and revitalized feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear** Men Shampoo:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Pour a generous amount of the shampoo onto your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp and hair to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For extra nourishment, you can repeat the process or use a suitable conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear** Men Shampoo:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Glycol Distearate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5)
â­ Silicone Quaterniums
â­ Niacinamide (Vitamin B3)
â­ Polyquaternium
â­ DMDM Hydantoin
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)

#ClearShampoo #MensHairCare #HairFallDefense #StrongHair #HealthyHair #Men #HairLoss #HairCareSaudi #SaudiBeauty #ClearMen

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Clear** Men Shampoo Shower Fresh, specifically formulated for men's scalp needs. It provides a long-lasting feeling of freshness and cleanliness, protecting you from dandruff and giving you healthy, shiny hair. With its unique formula enriched with Vitamin B3, Lemon & Mint extract, it deeply moisturizes the scalp and effectively combats dandruff, giving you freshness that lasts up to 24 hours. Enjoy a refreshing shower experience that makes your hair and scalp feel 10x fresher all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear** Men Shampoo Shower Fresh:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Pour a small amount of **Clear** Men Shampoo Shower Fresh into your palms and lather.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp and hair, focusing on the roots and tips.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, follow with a **Clear** conditioner suited for your hair type.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear** Men Shampoo Shower Fresh:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Zinc Pyrithione, Dimethiconol, Perfume, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium chloride, Carbomer, Menthol, Sodium Salicylate, Citric acid, Sodium hydroxide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Zinc Sulphate, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Sodium benzoate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, TEA-Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Laureth-23, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, Climbazole, Laureth-4, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf O, Cellulose Gum, PPG-9, PEG-4, Propylene glycol, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Passiflora Edulis Fruit Extract, Xanthan gum, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium sorbate, Panthenol, Alcohol Denat., Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Glucose, Sodium sulfate, Lactic acid, Trideceth-9, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Pantolactone, Panax Ginseng Root Extract.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness with **Clear Men Shampoo Cool Sport Menthol**, specially formulated to provide a cooling and invigorating experience for your scalp. Its menthol-rich formula effectively cleanses your hair, leaving you feeling energized and active, perfect for men with active lifestyles. It helps combat dandruff and scalp irritation, leaving your hair clean, refreshed, and dandruff-free.

â­ Instant cooling and refreshing sensation from menthol
â­ High efficacy in fighting dandruff
â­ Protects and moisturizes the scalp
â­ Deep cleansing removes dirt and oil
â­ Specifically formulated for men's scalp needs
â­ Long-lasting fresh fragrance
â­ Safe for daily use

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Men Shampoo Cool Sport Menthol**
â­ Wet your hair and scalp thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp and hair, focusing on the roots.
â­ Rinse your hair well with water to remove all lather.
â­ Repeat if necessary for cleaner hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Men Shampoo Cool Sport Menthol**
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS)
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Menthol
â­ Zinc Pyrithione
â­ Glycol Distearate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5)
â­ Polyquaternium-7

#ClearShampoo #ForMen #CoolSport #Menthol #HairCare #HealthyHair #AntiDandruff #Freshness #MensCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness with **Clear Cool Sport Menthol** shampoo, specially designed for men to combat dandruff and provide a superior cooling sensation. Its advanced formula deeply cleanses the scalp of excess oil and sweat, leaving hair refreshed and healthy. Perfect for an active lifestyle, **Clear Cool Sport Menthol** ensures long-lasting freshness and strengthens your hair from the roots.

â­ Provides an instant cooling and refreshing sensation.
â­ Effectively eliminates dandruff and prevents scalp itching.
â­ Deeply cleanses to remove dirt, oil, and impurities.
â­ Leaves hair with a revitalizing scent and all-day freshness.
â­ Strengthens hair and maintains scalp health.
â­ Suitable for daily use.
â­ Specifically formulated for men's scalp needs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Cool Sport Menthol**:
â­ Thoroughly wet your hair with warm water.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of shampoo into your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp and hair, working it into a rich lather.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if desired for enhanced freshness and cleanliness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Cool Sport Menthol**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Zinc Pyrithione
â­ Menthol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Citric Acid

description_en:
Achieve a flake-free, refreshed look with **Clear Men Cool Mint Anti-Dandruff Hair Styling Cream**. Specially formulated for men, this cream not only tackles dandruff but also provides a lasting cool sensation from menthol, keeping you fresh all day.

â­ Effectively combats dandruff.
â­ Delivers a long-lasting cool feeling with a refreshing mint scent.
â­ Nourishes and moisturizes both hair and scalp.
â­ Activates the scalp's natural protective layer with its innovative formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Men Cool Mint Anti-Dandruff Hair Styling Cream**:
â­ Apply to damp hair.
â­ Gently massage into the scalp and hair.
â­ Style as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Men Cool Mint Anti-Dandruff Hair Styling Cream**:
â­ Features a unique Nutrium 10 formulation to fight dandruff.
â­ Infused with cooling menthol for scalp refreshment.
â­ Contains moisturizing and nourishing ingredients for hair health.

#Clear #HairCream #AntiDandruff #HealthyHair #CoolingMint #MensGrooming #HairStyling #HairCare #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and superior care with **Clear Active Fresh 3-in-1**, the complete solution for men's hair, face, and body. Its unique formula is designed to tackle dandruff while revitalizing your skin and body.

If you're searching for an all-in-one shower essential, look no further. **Clear Active Fresh 3-in-1** is engineered to deliver comprehensive cleansing and care. Its specialized formula combats dandruff on your hair and scalp, while simultaneously cleansing and moisturizing your skin. Conquer daily urban stressors like sun exposure, dirt, and pollution that can lead to sweat, grease, and itchiness. **Clear Active Fresh 3-in-1** is your ultimate head-to-toe freshness solution. Infused with invigorating citrus, it revitalizes your hair, face, and body with a deep cleanse. Beyond its effectiveness as an anti-dandruff shampoo, it deeply cleanses pores, leaving your scalp healthy and refreshed, and your face and body skin moisturized and revitalized. This revolutionary product is the answer to the convenience you've been seeking, offering a high-quality shower experience that makes you feel and look your absolute best.

â­ Delivers dandruff-free hair.
â­ Leaves your face cleansed and moisturized.
â­ Refreshes your body.
â­ Engineered specifically for men.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Active Fresh 3-in-1**
â­ Apply a sufficient amount to wet hair, face, and body.
â­ Gently massage to cleanse hair and skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat as needed.
â­ For best results, use daily.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse immediately with water.
â­ Start your day with the invigorating power of **Clear Active Fresh 3-in-1** for 100% dandruff-free confidence and refreshed, moisturized skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Active Fresh 3-in-1**
â­ Advanced anti-dandruff formulation.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients for skin care.
â­ Invigorating citrus fragrance.
â­ Gentle and effective cleansing agents.
â­ Unique triple-action liquid gel formula.

#Clear #MensShampoo #HairCare #SkinCare #BodyWash #MensGrooming #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #Dubai

description_en:
Achieve stronger, thicker-looking hair with **Clear Shampoo for Men**, specifically engineered for men to combat hair fall. Formulated with the innovative Nutrium 10, **Clear Shampoo for Men** activates your scalp's natural protection layer and keeps it dandruff-proof, boosting your confidence all day long.

â­ Strengthens hair from root to tip.
â­ Promotes a thicker hair appearance.
â­ Protects the scalp from dandruff with Nutrium 10.
â­ A specialized formula for men to tackle hair concerns.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Shampoo for Men**:
â­ Begin by wetting your hair, then apply 2â€“3 pumps of the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into your scalp and hair to ensure full coverage and effect.
â­ Rinse thoroughly to ensure no shampoo residue is left in your hair.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Shampoo for Men**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethiconol, Zinc Pyrithione, Dimethicone, Perfume, Sodium Chloride, Carbomer, Sodium Salicylate, Sodium hydroxide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Citric acid, Zinc Sulphate, TEA-Sulfate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Zinc Gluconate, Poloxamer 407, Laureth-23, Sodium benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, Laureth-4, Propylene glycol, Lysine HCl, PPG-9, Climbazole, PEG-4, Cellulose Gum, Glucose, Trideceth-9, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Xanthan gum, Potassium sorbate, Panax Ginseng Root Extract Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Pyridoxine HCl, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lactic acid, Panthenol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Caramel, Pantolactone, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methyl Propional, Linalol, Eugenol, Citronellol, Geraniol, Cinnamal.

description_en:
Experience complete refreshment with **Clear Active Cool 3in1 Shampoo & Body Wash**. Specially formulated for men, this all-in-one product offers superior care for your hair, scalp, and skin. Its unique formula with Cool Menthol provides a deep sense of refreshment, effectively combats dandruff, and cleanses and moisturizes your face and body. Say goodbye to daily environmental stressors like dirt and pollution that cause greasiness and itchiness.

**Product Features:**
â­ Delivers head-to-toe freshness.
â­ Infused with Cool Menthol to soothe and invigorate hair, face, and body.
â­ Effectively fights dandruff for a healthy scalp and vibrant hair.
â­ Deeply cleanses facial pores for bright, refreshed skin.
â­ Leaves your body and mind feeling clean and refreshed.
â­ Unique triple-action liquid gel formula for powerful cleansing and comprehensive care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Active Cool 3in1 Shampoo & Body Wash**:
â­ For Hair: Apply a small amount to wet hair, lather and rinse thoroughly.
â­ For Face & Body: Apply as needed, massage gently to cleanse skin, then rinse.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes, if contact occurs, rinse immediately with water.
â­ For best results, use daily. Start your day with confidence with the refreshing power of **Clear Active Cool 3in1 Shampoo & Body Wash**.
â­ Ensures no visible flakes with regular use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Active Cool 3in1 Shampoo & Body Wash**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycerin, Dimethiconol, Citric Acid, Piroctone Olamine, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Menthol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Mica, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Acrylamidopropyltrimonium Chloride/Acrylamide Copolymer, Disodium EDTA, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Niacinamide, Glycine, Laureth-23, Poloxamer 407, Phenoxyethanol, Laureth-4, PEG-4, Taurine, PPG-9, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Propylene Glycol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Coumarin, Limonene, Linalool, CI 42090, CI 77891.

#MensShampoo #BodyWash #MensGrooming #HairCare #AntiDandruff #DailyFreshness #Clear #Skincare #MensFragrance #AllInOneCare

title_ar: ÙƒÙ„ÙŠØ± Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù„Ù„Ø±Ø¬Ù„ Ø³Ù‡ÙˆÙ„Ø© ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„ØªØµÙÙŠÙ 2 ÙÙŠ 1 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Made specially for men, **Clear** Complete Care 2 in 1 Shampoo cleans & cares for healthy scalp, manageable hair. Formulated with Nutrium 10, it activates scalp's natural protection layer, keeping you dandruff-proof.

â­ Provides complete care for healthy hair.
â­ Formulated with Nutrium 10, a rich blend of 10 nutrients and botanical actives.
â­ Delivers a fresh and woody masculine fragrance.
â­ Activates the scalp's natural protective layer, keeping you dandruff-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear** Shampoo Style Express (2 in 1) For Men:

â­ Start by applying 2â€“3 pumps of **Clear** Complete Care 2-in-1 Shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into scalp and hair to get the full effect.
â­ Rinse thoroughly to ensure there is no shampoo left in your hair.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use regularly.
â­ If shampoo gets into the eyes, rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear** Shampoo Style Express (2 in 1) For Men:

â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethiconol, Zinc Pyrithione, Dimethicone, Perfume, Sodium Chloride, Carbomer, Sodium Salicylate, Sodium hydroxide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Citric acid, Zinc Sulphate, TEA-Sulfate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium benzoate, Glycerin, Laureth-23, Poloxamer 407, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, Laureth-4, PPG-9, Propylene glycol, Climbazole, PEG-4, Cellulose Gum, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf O, Xanthan gum, Potassium sorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Glucose, Lactic acid, Trideceth-9, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Pantolactone, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Caramel, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methyl Propional, Linalol, Coumarin, Citronellol, Citral, Geraniol, Cinnamal.

#Clear #MensShampoo #HairCare #StyleExpress #AntiDandruff #HealthyHair #Grooming #SaudiArabia #OnlineShopping #MensGrooming

â­ Gently massage the scalp to distribute the cream.

description_en:
Experience the dual power of nature and science with **Clear Shampoo Herbal Fusion for Men**. Specially formulated to boost scalp's defense, its unique Nutrium 10 complex activates your scalp's natural protection layer, keeping you dandruff-proof. Enjoy a healthy scalp and hair free from dandruff with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Shampoo Herbal Fusion**:
â­ Start by applying 2-3 pumps of the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into scalp and hair for full effect.
â­ Rinse thoroughly to ensure no shampoo residue is left.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use regularly.
â­ In case of contact with eyes, rinse them immediately with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Shampoo Herbal Fusion**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethiconol, Zinc Pyrithione, Perfume, Juniperus Communis Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Multi-vitamins (e.g., B6, C, E), Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Lactic acid, and other natural ingredients.

#Clear #MensShampoo #DandruffTreatment #HairCare #ScalpHealth #NaturalIngredients #MensGrooming #SaudiArabia #HerbalShampoo #DandruffFree

description_en:
Discover the purifying power of **Clear Deep Cleanse Shampoo 190ml**, specifically formulated for men to combat dandruff and provide deep scalp refreshment. This effective shampoo efficiently removes dirt, excess oil, and impurities, leaving your scalp clean and healthy. Enjoy a long-lasting refreshed and clean feeling with every use.

â­ Deep Cleansing Action: Effectively removes dirt, oil, and buildup from the scalp and hair.
â­ Fights Dandruff: Targets the root cause of dandruff, reducing flakes and itching.
â­ Refreshes Scalp: Provides a clean and refreshing sensation after each wash.
â­ Suitable for All Hair Types: Especially beneficial for those with dandruff or oily scalp concerns.
â­ Long-Lasting Freshness: Helps maintain a fresh, clean scalp throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Deep Cleanse Shampoo 190ml**:
â­ Wet your hair and scalp thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Apply a sufficient amount of shampoo and gently massage into the scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary for a deeper cleanse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Deep Cleanse Shampoo 190ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Zinc Pyrithione
â­ Menthol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)

#Clear #MensShampoo #DandruffTreatment #HairCare #ScalpHealth #DeepCleanse #HairRefresh #AntiDandruffShampoo #HealthyHair #SaudiArabia

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Shower Fresh Shampoo for Men**:
â­ Wet your hair and scalp thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Squeeze a small amount of shampoo into your palm.
â­ Gently massage the shampoo into your scalp and hair, lathering well.
â­ Rinse your hair and scalp thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary.
â­ Style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Shower Fresh Shampoo for Men**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Zinc Pyrithione (Anti-dandruff ingredient)
â­ Menthol (For cooling and refreshing sensation)
â­ Glycerin (For scalp hydration)
â­ Fragrance (For added fresh scent)
â­ Citric Acid (For pH balance)

description_en:
Product Overview:

**Clear Men Shampoo 3in1 Active Fresh 600ml**

Product Description:

Looking for an ultimate solution for your hair, body, and face care needs? Discover **Clear Men Shampoo 3in1 Active Fresh 600ml**, the perfect choice for men who strive for the best. With its innovative formula, **Clear Men Shampoo 3in1 Active Fresh 600ml** provides a deep cleanse and effective dandruff control, while moisturizing and revitalizing your facial and body skin. Enjoy long-lasting freshness and a refreshing citrus scent that boosts your confidence all day long.

Product Features:

â­ Delivers a triple cleanse for hair, body, and face in one product.
â­ Specialized formula to combat hair and scalp dandruff.
â­ Deeply cleanses pores, leaving your scalp fresh and healthy.
â­ Moisturizes your face and body skin for a refreshed feel.
â­ Infused with a revitalizing citrus fragrance for a vibrant shower experience.
â­ Ideal for daily use to start your day actively and brightly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Men Shampoo 3in1 Active Fresh 600ml**

â­ Apply a sufficient amount to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly.
â­ Can be used on face and body as needed.
â­ Gently massage skin for effective cleansing.
â­ Rinse well and avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water.
â­ For best results, use daily for flake-free hair and a refreshing feel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Men Shampoo 3in1 Active Fresh 600ml**

â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Dimethiconol, Citric Acid, Piroctone Olamine, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Menthol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Mica, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Disodium EDTA, Acrylamidopropyltrimonium Chloride/Acrylamide Copolymer, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Niacinamide, Glycine, Laureth-23, Poloxamer 407, Phenoxyethanol, Laureth-4, PEG-4, Taurine, PPG-9, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Propylene Glycol, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Juice, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Citral, Citronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool, CI 42090, CI 77891.

#Clear #Shampoo #BodyWash #HairCare #Skincare #MensProducts #Freshness #MensFragrance #SaudiArabia #OnlineShopping

description_en:
Experience a revolutionary hair care solution with **Clear Shampoo** Hair Fall Defense for Men. This advanced formula is specifically designed to fortify your hair from root to tip, promoting visibly thicker and stronger-looking hair. It actively works to protect your scalp, keeping you dandruff-proof and leaving your hair clean with a masculine, sophisticated scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Apply 2-3 pumps of the shampoo to your scalp and hair.
â­ Massage gently to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Shampoo**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Dimethiconol, Zinc Pyrithione, Dimethicone.
â­ Perfume, Sodium Chloride, Carbomer, Sodium Salicylate.
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Panax Ginseng Root Extract.
â­ Lactic acid, Panthenol, Pantolactone.

title_en: Clear Style Express 2 In 1 Shampoo for Men 190ml
title_ar: ÙƒÙ„ÙŠØ± Ø³ØªØ§ÙŠÙ„ Ø§ÙƒØ³Ø¨Ø±Ø³ 2 ÙÙŠ 1 Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù„Ù„Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù„ 190 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Achieve clean, healthy hair with **Clear Style Express 2-in-1 Shampoo**. This innovative formula combines the power of shampoo and conditioner in a single step, saving you time and delivering a superior care experience. Perfect for busy men, **Clear Style Express 2-in-1 Shampoo** effectively fights dandruff, giving you a healthy scalp and soft, manageable hair. Enjoy long-lasting freshness and an invigorating scent that boosts your confidence throughout the day. It's the ultimate solution for dandruff-free, hydrated, and easy-to-style hair, all in one bottle. Make your hair care routine simpler and more effective with this remarkable product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Style Express 2-in-1 Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo to your palm.
â­ Gently massage into your scalp and hair, creating a rich lather.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary.
â­ Style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Style Express 2-in-1 Shampoo**:
â­ Water (Aqua): The hydrating base for hair and scalp.
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate: Aids in lathering and cleansing the hair.
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine: A gentle surfactant that prevents stripping natural oils.
â­ Zinc Pyrithione: An effective anti-dandruff agent.
â­ Glycerin: Provides moisture to hair and scalp.
â­ Citric Acid: Used to adjust the product's pH.
â­ Fragrance (Parfum): Imparts a refreshing scent.

#MensShampoo #Clear #HairCare #AntiDandruff #HealthyHair #HairStyling #GroomingProducts #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience the ultimate power for your scalp with **Clear Legend by CR7**. 

This innovative shampoo is specially formulated for men, offering instant power cleansing for your scalp in just 30 seconds, while deeply nourishing your hair from root to tip for significantly stronger, healthier-looking hair. Enjoy a fresh, aquatic fragrance that provides 8 hours of long-lasting freshness throughout your day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear Legend by CR7**:
â­ Start by applying 2â€“3 pumps of the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into your scalp and hair for the full effect.
â­ Rinse thoroughly to ensure no shampoo is left in your hair.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear Legend by CR7**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Charcoal Powder, Climbazole, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Glycerin, Glycine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Menthol, Niacinamide, Sea Salt, Zinc Pyrithione, Zinc Sulfate, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Laureth-23, Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Poloxamer 407, PPG-9, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, Sodium Salicylate, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Linalool.

description_en:
Achieve stronger, more vibrant hair with **Clear** Anti Hair Fall Shampoo. Specially formulated to strengthen hair from root to tip, **Clear** helps reduce hair fall by up to 95%. Enriched with Nutrium 10, it activates your scalp's natural protection layer, keeping you dandruff-proof and leaving your hair looking healthy and radiant. Indulge your hair with a formula that provides strength and resilience to effectively combat hair fall.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear**:
â­ Start by applying 2â€“3 pumps of **Clear** shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into scalp and hair to get the full effect.
â­ Rinse thoroughly to ensure there is no shampoo left in your hair.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use regularly.
â­ If shampoo gets into the eyes, rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear**:
â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Dimethiconol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Dimethicone, Zinc Pyrithione, Perfume, Sodium chloride, Carbomer.
â­ Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide.
â­ Glycerin, Zinc Gluconate, Propylene glycol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.
â­ Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Pyridoxine HCl, Tocopheryl Acetate.
â­ Hydrolyzed Collagen, Xanthan gum, Glucose, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing ingredients for hair and scalp.

Infused with potent Bamboo Extract, **Clear** Shampoo promotes a healthy scalp free from dandruff and other scalp concerns. Experience 10x stronger hair from the roots with this revitalizing formula, free from parabens and colorants.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear**:
â­ Start by applying 2â€“3 pumps of **Clear** Shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into your scalp and hair to ensure the full effect of the active ingredients.
â­ Rinse thoroughly to ensure no shampoo residue is left.
â­ For best results, repeat the process and use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Dimethiconol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethicone.

description_en:
Experience the dual power of **Clear** Shampoo for Men, expertly formulated to cleanse hair and scalp while providing effortless styling control. Our innovative 2-in-1 formula, enriched with Nutrium 10, activates your scalp's natural protection layer, giving you healthy, dandruff-free hair that's easy to manage for your day.

â­ Cleanses and nourishes hair and scalp effectively.
â­ Offers superior styling control for men's hair.
â­ 2-in-1 formula for complete convenience and care.
â­ Protects the scalp from dandruff with Nutrium 10.
â­ Refreshing fragrance for the modern man.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clear**:

â­ Apply 2-3 pumps of shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage thoroughly into scalp and hair for full ingredient effect.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly to ensure no shampoo residue remains.
â­ For optimal results, repeat the process regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clear**:

â­ Water, Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethiconol, Zinc Pyrithione, Dimethicone.
â­ Perfume, Sodium Chloride, Carbomer, Sodium Salicylate, Sodium hydroxide.
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium benzoate, Glycerin, Laureth-23, Poloxamer 407.
â­ Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Panthenol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract.

title_ar: ÙƒÙ„ÙŠÙ Ù‚Ø·Ø¹ Ø¯Ø§Ø¦Ø±ÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø·Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø¶ÙˆÙŠ 80 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ø©: Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ø¨Ø¨Ø´Ø±ØªÙƒ
description_en:
Say goodbye to tired skin with **Clevie Round Organic Cotton Pads**, the ultimate solution for superior daily care. These cotton pads are meticulously crafted from 100% organic cotton, ensuring exceptional softness on your skin and resistance to tearing during use, even with rigorous makeup removal. Their closed edges effectively trap fibers, preventing shedding and providing a clean, comfortable experience.

**Clevie Round Organic Cotton Pads** boast high absorbency, making them ideal for efficiently removing makeup, from everyday facial makeup to stubborn nail polish. They are also your perfect choice for applying toner, cleansers, or even essential oils for a gentle massage. Their superior softness makes them suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin and baby skin, making them an indispensable addition to every family member's skincare routine.

Beyond their skin benefits, you contribute to environmental protection by choosing a biodegradable product. The pack of 80 pieces makes them your perfect travel companion or for carrying in your handbag, allowing you to enjoy freshness and cleanliness anytime, anywhere. Ditch rough tissues and replace them with the softness and efficiency of **Clevie Round Organic Cotton Pads**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Round Organic Cotton Pads**:
â­ Take out one round cotton pad from its handy pack.
â­ Apply a bit of makeup remover or coconut oil to the pad.
â­ Gently wipe makeup off your skin, then use a fresh pad for a final cleanse.
â­ Can also be used for applying toner, cleansers, or removing nail polish.
â­ Suitable for cleaning baby skin or applying massage oils.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Round Organic Cotton Pads**:
â­ 100% Pure Organic Cotton.
â­ Genetically unmodified.
â­ Free from harmful chemicals.

#OrganicCotton #MakeupRemover #Skincare #OrganicProducts #SoftCotton #Beauty #FaceCare #SaudiArabia #Makeup #HealthySkin

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness and superior skin care with **Clevie Oval Organic Cotton pads**. These cotton pads are specially designed to provide an unparalleled skincare experience. Unlike traditional cotton balls that easily disintegrate, **Clevie Oval Organic Cotton pads** are stitched at the edges to keep the cotton fibers intact, ensuring no residue is left on your skin. Made from the finest organic cotton, these pads offer a super smooth and gentle feel, making them completely safe even for delicate baby skin. Perfect for makeup removal, skin cleansing, applying skincare products, and even for effectively cleaning surfaces. They come in a practical and attractive package, making them easy to carry and use anytime, anywhere.

â­ **Key Features:**

â­ Made with genetically non-modified organic cotton, free from pesticide residue.

â­ Elegant and practical oval design.

â­ Easy-to-use and attractive packaging to keep handy.

â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

â­ Highly absorbent and gentle on the skin.

â­ Does not cause irritation or rashes.

â­ Ideal for your daily skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ **Usage Instructions for Clevie Oval Organic Cotton Pads**

â­ Use for makeup removal and applying skincare products.

â­ Perfect for nail polish removal.

â­ Can be used for facial cleansing and refreshing by spraying rose water.

â­ Can be soaked in a disinfectant solution for cleaning surfaces and tools.

â­ Suitable for basic hygiene and household needs.

ğŸ”¹ **Ingredients of Clevie Oval Organic Cotton Pads**

â­ 100% Pure Organic Cotton.

description_en:
Discover ultimate softness and effectiveness with **Clevie Square Organic Cotton Pads**, meticulously designed to cater to your diverse skincare needs. Crafted from the finest organic cotton, these pads offer a unique experience for makeup removal, lotion application, and gentle skin cleansing, even for delicate baby skin. **Clevie Square Organic Cotton Pads** feature a convenient square shape and stitched edges to prevent fiber detachment, ensuring a clean and efficient use with minimal product. They are perfect for removing eye makeup, cleaning nails, and applying essential oils, thanks to their high absorbency.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Square Organic Cotton Pads**:
â­ Simply remove one square cotton pad from the package and use it as required.
â­ A few drops of nail polish remover on this pad are sufficient to remove your nail paint quickly and neatly.
â­ Ideal for wiping off face and eye makeup.
â­ Can be used with disinfectants to clean surfaces or personal belongings.
â­ Suitable for use with creams and essential oils.
â­ Keep the cotton pads away from children.
â­ It is advisable to safely discard used pads in a dustbin.
â­ To avoid infections, do not reuse the product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Square Organic Cotton Pads**:
â­ 100% Organic Cotton, naturally grown and non-GMO.
â­ Soft and gentle texture on the skin.
â­ Highly absorbent natural fibers.
â­ Stitched edges to prevent fiber shedding.

#organiccotton #skincare #makeup #makeupremover #cottonpads #personalhygiene #beautyproducts #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

title_ar: ÙƒÙ„ÙŠÙ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø³Ù„ 50 Ù…Ù„ - Ù„Ø±Ø§Ø­Ø© ÙÙˆØ±ÙŠØ© ÙˆØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚
description_en:
Give your skin the care it deserves with **Clevie Moisturising Cream Honey**, specially formulated to soothe and repair dry, irritated, and itchy skin. 

The rich formula of **Clevie Moisturising Cream Honey** features a blend of humectants that draw and seal moisture into the skin, along with honey and royal jelly known for their nourishing and revitalizing properties. This lightweight moisturizer is incredibly comfortable for daily use without leaving any greasy residue.

â­ Soothes and hydrates dry, irritated skin.
â­ Enriched with honey and royal jelly for deep nourishment.
â­ Repairs the skin barrier and locks in moisture.
â­ Lightweight, fast-absorbing formula.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft and smooth.
â­ Suitable for daily use and under makeup.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Moisturising Cream Honey**:
â­ Apply generously to clean skin after washing or showering.
â­ Helps lock in moisture and support the skin's natural moisture barrier.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Moisturising Cream Honey**:
â­ Orange honey.
â­ Royal jelly.
â­ Jojoba esters.
â­ Shea butter.

description_en:
Achieve fresh, purified skin with **Clevie Micellar Water**, the ultimate solution for cleansing and makeup removal in one step! This micellar water features a gentle yet effective formula that delicately removes impurities and makeup, while unifying skin tone and bestowing a natural radiance. **Clevie Micellar Water** is the European beauty secret relied upon for decades, serving as a versatile cleanser, makeup remover, or toner for soft, hydrated skin. Its lightweight, no-rinse formula allows moisturizing ingredients to penetrate deeply, making it suitable for the face and eyes, and usable morning and evening. It's also perfect for precise makeup correction. Dermatologically tested and suitable for all skin types.

â­ Effectively removes makeup and impurities.
â­ Unifies skin tone and enhances radiance.
â­ Hydrates the skin, leaving it soft.
â­ Suitable for face and eyes.
â­ Can be used as a toner.
â­ No rinsing required.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Micellar Water**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount onto a cotton pad.
â­ Gently wipe over the face and eyes to remove makeup and dirt.
â­ No need to rinse with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Micellar Water**:
â­ Purified Water.
â­ Mild Surfactants.
â­ Cleansing Micelles.
â­ Moisturizing Ingredients (e.g., Glycerin).

#MicellarWater #SkinCleanser #MakeupRemover #Skincare #Clevie #SkinHydration #Toner #HealthySkin #SaudiBeauty #DeepHydration

description_en:
Unlock radiant skin with **Clevie Ultra Moisturising Serum**, specifically formulated to deeply nourish and hydrate your skin. Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, this serum brightens and revitalizes moisture-depleted skin, leaving it feeling incredibly soft and smooth while visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The **Clevie Ultra Moisturising Serum** boasts a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that plumps the skin quickly for a smoother look and feel, without any greasy residue. It's perfect for layering, acting as an ideal primer before makeup or sunscreen.

â­ Delivers intense hydration and deep nourishment.
â­ Brightens and combats dryness with Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Provides a soft, silky texture and minimizes fine lines.
â­ Absorbs quickly, leaving skin plump and dewy.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, especially dry or mature skin.
â­ Non-greasy finish, perfect as a makeup primer.
â­ Dermatologically tested for safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Ultra Moisturising Serum**
â­ Apply morning and night on dry, clean skin before your usual face cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Ultra Moisturising Serum**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Other nourishing moisturizing ingredients

#ClevieSerum #SkinHydration #SaudiSkincare #HyaluronicAcid #GlowingSkin #SaudiBeauty #FaceSerum #FacialCare #DeepMoisture #ClevieSkincare

description_en:
Introducing **Clevie Lifting Day Cream**, your ultimate multi-tasking moisturizer with SPF 30 for a boost of hydration and protection against harmful sun rays. Simplify your skincare routine with this deeply hydrating formula that combats dryness and nourishes your skin.

**Clevie Lifting Day Cream** features a lightweight, creamy texture that melts into your skin effortlessly, leaving no greasy residue. It helps combat free radicals, reduces sun damage, and possesses anti-aging properties to diminish fine lines and wrinkles, ensuring long-lasting moisture retention.

â­ Provides intense hydration and combats dryness.
â­ Protects against harmful UV rays with SPF 30.
â­ Helps to combat fine lines and wrinkles.
â­ Absorbs quickly without a greasy feel.
â­ Creates a smooth canvas for makeup application.
â­ Suitable for daily use on all skin types.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Lifting Day Cream**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to your face, neck, and any other exposed skin areas.
â­ Wait a few minutes before applying makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Lifting Day Cream**:
(Product ingredients are not provided in the data, but the product focuses on hydration, sun protection, and anti-aging benefits).

description_en:
Discover a pure and radiant complexion with **Clevie Purifying Cleansing Gel 200 ml**. This purifying cleanser is designed to provide a deep and effective cleanse without the need for aggressive rubbing, making it an ideal choice for daily skincare.

â­ Deeply cleanses and moisturizes the skin, leaving it with a soft texture and natural radiance.
â­ Nourishing, moisturizing, and revitalizing formula gently exfoliates and enhances skin hydration.
â­ Enriched with antioxidants to protect the skin from harmful environmental stressors.
â­ Transforms into a gentle lather that removes accumulated makeup, dirt, and bacteria throughout the day.
â­ Controls sebum production for oily skin and hydrates without clogging pores.
â­ Does not cause skin dryness, flakiness, or irritation.
â­ Leaves the skin bright and smooth to the touch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Purifying Cleansing Gel 200 ml**
â­ Lather a small amount in your hands and apply to a damp face.
â­ Gently massage, then rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use morning and evening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Purifying Cleansing Gel 200 ml**
â­ Gentle and skin-safe formula, enriched with antioxidants and moisturizing ingredients.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, especially oily skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested to ensure maximum safety and effectiveness.

#Clevie #FacialCleanser #PurifyingGel #SkincareRoutine #OilySkin #DeepCleanse #HydratingSkin #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #DermatologistTested
