description_en:
Experience the transformative power of **Clevie Lifting Night Cream**, your ultimate ally for overnight skin rejuvenation. This luxurious cream is enriched with potent hydrating and anti-aging ingredients, expertly formulated to visibly reduce wrinkles and fine lines, revealing firmer, plumper-looking skin. Infused with shea butter, it delivers deep, lasting moisture and helps restore your skin's natural barrier for enhanced elasticity and vitality.

â­ Visibly diminishes the appearance of wrinkles and signs of aging.
â­ Firms and smooths skin for a more toned, supple complexion.
â­ Deeply moisturizes with nourishing shea butter.
â­ Replenishes and strengthens the skin barrier for improved moisture retention.
â­ Wake up to glowing, plump, and healthy-looking skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested for safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Lifting Night Cream**
â­ Apply to perfectly clean face and neck skin at night.
â­ Gently massage into skin until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Lifting Night Cream**
â­ NIACINAMIDE
â­ PANTENOL
â­ Shea butter

description_en:
**Clevie Collagen and Silanol Cream** is your ultimate solution for firm, youthful-looking skin. This effective cream combines the power of collagen and silanol to plump the skin, enhance its elasticity, and diminish fine lines and wrinkles, providing a perfect canvas for makeup application. Collagen, a key component in strengthening skin and boosting its hydration and elasticity, works synergistically with Silanol, a vital constituent of the bodyâ€™s connective tissue, to act as an antioxidant that protects your skin from premature aging and locks in moisture, leaving you with strong, firm, and fresh skin. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula feels amazing even on sensitive skin, offering superior softness and nourishment with deep hydration. Restore your skin's youthfulness and vitality with **Clevie Collagen and Silanol Cream**.

â­ Enriched with collagen and silanol to promote skinâ€™s beauty and elasticity.
â­ Plumps, hydrates, and conditions the skin, leaving it soft and velvety.
â­ Visibly reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines.
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy formula suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
â­ Packed with antioxidants and vitamins to lock in moisture for a youthful appearance.

title_ar: ÙƒÙ„ÙŠÙ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… ØªØ­Øª Ø§Ù„Ø¹ÙŠÙ† Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù‡ÙŠØ§Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙˆÙ†ÙŠÙƒ ÙˆÙÙŠØªØ§Ù…ÙŠÙ† Ù‡Ù€ 15 Ù…Ù„ Ù„ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙˆØªØ¬Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø©
description_en:
Discover the secret to rejuvenated eyes with **Clevie Eye Contour with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin E**.

**Clevie Eye Contour with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin E** is the ultimate solution for caring for the delicate eye area, working to provide deep hydration and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Thanks to its rich formula with Hyaluronic Acid, which maintains skin moisture and plumpness, and Vitamin E, an antioxidant that combats free radicals, **Clevie** cream grants you firm, youthful skin. Enriched with collagen, it instantly revitalizes the skin and minimizes the look of fine lines, bestowing unparalleled radiance. Get a boost of antioxidants and vitamins to fight signs of aging, and you won't believe the transformative effect on your eyes!

â­ Provides deep hydration for the delicate skin around the eyes.
â­ Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with Hyaluronic Acid and Collagen.
â­ Protects against free radicals and environmental toxins with Vitamin E.
â­ Revitalizes tired-looking eyes and imparts natural radiance.
â­ Suitable for morning and evening use, before makeup or on its own.
â­ Dermatologically tested and suitable for men and women.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Eye Contour with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin E**
â­ Gently cleanse the eye area with a mild cleanser.
â­ Pat your skin dry.
â­ Take a small amount of the cream onto your fingertip.
â­ Spread the cream by massaging it in light pressing movements around the eye area.
â­ It is recommended to use it twice daily, morning and evening.
â­ For best results, leave it on the skin overnight and rinse with lukewarm water in the morning.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Eye Contour with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin E**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for skin hydration and plumping.
â­ Vitamin E as an antioxidant.
â­ Collagen for skin firming and reducing fine lines.

#Clevie #EyeContour #HyaluronicAcid #VitaminE #SkinCare #Hydration #Wrinkles #FineLines #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Introducing **Clevie** Make Up Remover Wipes, the perfect solution for your normal skin. Effortlessly sweep away makeup, oil, and impurities for a refreshed and revitalized complexion. Infused with skin-loving ingredients, these hydrating wipes leave your skin feeling soft, smooth, and perfectly clean with no residue. They're ideal for a quick, effective cleanse before bed or for on-the-go refreshment.

â­ Effortlessly removes makeup and impurities.
â­ Exceptionally gentle on all skin types, including sensitive skin.
â­ Moisturizes and nourishes the skin, preventing dryness.
â­ Cleanses thoroughly and deeply hydrates in a single step.
â­ The ultimate quick and easy cleansing solution.
â­ Specially formulated for normal skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie**:
â­ Gently cleanse your entire face and lips, keeping your eyes closed.
â­ No need to rinse your face after use.
â­ Reseal the package tightly to prevent the wipes from drying out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie**:
â­ Hydrating ingredients that nourish and protect skin from dryness.
â­ Gentle formula that cleanses without irritation.
â­ Works to renew the appearance of your skin.

#Clevie #MakeupRemover #Skincare #NormalSkin #FacialCleanser #HydratingWipes #BeautySaudi #CleanSkin #SkincareRoutine #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Introducing **Clevie Make Up Remover Wipes for Sensitive Skin**, the perfect solution for quick, easy, and effective makeup removal. These wipes eliminate foundation, mascara, and blush in a single swipe, while also cleansing the skin of dirt and impurities for a healthy, clear complexion.

**Clevie Make Up Remover Wipes for Sensitive Skin** feature a moisturizing formula that protects your skin from dryness, making them ideal for a quick refresh before bedtime. With their perfect level of moisture, these wipes are ultra-gentle on sensitive skin and cause no irritation, while maintaining high effectiveness in removing all traces of makeup and debris.

â­ Effortlessly remove makeup and impurities without irritating the skin.
â­ Ultra-gentle, even on sensitive skin types.
â­ Hydrates and nourishes the skin, protecting it from dryness.
â­ Cleanses and deeply moisturizes in one step.
â­ A quick and easy solution for daily skin cleansing.
â­ Specially formulated for sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Make Up Remover Wipes for Sensitive Skin**:
â­ Gently cleanse your entire face and lips, keeping your eyes closed.
â­ No need to rinse your face afterwards.
â­ Reseal the package tightly after each use to prevent wipes from drying out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Make Up Remover Wipes for Sensitive Skin**:
â­ (Ingredients not specified in original text, can be replaced with product benefits)
â­ Gentle and moisturizing formula.
â­ Free from alcohol and irritating fragrances (assumed).
â­ Specifically designed for sensitive skin.

title_ar: ÙƒÙ„ÙŠÙ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù‡ÙŠØ§Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙˆÙ†ÙŠÙƒ 50 Ù…Ù„ - Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù†Ø¶Ø±Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ø´Ø±Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Achieve that coveted dewy glow with **Clevie Moisturising Cream With Hyaluronic Acid**! This advanced formula, enriched with hyaluronic acid, effectively targets dry spots, redness, and fine lines, giving your skin a youthful, plump appearance. Its delightful, lightweight texture is instantly absorbed, providing deep hydration without any heavy or greasy feel. Perfectly suited for oily skin types, its oil-free ingredients reinforce the skin's protective barrier, offering a matte finish that enhances skin health.

âœ¨ **Features & Benefits of Clevie Moisturising Cream With Hyaluronic Acid:**
â­ Lightweight formula that cares for and instantly moisturizes.
â­ Contains hyaluronic acid for both short-term and long-term skin health improvement.
â­ Prevents moisture loss and provides a shield against environmental damage.
â­ Deeply hydrating and lightweight, it smooths texture and brightens the complexion without clogging pores.
â­ Ideal for oily skin, providing a matte finish and reinforcing the skin barrier.
â­ Dermatologically tested for safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Moisturising Cream With Hyaluronic Acid**:
â­ Apply generously to cleansed skin after washing or showering to lock in moisture and support the skin's moisture barrier.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Moisturising Cream With Hyaluronic Acid**:
â­ Iris Extract.
â­ Retinyl Palmitate.
â­ Zinc Salt.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Niacinamide.

description_en:
Deeply cleanse and refresh your skin with **Clevie Cleansing Water Gel**. This innovative formula effectively removes impurities and makeup, even waterproof formulas, leaving your skin purified and hydrated. It acts as a gentle cleanser and exfoliant in one step, boosting your skin's radiance and improving its texture.

The **Clevie Cleansing Water Gel** features a unique formula suitable for all skin types, providing deep hydration while minimizing excess oil production. Enriched with antioxidants and exfoliating agents, it helps restore the skin's protective barrier and imparts a healthy, renewed appearance.

â­ Effectively removes makeup, dirt, and sweat.
â­ Easily removes waterproof mascara and liquid lipstick.
â­ Cleanses, replenishes, and restores skin balance in one step.
â­ Acts as a gentle exfoliant to remove dead skin cells.
â­ Improves skin tone and texture for a healthy glow.
â­ Deeply hydrates the skin and reduces dryness.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
â­ Soap-free formula leaves no residue.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Cleansing Water Gel**:
â­ Apply a sufficient amount to a cotton pad and swipe across your face, or massage into your skin with clean fingers.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Cleansing Water Gel**:
â­ Contains antioxidants and exfoliating agents to enhance hydration and radiance.
â­ Soap-free formula suitable for all skin types.

description_en:
The Clevie Refreshing Facial Toner is your ultimate solution for a clear and radiant complexion. This innovative toner works deep within the pores to eliminate any residual dirt and impurities left after cleansing, leaving your skin refreshed and pure. With its dermatologically tested formula, **Clevie** Facial Cleansing Toner is a safe and effective choice for all skin types, including sensitive skin, as it gently soothes and evens out skin tone without causing dryness or irritation. Regular use helps to minimize the appearance of pores and improve the absorption of subsequent skincare products, making it an essential step in your daily routine for smoother, brighter skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie**:
â­ Apply the **Clevie** Facial Toner to a cotton pad.
â­ Gently wipe the cotton pad around your face from the T-zone outward.
â­ Use morning and night after cleansing your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie**:
â­ Delicate, and nourishing formula that balances your complexion without drying the skin.
â­ Refreshing and skin-toning ingredients.
â­ Helps to tighten pores and prevent penetration of impurities.
â­ Moisturizing and soothing for the skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

title_ar: Ø±ØºÙˆØ© ØªÙ†Ø¸ÙŠÙ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙŠØ³ÙŠÙ„Ø§Ø± Ù…Ù† ÙƒÙ„ÙŠÙØŒ 200 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover purity and freshness with **Clevie Micellar Cleansing Foam**, an effective facial cleanser that gently removes dirt, oil, and makeup residue without causing dryness. With its alcohol-free formula, **Clevie Micellar Cleansing Foam** works in one quick and easy step, penetrating pores to give you clean, hydrated skin without that tight, dry feeling.

Ideal for all skin types, especially sensitive skin, this cleanser helps soothe and soften the skin's texture thanks to its hydrating formula that preserves the natural moisture barrier. Enjoy purified, supple skin with a supremely smooth feel after every use.

â­ Purifies skin, enhancing its elasticity and soft texture.
â­ Washes away excess oil without leaving any residue.
â­ Enriched with mild ingredients, gentle for all skin types.
â­ Helps maintain the skin's natural moisture level.
â­ Gently restores the skin's pH balance, leaving it feeling balanced.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clevie Micellar Cleansing Foam**:
â­ Apply to a damp face.
â­ Gently massage until a rich lather forms.
â­ Rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clevie Micellar Cleansing Foam**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Chamomile Extract.
â­ Cleansing Micellar Agents.
â­ Natural Moisturizers.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and protection with **Kotex Cotton Maxi Super Sanitary Pads**, designed for medium to heavy flow period days. Our innovative sanitary napkins are crafted from 100% natural cotton, offering a soft and fresh feel against your sensitive skin. Free from plastic, ink, and chlorine, **Kotex Cotton Maxi Super Sanitary Pads** are a perfect choice for sensitive skin, being hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested for your safety. Featuring a super absorbent core and leak-guard barriers with wings for a secure fit, these pads empower you with freedom of movement and confidence all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Cotton Maxi Super Sanitary Pads**
â­ Use as needed during your menstrual cycle.
â­ Peel off the backing strip and attach the pad securely.
â­ Change the pad regularly for hygiene and freshness.
â­ Dispose of used pads properly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Cotton Maxi Super Sanitary Pads**
â­ 100% Natural Cotton
â­ Super Absorbent Materials
â­ Soft and Skin-Friendly Top Layer
â­ Secure Fit Wings
â­ Free from Plastic, Ink, and Chlorine
â­ Dermatologically Tested & Hypoallergenic

#Kotex #SanitaryPads #WomensHealth #FeminineHygiene #CottonPads #Comfort #DailyFreshness #LadyCare #SaudiArabia #PeriodProtection

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and protection with **Kotex** Cotton Maxi Night Pads. Specially designed to provide you with peaceful nights and unmatched protection.

â­ Natural Overnight Protection: **Kotex** Natural Maxi Thick Night Pads offer natural, gentle, and effective protection for your comfort day and night.
â­ 100% Cotton: Enjoy a natural, soft, and fresh feel against your delicate skin, thanks to the use of 100% natural cotton.
â­ Free from Harmful Materials: Contains 0% plastic, ink, or chlorine. It is hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested.
â­ Superior Absorbency: The absorbent center effectively locks away heavy flow, ensuring long-lasting dryness and comfort.
â­ Anti-Leak Channels: Flexible anti-leak channels at the back are designed to prevent leakage and provide an ideal fit.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex**
â­ Secure the pad in place within your underwear.
â­ Change the pad regularly to maintain hygiene and comfort.
â­ Dispose of used pads hygienically.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex**
â­ 100% Natural Cotton
â­ High-Efficiency Absorbent Materials
â­ Skin-Friendly Adhesive Materials
â­ Leakage Protection Barrier

description_en:
Experience superior protection and unparalleled comfort with **Kotex Maxi Thick Sanitary Napkins with Wings**. Specifically designed for heavy flow days, these pads offer you ultimate peace of mind throughout your menstrual cycle. Thanks to their innovative design and high absorbency, you can move freely and confidently without worrying about leaks. **Kotex Maxi Thick Sanitary Napkins with Wings** provide a feeling of dryness and freshness all day and night.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Maxi Thick Sanitary Napkins with Wings**:
â­ Place the pad in the designated area of your underwear.
â­ Ensure the wings are secured around your underwear for stability.
â­ Change the pad regularly as needed to maintain hygiene and dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Maxi Thick Sanitary Napkins with Wings**:
â­ Super absorbent materials to effectively lock away fluids.
â­ A soft top layer that is gentle on the skin.
â­ Leak-guard barriers to prevent leakage from the front and back.
â­ Adhesive wings for a secure and comfortable fit.
â­ Lightly fragranced materials for added freshness (may vary by product).

description_en:
Description:

Experience peaceful and worry-free nights with **Kotex Maxi Night Time**, the sanitary pads designed for superior protection and unparalleled comfort. With their innovative design and soft top layer, these pads provide a feeling of dryness and freshness all night long.

**Kotex Maxi Night Time** features a fast-absorbent core that effectively locks away fluids, and flexible anti-leak channels at the back that prevent leaks and ensure a perfect fit. With their wide back coverage, you get continuous overnight protection, offering you up to 0% leaks and 100% comfort.

Kotex is committed to meeting your needs, offering **Kotex Maxi Night Time** as a reliable solution for feminine hygiene, allowing you to move with freedom and confidence at all times.

Features & Benefits:
â­ Continuous overnight protection for complete peace of mind.
â­ Ultra-soft top layer for a gentle touch on your skin.
â­ Fast-absorbent core that efficiently locks away fluids.
â­ Anti-leak channels to ensure no leaks occur.
â­ Wide back coverage for added security during sleep.
â­ A trusted brand for feminine care for decades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Maxi Night Time**:
â­ Peel off the adhesive strip from the back.
â­ Place the pad in the designated area of your underwear.
â­ Change the pad regularly as needed to maintain freshness and hygiene.
â­ Dispose of used pads properly after use.
â­ For optimal protection, use **Kotex Maxi Night Time** throughout the night.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Maxi Night Time**:
â­ Soft and comfortable top layer.
â­ Super absorbent material.
â­ Anti-leak channels.
â­ Secure adhesive strip.
â­ Individual packaging for hygiene.

#Kotex #SanitaryPads #GoodNight #OvernightProtection #FeminineCare #SaudiArabia #PersonalHygiene #WomensProducts #WomensHealth #Comfort

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort with **Kotex Cotton Maxi Super Sanitary Napkins 26 Pcs**. Specifically designed for medium to heavy flow days, these pads offer you a superior skin care experience. Enjoy natural and effective protection with a soft, fresh cotton feel. Made from 100% natural cotton, free from plastic, ink, and chlorine, they are hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested to ensure the utmost gentleness on your sensitive skin.

**Kotex Cotton Maxi Super Sanitary Napkins 26 Pcs** feature a super absorbent core and innovative protective barriers that effectively lock away fluids, giving you a feeling of freshness and confidence all day long. Flexible back channels and wings ensure a secure fit and extra leak protection, allowing you to move freely without worry.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Cotton Maxi Super Sanitary Napkins 26 Pcs**:
â­ Remove the adhesive strip from the back. â­ Place the pad in the designated area of your underwear. â­ Use the wings to secure the pad firmly around your underwear for added protection. â­ Change the pad regularly to ensure hygiene and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Cotton Maxi Super Sanitary Napkins 26 Pcs**:
â­ 100% Natural Cotton â­ Super Absorbent Materials â­ Leak Protection Barriers â­ Wings for Secure Fit

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and protection with **Kotex Natural Maxi Protect Night** pads. Designed for your peace of mind during the night, these pads offer superior absorbency and a gentle feel, ensuring you wake up refreshed. **Kotex Natural Maxi Protect Night** pads are crafted from 100% natural cotton, free from plastic, ink, and chlorine, making them exceptionally kind to sensitive skin. Featuring a fast-absorbing core and innovative anti-leak channels, they provide long-lasting dryness and a confidence-boosting fresh feeling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Natural Maxi Protect Night**:
â­ Remove the protective backing and place the pad in your underwear.
â­ Enjoy reliable protection and comfort throughout the night.
â­ Change the pad as needed for optimal hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Natural Maxi Protect Night**:
â­ 100% Natural Cotton
â­ Super Absorbent Materials
â­ Free from Plastic, Ink, and Chlorine
â­ Dermatologically Tested for Sensitive Skin

description_en:
**Kotex Natural Cotton Panty Liners, Thin, 40 pcs** are your trusted companion for discreet, long-lasting freshness.

These thin panty liners are your everyday ally for ultimate softness and gentle protection. They shield your panties against vaginal discharge and urine leaks, keeping you fresh and protected all day.

Unlike other solutions in the market, these discreet panty liners not only feel like cotton but are also purely made of 100% cotton. They offer a natural, soft, and fresh feel against your skin. Plus, they contain 0% plastic, ink, and chlorine and are carefully crafted to be gentle on your sensitive, delicate intimate skin. **Kotex Natural Cotton Panty Liners, Thin, 40 pcs** also provide a hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested solution for your intimate care needs.

For ultimate convenience and hygiene, each thin cotton liner inside this 100% recycled box is individually folded and wrapped. This way, you can easily carry them in your bag or purse wherever you go.

With these cotton liners for women constantly in reach, you can embrace the confidence that comes with their superior comfort and reliability. Carry the **Kotex Natural Cotton Panty Liners, Thin, 40 pcs** with you wherever you go to stay fresh and comfortable for a long time during your light to medium flow days.

For decades, Kotex has been present to cater to all feminine hygiene needs. From thick and thin sanitary pads, to daily panty liners for everyday freshness, Kotex has continuously innovated. Its aim was always to broaden its product range to ensure maximum comfort, protection, and convenience for women around the world.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Natural Cotton Panty Liners, Thin, 40 pcs**:
â­ Peel off the backing paper.
â­ Place the panty liner in the center of your underwear.
â­ Change as needed.
â­ Dispose of used panty liner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Natural Cotton Panty Liners, Thin, 40 pcs**:
â­ 100% Cotton Top Layer
â­ Absorbent Core
â­ Adhesive

#Kotex #PantyLiners #FeminineHygiene #CottonLiners #DailyFreshness #IntimateCare #Saudi Arabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #Dammam

description_en:
Say goodbye to nighttime worries with Kotex Thin Night Pads, specially designed to provide you with maximum protection and comfort.

Kotex Ultra Thin Night Pads feature an innovative design that offers a discreet and secure fit, with a super-soft cotton top layer ensuring unparalleled comfort and a gentle touch against your skin. Thanks to the 3D fast absorbent core, these pads efficiently lock away fluids, keeping you feeling dry all night long. The flexible back channels adapt to your body's movements, providing extra protection against leaks.

Enjoy deep, peaceful sleep with the wider back coverage, designed to offer you unwavering confidence and reliable protection. These wonderful sanitary pads ensure no leaks or disrupted sleep, thanks to their inner layer that conforms to your unique body curves, allowing you to go through your days and nights with confidence and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex** Ultra Thin Night Pads with Wings:
â­ Remove the protective backing from the adhesive and wings.
â­ Stick the pad to the center of your underwear.
â­ For maximum protection, change the pad regularly.
â­ Dispose of used pads hygienically.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex** Ultra Thin Night Pads with Wings:
â­ Soft cotton top layer.
â­ Super absorbent and fast-absorbing core.
â­ Adhesive wings for secure placement.
â­ Highly absorbent materials for dryness.
â­ Flexible back channels for leak prevention.

description_en:
Always feel confident and fresh with **Kotex Anti-Bac Panty Liners Long**. Specially designed for your all-day protection, these long panty liners for women offer superior 99% protection against bacterial growth with exceptional odor control. Enjoy double the absorption capacity of regular panty liners, ensuring you feel dry and fresh for a long time. With their breathable design and absence of fragrances and inks, they are exceptionally gentle on your delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Anti-Bac Panty Liners Long**:
â­ Use **Kotex Anti-Bac Panty Liners Long** daily for guaranteed protection and hygiene.
â­ Ideal for use with tampons or menstrual cups for extra protection during heavy flow days.
â­ Perfect solution for unexpected periods.
â­ Each liner is individually wrapped for easy portability and ultimate hygiene anytime, anywhere.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Anti-Bac Panty Liners Long**:
â­ Made with quality materials for extra protection.
â­ Contains 0% fragrance and 0% ink to be gentle on sensitive skin.
â­ Breathable design allows for air circulation.
â­ Antibacterial technology provides 99% protection against bacteria.
â­ Double the absorption capacity compared to regular panty liners.

description_en:
Experience daily freshness and confidence with **Kotex Natural Panty Liners Cotton Normal**. Specifically designed to offer superior softness and gentle protection, these liners act as a shield for your underwear against discharge and leaks, ensuring you feel clean and dry all day long. Made from 100% natural cotton, **Kotex Natural Panty Liners Cotton Normal** provide a soft and refreshing feel against your sensitive skin, free from plastic, ink, and chlorine. Dermatologically tested and hypoallergenic, they efficiently and safely meet your personal care needs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Natural Panty Liners Cotton Normal**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before and after using the liner.
â­ Peel off the protective backing from the adhesive strip.
â­ Place the panty liner in the center of your underwear.
â­ Change the liner as needed to ensure maximum hygiene and freshness.
â­ Dispose of used liners properly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Natural Panty Liners Cotton Normal**:
â­ 100% Natural Cotton
â­ Soft, cottony topsheet
â­ Highly absorbent core
â­ Safe adhesive for underwear
â­ Free from plastic, ink, and chlorine

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness and superior protection with **Kotex Fem Pantiliners Antibac Long 20 pcs**. These innovative panty liners are designed to offer you advanced antibacterial protection and effective odor control, ensuring you feel confident and comfortable throughout your day.

**Kotex Fem Pantiliners Antibac Long 20 pcs** feature double the absorption capacity of regular panty liners, providing you with long-lasting dryness and freshness. Made from high-quality, skin-friendly materials, they are 0% fragrance and print ink-free, making them gentle on delicate intimate areas. Their breathable design allows for air circulation, ensuring maximum comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Fem Pantiliners Antibac Long 20 pcs**:
â­ Change the panty liner regularly for optimal hygiene and freshness.
â­ Ideal for daily use, during pregnancy, post-partum, or on light flow days.
â­ Can be used with tampons or menstrual cups for extra protection on heavy flow days.
â­ Each liner is individually wrapped for ultimate convenience and hygiene on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Fem Pantiliners Antibac Long 20 pcs**:
â­ High-absorption materials for superior absorbency.
â­ Soft, skin-friendly top layer.
â­ Fragrance-free.
â­ Print ink-free.
â­ 99% antibacterial design.
â­ Breathable materials.

description_en:
Experience superior protection and unmatched comfort with **Kotex** Feminine Napkin Normal with Wings.

**Kotex** pads are specially designed to provide the confidence and comfort you need throughout your day, ideal for light to medium flow days. Featuring a silky soft top layer and an ultra-absorbent core, these pads effectively lock away moisture, keeping you dry and fresh. The secure wings and innovative leak guards ensure worry-free movement, giving you the freedom you deserve. Discover the high quality and innovation that **Kotex** offers for your daily comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex**:
â­ Peel off the backing strip.
â­ Attach the pad to the inside of your underwear.
â­ Use the wings to ensure extra security and better leak protection.
â­ Change the pad regularly for maximum hygiene and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex**:
â­ Soft and comfortable top layer.
â­ Ultra-absorbent core.
â­ Leak guards for leak prevention.
â­ Adhesive wings for secure fit.

description_en:
Experience natural and reliable protection with **Kotex Ultra Natural Thin**, specifically designed for your medium to heavy flow days. These ultra-thin pads offer superior absorbency and 100% cotton comfort, providing you with a feeling of freshness and confidence all day long.

**Kotex Ultra Natural Thin** features a fast-absorbing core and effective leakage barriers, ensuring a discreet and secure fit. Made from 100% natural cotton and free from plastic, ink, and chlorine, they are gentle on sensitive skin and dermatologically tested to be a hypoallergenic and ideal choice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Ultra Natural Thin**
â­ Remove the outer protective wrapper.
â­ Secure the pad firmly in the panty.
â­ Change the pad every 4-6 hours or as needed for optimal hygiene and freshness.
â­ Dispose of used pads properly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Ultra Natural Thin**
â­ 100% Natural Cotton
â­ Soft and gentle top layer against the skin
â­ Super absorbent core to lock away fluids
â­ Panty locks for added security and protection
â­ Free from plastic, ink, and chlorine
â­ Hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested

description_en:
**Kotex Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads with Wings 30 Pcs** are your trusted companion day and night, especially for those heavy flow period days. Experience worry-free periods with these super absorbent sanitary pads designed for unparalleled protection.

Enjoy superior dryness and long-lasting comfort with **Kotex Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads with Wings 30 Pcs**. These pads feature a cotton-soft top cover that feels gentle against your skin, an absorbent center that efficiently locks away fluids, and protective barriers that effectively prevent leaks. With flexible back channels and wings for a secure fit, these pads offer freedom of movement without leakage worries, giving you 0% leaks and 100% comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads with Wings 30 Pcs**
â­ Cotton-soft top cover for gentle skin protection.
â­ Fast absorbing core locks in fluid, even for heavy flow.
â­ Protective barriers and back channels to prevent leaks, ensuring freedom of movement.
â­ Wings for a secure fit and added comfort.
â­ Wider back coverage for peaceful sleep and continuous nighttime protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads with Wings 30 Pcs**
â­ Highly absorbent materials for guaranteed dryness.
â­ Soft and comfortable top layer.
â­ Leak-proof barriers.
â­ Secure-fit wings.
â­ Adhesive materials to keep the pad in place.

Experience unparalleled protection and ultimate comfort all night long with **Kotex Ultra Natural Thin Night Pads**.

These pads are meticulously designed to offer a gentle yet effective experience, combining exceptional softness with reliable protection. Enjoy confidence and comfort throughout the night with a discreet and secure fit that allows you to move freely.

What sets **Kotex Ultra Natural Thin Night Pads** apart is their composition of 100% natural cotton, providing your skin with a supremely soft and fresh feel. Free from plastic, ink, and chlorine, they are dermatologically tested to ensure maximum safety, even for the most sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Ultra Natural Thin Night Pads**
â­ Place the pad on your underwear.
â­ Change regularly as needed for hygiene and comfort.
â­ Dispose of used pads safely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Ultra Natural Thin Night Pads**
â­ 100% Natural Cotton.
â­ Super Absorbent Materials.
â­ Soft, Skin-Friendly Top Layer.
â­ Free from Plastic, Ink, and Chlorine.
â­ Hypoallergenic materials, dermatologically tested.

Experience ultimate peace of mind with **Kotex Maxi Thick Night Time XL/S** Pads, engineered for superior leak protection. These ultra-dry and soft pads offer an unparalleled experience with their gentle top cover and fast-absorbing core that effectively locks away fluids. ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Maxi Thick Night Time XL/S**

â­ Remove the protective strips from the wings and attach them to the sides of your underwear for stability and leak prevention. 
â­ Dispose of the used pad safely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Maxi Thick Night Time XL/S**

â­ Soft top cover for superior comfort. 
â­ Fast-absorbing core to efficiently lock in fluids. 
â­ Anti-leak channels for maximum protection. 
â­ Adhesive wings for a secure fit.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled comfort and trusted protection with **Kotex Ultra Thin Pads with Wings**. Designed for medium to heavy flow days, these pads offer a discreet and secure fit that keeps you feeling fresh and confident. Enjoy the freedom to move with ease thanks to their advanced absorbent core and leak-prevention features.

**Kotex Ultra Thin Pads with Wings** are crafted with a soft, gentle top layer for maximum comfort against your skin. The innovative 3D absorbent center effectively locks away moisture, while the flexible back channels prevent leaks, providing worry-free wear day and night. Kotex has been dedicated to feminine hygiene for decades, and these pads embody that commitment to superior comfort and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Ultra Thin Pads with Wings**:
â­ Remove the backing strip from the pad and the adhesive from the wings.
â­ Secure the pad to the center of your underwear.
â­ Wrap the wings around the sides of your underwear to keep the pad in place.
â­ Change the pad regularly for optimal hygiene and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Ultra Thin Pads with Wings**:
â­ Soft, skin-friendly top layer.
â­ Fast-absorbing 3D core.
â­ Leak-proof outer layer.
â­ Adhesive wings for secure placement.
â­ Super absorbent materials.

description_en:
Product Name: **Kotex Cotton Liners**

Embrace daily freshness and gentle protection with **Kotex Cotton Liners**, your essential companion for intimate hygiene. These panty liners are expertly designed to keep you feeling confident and fresh throughout the day, providing a protective barrier against vaginal discharge and light leaks.

What sets **Kotex Cotton Liners** apart is their construction from 100% natural cotton, ensuring a soft and gentle feel against your sensitive skin. Free from plastic, ink, and chlorine, and dermatologically tested, they are hypoallergenic and safe for everyday use. Their dual absorption power guarantees superior dryness and unparalleled comfort. Each liner is individually wrapped for maximum hygiene and portability, making them your perfect partner on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Cotton Liners**
â­ Remove the outer wrapper and the backing paper.
â­ Place the panty liner in the center of your underwear.
â­ Change as needed to maintain freshness and hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Cotton Liners**
â­ 100% Natural Cotton.
â­ Plastic-Free.
â­ Ink-Free.
â­ Chlorine-Free.
â­ Super Absorbent Material.

#Kotex #PantyLiners #CottonLiners #FeminineHygiene #Freshness #Comfort #WomensCare #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Stay fresh and comfortable all day with **Kotex Feminine Napkin Normal Wings**. These sanitary pads are designed for superior protection and unmatched dryness, giving you the confidence to tackle your day with ease. Featuring a soft top cover and an absorbent core with leak-guard barriers, they ensure you feel secure and comfortable, even with light to medium flow. The innovative wings provide a secure fit, allowing you to move freely without worry.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Feminine Napkin Normal Wings**
â­ Remove the protective backing from the bottom and the adhesive strip on the wings.
â­ Place the pad in the center of your underwear, ensuring the wings are wrapped around the sides.
â­ Change the pad regularly for optimal hygiene and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Feminine Napkin Normal Wings**
â­ Soft top layer gentle on the skin.
â­ Absorbent core effectively locks away fluid.
â­ Protective barriers prevent side leakage.
â­ Back channels to prevent leakage from the back.
â­ Wings for secure fit and optimal placement.
â­ Breathable materials for freshness.

description_en:
Experience ultimate protection and unparalleled comfort with **Kotex Natural Maxi Protect Super** sanitary pads. Specially designed for medium to heavy flow days, these pads provide a feeling of freshness and confidence throughout your day.

â­ Made with 100% natural cotton for a soft and gentle feel against your skin.
â­ Completely free from plastic, ink, and chlorine, making them ideal for sensitive skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested to ensure they are safe and hypoallergenic.
â­ Features a super absorbent core and protective barriers for effective leak prevention.
â­ Flexible back channels ensure freedom of movement without worry.
â­ Wings for a secure fit and extra protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Natural Maxi Protect Super**:
â­ Remove the protective wrapper.
â­ Place the pad in the designated area of your underwear.
â­ Change the pad as needed to ensure hygiene and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Natural Maxi Protect Super**:
â­ 100% Natural Cotton
â­ Super Absorbent Materials
â­ Leak-proof Barrier
â­ Adhesive Wings for Secure Fit
â­ Soft, Skin-friendly Top Layer

Introducing **Kotex** Ultra Thin Sanitary Pads, your ultimate companion for superior protection and unmatched comfort during medium to heavy flow days. These thin sanitary pads are designed to provide you with a feeling of dryness and confidence throughout your day.

â­ Thin and discreet design for a comfortable fit.
â­ Soft and gentle top layer against the skin.
â­ Fast-absorbing 3D core effectively locks in fluids.
â­ Wings for secure fixation and leak prevention.
â­ Offers reliable protection and peace of mind all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex**:
â­ Remove the protective wrapper.
â­ Place the pad in your underwear.
â­ Ensure the wings are secured around your underwear.
â­ Change the pad as needed to ensure hygiene and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex**:
â­ Soft and breathable top layer.
â­ Quick-drying absorbent core.
â­ Leak-proof backing layer.
â­ Adhesive for secure fixation.

description_en:
Experience superior protection and unparalleled comfort with **Kotex Maxi Thick Night Pads**, your ultimate solution for peaceful, worry-free nights. Designed for maximum dryness and protection, these pads will leave you feeling fresh and confident throughout the night. They feature a soft top cover that's gentle on your skin, an ultra-absorbent core that effectively locks away moisture, and flexible anti-leak channels for a perfect fit and leak prevention. With wider back coverage, **Kotex Maxi Thick Night Pads** ensure continuous protection with 0% leaks and 100% comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Maxi Thick Night Pads**:
â­ Carefully remove the outer wrapper.
â­ Attach the pad to your underwear.
â­ Change as needed for maximum hygiene and comfort.
â­ Dispose of used pads properly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Maxi Thick Night Pads**:
â­ Soft and skin-friendly top layer.
â­ Super absorbent material.
â­ Anti-leak channels.
â­ Wide back design for enhanced protection.
â­ Safe and reliable materials.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled comfort and long-lasting protection with **Kotex Tampon Super**, designed for your heaviest period days. These tampons offer superior security, featuring a smooth applicator for easy insertion and a comfortable fit that lasts. Each pack contains 16 pieces, empowering you to stay confident and active.

Product Features:
â­ High absorbency perfect for heavy flow days.
â­ Silky-smooth applicator for easy, comfortable insertion.
â­ Leak-lock technology for ultimate protection against leaks.
â­ Made with a blend of cotton and rayon for softness and comfort.
â­ Individually wrapped for discretion and convenience on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Tampon Super**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before use.
â­ Unwrap the tampon and hold it by the base of the applicator.
â­ Gently insert the tampon into your vagina at a slight angle.
â­ Ensure the string is hanging outside for easy removal.
â­ Change every 4-8 hours, depending on your flow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Tampon Super**:
â­ Cotton
â­ Rayon
â­ Cotton String
â­ Plastic or Cardboard Applicator

description_en:
Experience superior comfort and reliable protection with **Kotex Ultra Thin Sanitary Pads - Super Absorption with Wings**. Specifically designed to provide ultimate dryness and a feeling of freshness and confidence throughout the day, even for medium to heavy flow. The soft top layer offers a gentle feel against your skin, while the rapid-absorbent 3D core effectively locks away fluids to prevent leaks. Flexible wings ensure a secure fit and adapt to your body's movements, allowing you to move freely and confidently.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Ultra Thin Sanitary Pads - Super Absorption with Wings**

â­ Remove the paper backing from the pad.
â­ Place the pad in the center of your underwear.
â­ Wrap the wings around the sides of your underwear for extra security.
â­ Change the pad regularly as needed for hygiene and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Ultra Thin Sanitary Pads - Super Absorption with Wings**

â­ Soft top layer, gentle on the skin.
â­ Super absorbent layer with a 3D rapid-absorbent core.
â­ High-quality absorbent materials.
â­ Adhesive wings for extra stability.
â­ Thin and comfortable design.

#Kotex #SanitaryPads #FeminineHygiene #PeriodCare #SaudiArabia #ShopKSA #WomensHealth #Comfort #Protection #DailyFreshness

description_en:
**Kotex Natural Cotton Panty Liners** provide you with unparalleled daily freshness and gentle protection. Designed to offer superior softness and comfort all day long, these panty liners shield your underwear from daily discharge, keeping you feeling confident and continuously fresh. What sets **Kotex Natural Cotton Panty Liners** apart is their construction from 100% natural cotton, offering your skin a natural, soft feel that is free from plastic, ink, or chlorine, ensuring gentleness on your sensitive skin. These panty liners are hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested for maximum care. With their dual absorption power, they provide superior dryness and long-lasting comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Natural Cotton Panty Liners**:
â­ Remove the adhesive strip from the back.
â­ Place the panty liner in the center of your underwear.
â­ Change the panty liner regularly for hygiene and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Natural Cotton Panty Liners**:
â­ 100% Natural Cotton
â­ Free from Plastic, Ink, and Chlorine
â­ High-quality absorbent materials
â­ Hypoallergenic
â­ Dermatologically tested

description_en:
Experience superior freshness and unmatched protection with **Kotex Antibacterial Long Panty Liners**. These panty liners are specifically designed to offer 99% protection against bacteria and control unwanted odors, ensuring you feel confident and fresh all day long. They feature exceptional absorbency, providing double the absorption capacity of regular panty liners for ultimate dryness and lasting comfort. Made with high-quality materials, they are free from fragrances and inks, gentle on your delicate skin, and designed to be breathable for maximum comfort. Ideal for daily protection, during light flow days of your period, or for extra security with other menstrual products. Each **Kotex Antibacterial Long Panty Liner** is individually wrapped for convenience and superior hygiene anytime, anywhere. Choose **Kotex Antibacterial Long Panty Liners** for an exceptional experience of freshness and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kotex Antibacterial Long Panty Liners**

â­ Change the panty liner whenever you feel the need for freshness or hygiene.
â­ Use daily for personal hygiene maintenance.
â­ Ideal for everyday use, during lighter period days, or for extra protection with other menstrual products.
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before and after using the liner.
â­ Dispose of used liners hygienically.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kotex Antibacterial Long Panty Liners**

â­ Soft materials gentle on the skin.
â­ Fast-absorbing top layer.
â­ Super absorbent core.
â­ Leak-guard side barriers.
â­ Breathable materials.
â­ Fragrance and dye-free.
â­ Antibacterial components.

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect skin with **Cosrx Advanced Snail 92**, the all-in-one cream that combines deep hydration and skin repair thanks to 92% snail mucin. This rich gel-type cream soothes irritated and sensitized skin after breakouts, leaving your skin feeling fresh and comfortable. It features a unique formula that nourishes the skin, helps fight aging, repairs damaged skin, and provides long-lasting hydration.

â­ Nourishes & plumps the skin
â­ Aids in anti-aging
â­ Repairs damaged skin, reducing scars and dark spots
â­ Provides deep and long-lasting hydration for dry skin
â­ Soothes irritated and sensitive skin

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Advanced Snail 92**:
â­ Gently apply a proper amount of the cream to your face after cleansing and toning.
â­ Avoid the eye and mouth area.
â­ Gently tap the area where the cream was applied to ensure complete absorption along the skin texture.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Advanced Snail 92**:
â­ Snail Secretion Filtrate (92%)
â­ Betaine
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Carbomer, Arginine
â­ Dimethicone, Sodium Polyacrylate
â­ Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate
â­ Stearic acid, Allantoin, Panthenol
â­ Xanthan Gum, Ethyl Hexanediol, Adenosine

description_en:
Experience the transformative power of **Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence**. This highly concentrated essence, boasting 96.3% snail secretion filtrate, deeply hydrates and revitalizes your skin, delivering a natural glow from within. Its lightweight formula absorbs quickly, soothing irritation, minimizing acne scars, and restoring radiance to dull complexions. Perfect for all skin types, including sensitive skin, to enhance elasticity and strengthen the skin barrier.

â­ Deep, long-lasting hydration.
â­ Promotes a healthy, natural skin radiance.
â­ Reduces the appearance of acne scars and blemishes.
â­ Firms and improves skin elasticity.
â­ Strengthens tired skin for renewed vitality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence**:
â­ After cleansing and toning, apply a small amount to your entire face.
â­ Gently pat with fingertips to aid absorption, then follow with your moisturizer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence**:
â­ Snail Secretion Filtrate (96.3%).
â­ Betaine.
â­ Butylene Glycol.
â­ 1,2-Hexanediol.
â­ Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate (1,000 ppm).
â­ Allantoin.
â­ Panthenol.
â­ Arginine.

description_en:
Achieve plump, nourished skin in 4 simple steps with the **Cosrx** Advanced Snail Skincare Kit. 

This meticulously designed kit features snail mucin extract to effectively repair, moisturize, and soothe your skin. The four-step routine offers a comprehensive solution for various skin concerns, from dryness and acne to dark spots, revealing healthier, revitalized skin.

â­ **Benefits:**
â­ Comprehensive skin repair.
â­ Superior soothing for irritated skin.
â­ Deep, long-lasting hydration.
â­ Restores skin's vitality and radiance.

â­ **Targets:**
â­ Addresses diverse skin concerns.
â­ Hydrates dehydrated skin.
â­ Soothes acne-prone skin.
â­ Fades dark spots and hyperpigmentation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx**:
â­ **Step 1: Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser**
â­ Gently massage the cleanser onto wet skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with tepid water.

â­ **Step 2: Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence**
â­ Apply a proper amount evenly, avoiding the eye area.

â­ **Step 3: Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream**
â­ Apply a proper amount around the eye area.
â­ Gently pat with fingertips for fast absorption.

â­ **Step 4: Advanced Snail 92 All In One Cream**
â­ Apply a proper amount evenly onto the face, avoiding the eye area.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx**:
â­ **Advanced Snail Mucin Gel:** Contains 10,000ppm Snail Mucus Filtrate.
â­ **Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence:** 96.3% Snail Secretion Filtrate, with 1,000ppm Sodium Hyaluronate.
â­ **Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream:** Features 73.6% Snail Secretion Filtrate.
â­ **Advanced Snail 92 All in one Cream:** Contains 92% Snail Mucin and 1,000ppm Sodium Hyaluronate.

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆØ³Ø±ÙƒØ³ Ù„ØµÙ‚Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù„Ø²ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¦ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØªØ·ÙˆØ±Ø© 60 Ù„ØµÙ‚Ø©
description_en:
Introducing the **Cosrx Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch**, your ultimate solution for intensely hydrating and revitalizing the delicate skin around your eyes. These advanced hydrogel patches visibly hydrate, plump, and brighten the eye area, effectively reducing puffiness and nourishing the skin. Their unique design features two different sizes for a perfect fit, making them ideal for dehydrated, damaged, or tired-looking skin. Achieve a more refreshed and youthful appearance with **Cosrx Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch**:
â­ Apply the hydrogel patches to the desired area using the included tweezers.
â­ Leave on for 20-30 minutes.
â­ Gently remove.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Snail Secretion Filtrate, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, 1,2-Hexanediol.
â­ Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Betaine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Allantoin, Chlorphenesin.
â­ Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Calcium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Sucrose, Cellulose Gum.
â­ Adenosine, Potassium Chloride, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin.
â­ 20,400ppm Snail Secretion Filtrate: Soothes damaged skin and delivers moisture deep into your skin.

#Cosrx #EyePatches #SnailMucin #Skincare #Hydration #Beauty #SaudiArabia #KBeauty #KoreanSkincare #HealthySkin

title_ar: Cosrx Ù…Ù†Ø¸Ù Ø¬Ù„ ØµØ¨Ø§Ø­ÙŠ Ù…Ù†Ø®ÙØ¶ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù…ÙˆØ¶Ø© 150Ù…Ù„ - Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù…Ø´Ø±Ù‚Ø© ÙˆÙ†Ù‚ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Discover the secret to refreshed skin with the **Cosrx Low Ph Good Morning Gel Cleanser**. This gentle gel cleanser, formulated with a mildly acidic pH level, purifies your skin without stripping it of its natural moisture. Perfect for all skin types, the **Cosrx Low Ph Good Morning Gel Cleanser** refines skin texture, leaving it looking firmer and smoother after an overnight cleanse, ensuring your skin rests clean and revitalized.

**Key Benefits:**
â­ Hydrating cleanse without stripping.
â­ Effectively removes daily impurities.
â­ Protects the skin's natural barrier.
â­ Restores the skin's optimal pH balance.
â­ Ideal for dry, dull, tired, uneven textured skin, and sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Low Ph Good Morning Gel Cleanser**
â­ Use morning and night, after removing makeup.
â­ Begin with wet hands and face. Squeeze a proper amount onto your hand and foam up.
â­ Gently massage onto the face, avoiding the eye and mouth area.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Low Ph Good Morning Gel Cleanser**
â­ Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, Styrax Japonicus Branch/Fruit/Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Saccharomyces Ferment, Cryptomeria Japonica Leaf Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract.
â­ Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Allantoin, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Betaine Salicylate, Citric Acid, Ethyl Hexanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium EDTA.
â­ **Star Ingredients:** Betaine Salicylate (BHA) & Tea Tree Oil: Soothe and strengthen for luminous and clear skin.
â­ **pH Balanced:** pH 5.31Â±1.00 optimizes the balance of oil and water in the skin.

#Cosrx #Skincare #FaceCleanser #HealthySkin #Hydration #RadiantSkin #KoreanBeauty #FacialCleanser #ClearSkin #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Target and treat acne effectively and quickly with **Cosrx Acne Pimple Master Patch**. These innovative patches are specifically designed to tackle pimples, offering the perfect solution for clearer skin overnight. Made with advanced hydrocolloid material, these patches act as a protective barrier for acne-affected areas, preventing them from worsening and maintaining an ideal moist environment for the skin, thus reducing the likelihood of further inflammation or scarring.

â­ Effectively absorbs impurities and discharge from pimples.
â­ Promotes faster healing of blemishes.
â­ Helps prevent scar formation after acne treatment.
â­ Protects affected areas from bacteria and external factors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Acne Pimple Master Patch**:
â­ Thoroughly cleanse the area around the pimple before applying the patch.
â­ Select a **Cosrx Acne Pimple Master Patch** of an appropriate size that fully covers the pimple.
â­ Gently attach the patch to the affected area.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Acne Pimple Master Patch**:
â­ Hydrocolloid: Absorbs excess exudate and maintains skin hydration to prevent new breakouts.
â­ Petroleum Resin.
â­ Cellulose Gum.
â­ Styrene Isoprene Styrene Block Copolymer.
â­ Polyurethane Film.
â­ Polyisobutylene.
â­ Liquid Paraffin.
â­ Tetrakismethane.

#AcneTreatment #ClearSkin #PimplePatches #Cosrx #Skincare #KoreanBeauty #BlemishCare #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Revitalize your eyes with **Cosrx Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream**.

Never look tired again! This non-heavy, double-functioning eye cream visibly brightens the eye area. It's a hydrating, fast-absorbing eye cream suitable for EVERYONE â€“ whether you're in your 20s, 30s, 70s, or even teens â€“ without over-nourishing.

â­ Firms skin around the eyes.
â­ Boosts radiance and luminosity.
â­ Effectively reduces the appearance of dark circles.
â­ Targets dull, dehydrated skin.
â­ Helps minimize fine lines and wrinkles.
â­ Addresses under-eye puffiness.
â­ Combats dark circles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount after using essence/serum/ampoule around your eye area.
â­ Gently massage around the eyes and tap the area for optimal absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream**:
â­ Snail Secretion Filtrate (72%).
â­ A blend of 5 peptides at 5 ppm.
â­ Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Water, Palmitic Acid, Arginine, Carbomer, Stearic Acid, Betaine, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Allantoin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Adenosine, Xanthan Gum, Myristic Acid.

#Cosrx #EyeCream #SnailMucin #Peptide #Skincare #DarkCircles #AntiAging #RadiantSkin #SaudiBeauty #EyeCare

description_en:
Experience the secret to rejuvenated and radiant skin with **Cosrx Advanced Snail Radiance Dual Essence**. This innovative formula uniquely combines high-efficacy snail secretion filtrate with radiance essence upon pumping, delivering dual care for your skin.  Each pump provides a concentrated dose of intense hydration and skin brightening, restoring elasticity and vitality. Its lightweight texture leaves no sticky residue, offering a refreshing sensation. Ideal for dry, rough, and sensitive skin seeking effective and rejuvenating skincare.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Advanced Snail Radiance Dual Essence**
â­ Pump an appropriate amount of the product.
â­ Mix the two essences together before application.
â­ Gently apply onto the face and neck.
â­ Tap gently into the skin for enhanced absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Advanced Snail Radiance Dual Essence**
â­ 74.3% Triple Snail Complex: For intense hydration, plumping, and anti-aging benefits.
â­ 5% Niacinamide: To brighten skin, strengthen the skin barrier, and boost radiance.
â­ Glutathione: To improve skin tone and overall complexion.
â­ Snail Secretion Filtrate, Butylene Glycol, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate.

title_en: Cosrx Advanced Snail Mucin Power Sheet Mask 25ml for Instant Hydration
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆØ³Ø±ÙƒØ³ Ù‚Ù†Ø§Ø¹ Ø®Ù„Ø§ØµØ© Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù„Ø²ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙƒØ«Ù 25Ù…Ù„ Ù„ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙÙˆØ±ÙŠ
description_en:
Revitalize your skin with the intensely nourishing **Cosrx Advanced Snail Mucin Power Sheet Mask 25ml**. 

This luxurious sheet mask is saturated with 35,000 ppm of snail mucin filtrate, designed to deeply hydrate, repair, and plump your skin. The natural-derived cellulose sheet ensures a perfect face-hugging fit, allowing the potent formula to be fully absorbed, leaving your skin supple, dewy, and revitalized. Experience a burst of nourishment and hydration in just 15-20 minutes for a radiant complexion.

â­ Delivers intense hydration for a plump, smooth feel.
â­ Rich snail mucin nourishes and supports skin repair.
â­ Natural cellulose sheet provides optimal essence absorption.
â­ Improves skin texture and elasticity.
â­ Soothes and calms irritated skin.
â­ Lightweight formula absorbs quickly without residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Advanced Snail Mucin Power Sheet Mask 25ml**
â­ Start with a clean, dry face.
â­ Carefully unfold the mask and apply it to your face, aligning with your eyes, nose, and mouth.
â­ Leave on for 15-20 minutes.
â­ Remove the mask and gently pat in any remaining essence for maximum absorption.
â­ Follow with your usual skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Advanced Snail Mucin Power Sheet Mask 25ml**
â­ Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Snail Secretion Filtrate, 1,2-hexanediol.
â­ Panthenol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hexylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum.
â­ Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Allantoin, Hydroxyethylcellulose.
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate.
â­ Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate.

#Cosrx #SheetMask #SnailMucin #Skincare #KoreanBeauty #Hydration #HealthySkin #BeautyRoutine #KBeauty #SaudiArabia

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆØ³Ø±ÙƒØ³ Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹Ø© Ù„ØµÙ‚Ø© Ø­Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¨Ø§Ø¨: Ø­Ù„ Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„ Ù„Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ù‚Ø¹
description_en:
Introducing the **Cosrx Ac Collection Acne Patch**, your ultimate solution for clearer, calmer skin. These highly adhesive, oval-shaped patches come in three convenient sizes, offering seamless coverage and effective treatment for blemishes. They work to soothe inflammation and help acne disappear without leaving scars, while their strong adherence ensures they stay in place even on curved areas like your jawline and hairlines.

â­ Offers invisible coverage for inflamed spots.
â­ Features 3 different sizes to fit all types of acne.
â­ Provides strong adhesion, lasting even on curved areas.
â­ Aids in healing acne without leaving marks or scars.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Ac Collection Acne Patch**
â­ Cleanse the area around the troubled spot.
â­ Apply the patch to dry, clean skin.
â­ Select a patch size that is slightly larger than the blemish for optimal coverage and adhesion.
â­ Can be used after an exfoliator or before toner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Ac Collection Acne Patch**
â­ Carboxymethylcellulose sodium
â­ Polyisobutene
â­ Rosin
â­ Polybutene
â­ Mineral oil
â­ Centella Asiatica Extract
â­ Polyurethane film

description_en:
Discover the ultimate solution for oily skin and enlarged pores with the **Cosrx Master Patch X-Large**. These generously sized hydrocolloid patches are expertly designed to effectively and safely address blemishes and oily pore areas, serving as a superior alternative to traditional pore strips. Infused with niacinamide, this single, large patch works to heal and clear extensive problematic zones simultaneously, visibly reducing acne-induced discoloration and absorbing excess sebum. Its contoured shape embraces your facial features, blending seamlessly with the skin for discreet, comfortable care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Master Patch X-Large**
â­ After cleansing, thoroughly dry the problematic spot.
â­ Gently stick the patch onto the affected area and let it heal. Goodbye, pimple!
â­ For best results, it is recommended to use overnight.
â­ Can be used to visibly reduce dark spots or absorb pore gunk.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Master Patch X-Large**
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Hydrogenated Poly(C6-20 Olefin)
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
â­ Polyisobutene
â­ Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer
â­ Niacinamide

Caution & Warnings:
â­ In case of allergy to any of the ingredients.
â­ Avoid the eye area.

description_en:
Experience ultimate hydration and a gentle cleanse with the **Cosrx Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser**. This advanced gel cleanser is formulated with a powerful dose of snail mucin to deeply cleanse, hydrate, and protect your skin.

â­ Supercharged with a smooth lather powered by snail mucin.
â­ Impeccable cleansing that reaches deep into the pores to remove impurities.
â­ Minimizes stimulation, making it ideal for sensitive skin.
â­ Provides essential moisturizing care, leaving skin feeling balanced.
â­ Protects skin from stripping and restores moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser**:
â­ Wet your face.
â­ Lather a pea-sized amount of cleanser between your palms.
â­ Massage the foam into your skin from forehead to jaw.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser**:
â­ Enriched with Snail Secretion Filtrate (10,000ppm) to protect and restore skin while removing impurities.
â­ Water, Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Coco-Glucoside, Lauryl Betaine, Tromethamine, Fragrance.

Discover your skin's radiance with **COSRX The Vitamin C 23 Serum**, a potent antioxidant serum formulated with 23% pure Vitamin C (ascorbic acid). This serum works to brighten the skin, even out skin tone, and combat signs of aging. Its lightweight, fast-absorbing formula helps reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines, delivering a radiant and youthful complexion.

**Product Features:**
â­ High Concentration of Vitamin C: 23% pure ascorbic acid for maximum brightness and antioxidant benefits.
â­ Brightening Effect: Helps fade dark spots and improve overall skin tone.
â­ Anti-Aging Properties: Reduces the appearance of fine lines and promotes a youthful look.
â­ Lightweight Texture: Absorbs quickly without leaving a sticky residue.
â­ Free from Harmful Additives: No parabens, sulfates, or artificial fragrances.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **COSRX The Vitamin C 23 Serum**:
â­ Cleanse: Start with a clean face.
â­ Apply Serum: Use 1-2 drops of the serum and gently massage onto your face and neck, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Moisturize: Follow with your favorite moisturizer to lock in hydration.
â­ Frequency: Use in the morning or evening. For daytime use, follow up with sunscreen for added protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **COSRX The Vitamin C 23 Serum**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)
â­ Glycerin
â­ 1,2-Hexanediol
â­ Propanediol
â­ Beta-Glucan
â­ Various botanical extracts
â­ Preservatives (as needed)

#VitaminCSerum #COSRX #Skincare #Brightening #AntiAging #KoreanBeauty #FacialCare #SkinHydration #BeautyProducts #RadiantSkin

description_en:
Reveal radiant and glowing skin with the **Cosrx Honey Glow Kit**. This comprehensive set is specifically designed for dry and rough skin, featuring naturally derived moisturizing ingredients that will leave your skin with unparalleled radiance and exceptional smoothness, without any sticky residue.

**Kit Benefits:**
â­ Deep skin moisturization.
â­ Intensive nourishment for enhanced skin health.
â­ Strengthens the skin's natural barrier.
â­ Ideal for dull, dry, and fine-line prone skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Honey Glow Kit**:
Follow these integrated steps for optimal results:
â­ **STEP 1:** Propolis Synergy Toner (30ml) - Apply as the first step after cleansing to prepare the skin.
â­ **STEP 2:** Propolis Light Ampoule (10ml) - Apply evenly after the toner to boost radiance.
â­ **STEP 3:** Propolis Light Cream (15ml) - Use as the final step to moisturize and seal in nutrients.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Honey Glow Kit**:
This effective set is formulated with carefully selected natural ingredients:
â­ Propolis Synergy Toner: Contains 72.6% Propolis Extract, 10.7% Honey Extract, and 0.2% Panthenol.
â­ Propolis Light Ampoule: Rich with 83.3% Propolis Extract.
â­ Propolis Light Cream: Includes 64% Propolis Extract, 1% Honey Extract, and 1% Royal Jelly Extract.

#Cosrx #Skincare #KoreanBeauty #PropolisToner #PropolisAmpoule #PropolisCream #DrySkin #GlowySkin #SkinMoisture #NaturalHoney

description_en:
Wake up to revitalized and radiant skin as if you've just stepped out of a spa! Enriched with over 68% Rice Extract, the **Cosrx Ultimate Nourishing Rice Overnight Spa Mask** delivers intensive nourishment and deep hydration, helping to clarify and soften your skin for a noticeably smoother complexion.

â­ Brightens and softens dull, flaky skin.
â­ Nurses and moisturizes tired, dry skin.
â­ Gentle, natural ingredients for a healthy complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Ultimate Nourishing Rice Overnight Spa Mask**:

â­ Complete your daily skincare routine. Dispense a pea-sized amount of the **Cosrx Ultimate Nourishing Rice Overnight Spa Mask**.
â­ Apply all over the skin in the final step of your nightly routine.
â­ Massage the product into the skin for better absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Ultimate Nourishing Rice Overnight Spa Mask**:

â­ Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract (68.9%): A natural ingredient well-known in Asia for toning and softening the skin.
â­ Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Betaine, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Kernel Oil, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Arginine, Carbomer, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum.

description_en:
**Cosrx The Retinol 0.1 Cream** is your ultimate weapon against aging, meticulously crafted to boost skin elasticity and diminish wrinkles. Its potent formula works diligently to rejuvenate skin cells, bestowing a more youthful and vibrant appearance. Revel in smoother, firmer, and radiantly glowing skin with this exceptional cream.

â­ Enhances skin elasticity and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
â­ Evens out skin tone and imparts a healthy glow.
â­ Improves skin texture, leaving it softer and smoother.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx The Retinol 0.1 Cream**:
â­ In the evening, after cleansing, apply a pea-sized amount to your face and neck.
â­ Start gradually (2-3 times a week) and increase frequency as tolerated by your skin.
â­ Always use sunscreen in the morning when using this product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx The Retinol 0.1 Cream**:
â­ Pure Retinol 0.1% for skin cell turnover.
â­ Retinyl Palmitate to improve skin resilience.
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing ingredients to soothe the skin.

#Cosrx #Retinol #Skincare #KoreanBeauty #AntiAging #HealthySkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Moisturizer #SkinCareJeddah

description_en:
Say goodbye to blackheads and clogged pores with the **Cosrx BHA Blackhead Power Liquid**! This effective formula is your key to deeply cleansed pores, blending BHA and Niacinamide for gentle exfoliation and optimal oil control. It works to prevent breakouts and reduce post-acne marks, making it ideal for oily, acne-prone skin. Achieve a clearer, radiant complexion with the **Cosrx BHA Blackhead Power Liquid**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx BHA Blackhead Power Liquid**:
â­ After cleansing, apply an appropriate amount in your toner or essence step.
â­ If used as a toner, ensure the liquid is fully absorbed before applying subsequent skincare products.
â­ Recommended to use 2-3 times a week, gradually increasing frequency based on skin tolerance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx BHA Blackhead Power Liquid**:
â­ Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Water, Butylene Glycol, Betaine Salicylate, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Arginine, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Ethyl Hexanediol.
â­ Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Water + Betaine Salicylate: Clears clogged pores and improves skin tone and texture.
â­ Niacinamide: Reduces marks from spots and boosts skin radiance.

#Skincare #KoreanBeauty #SkinExfoliation #Blackheads #PoreCleanser #OilySkin #AcneTreatment #Niacinamide #SalicylicAcid #Cosrx

description_en:
Introducing the **Cosrx Clear Fit Master Patch**, your discreet yet powerful ally against acne. These patches are designed to be matt, gradient, and ultra-thin, adhering naturally to your skin and becoming virtually invisible, even under makeup. Perfect for daytime wear, they protect affected areas and accelerate the healing process.

â­ Highly effective in absorbing acne exudate.
â­ Acts as a barrier against bacteria to prevent secondary infections.
â­ Gradient design and matt finish make them nearly unnoticeable.
â­ Significantly reduces pimple size and helps prevent scarring.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Clear Fit Master Patch**
â­ Apply before skincare products.
â­ Attach to a clean, dry face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Clear Fit Master Patch**
â­ Petroleum Resin.
â­ Cellulose Gum.
â­ Styrene Isoprene Styrene Block Copolymer.
â­ Polyurethane Film.
â­ Polyisobutylene.
â­ Liquid Paraffin.
â­ Tetrakis Methane.

description_en:
The ultimate lip scrub for soft, hydrated lips.

â­ Gently buffs away dead skin cells with natural sugar crystals.
â­ Deeply moisturizes lips with luxurious honey extract.
â­ Acts as both an exfoliator and moisturizer (2-in-1) to maintain your lips' healthy condition.
â­ Perfectly preps lips for lipstick application, leaving you with a flawless color payoff.
â­ Experience the synergy of natural ingredients for irresistibly smooth, prepped lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Full Fit Honey Sugar Lip Scrub**:
â­ Apply a proper amount onto lips, and massage gently with a finger.
â­ Leave on for a few minutes, then rinse with lukewarm water.
â­ For the best effect, use the Propolis Lip Sleeping Mask before and after exfoliation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Full Fit Honey Sugar Lip Scrub**:
â­ Sucrose, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Water, Stearalkonium Hectorite, 1,2-Hexanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Dextrin, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Honey.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with a soothing, lightweight moisturizer that feels non-greasy! Soothing moisturizer doesn't feel greasy at all!

What it is: An everyday lightweight moisturizer formulated for Acne-prone skin.

WHY IT'S SPECIAL:
â­ A soothing moisturizer that leaves a non-greasy finish on the skin.
â­ Features the Centella AC-RX Complex to treat acne and help revitalize and recover the skin without irritation.
â­ Provides a light and non-sticky moisturizing sensation, perfect for acne-prone skin.
â­ Calms heat-sensitive skin and cools down acne-prone skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Ac Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer**:
â­ Gently apply a proper amount onto the face after cleansing and toning, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Tap gently for better absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Ac Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer**:
â­ Centella AC-RX Complex (Madecassic acid, Asiaticoside and Asiatic acid)
â­ Propolis Extract
â­ Aloe Vera Water
â­ Green Tea Water
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Panthenol
â­ Tea Tree Leaf Oil
â­ Zinc PCA
â­ Citric Acid

description_en:
Melt away the skinâ€™s impurities with **COSRX Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser**, a nourishing cleansing wash that helps to treat and prevent breakouts. Infused with a potent blend of Tea Tree Oil, Willow Bark Water, and 0.5% Salicylic Acid, the cleanser gently removes dirt, excess oil, and product build-up while replenishing moisture in order to combat the underlying causes of blemishes and breakouts. The result is a touchably soft, visibly clearer complexion that boasts a natural glow.

â­ Deep pore cleansing.
â­ Helps reduce breakouts and promotes clear skin.
â­ Moisturizes and calms sensitive skin.
â­ Effectively removes blackheads and whiteheads.
â­ Controls excess sebum production.
â­ Gentle exfoliation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **COSRX Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser**:
â­ Dispense a moderate amount into your hand.
â­ Add water and lather.
â­ Massage onto the face and neck, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Rinse with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **COSRX Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Stearic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Lauric Acid, Butylene Glycol, Glycol Distearate, Polysorbate 80, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Salicylic Acid (0.5%).
â­ Melaleuca Alternigolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Water.
â­ Natural botanical extracts for calming and moisturizing.

description_en:
Discover radiant, healthy skin with the **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner 150ml**. This daily boosting toner works in perfect synergy with the Propolis Light Ampoule to provide superior hydration and nourishment. Formulated with 72.6% Black Bee Propolis Extract and 10% Honey Extract, this toner brightens your complexion, improves skin texture, enhances smoothness, reduces redness, and leaves your skin plump, glowing, and healthy.

Ideal for dull, dehydrated, red, or irritated skin, the **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner 150ml** is a fantastic addition to your daily skincare routine for all skin types and seasons.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner 150ml**:
â­ Apply as the first step of your skincare routine after cleansing your face.
â­ Gently massage over the entire face for optimal absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner 150ml**:
â­ Propolis Extract
â­ Honey Extract
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ 1,2-Hexanediol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Betaine
â­ Cassia Obtusifolia Seed Extract
â­ Panthenol
â­ Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate
â­ Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate
â­ Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride

#Cosrx #PropolisToner #Skincare #Hydration #GlowySkin #HealthySkin #Beauty #SaudiBeauty #KBeauty #DullSkin

description_en:
Indulge your lips with the **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Lip Sleeping Mask**, a luxurious overnight treatment designed for deep hydration and rejuvenation. Formulated with 6 honey-derived ingredients, this mask creates a hydrating barrier that locks in moisture while you sleep, leaving your lips plump and supple by morning.

Product Features:
â­ Honey-6 Complex: Delivers in-depth hydration and improves fundamental lip health.
â­ Combats dryness and provides overnight plump, hydrated lips.
â­ Can be used as a thin layer during the day for a shiny, moisturized look.
â­ Soft, dense honey jam texture protects lips from dryness effectively.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Lip Sleeping Mask**:
â­ Before bed, apply an appropriate amount to your lips.
â­ In the morning, gently rinse your lips with warm water.
â­ For daytime use, apply a thin layer for moisturization and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Lip Sleeping Mask**:
â­ Petrolatum, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyisobutene, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Beeswax, Honey Extract, Propolis Extract, Royal Jelly Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), and other nourishing and moisturizing ingredients.
â­ Key Ingredient: Honey-6 Complex â€“ Nourishing / Intense hydration / Glow.

description_en:
Achieve clear, glowing, whitehead-free skin with **Cosrx AHA 7 Whitehead Power Liquid**. Formulated with 7% Glycolic Acid (AHA), this toner gently exfoliates the skin and helps reveal a radiant, even-toned complexion.

â­ Gently exfoliates and brightens the skin.
â­ Effectively clears whiteheads and small bumps.
â­ Promotes skin cell turnover and removes dead skin cells.
â­ Ideal for dull, rough, uneven textured, dry, and combination skin.
â­ Recommended for experienced users.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx AHA 7 Whitehead Power Liquid**:
â­ After cleansing, soak a cotton pad and swipe a thin layer of the liquid over the skin, avoiding the eye and mouth area.
â­ For daytime use, follow with a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx AHA 7 Whitehead Power Liquid**:
â­ Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycolic Acid, Niacinamide, Sodium Hydroxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Ethyl Hexanediol.
â­ Glycolic Acid: Refines uneven skin texture and removes whiteheads.
â­ Niacinamide: Reduces acne marks and boosts radiance.

#skincare #cosrx #faceexfoliation #whiteheadtreatment #skinbrightening #healthyskin #koreanbeauty #skincareroutine #beauty #saudiarabia

description_en:
Discover the power of **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Light Cream**, a moisturizing cream packed with a high percentage of black bee propolis complex and antioxidants. Its lightweight, gel-like texture absorbs effortlessly, replenishing moisture and enhancing radiance for plump, hydrated skin. Ideal for dull, dehydrated, and rough skin, this cream helps diminish fine lines, leaving your complexion revitalized.

â­ Nourishes for healthy, resilient skin
â­ Replenishes essential moisture levels
â­ Enhances natural radiance and glow
â­ Diminishes the appearance of fine lines
â­ Targets dull, dehydrated, and rough skin concerns
â­ Lightweight, fast-absorbing gel texture
â­ Suitable for all skin types

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Light Cream**:
â­ Gently apply a suitable amount of the cream to your face.
â­ Avoid contact with the eye and mouth area.
â­ Gently tap the cream into the skin to ensure optimal absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cosrx Full Fit Propolis Light Cream**:
â­ Propolis Extract (64%)
â­ Honey Extract (1%)
â­ Royal Jelly Extract (1%)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sunflower Seed Oil
â­ Beeswax
â­ Allantoin
