Experience superior oral hygiene with the **Colgate Zigzag Medium Toothbrush**. This value pack of 3s, with 6 toothbrushes per pack, is engineered for a deep and thorough clean. The unique Zigzag design of **Colgate Zigzag Medium Toothbrush** features angled bristles that reach deep between teeth and along the gumline, ensuring effective plaque and tartar removal.

â­ Zigzag bristles effectively remove plaque.
â­ Medium bristles suitable for most teeth sensitivity.
â­ Compact brush head for easy access to all areas of the mouth.
â­ Ergonomic handle for a secure grip.
â­ Excellent value with an extra free brush.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Zigzag Medium Toothbrush**:
â­ Adults and children 12+ years: Replace toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles are frayed.
â­ Children 6-12 years: Use appropriate children's toothbrush under parental supervision.
â­ Brushing technique: Brush teeth in gentle, circular motions for at least two minutes, twice daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Zigzag Medium Toothbrush**:
â­ High-quality Nylon bristles.
â­ Durable Plastic handle.

description_en:
Give your child a healthy smile with **Colgate Kids Fluoride Toothpaste 6-9 Years 60ml**, specially formulated to protect their teeth and strengthen enamel. Its natural, kid-friendly flavor encourages independent oral hygiene. It's perfect for setting your child on the fast track to healthy smiles for life!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Kids Fluoride Toothpaste 6-9 Years 60ml**
â­ Brush twice a day under parental supervision.
â­ For children 6 years and younger, use a pea-sized amount under supervision to minimize swallowing.
â­ Ensure children spit out after brushing to minimize swallowing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Kids Fluoride Toothpaste 6-9 Years 60ml**
â­ Age-appropriate Fluoride level (1,000 ppm).
â­ Natural, Kid-Friendly flavor.
â­ Does not contain artificial ingredients: flavors, preservatives, sweeteners, colors.
â­ Gluten-Free.
â­ Sugar-Free.
â­ Free from animal-derived ingredients.
â­ Suitable for vegans.

description_en:
Reveal a brighter smile with **Colgate Optic White Purple Reveal**. Featuring breakthrough color-correcting technology to instantly reveal whiter teeth, it's designed for everyday use. Clinically proven to remove up to 100% of surface stains in just two weeks, it offers a luminous whitening experience every day and ensures your teeth radiate confidence. The effect is temporary and effective against stains from food and drinks.

â­ Reveals Instantly Whiter Teeth
â­ Enamel-Safe, Daily Whitening
â­ With Optic Colour-Correcting Technology
â­ Clinically Proven to Remove up to 100% Surface Stains

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Optic White Purple Reveal**:
â­ Not for use by children under 7 years old.
â­ For adult usage only.
â­ In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.
â­ Do not swallow; spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct heat or sunlight.

Make brushing fun with the **Colgate** Smiles Barbie Kids Toothbrush, specially designed for children aged 2-5 years. It features soft, gentle bristles perfect for delicate gums and an engaging Barbie design that kids adore. The innovative suction cap allows for easy, upright storage, keeping the toothbrush clean and accessible.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate** Smiles Barbie Kids Toothbrush:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste.
â­ Gently brush your child's teeth in circular motions.
â­ Rinse mouth thoroughly with water.
â­ Use the suction cap to store the toothbrush upright after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate** Smiles Barbie Kids Toothbrush:
â­ Soft and gentle bristles.
â­ Ergonomic handle for small hands.
â­ Reusable suction base.
â­ Delightful Barbie theme.
â­ High-quality, BPA-free plastic.

description_en:
Elevate your child's dental care routine with the **Colgate Kids Toothbrush 6+ Years Barbie**. Specifically designed for healthy children's smiles, this toothbrush features soft, gentle bristles that are kind to sensitive gums. The fun Barbie design makes brushing time enjoyable, while the unique suction cap allows for easy upright storage, keeping the brush hygienic and accessible.

â­ Barbie-themed design to engage children and make brushing a fun activity.
â­ Soft, gentle bristles effectively clean teeth without irritating gums.
â­ Innovative suction cap for easy and convenient upright storage.
â­ Ideal for children aged 6 years and above.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Kids Toothbrush 6+ Years Barbie**
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste to the brush.
â­ Gently brush your child's teeth in circular motions, covering all surfaces.
â­ Ensure you clean the gum line and the inner and outer surfaces of the teeth.
â­ Rinse your child's mouth thoroughly with water.
â­ Rinse the toothbrush well with water and dry it.
â­ Use the suction cap to store the brush upright after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Kids Toothbrush 6+ Years Barbie**
â­ High-quality toothbrush bristles, designed to be gentle and effective.
â­ Plastic handle ergonomically designed for small children's hands, providing a comfortable grip.
â­ Suction cap for durability and stability.

#ColgateKids #KidsToothbrush #OralCare #DentalHealth #Barbie #KidsProducts #ToothBrushing #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Discover the incredible power of **Colgate Optic White Oxygen Toothpaste**, an innovative toothpaste designed to give you a whiter and brighter smile in just days*. Experience revolutionary Active Oxygen Technology that works in 5 effective ways to enhance your smile: it releases millions of active oxygen molecules at the 1st brush, penetrates safely beyond the enamel surface, lifts deep-set stains from food & drink, removes surface stains, and prevents future surface stains. Enjoy non-abrasive whitening of deep stains** for your truly white, radiant smile with **Colgate Optic White Oxygen Toothpaste**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Optic White Oxygen Toothpaste**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount of toothpaste to your toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth gently for at least two minutes.
â­ Brush twice daily for optimal results.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Optic White Oxygen Toothpaste**:
â­ Advanced Active Oxygen Technology.
â­ Effective ingredients for removing surface and deep stains.
â­ Protective agents to prevent future staining.
â­ Enamel-safe formulation.
â­ Refreshing flavor for a clean feel.

shortdescription_en: Whiter smile in days with Colgate Optic White Oxygen. Active Oxygen Technology lifts stains.

title_en: Colgate Optic White Overnight Whitening Pen 2.5 ml
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„Ø¬ÙŠØª Ø£ÙˆØ¨ØªÙŠÙƒ ÙˆØ§ÙŠØª Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ¨ÙŠÙŠØ¶ Ø·ÙˆØ§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù„ÙŠÙ„ 2.5 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Unlock a brighter smile with the NEW **Colgate Optic White Overnight Whitening Pen**. This innovative pen reverses 15 years of stains* while you sleep, giving you a visibly whiter smile in just weeks. Enjoy effective at-home whitening in a mess-free pen with a precise application and an invisible film. It's easy to use and provides 35 nightly treatments for a noticeable difference in stains caused by food and drinks after 3 weeks of continued use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Optic White Overnight Whitening Pen**:

â­ After brushing teeth before bed, dry teeth with a tissue.
â­ Click until a small drop appears on the pen-brush. On first use up to 20 clicks may be required for the product to come out.
â­ Apply a thin layer to each tooth and allow to dry. 1-2 drops cover up to 4 teeth.
â­ Wipe brush clean with a dry tissue.
â­ Do not use water. Replace cap.
â­ In the morning, brush teeth as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Optic White Overnight Whitening Pen**:

â­ Advanced whitening formula for effective results.
â­ Safe and gentle ingredients for tooth enamel.
â­ Effective whitening agent.
â­ Preservatives to ensure product efficacy.
â­ Moisturizing agents for oral comfort.

#Colgate #TeethWhitening #SmileMakeover #DentalCare #OralHealth #OvernightWhitening #WhiteningPen #WhiteTeeth #SaudiArabia #DentalBeauty

shortdescription_en: Whiter smile in 3 weeks! Colgate Optic White Overnight Pen works while you sleep to reverse 15 years of stains.

title_en: Colgate Kids Battery Toothbrush - Barbie
title_ar: ÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† ÙƒÙˆÙ„Ø¬ÙŠØª Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø·Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© - Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ø¨ÙŠ
description_en:
Make brushing time a fun adventure with the **Colgate Kids Battery Toothbrush Barbie**! This toothbrush is designed to make teeth brushing effective and enjoyable for children, easily removing plaque for a healthy smile. Its small vibrating head and extra-soft bristles gently clean teeth and sweep away plaque without irritating delicate gums. The slim, ergonomic handle is specifically designed for small hands to grip and control easily, encouraging kids to brush with care. The charming Barbie design makes this toothbrush a fantastic tool for fostering healthy dental habits.

â­ Small oscillating head with extra-soft bristles for effective and gentle cleaning.
â­ Easy-to-use on/off buttons.
â­ Includes 2 replaceable AAA alkaline batteries for continuous power.
â­ Slim, comfortable handle designed for kids' hands for easy grip and control.
â­ Polishing bristles help whiten teeth by removing surface stains.
â­ Non-slip handle for maximum comfort and control.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Kids Battery Toothbrush Barbie**
â­ Wet the brush head with water and apply a small amount of toothpaste.
â­ Place the toothbrush in the child's mouth and turn it on.
â­ Guide the brush head slowly from tooth to tooth, holding it for a few seconds on each tooth.
â­ Brush the outer, inner, and chewing surfaces of the teeth.
â­ Rinse the brush head thoroughly after use and shake to remove excess water.
â­ Replace the brush head every 3-4 months or when bristles appear worn.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Kids Battery Toothbrush Barbie**
â­ Durable, high-quality plastic.
â­ Extra-soft nylon bristles, gentle on gums.
â­ Small battery-powered motor for effective vibration action.
â­ 2 replaceable AAA alkaline batteries.

description_en:
Discover the power of a brighter smile with **Colgate Total Advanced Whitening Toothpaste**. This advanced toothpaste is specifically formulated to effectively whiten your teeth and remove surface stains, revealing a naturally radiant smile. **Colgate Total Advanced Whitening Toothpaste** offers comprehensive oral care by fighting bacteria on your teeth, gums, and tongue, strengthening tooth enamel, and promoting gum health to help prevent gum disease. Experience a superior feeling of freshness and cleanliness with every brush.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Total Advanced Whitening Toothpaste**
â­ For adults and children 12 years and older: Brush your teeth with **Colgate Total Advanced Whitening Toothpaste** for at least two minutes, twice a day, or as directed by your dentist.
â­ For children aged 6 to 12 years: Use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision to ensure minimal swallowing.
â­ For children under 6 years of age: Consult a dentist before use to determine the appropriate amount and supervision.
â­ For external use only. Avoid swallowing the toothpaste.
â­ If more than used for brushing is accidentally swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
â­ If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a dentist.
â­ Store at room temperature.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Total Advanced Whitening Toothpaste**
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Flavor
â­ Sodium Monofluorophosphate
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Sodium Bicarbonate
â­ Titanium Dioxide
â­ Zinc Citrate
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Sucralose
â­ FD&C Blue No. 1

#Colgate #Toothpaste #Whitening #OralCare #HealthySmile #BrightTeeth #DentalHygiene #SaudiArabia #SmileCare #ToothCare

description_en:
Experience superior oral hygiene with the **Colgate Ultra Soft Toothbrush** 2Pcs, meticulously designed for an exceptional cleaning experience. Each toothbrush boasts over 5500 ultra-slim filament tips, each measuring a mere 0.1mm, packed with high density for a gentle yet remarkably effective clean.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ Over 5500 ultra-slim filament tips per brush head.
â­ 0.1mm ultra-soft filaments for deeper, gentler cleaning.
â­ High bristle density for effective plaque removal.
â­ Gentle on gums, minimizing irritation.
â­ Helps polish away surface stains.
â­ Aids in cavity protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Ultra Soft Toothbrush**:
â­ Rinse the toothbrush head thoroughly with water.
â­ Shake off excess water and store upright.
â­ Dentists and hygienists recommend replacing your toothbrush every 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Ultra Soft Toothbrush**:
â­ Ultra-soft filaments (0.1mm diameter).
â­ High-density bristle head design.
â­ Ergonomically designed handle for a comfortable grip.

description_en:
Achieve a brighter smile with **Colgate Natural Charcoal Whitening Toothpaste 75ml**. Experience an unparalleled freshness with the blend of activated charcoal and refreshing mint, providing a deep clean sensation and a delightful taste. Perfect for daily use to maintain the health of your mouth and gums.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Natural Charcoal Whitening Toothpaste 75ml**
â­ Brush thoroughly with a Colgate toothbrush, at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist or physician.
â­ Children 6 years and under should only use a pea-sized amount and should be supervised by an adult to minimize swallowing.
â­ In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.
â­ Do not swallow. Spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Natural Charcoal Whitening Toothpaste 75ml**
â­ Activated Charcoal: Helps remove surface stains and whiten teeth.
â­ Mint: Provides refreshing breath and a pleasant taste.
â­ Other ingredients for dental care and hygiene enhancement.

description_en:
Unlock a dazzling smile with **Colgate Optic White Whitening Mouthwash**. Expertly formulated to enhance your teeth's natural radiance, it's the perfect partner to the Optic White Toothpaste for an instantly brilliant white smile. Experience long-lasting protection and a brighter, healthier mouth with every use.

â­ Complements Optic White Toothpaste for superior whitening.
â­ Helps remove surface stains for a brighter appearance.
â­ Provides a refreshing clean feeling.
â­ Alcohol-free formula for gentle care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Optic White Whitening Mouthwash**
â­ Use twice daily after brushing your teeth.
â­ Fill cap to the line (20ml).
â­ Rinse thoroughly for 30 seconds, gargle, and expel. Do not swallow.
â­ Not recommended for children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Optic White Whitening Mouthwash**
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol.
â­ Sorbitol, Tetrapotassium Pyrophosphate.
â­ Polysorbate 20, Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate.
â­ Zinc Citrate, PVM/MA Copolymer.
â­ Aroma, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Fluoride.
â­ Sodium Saccharin, CI 42051.

#Colgate #Mouthwash #TeethWhitening #OralHealth #WhiteSmile #DentalCare #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Dubai

title_en: Colgate Kids Battery Powered Toothbrush Batman
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„Ø¬ÙŠØª ÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø·Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Øª Ù…Ø§Ù†
description_en:
Make brushing fun and effective for your little ones with the **Colgate Kids Battery Powered Toothbrush Batman**!

This electric toothbrush features the beloved Batman character, motivating children to maintain a consistent oral hygiene routine. Its small, vibrating head is equipped with extra-soft bristles, ensuring a deep and gentle clean that effectively removes plaque while protecting sensitive gums and teeth.

The slim, ergonomic handle is designed for small hands, providing a comfortable grip and easy control, empowering your child to brush independently. The toothbrush also lies flat, making toothpaste application simple and mess-free.

With the **Colgate Kids Battery Powered Toothbrush Batman**, oral care transforms into an exciting adventure, turning the daily brushing routine into a moment of joy.

â­ Features the popular Batman character to engage children.
â­ Small vibrating brush head with extra-soft bristles for effective and gentle cleaning.
â­ Slim, comfortable handle designed for kids' hands.
â­ Encourages good brushing habits.
â­ Effectively removes plaque.
â­ Lies flat for easy toothpaste application.
â­ Powered by 2 AAA batteries.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Kids Battery Powered Toothbrush Batman**:
â­ Dentists recommend replacing the brush head every 3-4 months, or when bristles are faded and worn.
â­ Wet the brush head with water and apply toothpaste.
â­ Place the toothbrush in the child's mouth and turn it on.
â­ Guide the brush head slowly from tooth to tooth.
â­ Hold the brush head in place for a few seconds before moving to the next tooth.
â­ Brush the outer, inner, and chewing surfaces of the teeth.
â­ Brush the gums as well for a thorough clean.
â­ Not for children under 3 years; adult supervision required.
â­ After use, rinse the brush head thoroughly and shake to remove excess water.
â­ Store in a vertical position.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Kids Battery Powered Toothbrush Batman**:
â­ Extra-soft bristles gentle on enamel and gums.
â­ Small brush head for easy access to all mouth areas.
â­ Ergonomic handle made from safe materials.
â­ Gentle and effective vibrating electric mechanism.
â­ Batman character exterior design.
â­ Requires 2 AAA batteries (not included).
â­ Replaceable brush head capability.

#KidsToothbrush #Colgate #Batman #TeethCleaning #OralHealth #DentalCare #ElectricToothbrush #KidsProducts #Cavities #HealthySmile

description_en:
Discover the joy of oral care for your little ones with the **Colgate Mega Smiles Kids Toothbrush 6+ Years** in a fun Minions design! This innovative toothbrush is specially crafted to instill healthy brushing habits in children aged 6 and above, focusing on a fun and engaging experience. It features a strong suction cap for easy, upright storage, keeping the toothbrush clean and adding a touch of playfulness to their daily routine.

â­ Beloved Minions design to attract children and encourage brushing.
â­ Soft, gentle bristles on gums for effective and safe cleaning.
â­ Ergonomic handles designed for small children's hands.
â­ Innovative suction cap for easy, clean upright storage.
â­ Promotes independence and healthy habit formation from an early age.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Mega Smiles Kids Toothbrush 6+ Years**
â­ Use a pea-sized amount of toothpaste.
â­ Teach your child to brush their teeth gently in circular motions, ensuring all surfaces are reached.
â­ Encourage your child to rinse their mouth with water after brushing.
â­ Replace the toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles become worn.
â­ Use the suction cap to attach the toothbrush upright to clean surfaces.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Mega Smiles Kids Toothbrush 6+ Years**
â­ Soft nylon bristles of high quality.
â­ Durable and comfortable plastic handle.
â­ Strong suction cap for secure attachment.

description_en:
Experience an unparalleled cleaning sensation with the **Colgate Foamsoft Dense Soft Toothbrush**. This toothbrush boasts 7x denser and ultra-fluffy bristles for a gentle yet thorough clean. The 3.5mm thin head design ensures easy access to molars, while the bristles gently polish your teeth and massage your gums, giving you a healthy and radiant smile. Enjoy a gentle, foamy deep clean with the **Colgate Foamsoft Dense Soft Toothbrush** for whiter teeth and healthier gums.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Foamsoft Dense Soft Toothbrush**
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily.
â­ Dry the toothbrush after use.
â­ Dentists & hygienists recommend replacing your toothbrush every 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Foamsoft Dense Soft Toothbrush**
â­ Super dense soft bristles (7x tuft density).
â­ 3.5mm thin head for easy access.
â­ Ergonomic design for effective cleaning.

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„Ø¬ÙŠØª Ù…Ø¹Ø¬ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ø£ÙˆØ¨ØªÙƒ ÙˆØ§ÙŠØª Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙØ­Ù…ØŒ ØªØ¨ÙŠÙŠØ¶ Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ 75 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Achieve a brighter smile with **Colgate Optic White Charcoal Toothpaste**! Featuring a unique formula combining activated charcoal with gentle mineral micro-particles, specifically designed to effectively scrub and remove extrinsic surface stains. Its formula is clinically proven to remove up to 100% of extrinsic stains, giving you a noticeably whiter and brighter smile.

â­ Contains activated charcoal and gentle mineral micro-particles to scrub away surface stains.
â­ Clinically proven to remove up to 100% of extrinsic stains.
â­ Provides a refreshing sensation with a purified mint flavor.
â­ Completely safe on tooth enamel for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Optic White Charcoal Toothpaste**:
â­ Brush thoroughly with a Colgate toothbrush, at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist or healthcare professional.
â­ Children 6 years and under should have adult supervision and use only a pea-sized amount to minimize swallowing.
â­ In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.
â­ Do not swallow. Spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Optic White Charcoal Toothpaste**:
â­ Activated charcoal.
â­ Gentle mineral micro-particles.
â­ Purified mint flavor.
â­ Enamel-safe ingredients for daily use.

description_en:
Make toothbrushing an exciting adventure for your little one with the **Colgate Kids Batman Toothbrush**! Specially designed for children aged 2-5 years, this toothbrush helps effectively clean teeth for excellent oral health. It removes more plaque than manual brushing, with a flat brush head that makes toothpaste application easy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Kids Batman Toothbrush**
â­ Use a pea-sized amount of fluoride toothpaste.
â­ Teach your child to brush gently in circular motions.
â­ Rinse the toothbrush thoroughly after each use.
â­ Replace the toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles show signs of wear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Kids Batman Toothbrush**
â­ Soft bristles gentle on gums.
â­ Appropriately sized brush head for children's mouths.
â­ Ergonomic handle designed for small hands to grip easily.
â­ Beloved Batman character to engage children.

#ColgateKids #KidsToothbrush #BatmanToothbrush #OralCare #DentalHealth #ChildrensHealth #SaudiMoms #HealthySmile #KidsDental #Colgate

description_en:
Discover the purifying power of charcoal with **Colgate Total Charcoal Deep Clean**. This innovative formula is designed for a comprehensive clean, with charcoal properties acting as a detox for your mouth by effectively cleaning your teeth and fighting plaque, even in hard-to-reach areas between teeth. Enjoy antibacterial benefits that protect your entire mouth, helping to maintain a healthy smile and fresh breath.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Total Charcoal Deep Clean**
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste to your toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth thoroughly for two minutes, twice a day.
â­ Ensure all surfaces of your teeth and gums are cleaned.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Total Charcoal Deep Clean**
â­ Antibacterial formula with Charcoal.
â­ Fights plaque even between the teeth.
â­ Antibacterial protection for up to 100% of your mouth.
â­ Breakthrough formula with Zinc & Arginine.
â­ Provides relief for sensitive teeth.
â­ Instant neutralization of bad breath.
â­ Mint toothpaste, leaves mouth clean and fresh.
â­ Safe for daily use.

#Colgate #Toothpaste #Charcoal #DeepClean #OralCare #HealthySmile #FreshBreath #DentalHygiene #SaudiArabia #Jeddah

description_en:
Product Description:

Experience the freedom to enjoy your favorite foods without discomfort with **Colgate Sensitive Teeth Whitening Toothpaste 75ml**. This innovative toothpaste is specifically designed to effectively relieve sensitive tooth pain while delivering noticeable whitening results, restoring your smile's natural radiance.

âœ… Provides instant and long-lasting relief from tooth sensitivity.
âœ… Works by plugging the microscopic channels that cause pain when exposed to hot, cold, or sweet stimuli.
âœ… With regular use, builds a long-lasting protective barrier against sensitivity.
âœ… Its gentle yet effective formula removes stains to restore your teeth's natural whiteness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Sensitive Teeth Whitening Toothpaste 75ml**:
â­ For instant relief: Apply a small amount directly to the sensitive tooth with your fingertip and gently massage for 1 minute, up to twice a day.
â­ For children aged 6-12 years: Once a week or less frequently.
â­ For lasting relief: Apply to a soft toothbrush, ensuring all areas are covered and brush gently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Sensitive Teeth Whitening Toothpaste 75ml**:
â­ Contains active compounds that work to block the microscopic channels causing sensitivity.
â­ Gentle formula on enamel with natural whitening ingredients.
â­ Free from harsh abrasives.
â­ Refreshes breath with a pleasant flavor.

#Colgate #SensitiveToothpaste #TeethWhitening #OralCare #HealthySmile #DentalHygiene #Toothpaste #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Experience the refreshing power of mint with **Colgate Total Active Protection Toothpaste Fresh Mint**. This innovative toothpaste delivers superior 12-hour whole mouth protection, featuring a unique system that stabilizes the active ingredient for enhanced performance, helping to prevent dental problems before they start. Enjoy long-lasting benefits against numerous oral care issues, coupled with an unparalleled feeling of freshness and cleanliness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Total Active Protection Toothpaste Fresh Mint**:
â­ Brush your teeth twice a day for two minutes with a pea-sized amount.
â­ For children 6 years and under, use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision to minimize swallowing.
â­ Rinse thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Total Active Protection Toothpaste Fresh Mint**:
â­ Contains Sodium Fluoride and Stannous Fluoride.
â­ Total Fluoride content: 1450 ppm.
â­ Fresh Mint flavor.

#Colgate #Toothpaste #OralCare #DentalHealth #FreshMint #HealthySmile #SaudiArabia #Toothbrushing #Mouthwash #DentalHygiene

description_en:
Elevate your smile to a whole new level with **Colgate Optic White Expert** Whitening Toothpaste, delivering 3 shades whiter teeth starting from day one*. Featuring White Seal Technology, inspired by the enamel-safe whitening ingredients dentists use, **Colgate Optic White Expert** provides you with a stunningly white smile. Brush, whiten, and go with this effective dental care system.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Optic White Expert**
â­ Brush thoroughly at least twice a day or as directed by a dentist.
â­ For children 6 years and under, use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision.
â­ Do not swallow.
â­ Spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.
â­ For advertised results, continue to use as directed for 3 weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Optic White Expert**
â­ Contains the same enamel-safe whitening ingredient dentists use.
â­ Effective whitening formula.

description_en:
Make brushing time a heroic adventure with the **Colgate Kids Toothbrush 6+ Years Batman**. Specially designed for children aged 6 and above, it features extra-soft bristles for gentle yet effective cleaning that protects delicate gums. The ergonomic Batman-themed handle enhances grip and control, encouraging lifelong healthy oral habits.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Kids Toothbrush 6+ Years Batman**
â­ Begin by gently brushing your child's teeth in circular motions on all surfaces.
â­ Use a pea-sized amount of fluoride toothpaste for kids.
â­ Encourage your child to brush twice daily for two minutes.
â­ Replace the toothbrush every 3-4 months or when bristles become frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Kids Toothbrush 6+ Years Batman**
â­ High-quality, extra-soft bristles.
â­ Ergonomically designed, comfortable grip handle.
â­ Perfectly sized brush head for children.
â­ Decorated with the beloved Batman character.

â­ Tongue and Cheek Cleaner: Removes odor-causing germs for fresher breath.
â­ Polishing Bristles: Help whiten teeth by removing surface stains, polishing them, and cleaning hard-to-reach areas.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate 360 Optic White Medium Toothbrush**:
â­ Brush twice daily.
â­ Clean your tongue and inner cheeks with the integrated cleaner.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles become frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate 360 Optic White Medium Toothbrush**:
â­ Medium soft bristles.
â­ Advanced brush head.

â­ Tongue and cheek cleaner.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Colgate Natural Lemon Freshness Toothpaste 75ml**. Our unique formula combines the power of natural lemon extracts and invigorating lemon oil with soothing aloe extracts for superior protection for your teeth and gums. Enjoy the energizing citrus mint flavor that provides an unparalleled sense of freshness throughout your day.

â­ Features natural lemon oil for enhanced freshness.
â­ Aloe vera extract to soothe and care for gums.
â­ Provides fresh breath with a lemon and mint flavor.
â­ Helps maintain gum and teeth health.
â­ Ideal for daily use for a healthy, radiant smile.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Natural Lemon Freshness Toothpaste 75ml**:
â­ Brush thoroughly with a Colgate toothbrush, at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist or physician.
â­ Children 6 years and under should only use a pea-sized amount and should be supervised by an adult to minimize swallowing.
â­ In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.
â­ Do not swallow. Spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Natural Lemon Freshness Toothpaste 75ml**:
â­ Water, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Flavor, Cellulose Gum, Vitamin E, Lemon Peel Oil, Aloe Vera Extract, Sodium Fluoride, Sucralose, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, CI 47005.

#Colgate #Toothpaste #LemonFreshness #OralCare #DentalHealth #FreshBreath #NaturalExtracts #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Experience instant and long-lasting relief with **Colgate Pro-Relief Xtreme**, the toothpaste specifically formulated for extremely sensitive teeth. Its advanced formula effectively reduces tooth sensitivity and provides comprehensive oral care, giving you a healthy and comfortable smile.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Pro-Relief Xtreme**:
â­ Adults and children 12 years and older: Brush your teeth with **Colgate Pro-Relief Xtreme** toothpaste for at least two minutes, twice a day, or as directed by your dentist.
â­ Children under 6 years of age should use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision.
â­ Consult your dentist if you have a medical condition or are pregnant.
â­ Helps prevent cavities and strengthen enamel.
â­ Effectively removes plaque and tartar.
â­ Protects teeth from erosion.
â­ Leaves your mouth feeling fresh.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Pro-Relief Xtreme**:
â­ Potassium Nitrate: Known for its effectiveness in reducing tooth sensitivity.
â­ Sodium Fluoride: Helps prevent cavities and strengthen enamel.
â­ Abrasive Agents: Aid in removing plaque and tartar.
â­ Anti-cavity agents: Help protect teeth from erosion.
â­ Flavor: Provides a refreshing taste.
â­ Preservatives: Maintain the quality of the toothpaste.

#Colgate #SensitiveTeeth #OralCare #DentalHealth #Toothpaste #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #HealthySmile #TeethProtection

description_en:
**Colgate 360 Charcoal Black Medium Toothbrush** offers a comprehensive solution for a healthier mouth. Infused with charcoal, known for its deep cleansing and polishing properties, this toothbrush effectively helps to remove surface stains and reveal a naturally whiter smile. The specially designed head reaches deep between teeth and along the gum line, ensuring thorough cleaning where ordinary toothbrushes may miss.

Beyond just cleaning your teeth, the **Colgate 360 Charcoal Black Medium Toothbrush** features a built-in tongue and cheek cleaner designed to comfortably remove odour-causing germs, promoting overall oral freshness. Its 100% antibacterial bristles inhibit germ build-up on the brush for up to 90 days, maintaining hygiene and effectiveness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate 360 Charcoal Black Medium Toothbrush**:
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily for two minutes each time.
â­ Use the tongue and cheek cleaner on the back of the brush head to remove germs.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or sooner if bristles become frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate 360 Charcoal Black Medium Toothbrush**:
â­ Medium-soft bristles infused with charcoal.
â­ Multi-faceted brush head design for comprehensive cleaning.
â­ Integrated tongue and cheek cleaner.
â­ 100% antibacterial bristles.

#Colgate #Toothbrush #OralCare #DentalHygiene #CharcoalToothbrush #Whitening #HealthySmile #SaudiArabia #CleanMouth #FreshBreath

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness with **Colgate** Charcoal Mint Toothpaste! This toothpaste offers gentle yet effective cleaning with an uplifting mint flavor that leaves your mouth feeling clean and revitalized. Expertly formulated for a healthy, radiant smile.

â­ Gentle and effective cleaning
â­ Features activated charcoal for deep cleansing
â­ Invigorating mint flavor for all-day freshness
â­ Contains fluoride to strengthen tooth enamel and prevent cavities

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate** Charcoal Mint:
â­ Brush thoroughly with a **Colgate** toothbrush, at least twice a day, or as directed by your dentist.
â­ For children 6 years and younger, use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision to minimize swallowing.
â­ Consult a dentist if you are taking fluoride from other sources.
â­ Do not swallow; spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate** Charcoal Mint:
â­ Activated Charcoal
â­ Natural Mint
â­ Fluoride
â­ Gentle Cleansing Agents
â­ Other ingredients for a complete toothpaste formula

description_en:
Introduce your kids to healthy oral hygiene habits with the **Colgate** Big Kids' Smiles Soft Twin Pack Toothbrush. Specifically crafted for children aged 6 to 9, this toothbrush features Soft Multi-Height Bristles, providing gentle yet effective cleaning for both big and small teeth. Designed to be a safe and enjoyable part of your child's routine, it includes a fun suction cup for easy upright storage and a rounded tip to efficiently clean hard-to-reach back teeth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate**:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of age-appropriate toothpaste.
â­ Teach your child to brush gently in circular motions, covering all tooth surfaces.
â­ Utilize the rounded tip to clean hard-to-reach back teeth effectively.
â­ Rinse mouth thoroughly with water.
â­ Use the suction cup base for upright, hygienic storage after use.
â­ Replace toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles become frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate**:
â­ Soft Multi-Height Bristles for cleaning big and small teeth.
â­ Rounded Tip Design for easy reach and effective cleaning of back teeth.
â­ Fun & Functional Suction Cup for playful and practical upright storage.

description_en:
Experience superior cleaning power with **Colgate Total Pro Plaque Whitening Toothpaste, 75 ml**. This innovative toothpaste is designed to be your ultimate ally in fighting plaque and restoring the natural whiteness of your teeth. It works deeply to eliminate the harmful effects of plaque, the root cause of common oral health problems. Thanks to Precision Foam Cleansing Technology, fluoride penetrates tough areas to remove 3X more plaque along the gumline, providing 24-hour whole mouth protection. Clinically proven and developed with dental experts, **Colgate Total Pro Plaque Whitening Toothpaste, 75 ml** helps restore your teeth's natural whiteness by dissolving and lifting away surface stains, giving you a brighter, more confident smile.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Total Pro Plaque Whitening Toothpaste, 75 ml**
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily with a pea-sized amount of toothpaste.
â­ Spit out after brushing.
â­ In case of fluoride intake from other sources, consult a dentist.
â­ Do not swallow.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct heat or sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Total Pro Plaque Whitening Toothpaste, 75 ml**
â­ Contains: Sodium Fluoride and Stannous Fluoride.
â­ Total Fluoride content: 1450 ppm.

#Colgate #Toothpaste #TeethWhitening #OralCare #OralHealth #WhiteTeeth #Plaque #Fluoride #DentalHygiene #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve a brighter smile with the **Colgate 360 Optic White Power** toothbrush, designed for 2X whitening action and superior efficacy.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ Floss tip bristles for deeper cleaning.
â­ Oscillating bristles for effective cleaning.
â­ Tongue and cheek cleaner to remove odor-causing germs.
â­ 20,000 sonic strokes per minute for powerful cleaning.
â­ 4x deeper reach and enhanced efficacy.
â­ Polishing bristles to remove surface stains.
â­ Whitening cups to hold toothpaste and boost whitening effectiveness.
â­ Non-slip ergonomic handle for comfortable use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate 360 Optic White Power**:
â­ Wet the brush head with water and apply toothpaste.
â­ Place the toothbrush in your mouth and turn it on.
â­ Slowly guide the brush head from tooth to tooth, holding for a few seconds on each tooth.
â­ Brush the outer surfaces, then the inner surfaces, and finally the chewing surfaces.
â­ Gently brush your gums.
â­ Dentists recommend replacing the brush head every 3-4 months or when bristles are worn.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate 360 Optic White Power**:
â­ Polishing Bristles.
â­ Oscillating Bristles.
â­ Tongue & Cheek Cleaner.
â­ Whitening Cups.
â­ Ergonomic Handle.

description_en:
Achieve a healthy and bright smile with **Colgate Total Anti-Tartar Toothpaste**.

A clinically proven breakthrough formula of Colgate Total, combining zinc and arginine ingredients, provides 12-hour whole mouth protection. It helps in effective cleaning and fights tartar formation with its microparticles.

â­ 12-hour whole mouth protection*
â­ Advanced technology combining the power of zinc and arginine mineral shield
â­ Microparticles that aid in effective cleaning
â­ Effectively fights tartar formation
â­ Leaves you with fresh breath and a healthy smile

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Total Anti-Tartar Toothpaste**:
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily for two minutes with an adequate amount of toothpaste.
â­ Use a soft or medium-bristle toothbrush.
â­ Do not swallow.
â­ Suitable for adults and children over 7 years old under supervision.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Total Anti-Tartar Toothpaste**:
â­ Zinc Gluconate
â­ Arginine
â­ Fluoride
â­ Microcleaning Particles
â­ Other Excipients for Toothpaste Formulation

#Colgate #Toothpaste #AntiTartar #OralHealth #HealthyTeeth #OralCare #DentalCare #HealthySmile #MouthProtection #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the power of **Colgate Natural Extract Habba Sauda** toothpaste, formulated to strengthen your enamel with 100% natural origin Habba Sauda oil. With advanced **Colgate** toothpaste technology, this formulation provides everyday enamel strengthening to help you and your family achieve a healthy smile.

â­ Helps to strengthen enamel.
â­ Features 100% Natural Origin Habba Sauda Oil.
â­ Offers advanced dental protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Natural Extract Habba Sauda**
â­ Brush thoroughly with a **Colgate** toothbrush, at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist or physician.
â­ For children 6 years and under, use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision to minimize swallowing.
â­ Consult a dentist if taking fluoride from other sources.
â­ Do not swallow. Spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Natural Extract Habba Sauda**
â­ Contains Sodium Fluoride - Total Fluoride content: 1450 ppm fluoride.
â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Glycerin, Aroma, Zinc Oxide, Cellulose Gum, Zinc Citrate, Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Xanthan Gum, Benzyl Alcohol, Nigella Sativa Seed Oil, Eugenol, Linalool, CI 77266.

#Colgate #HabbaSauda #Toothpaste #OralCare #HealthySmile #DentalHealth #CavityProtection #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience an unbelievably gentle yet thorough clean with the **Colgate FoamSoft Charcoal Toothbrush**.

â­ Achieve superior softness and deep cleaning with our unique foam technology.
â­ Features 7x denser bristles and super fluffy, fine bristles for a comprehensive clean.
â­ Gently massages your gums while effectively polishing your teeth to restore their natural shine.
â­ Dense bristles infused with charcoal for enhanced cleaning and stain removal.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate FoamSoft Charcoal Toothbrush**:
â­ Wet the toothbrush head with water.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of toothpaste.
â­ Begin brushing your teeth in gentle circular motions, focusing on all surfaces.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate FoamSoft Charcoal Toothbrush**:
â­ Fine, high-density bristles with soft foam technology.
â­ Bristles contain natural charcoal particles.
â­ Ergonomically designed handle for comfortable grip and ease of use.
â­ Available in 2 colors to suit your preference.

description_en:
Experience superior cleaning with the **Colgate High Density Charcoal Soft Toothbrush 3Pcs**. This toothbrush features ultra-fine, high-density bristles (<0.01mm) infused with natural charcoal for enhanced oral care. Its finely tapered, soft bristles provide a deep yet gentle clean for your gums, leaving your mouth feeling fresh and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate High Density Charcoal Soft Toothbrush 3Pcs**:
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the brush.
â­ Gently brush your teeth in circular motions for two minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water.
â­ Rinse the toothbrush well after each use.
â­ Replace the toothbrush every 3 months or when bristles become frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate High Density Charcoal Soft Toothbrush 3Pcs**:
â­ High-density soft bristles.
â­ Natural charcoal infusion.
â­ Ergonomic handle.

#Colgate #Toothbrush #OralCare #CharcoalToothbrush #HealthyGums #DentalHygiene #TeethWhitening #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Make brushing a blast with the **Colgate Kids Minions Extra Soft Power Toothbrush**! Designed with beloved Minions characters, this toothbrush turns your child's dental routine into a fun adventure. Featuring built-in sonic coaching, it guides your child to become a brushing pro. The toothbrush rewards your child with fun sound effects for completing two minutes of brushing, aligning with dentists' recommendations for healthy teeth. Transform dental care into a positive and rewarding experience for your little one with this fantastic toothbrush.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Kids Minions Extra Soft Power Toothbrush**:
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the brush.
â­ Gently guide the brush over all tooth surfaces.
â­ Follow the toothbrush's sonic guidance.
â­ Rinse the brush thoroughly after each use.
â­ Replace the battery when needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Kids Minions Extra Soft Power Toothbrush**:
â­ Extra soft bristles for gentle cleaning.
â­ Small vibrating head for effective plaque removal.
â­ Slim handle with easy ON/OFF buttons.
â­ 1 Replaceable AA Alkaline battery.
â­ Fun Minions character design.

#KidsToothbrush #Colgate #Minions #HealthyTeeth #KidsDentalCare #ToothBrushing #OralHealth #Jeddah #Riyadh #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience an exceptional cleaning with the **Colgate Triple Action** Medium Toothbrush 2Pcs. This toothbrush is designed with unique dual-angled-pointing cleaning-tip bristles, engineered to effectively reach deep and clean your back teeth. The circled bristle pattern gently removes stains to reveal the natural whiteness of your teeth, while the integrated tongue cleaner helps eliminate odor-causing bacteria.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Triple Action**:
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily for two minutes with each brush.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3-4 months, or sooner if bristles show signs of wear.
â­ Use the tongue cleaner to remove odor-causing bacteria.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Triple Action**:
â­ Dual-angled-pointing cleaning-tip bristles.
â­ Circled bristle pattern for gentle stain removal.
â­ Integrated tongue cleaner.
â­ Ergonomic grip for better control during brushing.
â­ Medium soft bristles suitable for everyone.

description_en:
Experience deep cleaning yet gentle care with the **Colgate Slim Soft Charcoal Toothbrush 2Pcs**. This toothbrush features 17x slimmer bristles infused with charcoal, specially designed to reach tough spots and effectively sweep away plaque and food debris from along the gum line and in between teeth. Achieve a healthier, softer smile with the **Colgate Slim Soft Charcoal Toothbrush 2Pcs**, as it helps remove plaque better compared to ordinary end-rounded bristles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Slim Soft Charcoal Toothbrush 2Pcs**:
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily for two minutes.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3-4 months or when bristles become frayed.
â­ Rinse the brush thoroughly with water after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Slim Soft Charcoal Toothbrush 2Pcs**:
â­ Ultra-slim bristles with active charcoal infusion.
â­ Ergonomically designed handle for a comfortable grip.
â­ Tapered bristle tips for deeper cleaning.

#Colgate #Toothbrush #OralCare #DentalHealth #WhiteTeeth #Toothpaste #CleanMouth #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Experience brilliant results with the **Colgate Max White** Medium Toothbrush. Specially designed to effectively remove stains, this toothbrush reveals the natural whiteness of your teeth for a brighter, more attractive smile. Enjoy a superior cleaning experience with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Max White**:
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the bristles.
â­ Gently brush your teeth in a circular motion, focusing on each tooth surface.
â­ Don't forget to clean the gum line and tongue to remove bacteria.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water.
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months or when the bristles become frayed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Max White**:
â­ Soft, medium bristles.
â­ Toothbrush head designed for easy reach of difficult areas.
â­ Ergonomic handle for a perfect grip.
â­ High-quality materials for durability.

description_en:
To have a healthy mouth, one needs to take care of more than just teeth. Thatâ€™s why the new **Colgate Total Clean Mint** toothpaste pro-actively fights bacteria not just on your teeth, but also your tongue, cheeks and gums for 12 hours for whole mouth health. Experience the unique difference of a truly healthier mouth with our best toothpaste for you and your family.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Total Clean Mint**:
â­ Brush thoroughly with a Colgate toothbrush, at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist or physician.
â­ Children 6 years and under should have adult supervision and use only a pea sized amount to minimize swallowing.
â­ In case of intake of fluoride from other sources consult a dentist or doctor.
â­ Do not swallow. Spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Total Clean Mint**:
â­ Active Ingredient: Sodium Fluoride 0.24% (0.15% w/v fluoride ion).
â­ Inactive Ingredients: Water, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Polyethylene Glycol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Flavor, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Saccharin, Sorbic Acid, Titanium Dioxide, Red 40, Blue 1.

#Colgate #Toothpaste #OralCare #HealthyTeeth #FreshBreath #CavityProtection #MintFlavor #GumHealth #SaudiArabia #DentalHygiene

description_en:
Experience superior oral protection with **Colgate Total Toothpaste with Vitamin C - Antibacterial 75ml**. Our breakthrough formula, enhanced with Zinc, Arginine, and Vitamin C known for its antioxidant properties, works to strengthen your mouth's natural protection for up to 12 hours against germs and toxins.

â­ **Advanced Formula for Comprehensive Protection:**
    â­ Strengthens the mouth's natural defenses against germs for 12 hours.
    â­ Kills toxins and bacteria in the mouth with the power of Vitamin C.
    â­ Unique formula with Zinc and Arginine to build a protective mineral shield.
    â­ Fights cavities, removes plaque, and prevents tartar buildup.
    â­ Strengthens enamel, removes surface stains, and relieves tooth sensitivity.
    â­ Promotes healthy gums and provides long-lasting fresh breath.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Total Toothpaste with Vitamin C - Antibacterial 75ml**:
    â­ Brush thoroughly with a **Colgate** toothbrush at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist.
    â­ For children 6 years and under, use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision to minimize swallowing.
    â­ If taking fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist.
    â­ Do not swallow. Spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Total Toothpaste with Vitamin C - Antibacterial 75ml**:
    â­ Contains: Sodium Fluoride.

#Colgate #Toothpaste #OralCare #DentalHealth #VitaminC #Whitening #ToothProtection #FreshBreath #SaudiArabia #GulfDentalHealth

description_en:
Colgate Sensitive Pro-Relief Toothpaste offers instant and lasting relief from tooth sensitivity. Featuring Pro-Arginâ„¢ technology, it helps to seal and repair sensitive areas, protecting you from painful stimuli.

â­ Provides instant and long-lasting sensitivity relief.
â­ Pro-Arginâ„¢ technology repairs and prevents sensitivity from returning.
â­ Protects against hot, cold, and sweet stimuli.
â­ Helps strengthen gums and prevent gum recession, addressing a key cause of sensitivity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate**:
â­ For instant relief, apply directly to the sensitive tooth with a fingertip and massage gently for 1 minute, up to twice a day. For children aged 6-12 years, repeat once a week or less frequently.
â­ For lasting relief, apply to a soft toothbrush and clean all sensitive areas of your teeth twice daily. Do not swallow; spit and rinse after brushing.
â­ Children 6 years and younger: Use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision to minimize swallowing.
â­ Consult a dentist if pain persists or if you are taking fluoride from other sources.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate**:
â­ Water, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Polyethylene Glycol, Potassium Nitrate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Flavor, Xanthan Gum, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Saccharin, FD&C Blue No. 1.

#Colgate #SensitiveTeeth #Toothpaste #OralCare #DentalHealth #ToothRepair #InstantRelief #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Introducing the **Colgate Kids Toothbrush 5+ Years Spiderman**, designed to make brushing fun and effective for your little one. With its vibrant Spiderman theme, this toothbrush encourages good oral hygiene habits from an early age.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Kids Toothbrush 5+ Years Spiderman**:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of fluoride toothpaste.
â­ Guide your child to brush gently in circular motions for two minutes.
â­ Ensure all surfaces of the teeth and gums are cleaned.
â­ Replace the toothbrush every 3-4 months or when bristles become frayed.
â­ Adult supervision recommended for children under 4.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Kids Toothbrush 5+ Years Spiderman**:
â­ Soft, multi-height bristles designed to clean both large and small teeth effectively.
â­ Raised tip effectively cleans hard-to-reach back teeth.
â­ Ergonomically designed handle with thumb rest and non-slip grip for better control.
â­ Engaging Spiderman design to motivate children to brush regularly.

description_en:
Achieve a confident and attractive smile with **Colgate Total Advanced Whitening Toothpaste** 100ml. Its unique formula not only helps remove stains for whiter teeth but also keeps your whole mouth healthy by fighting bacteria on teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gums for 12 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colgate Total Advanced Whitening Toothpaste**:
â­ Brush thoroughly with a Colgate toothbrush, at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist or physician.
â­ Children 6 years and under should have adult supervision and use only a pea-sized amount to minimize swallowing.
â­ In case of fluoride intake from other sources, consult a dentist.
â­ Do not swallow. Spit and rinse thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colgate Total Advanced Whitening Toothpaste**:
â­ Contains effective ingredients for teeth whitening and fighting bacteria.
â­ Safe and gentle formula for enamel.
â­ Long-lasting fresh flavor.

#Colgate #Toothpaste #Whitening #OralCare #HealthySmile #TeethWhitening #DentalHealth #SaudiArabia #Dubai #KSA

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù†ØªÙ†Ø³ ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ ØºØ§Ù…Ù‚ 303/0 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙˆØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Time for a change? Select the perfect shade for your skin tone with **Koleston Intense Hair Color Dark Brown 303/0**. Wella Koleston offers a wide range of rich, intense colors that last long, with complete grey coverage. This formula is developed by Wella experts to ensure you get the best results. Enjoy vibrant, lively hair color that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Intense Hair Color Dark Brown 303/0**:
Preparation: Mix the contents of the tube with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush until thoroughly combined. Apply the mixture to your hair immediately.
First Time Coloring: Apply to unwashed hair, ensuring all strands are covered. Use a wide-toothed comb for even distribution.
Root Coloring: Part your hair and apply the mixture to the roots. Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the mixture evenly to the ends of your hair.
Development Time: Leave on for 30 minutes. For root coloring, it's 20 minutes for the roots and an additional 10 minutes for the entire hair.
Finish: Rinse hair until water runs clear. Apply the Oil Replacement sachet and leave on for 2 minutes, then rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Intense Hair Color Dark Brown 303/0**:
â­ Highly effective color cream.
â­ Developer fluid.
â­ Oil Replacement sachet for post-color care.

#Koleston #HairDye #DarkBrownHair #WellaKoleston #HairCare #HealthyHair #GreyCoverage #PermanentColor #HairTransformation #BeautySaudi

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù†ØªÙ†Ø³ ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ù…ØªÙˆØ³Ø· Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ 307/1
description_en:
Time for a change with **Koleston Intense Hair Color Medium Gray Blonde 307/1**! Discover long-lasting intense color and perfect grey coverage with Wella's expert-developed formula. Enjoy the revolutionary Oil Replacement sachet for extraordinary post-coloration treatment, leaving your hair vibrant and healthy.

Features:
â­ Intense, long-lasting color for a refreshed look.
â­ Perfect grey coverage for a uniform and attractive color.
â­ Oil Replacement Treatment to nourish hair post-coloring and maintain shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Intense Hair Color Medium Gray Blonde 307/1**:
**Preparation:**
â­ Press the tube's content into a non-metallic dish and mix with the developer fluid using a coloring brush until combined.
**First Time Coloring:**
â­ Apply to unwashed hair with a coloring brush, ensuring all strands are covered.
â­ Use a wide-toothed comb for even distribution.
**Root Coloring:**
â­ Apply the emulsion to the roots, leave for 20 minutes, then comb evenly down to the ends.
**Development Time:**
â­ Leave on hair for 30 minutes in total (20 minutes for roots, 10 minutes for full hair).
**Finish:**
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear.
â­ Apply the Oil Replacement sachet, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Intense Hair Color Medium Gray Blonde 307/1**:
â­ Hair Color Cream.
â­ Developer Fluid.
â­ Oil Replacement for hair care.
â­ Blend of highly effective pigments for perfect coverage and lasting color.

description_en:
Transform your look with **Koleston Intense Hair Color Blue Black 301/0**. Developed by Wella experts, this hair color delivers long-lasting intense color and perfect grey coverage, while keeping your hair looking healthy with the included Oil Replacement.

â­ Rich and intense color payoff.
â­ Complete coverage for grey hair.
â­ Treats and revitalizes hair post-coloring with Oil Replacement.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Intense Hair Color Blue Black 301/0**:
    â­ Preparation: Press the tube's content into a non-metallic dish, add the developer fluid, and mix with a coloring brush until thoroughly combined. Apply the emulsion immediately.
    â­ First-Time Coloring: Apply to unwashed hair using the coloring brush, ensuring no strands are missed. Comb through for even distribution.
    â­ Root Coloring: Make partings and apply the coloring emulsion to the roots. Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion evenly to the ends.
    â­ Development Time: Leave on for 30 minutes. For root coloring, it's 20 minutes for roots and an additional 10 minutes for the entire hair.
    â­ Finish: Rinse hair until water runs clear. Apply the Oil Replacement sachet, leave on for 2 minutes, and rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Intense Hair Color Blue Black 301/0**:
    â­ Features an advanced formula for exceptional hair color.
    â­ Includes Oil Replacement for post-coloring hair treatment and nourishment.
    â­ Formulated to provide vibrant and lasting results.

#Koleston #HairColor #BlueBlack #PermanentColor #WellaHair #HealthyHair #GreyCoverage #HairCare #HairStyle #HomeSalon

description_en:
Achieve a stunning transformation with **Koleston Intense Hair Color Light Gray Blonde 308/1**. Enjoy a rich, intense, and long-lasting color with perfect grey coverage. This formula is developed by Wella experts to ensure the best results, and it comes with an Oil Replacement sachet for post-coloration hair care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Intense Hair Color Light Gray Blonde 308/1**:
â­ **Preparation:** Mix the contents of the tube with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush until thoroughly combined.
â­ **First-Time Coloring:** Apply the emulsion to unwashed hair, ensuring all strands are covered. Use a wide-toothed comb for even distribution.
â­ **Root Coloring:** Create partings in your hair and apply the emulsion to the roots. Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion evenly through to the ends of your hair for an additional 10 minutes.
â­ **Development Time:** Leave the color on for 30 minutes.
â­ **Finishing:** Rinse hair until water runs clear, then apply the Oil Replacement sachet, leave on for 2 minutes, and rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Intense Hair Color Light Gray Blonde 308/1**:
â­ Koleston hair color cream formula contains highly effective pigments.
â­ Includes an Oil Replacement sachet for post-coloration hair care.

description_en:
Transform your look with **Koleston Intense Hair Color Dark Gray Blonde 306/1**. 

Discover the secret to rich, deep hair color with **Koleston Intense Hair Color Dark Gray Blonde 306/1**, specifically formulated for perfect grey coverage and long-lasting, vibrant color. Developed by Wella experts, this product delivers intense color and unparalleled vitality. 

â­ Intense, long-lasting color.
â­ Complete grey coverage.
â­ Enriched with Oil Replacement for post-color hair nourishment and protection.
â­ Easy-to-use for a professional at-home coloring experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Intense Hair Color Dark Gray Blonde 306/1**:

**Preparation:**
â­ Mix the contents of the tube with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush.

**Application:**
â­ Apply the mixture evenly to unwashed hair.
â­ For root application, apply the emulsion only to the roots, leave for 20 minutes, then distribute to the rest of the hair.

**Development Time:**
â­ Leave the color on the hair for 30 minutes.

**Finish:**
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly until the water runs clear.
â­ Apply the Oil Replacement sachet, leave on for 2 minutes, then rinse again.

â­ Advanced blend of high-quality pigments for effective coverage.
â­ Oil Replacement for post-dye hair care.
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing ingredients to maintain hair health.

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ Ù…ØªÙˆØ³Ø· + Ù…Ø¸Ù‡Ø± 304/0 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙˆØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Transform your look with **Koleston Hair Color Medium Brown + Developer 304/0**! Discover a wide range of shades offering intense, long-lasting color and perfect grey coverage. Formulated with an innovative Oil Replacement for exceptional post-color care, this **Koleston** hair color leaves your hair looking vibrant and healthy. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Medium Brown + Developer 304/0**:
â­ Preparation: Mix the tube's contents with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush until thoroughly combined.
â­ First-Time Coloring: Apply to unwashed hair with the brush, ensuring all strands are covered. Comb for even distribution.
â­ Root Coloring: Create partings and apply the coloring emulsion to the roots. Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion evenly through to the ends.
â­ Development Time: Leave on hair for 30 minutes (20 minutes for roots and an additional 10 minutes for the rest of the hair).
â­ Finish: Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo not recommended). Apply the Oil Replacement sachet for 2 minutes, then rinse again.
â­ Cautions: Wear suitable gloves. Perform an allergy alert test 48 hours prior. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use on eyelashes or eyebrows.

shortdescription_en: Koleston Medium Brown hair color delivers rich, long-lasting color and perfect grey coverage, with added care from the Oil Replacement.

title_en: Koleston Supreme Hair Color Dark Brown 3/0
title_ar: ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø±ÙŠÙ… Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ ØºØ§Ù…Ù‚ 3/0
description_en:
Achieve a rich, natural-looking Dark Brown hair color that lasts up to 8 weeks with **Koleston Supreme Hair Color Dark Brown 3/0**. This advanced formula features deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments that penetrate to the maximum, ensuring a vibrant and healthy-looking color. Experience deep hydration and superior care with our two-step conditioning system, along with a color reactivator to boost vibrancy after 15 days, and a gloss treatment to lock in color and add brilliant shine.

â­ 100% grey coverage.
â­ Rich, long-lasting color for up to 8 weeks.
â­ Two-step deep moisture for hair protection.
â­ Easy application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply.
â­ Color Reactivator to boost vibrancy after 15 days.
â­ Gloss Treatment for color longevity after 30 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Supreme Hair Color Dark Brown 3/0**:
â­ Mix the contents of the tube with the developer liquid in a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Apply to unwashed hair using the applicator brush, ensuring all strands are covered.
â­ For first-time coloring, distribute evenly and then comb through.
â­ For root touch-ups, apply to roots first, wait 20 minutes, then spread the remaining color to the lengths of your hair.
â­ Leave the color on for a total of 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly until water runs clear.
â­ Apply the first Miracle Gloss Treatment sachet, leave for 2 minutes, then rinse again.
â­ After 15 days, apply the Color Re-Activator to wet hair, wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style.
â­ After 30 days, apply the second Miracle Gloss Treatment, wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Supreme Hair Color Dark Brown 3/0**:
â­ Micro-fine pigments for deep color penetration.
â­ Color Intense Cream.
â­ Color Reactivator.
â­ Intense Gloss Treatment sachet.

description_en:
Time for a change with **Koleston Hair Color**, the perfect solution for vibrant, captivating, and long-lasting hair color. This innovative formula is developed by Wella experts to provide rich color and complete grey coverage. **Koleston Hair Color** comes with an Oil Replacement sachet for superior post-color hair care, giving your hair healthy shine and vitality.

â­ Intense Long Lasting Color
â­ Perfect grey coverage
â­ Oil Replacement Treatment for post-color revitalization

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color**:
**Preparation:**
â­ Mix the contents of the tube with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush.
**Application:**
â­ For unwashed hair, apply the mixture evenly with a brush, ensuring all strands are covered.
â­ For root coloring, apply the emulsion to the roots then comb through to distribute it to the entire hair.
**Development Time:**
â­ Leave the color on the hair for 30 minutes.
**Finish:**
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear.
â­ Apply the Oil Replacement sachet, leave it on for 2 minutes, and then rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color**:
â­ Contains highly effective pigments for perfect coverage.
â­ Creamy formula for easy application.
â­ Oil Replacement sachet for post-color hair care.

#Koleston #HairDye #Wella #HairColor #HairGoals #Beauty #HairCare #PermanentColor #HealthyHair #FashionHair

title_en: Koleston Hair Color Light Brown + Developer 305/0 | Long-Lasting Color
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ ÙØ§ØªØ­ + Ù…Ø¸Ù‡Ø± 305/0 | Ù„ÙˆÙ† ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Transform your hair with **Koleston Hair Color Light Brown + Developer 305/0**. Wella Koleston offers a diverse palette of shades meticulously selected to complement all skin tones. This innovative formula features a rich color creme, powered by highly effective pigments developed by Wella experts to deliver intense, long-lasting color and perfect grey coverage. What sets **Koleston** apart is its unique Oil Replacement sachet, designed for extraordinary post-coloration treatment to revitalize your hair and maintain its healthy, radiant appearance. Achieve professional results and stunning vibrancy every time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Light Brown + Developer 305/0**:
â­ Preparation: Press the tube's contents into a non-metallic dish, add the developer fluid, and mix thoroughly with a coloring brush until combined.
â­ First-Time Coloring: Apply to unwashed hair using the coloring brush. Ensure even distribution and comb through with a wide-toothed comb.
â­ Root Coloring: Create partings in your hair and apply the coloring emulsion to the roots. Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion evenly through to the ends.
â­ Development Time: Leave on for a total of 30 minutes (20 minutes for roots, an additional 10 minutes for the entire hair length).
â­ Rinse & Finish: Rinse hair until water runs clear. Apply the Oil Replacement sachet, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Light Brown + Developer 305/0**:
â­ Highly effective color creme pigments.
â­ Developer fluid.
â­ Oil Replacement for post-coloration hair care.

#Koleston #HairColor #LightBrown #HealthyHair #LongLastingColor #Wella #HairDye #HairCare #ShinyHair #GreyCoverage

description_en:
Discover the beauty of your hair with **Koleston Hair Color Medium Blonde 307/0**, the perfect solution for a refreshed look and vibrant, long-lasting color. Expertly developed by Wella, it provides intense color and complete grey coverage, with a unique formula that maintains your hair's health post-coloring. 

â­ Rich, intense, and long-lasting color.
â­ Perfect grey coverage.
â­ Oil Replacement treatment for post-dye hair repair.
â­ Various shades to suit all skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Medium Blonde 307/0**:
    â­ Preparation: Mix the tube's contents with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush until thoroughly combined.
    â­ First-time Coloring: Apply to unwashed hair, ensuring all strands are covered, then comb through for even distribution.
    â­ Root Coloring: Create partings in your hair and apply the mixture to the roots for 20 minutes, then comb through to cover the rest of the hair.
    â­ Development Time: Leave the color on your hair for a total of 30 minutes (20 minutes for roots and 10 minutes for the entire hair).
    â­ Final Rinse: Rinse hair until water runs clear (without shampoo), then apply the Oil Replacement treatment for 2 minutes and rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Medium Blonde 307/0**:
    â­ Color Creme.
    â­ Developer Fluid.
    â­ Oil Replacement Treatment.
    â­ Gloves.
    â­ Instruction Leaflet.

title_en: Koleston Maxi Hair Color Cherry Red 366/46 - Long-Lasting Intense Color
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ù…Ø§ÙƒØ³ÙŠ ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± ÙƒØ±Ø²ÙŠ 366/46 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Achieve irresistible hair color with **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Cherry Red 366/46**. This hair dye provides stunning color intensity that lasts up to 8 weeks, thanks to its deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments that penetrate deep into the hair. It comes with a special 15-day Color Reactivator to boost color vibrancy and two intensive gloss treatments to maintain your hair's radiance. Perfect for a bold and captivating look.

â­ 100% Intense Color
â­ Step Deep Moisture
â­ Water Protection Factor for enhanced color intensity
â­ Easy Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply
â­ Extended Care & Protection with gloss treatments on Day 1 and Day 30
â­ Color Reactivator to restore richness and vibrancy of color after 15 days

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Cherry Red 366/46**

Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the dye tube liquid into the developer bottle.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until completely blended.

Application all over starting at roots:
â­ Leave hair unwashed and dry.
â­ Apply to roots first and work through all hair to the tips.
â­ Wait for 40-50 minutes.

Finish:
â­ Rinse hair well until water runs clear (using shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the 1st sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment for coloring day. Leave on for 2 minutes and rinse again.

After 15 days:
â­ Using gloves, apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair.
â­ Wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style your hair as usual.

After 30 days:
â­ Apply the 2nd sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment to wet hair.
â­ Wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Cherry Red 366/46**

(Dye ingredients include: Para-phenylenediamine, Resorcinol, Hydrogen Peroxide, Botanical Extracts, Natural Moisturizers. Please refer to the packaging for the complete ingredient list.)

#Koleston #HairDye #CherryRedHair #HairColor #HealthyHair #HairCare #Wella #Hairstyle #PermanentHairDye #BeautyHair

title_en: Koleston Supreme Hair Color Medium Ash Blonde 7/1
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø±ÙŠÙ… ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ù…ØªÙˆØ³Ø· Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ 7/1
description_en:
Discover ultimate radiance with **Koleston Supreme Hair Color Medium Ash Blonde 7/1**, for rich, long-lasting color that enhances your hair's natural beauty.

This advanced hair color delivers a natural, captivating shade with complete grey coverage. Its innovative technology features micro-fine pigments that deeply penetrate hair fibers, providing unparalleled color intensity and vibrancy that lasts up to 8 weeks. With **Koleston Supreme Hair Color Medium Ash Blonde 7/1**, achieving professional-looking hair at home is easy and enjoyable.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Koleston Supreme Hair Color Medium Ash Blonde 7/1**
â­ Preparation: Mix the contents of the colorant tube with the developer liquid in a non-metallic bowl until completely blended.
â­ Application:
   - For virgin hair: Start by applying the color to the roots, then distribute it throughout the rest of your hair. Leave on for 30 minutes.
   - For previously colored hair: Apply the color to the roots only and leave on for 20 minutes, then distribute it to the rest of your hair and leave on for an additional 10 minutes.
â­ Rinsing and Care:
   - Rinse your hair thoroughly with water until clear (shampoo is not recommended).
   - Apply the intensive care sachet after 15 days, and then the second sachet after 30 days to maintain color vibrancy and hair moisture.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Koleston Supreme Hair Color Medium Ash Blonde 7/1**
â­ Contains a blend of nourishing oils for deep hydration.
â­ Features high-quality micro-fine pigments for full coverage and long-lasting color.
â­ Gentle formula for scalp and hair.
â­ Includes color care and shine-boosting sachets.

#KolestonSupreme #HairColor #AshBlonde #HairDye #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairColors #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiArabia

title_en: Koleston Supreme Hair Color Medium Blonde 7/0
title_ar: ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø±ÙŠÙ… Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ù…ØªÙˆØ³Ø· 7/0
description_en:
Achieve stunning, long-lasting color with the **Koleston Supreme** hair dye, designed to deliver intense color that lasts up to 8 weeks. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, **Koleston Supreme** penetrates the hair to provide a captivating and vibrant hue.

The kit includes a special Color Reactivator to boost color intensity after 15 days, along with two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment to lock in color and protect your hair. Enjoy vibrant color and superior care with every use.

â­ Rich, long-lasting color intensity
â­ Deep moisture thanks to advanced technology
â­ Easy application in simple steps: Squeeze, Mix, Apply
â­ Color Reactivator revives color vibrancy after 15 days
â­ Dual care treatments on Day 1 and Day 30

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Supreme**:
Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the dye tube into a non-metallic bowl, add the developer and mix well with a color brush.
â­ Apply the mixture to your hair immediately after blending.
First-time coloring:
â­ Apply the mixture to unwashed hair using the color brush, ensuring all strands are covered.
â­ Use a wide-tooth comb to distribute the color evenly.
Root coloring:
â­ Create partings in your hair and apply the colored emulsion to the roots.
â­ Leave for 20 minutes, then distribute the colored emulsion evenly through the rest of your hair.
Processing time:
â­ Leave the color on the hair for a total of 30 minutes.
Finishing:
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the first sachet of Intense Gloss Treatment, leave for 2 minutes, then rinse again.
After 15 days:
â­ Wear gloves and apply the Color Re-Activator to wet hair, wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.
After 30 days:
â­ Apply the second sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment, wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Supreme**:
â­ Micro-fine coloring agents for rich, deep color.
â­ Nourishing oils for hair hydration.
â­ Color Reactivator for enhancing hair vibrancy.
â­ Intense Gloss Treatment ingredients to lock in color and protect hair.

#KolestonSupreme #HairDye #MediumBlonde #HairColor #HairColoring #HairCare #HealthyHair #SaudiBeauty #KSAFashion #HairGoals

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± ØºØ§Ù…Ù‚ + Ù…Ø¸Ù‡Ø± 306/0
description_en:
Time for a change with **Koleston Hair Color Dark Blonde + Developer 306/0**! Discover the perfect shade for your skin tone from Wella's extensive Koleston collection. **Koleston Hair Color Dark Blonde + Developer 306/0** features high-performance, long-lasting color with perfect grey coverage, plus a unique Oil Replacement treatment for post-coloration hair care.

â­ Intense Long Lasting Color
â­ Perfect grey coverage
â­ Oil Replacement Treatment for post-coloration nourishment

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Dark Blonde + Developer 306/0**:

**Preparation:**
â­ Mix the tube's content with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush.
â­ Apply the emulsion to your hair immediately after mixing.

**First Time Coloring:**
â­ Apply to unwashed hair for complete and even coverage.

**Root Coloring:**
â­ Apply the emulsion to the roots, leave for 20 minutes, then comb evenly through to the ends.

**Development Time:**
â­ 30 minutes total for the entire hair, with 20 minutes for roots and an additional 10 minutes for the rest of the hair.

**Finish:**
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear.
â­ Apply the Oil Replacement sachet for 2 minutes, then rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Dark Blonde + Developer 306/0**:

â­ Contains high-performance pigments developed by Wella experts.
â­ Includes an Oil Replacement treatment for superior hair care.

#Koleston #HairColor #HairDye #Wella #HealthyHair #HairCare #DarkBlonde #BeautifulHair #SaudiBeauty #HairTransformation

title_en: Koleston Permanent Hair Color Light Brown Kit 5/0
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ ÙØ§ØªØ­ Ø¯Ø§Ø¦Ù… - Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹Ø© Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø© 5/0
description_en:
Discover vibrant color with **Koleston** Hair Color Light Brown Kit 5/0, enhancing your hair with a rich, captivating shade that lasts up to 8 weeks. Featuring advanced deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, this formula penetrates deeply to deliver unparalleled vibrancy and shine. The kit includes a special 15-day Color Reactivator to boost color intensity and two Miracle Gloss Treatments for Day 1 and Day 30, ensuring your hair remains healthy and radiant.

â­ Rich color lasting up to 8 weeks.
â­ Deep-infusion technology with micro-fine pigments for maximum color.
â­ Exclusive Color Reactivator on Day 15 for boosted intensity.
â­ Two Miracle Gloss Treatments for intensive care and shine on Day 1 and Day 30.
â­ Complete grey coverage.
â­ Easy application: Squeeze, Mix, Apply.
â­ Deep moisture and hair protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston**:
Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the dye tube contents into a non-metallic bowl, add the developer, and mix with a brush until smooth.
â­ Apply the emulsion to your hair immediately.
First-time coloring:
â­ Apply to unwashed hair using a coloring brush, ensuring all strands are covered.
â­ Comb hair to distribute the color evenly.
Root coloring:
â­ Make partings in your hair and apply the colored emulsion to the roots.
â­ Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion evenly through the rest of your hair to the tips.
Processing Time:
â­ Leave the color on for 30 minutes (20 minutes for roots + 10 minutes for the rest of the hair).
Finishing:
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly until the water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the Oil Replacement sachet, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.
After 15 days:
â­ Wear gloves and apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair.
â­ Wait 10 minutes, rinse, and style as usual.
After 30 days:
â­ Apply the second sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment.
â­ Wait 2 minutes, rinse, and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston**:
â­ The kit includes Color Cream, Developer Lotion, Color Reactivator, Miracle Gloss Treatments, gloves, and an instruction leaflet.

#Koleston #HairDye #LightBrown #HealthyHair #HairCare #PermanentColor #HairColor #ShinyHair #Hairstyles #SaudiBeauty
