title_ar: ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ ÙØ§ØªØ­ 308/11 + Ø¹Ø¨ÙˆØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¸Ù‡Ø±
description_en:
Discover the power of rich, long-lasting color with **Koleston** Light Ash Blonde 308/11. Achieve vibrant, fade-defiant color for up to 8 weeks with deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments. This kit includes an exclusive 15-day Color Reactivator to boost color intensity, and two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment to lock in color and shine until day 30. Easy to apply for complete grey coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston** Light Ash Blonde 308/11:

Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the dye tube into the developer bottle and mix thoroughly in a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Apply the mixture to your hair immediately using a color brush.

Application:
â­ First-time coloring: Apply to unwashed hair from roots to tips, ensuring even distribution.
â­ Root retouching: Apply to roots first for 20 minutes, then distribute to the rest of your hair for an additional 10 minutes.
â­ Leave the color on your hair for a total of 30 minutes.

Finish:
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly until water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the Intense Gloss Treatment sachet, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.
â­ After 15 days: Apply the Color Reactivator to wet hair for 10 minutes, then rinse.
â­ After 30 days: Apply the second sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment for 2 minutes, then rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston** Light Ash Blonde 308/11:

â­ Contains an Intense Gloss Treatment complex for hair hydration and color lock.
â­ Includes a Color Reactivator to enhance hair vibrancy.
â­ Micro-fine pigments for perfect coverage and rich color.
â­ Gentle formula for hair and scalp with a water protection factor for increased color longevity.

description_en:
Time for a change with **Koleston**! Discover rich chocolate brown shades perfectly suited for your skin tone. **Koleston**'s expert-developed formula by Wella provides long-lasting intense color and perfect grey coverage, featuring an innovative Oil Replacement for post-coloration hair care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston**:
Preparation:
â­ Mix the tube content with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush.
â­ Apply the mixture to hair immediately after preparation.
Application:
â­ For first-time coloring, apply to unwashed hair, ensuring all strands are covered.
â­ For root coloring, apply to roots, leave for 20 minutes, then distribute to ends.
Development Time:
â­ Leave the color on for 30 minutes.
Finish:
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear.
â­ Use the Oil Replacement sachet for 2 minutes, then rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston**:
â­ Hair color cream.
â­ Developer fluid.
â­ Oil Replacement for post-coloring care.

description_en:
Discover vibrant, long-lasting color with **Koleston Forever Reds Hair Color Exotic Red 55/46**. Achieve an intensely rich and radiant shade that lasts up to 8 weeks, thanks to its deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments that penetrate deeply for maximum color payoff. The Wella Koleston Color Intense Cream Kit provides deep moisture and superior care in two steps, featuring an exclusive color reactivator to boost vibrancy after 15 days, and an intense gloss treatment for day 1 and day 30 to lock in color and protect your hair.

â­ Rich color lasting up to 8 weeks.
â­ Deep-infusion technology for perfect coloring.
â­ Deep moisture and superior care in two steps.
â­ Color reactivator to boost vibrancy after 15 days.
â­ Intense gloss treatment to maintain color.
â­ Easy application: Squeeze, Mix, Apply.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Forever Reds Hair Color Exotic Red 55/46**:
â­ Preparation: Squeeze the dye tube into a non-metallic bowl and add the developer liquid, mixing well with a color brush.
â­ Application: Apply the emulsion to unwashed hair using a color brush, ensuring all strands are covered.
â­ Root Coloring: Apply to roots first for 20 minutes, then comb through to the ends for an additional 10 minutes.
â­ Waiting Time: 30 minutes total for the entire hair.
â­ Finish: Rinse hair until water runs clear, apply the oil replacement sachet for 2 minutes, then rinse again.
â­ After 15 Days: Apply the color reactivator to wet hair, wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.
â­ After 30 Days: Apply the second sachet of miracle gloss treatment for 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Forever Reds Hair Color Exotic Red 55/46**:
â­ Rich Color Cream.
â­ Developer Liquid.
â­ Day 15 Color Activator.
â­ Day 1 Miracle Gloss Treatment sachet.
â­ Day 30 Miracle Gloss Treatment sachet.
â­ Gloves for easy application.

#Koleston #HairColor #ExoticRed #HairDye #HairCare #Wella #HealthyHair #HairColors #Beauty #Hairstyles

title_en: Koleston Kit 4/1 Enigmatic Med Ash Brown Mea - Long-Lasting Rich Color
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ 4/1 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Achieve rich, water-resistant color with the **Koleston** Kit 4/1 Enigmatic Med Ash Brown Mea. The advanced **Koleston** color cream formulation helps color pigments penetrate deep into the hair's core, delivering beautiful, rich color and perfect grey coverage. Enjoy long-lasting shine and water resistance thanks to **Koleston**'s Miracle Gloss Conditioners. The Color Reactivator revitalizes your hair's vibrancy after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston**:
â­ PREPARE: Put on gloves. Unscrew the developer bottle, open the color cream tube, and squeeze the color into the developer bottle. Close the bottle and shake until the color mixture is completely blended.
â­ APPLY: Apply all over, starting from the roots to dry, unwashed hair. Ensure full saturation from roots to tips. Leave the color mixture on for the recommended time.
â­ FINALIZE: Rinse thoroughly with water until it runs clear. Apply the first sachet of Advanced Intense Gloss Treatment. Leave on for 2 minutes and rinse again.
â­ AFTER 15 DAYS: Put on gloves. Apply the Day 15 Colour Reactivator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes. Rinse and style your hair as usual.
â­ AFTER 30 DAYS: Apply the second sachet of Advanced Intense Gloss Treatment. Wait 2 minutes. Rinse and style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston**:
â­ Color Cream: Aqua / Water / Eau, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonia, Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Ammonium Sulfate, Dicetyl Phosphate, Resorcinol, Sodium Sulfite, Celeth-10 Phosphate, Steareth-200, Ascorbic Acid, Parfum / Frangrance, 2-Methylresorcinol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Disodium Edta, 2-Amino-6chloro-4-Nitrophenol, Linalool, P-Aminophenol, M-Aminophenol, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene.
â­ Developer: Aqua / Water / Eau, Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale / Paraffinum Liquidum, Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Salicylic Acid, Disodium Phosphate, Phosphoric Acid, Etidronic Acid.
â­ Color Reactivator: Aqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxycetyl Hydroxyethyl Dimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale, Petrolatum, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum / Fragrance, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Disodium Edta, 2-Amino-6-Chloro-4-Nitrophenol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyethyl-2-Nitro-P-Toluidine, Linalool, Citronellol, Citric Acid, Geraniol, Sodium Hydroxide.

title_en: Koleston Supreme Hair Color Dark Ash Blonde 6/1
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø±ÙŠÙ… ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ ÙØ§ØªØ­ Ø¬Ø¯Ø§ 6/1
description_en:
Achieve rich, captivating color that lasts up to 8 weeks with the **Koleston Supreme Hair Color Dark Ash Blonde 6/1**. Featuring innovative technology and micro-fine pigments, this formula deeply penetrates to deliver unparalleled intensity and superior protection. The **Koleston Supreme Hair Color Dark Ash Blonde 6/1** offers a complete care system, including a special 15-day Color Reactivator to boost vibrancy and two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment for Day 1 and Day 30, ensuring deep hydration and lasting protection. Enjoy brilliant color and exceptionally healthy hair with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Supreme Hair Color Dark Ash Blonde 6/1**:
â­ Preparation: Squeeze the dye tube into a non-metallic bowl and add the developer liquid. Mix with a color brush until well blended.
â­ First-Time Application: Apply the mixture to unwashed hair using a color brush, ensuring all strands are covered. Comb through for even distribution.
â­ Root Application: Apply the colorant to the roots first. Leave on for 20 minutes, then comb the colorant evenly to the ends of your hair.
â­ Development Time: 30 minutes total (20 minutes for roots, 10 minutes for the rest of the hair). The colorant may change color during the waiting time.
â­ Finishing: Rinse hair until the water runs clear (shampoo not recommended). Apply the first gloss treatment sachet, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.
â­ After 15 Days: Apply the Color Reactivator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes and rinse.
â­ After 30 Days: Apply the second gloss treatment sachet. Wait 2 minutes and rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Supreme Hair Color Dark Ash Blonde 6/1**:
â­ Argan Oil for deep nourishment.
â­ Coconut Oil for added moisture and shine.
â­ Vitamin E for hair protection.
â­ Micro-fine pigments for deep color penetration.
â­ Natural moisturizers to maintain hair softness.

title_en: Koleston Intense Hair Color Special Gray Blonde 309/1
title_ar: ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù†ØªÙ†Ø³ Ø§Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ ÙØ§ØªØ­ Ø®Ø§Øµ 309/1
description_en:
Discover the perfect transformation with **Koleston Intense Hair Color Special Gray Blonde 309/1**. This professional hair dye from Wella is designed to provide you with long-lasting intense color and superior grey coverage. Thanks to its innovative formula, which includes an Oil Replacement sachet, **Koleston Intense Hair Color Special Gray Blonde 309/1** offers exceptional post-coloration care for your hair, maintaining its vitality and shine.

â­ Intense, long-lasting color.
â­ Perfect grey coverage.
â­ Includes Oil Replacement for post-coloration care.
â­ Formula developed by Wella experts.
â­ Provides exceptional shine and vitality to hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Intense Hair Color Special Gray Blonde 309/1**:
â­ Preparation: Mix the contents of the tube with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush.
â­ First-time Coloring: Apply the mixture to unwashed hair, then comb through for even distribution.
â­ Root Coloring: Apply the mixture to the roots, leave for 20 minutes, then distribute to the ends.
â­ Development Time: Leave on for 30 minutes for the entire hair; 20 minutes for roots and an additional 10 minutes for the rest.
â­ Finishing: Rinse hair until water runs clear, apply the Oil Replacement sachet for 2 minutes, then rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Intense Hair Color Special Gray Blonde 309/1**:
â­ Includes a high-performance color cream package.
â­ Oil Replacement sachet for post-coloration care.
â­ Advanced coloring ingredients.
â­ Mixing Ratio: 1:1.
â­ It is recommended to perform an allergy alert test 48 hours before use.

title_en: Koleston Hair Color Dark Blonde Kit 6/0
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± ØºØ§Ù…Ù‚ ÙƒÙŠØª 6/0
description_en:
Achieve rich, vibrant color that lasts up to 8 weeks with the Wella **Koleston** Color Intense Cream Kit. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, **Koleston** delivers irresistible, magnetic color that always gets noticed.

The Wella **Koleston** Color Intense Cream Kit includes an exclusive 15-day Color Reactivator to deposit more pigments for a boost of intensity, plus two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment to lock in your colorâ€”one for Day 1 and another for Day 30.

â­ Rich, vibrant color intensity for up to 8 weeks.
â­ Deep moisture in 2 stages.
â­ Water Protection Factor for richer color intensity.
â­ Easy Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply.
â­ Extended Care & Protection: 2 stages of conditioning on Day 1 and Day 30.
â­ Color Reactivator: Restores richness and vibrancy after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston**:

â­ Preparation: Squeeze the dye tube into a non-metallic bowl and add the developer. Mix with an applicator brush until fully blended. Apply the emulsion to your hair immediately.
â­ First-Time Coloring: Apply to unwashed hair using the applicator brush. Ensure even coverage. For root touch-ups, apply the colored emulsion to the roots, leave for 20 minutes, then comb through to the ends.
â­ Processing Time: Leave on hair for 30 minutes (20 minutes for roots, 10 minutes for the rest of the hair).
â­ Finishing: Rinse hair with water until it runs clear (shampoo is not recommended). Apply the first sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.
â­ After 15 Days - Reactivate Your Color: Wear gloves and apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.
â­ After 30 Days - Condition Your Hair: Apply the second sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment. Wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston**:

â­ Color Intense Cream Formula.
â­ Day 15 Color Reactivator.
â­ Intense Gloss Treatment (2 Sachets).

title_en: Koleston Hair Color Deep Ash Blonde + Developer 307/11
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¯ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ ÙØ§ØªØ­ + Ù…Ø·ÙˆØ± 307/11
description_en:
Achieve unstoppable color intensity for up to 8 weeks with the Koleston Color Intense Cream Kit. Powered by deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, **Koleston Hair Color Deep Ash Blonde + Developer** delivers magnetic color that always gets noticed.

This kit includes an exclusive 15-day Color Reactivator to boost your color's richness and vibrancy, plus two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment to lock in your shade. Discover even more reasons to love your color with **Koleston Hair Color Deep Ash Blonde + Developer**.

â­ 100% Intense Color.
â­ Step Deep Moisture.
â­ Water Protection Factor for more color intensity.
â­ Easy of Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply.
â­ Extended Care & Protection: 2 stages of conditioning on Day 1 and Day 30.
â­ Color Reactivator: Restores richness & vibrancy of color after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Deep Ash Blonde + Developer**:

**Preparation:**
â­ Squeeze the dye tube into a non-metallic bowl, add the developer, and mix thoroughly with a brush.
â­ Apply the emulsion to your hair immediately.

**First-time Coloring:**
â­ Apply to unwashed hair using an applicator brush, ensuring even coverage.
â­ Comb through to distribute the color evenly.

**Root Coloring:**
â­ Create partings and apply the color emulsion to the roots.
â­ Leave on for 20 minutes, then comb the color through to the ends.

**Development Time:**
â­ Leave on hair for 30 minutes.

**Rinse and Condition:**
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly until water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the first sachet of Intense Gloss Treatment, leave for 2 minutes, then rinse again.

**After 15 days - Reactivate Your Color:**
â­ Wear gloves and apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair.
â­ Wait 10 minutes. Rinse and style as usual.

**After 30 days - Condition Your Hair:**
â­ Apply the second sachet of Intense Gloss Treatment.
â­ Wait 2 minutes. Rinse and style as usual.

#Koleston #HairColor #HairDye #HairCare #Beauty #AshBlonde #KSA #SaudiBeauty #HairGoals #ColorIntense

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ ØºØ²Ø§Ù„ÙŠ + Ù…Ø¸Ù‡Ø± 307/7
description_en:
Discover the perfect transformation with **Koleston Hair Color Deer Brown + Developer 307/7**. This innovative formula by Wella is designed to provide you with intense, long-lasting color and perfect grey coverage, while maintaining your hair's health. Enjoy unparalleled shine and vitality with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Deer Brown + Developer 307/7**:

*   **Preparation:** Press the content of the tube into a non-metallic dish, then add the developer fluid and mix the two ingredients with a coloring brush until thoroughly combined.
*   **Application:** Apply the emulsion to unwashed hair using the coloring brush, ensuring all strands are covered. For even distribution, comb your hair with a wide-toothed comb.
*   **Root Coloring:** Make partings in your hair and apply the coloring emulsion to the roots. Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the coloring emulsion evenly down to the ends of your hair.
*   **Development Time:** Leave the color on your hair for 30 minutes.
*   **Finish:** Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended). Apply the Oil Replacement sachet and leave it on for 2 minutes, then rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Deer Brown + Developer 307/7**:

â­ Hair coloring cream with an advanced formula.
â­ Developer fluid to ensure color effectiveness.
â­ Oil Replacement sachet for post-coloring hair care.

#Koleston #HairColor #DeerBrown #Wella #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairDye #HairMakeup #SaudiBeauty #HomeSalon

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„Ø³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ù…ØªÙˆØ³Ø· Ù„Ø¤Ù„Ø¤ÙŠ 7/18
description_en:
Achieve rich, water-resistant color with the **Koleston** Kit 7/18 Medium Pearl Blonde. This advanced color cream ensures deep pigment penetration for a vibrant, long-lasting shade with perfect grey coverage. The water-resistant formula enhances shine and color longevity, while the Color Reactivator helps maintain color intensity after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston** Kit 7/18 Medium Pearl Blonde:
â­ PREPARE: Put on gloves. Unscrew the developer bottle. Open the color cream tube and squeeze the color into the developer bottle. Close the bottle and shake until the color mixture is completely blended.
â­ APPLY: Starting from the roots, apply the dye mixture directly to dry, unwashed hair. Distribute evenly from roots to tips for full saturation. Leave on for 40 minutes.
â­ FINALIZE (After Coloring): Rinse until water runs clear. Apply the first sachet of Advanced Intense Gloss Treatment for 2 minutes, then rinse again.
â­ AFTER 15 DAYS: Put on gloves. Apply the Day 15 Colour Reactivator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes. Rinse and style as usual.
â­ AFTER 30 DAYS: Apply the second sachet of Advanced Intense Gloss Treatment. Wait 2 minutes. Rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston** Kit 7/18 Medium Pearl Blonde:
â­ Color Cream: Aqua / Water / Eau, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonia, Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Ammonium Sulfate, Dicetyl Phosphate, Resorcinol, Sodium Sulfite, Celeth-10 Phosphate, Steareth-200, Ascorbic Acid, Parfum / Fragrance, 2-Methylresorcinol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Disodium Edta, 2-Amino-6chloro-4-Nitrophenol, Linalool, P-Aminophenol, M-Aminophenol, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene.
â­ Developer: Aqua / Water / Eau, Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale / Paraffinum Liquidum, Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Salicylic Acid, Disodium Phosphate, Phosphoric Acid, Etidronic Acid.
â­ Color Reactivator: Aqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxycetyl Hydroxyethyl Dimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale, Petrolatum, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum / Fragrance, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Disodium Edta, 2-Amino-6-Chloro-4-Nitrophenol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyethyl-2-Nitro-P-Toluidine, Linalool, Citronellol, Citric Acid, Geraniol, Sodium Hydroxide.
â­ Advanced Intense Color Treatment: Aqua Water / Eau, Bis-Hydroxy / Methoxy Amodimethicone, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Glutamic Acid, Parfum / Fragrance, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Benzyl Benzoate, Edta, L-Histidine, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sodium Chloride, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Magnesium Nitrate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone.

shortdescription_en: Koleston 7/18 Medium Pearl Blonde hair color delivers rich, water-resistant color with perfect grey coverage for vibrant, healthy-looking hair.

title_en: Koleston Permanent Hair Color - Hazelnut Blonde 307/3
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¯Ø§Ø¦Ù…Ø© - Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ø¨Ù†Ø¯Ù‚ÙŠ 307/3
description_en:
Discover the beauty of your hair with **Koleston Hair Color Hazelnut + Developer 307/3**. Enjoy a rich, vibrant, and long-lasting color with perfect grey coverage. Our unique formula, developed by Wella experts, gives your hair a stunning shine and superior care. As the first brand to offer an Oil Replacement sachet for post-color care, it maintains your hair's vitality and health. Indulge your hair with natural colors and professional results every time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Hazelnut + Developer 307/3**:

â­ Preparation: Mix the content of the tube with the developer fluid in a non-metallic dish using a coloring brush until thoroughly combined.
â­ First-Time Coloring: Apply the mixture evenly to unwashed hair, ensuring all strands are covered. Comb through for even distribution.
â­ Root Coloring: Section your hair and apply the coloring emulsion to the roots. Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion evenly to the ends of your hair for another 10 minutes.
â­ Development Time: Leave on the hair for a total of 30 minutes.
â­ Finishing: Rinse hair until water runs clear. Apply the Oil Replacement sachet and leave on for 2 minutes, then rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Hazelnut + Developer 307/3**:

â­ Contains a high-performance color creme.
â­ Includes a developer fluid.
â­ Comes with an Oil Replacement sachet for post-color care.

description_en:
Achieve vibrant, long-lasting hair color with the **Koleston** Hair Color Light Ash Blonde 8/1. Featuring deep-infusion technology, this formula provides rich, intense color that lasts up to 8 weeks. Enjoy enhanced shine and intensive care with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston**:
â­ Prepare the mixture carefully according to the instructions.
â­ Section your hair and apply the color evenly, starting from the roots.
â­ Leave on for the time specified in the leaflet.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly until the water runs clear.
â­ Use the intensive care sachets on Day 1 and Day 30 for hydration and color protection.
â­ Apply the Color Reactivator after 15 days to boost color vibrancy.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston**:
â­ Rich color cream with micro-fine pigments.
â­ Developer liquid.
â­ Day 15 Color Reactivator.
â­ Intense Gloss Treatment sachets.
â­ Carefully selected ingredients to ensure lasting color and hair nourishment.

#Koleston #HairColor #AshBlonde #HairDye #HairCare #Beauty #SaudiStyle #HairGoals #FashionHair #KSA

description_en:
Time for a change with **Koleston Platinum Blonde + Developer 310/0**. Wella Koleston offers a wide range of shades to perfectly suit your skin tone, featuring an innovative Hair color Creme kit with highly effective pigments for long-lasting intense color and perfect grey coverage. It's the first hair coloration brand to introduce an Oil Replacement sachet for extraordinary post-coloration treatment, providing extra nourishment and shine.

â­ Intense long-lasting color.
â­ Perfect grey coverage.
â­ Oil Replacement Treatment for post-coloration nourishment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Platinum Blonde + Developer 310/0**:

Preparation:
â­ Press the content of the tube into a non-metallic dish.
â­ Add the developer fluid and mix the two ingredients with a coloring brush until thoroughly combined.
â­ Apply the emulsion to your hair as soon as you have finished mixing it.

First-Time Coloring:
â­ Apply to unwashed hair using the coloring brush.
â­ Ensure you do not miss any strands.
â­ Comb your hair through with a wide-toothed comb for even distribution.

Root Coloring:
â­ Make partings in your hair and apply the coloring emulsion to the roots.
â­ Leave for 20 minutes then comb the coloring emulsion evenly right down to the ends of your hair.

Development Time:
â­ Leave to soak for 30 minutes.
â­ For root coloring: 20 minutes for the roots and another 10 minutes for the whole of your hair.

Finish:
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the Oil Replacement Sachet.
â­ Leave on for 2 minutes and then rinse again.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Wear suitable gloves.
â­ Mixing ratio: 1:1.
â­ Conduct an allergy alert test 48 hours before each use.
â­ Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Platinum Blonde + Developer 310/0**:

â­ Contains Wella Koleston's innovative Hair color Creme formula with highly effective pigments.
â­ Includes Oil Replacement for post-coloration hair care.
â­ Ensures perfect grey coverage and intense, long-lasting color.

#Koleston #PlatinumBlonde #HairColor #HairDye #WellaKoleston #GreyCoverage #HealthyHair #HairCare #SaudiBeauty #KSA

description_en:
Transform your look with **Koleston Hair Color Light Blonde 308/0 with Developer**. Wella Koleston, with its expert-developed formula, brings you a highly effective hair color cream kit packed with rich pigments. Achieve intense, long-lasting color and perfect grey coverage, all while enjoying a healthy shine thanks to the innovative Oil Replacement sachet â€“ the first of its kind for extraordinary post-coloration treatment. Get salon-quality results in the comfort of your home with this premium hair color solution.

â­ Intense, long-lasting color results.
â­ Perfect grey coverage for a flawless finish.
â­ Oil Replacement treatment to maintain hair vitality after coloring.
â­ Expertly developed by Wella for superior color and care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Light Blonde 308/0 with Developer**

**Preparation:**
â­ Squeeze the tube's contents into a non-metallic dish (plastic, glass, or porcelain).
â­ Add the developer fluid and mix thoroughly with a coloring brush until well combined.
â­ Apply the emulsion to your hair immediately after mixing.

**First-Time Coloring:**
â­ Apply to unwashed hair using the coloring brush, ensuring no strands are missed.
â­ Comb through your hair with a wide-toothed comb for even distribution.

**Root Coloring:**
â­ Create partings in your hair and apply the coloring emulsion directly to the roots.
â­ Leave on for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion evenly through to the ends of your hair.

**Development Time:**
â­ Leave to develop for 30 minutes on the hair.
â­ For root coloring, allow 20 minutes for the roots and an additional 10 minutes for the rest of the hair.

**Finish:**
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly until the water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the Oil Replacement Sachet and leave it on for 2 minutes before rinsing again.

**Caution & Warnings:**
â­ Wear suitable gloves.
â­ Mixing ratio: 1:1.
â­ Conduct an allergy alert test 48 hours before each use.
â­ Not intended for use on persons under 16 years of age.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Light Blonde 308/0 with Developer**

â­ Contains a highly effective hair color cream formula with an Oil Replacement treatment.
â­ Developed by Wella experts to ensure optimal color quality and hair care.

#Koleston #HairColor #LightBlonde #HairDye #Wella #Beauty #HairCare #Salon #HealthyHair #ProfessionalColoring

title_en: Koleston Hair Color Blue Black Kit 2/8
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ù…Ø²Ø±Ù‚ ÙƒÙŠØª 2/8
description_en:
Discover deep, captivating color with **Koleston** Blue Black 2/8 hair dye, designed to give your hair rich, long-lasting color for up to 8 weeks. Thanks to deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, **Koleston** penetrates your hair to deliver an irresistible look. The kit includes an exclusive Color Reactivator for color boost on day 15, plus two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment for deep moisture and color protection on day 1 and day 30. Enjoy stunning hair color that combines care and radiance with **Koleston**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston**:

â­ **Preparation:** Squeeze the dye tube into a non-metallic bowl, add the developer, and mix well with a brush.
â­ **First-time coloring:** Apply the emulsion to unwashed hair, ensuring all strands are covered, then comb through for even distribution.
â­ **Root coloring:** Create sections and apply the colored emulsion to the roots. Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion through to the ends of your hair.
â­ **Development Time:** Leave the color on your hair for 30 minutes.
â­ **Rinse & Treat:** Rinse hair until water runs clear. Apply the first sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.
â­ **After 15 days:** Wear gloves and apply the Day 15 Colour Re-Activator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.
â­ **After 30 days:** Apply the second sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment. Wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston**:

â­ Rich color cream with micro-fine pigments.
â­ Exclusive color reactivator for enhanced color intensity.
â­ Two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment for moisture and protection.
â­ Application gloves.

#Koleston #HairColor #HairDye #HairCare #LongLastingColor #Beauty #SaudiBeauty #KSA #Riyadh #Jeddah

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± ÙØ§ØªØ­ Ø¬Ø¯Ø§Ù‹ + Ù…Ø·ÙˆØ± 309/0
description_en:
Achieve a stunning hair transformation with **Koleston Lightest Blonde Hair Color + Developer 309/0**. This advanced formula offers you a rich, radiant, and long-lasting color with complete grey coverage. Enjoy healthy, shiny hair thanks to our high-quality ingredients, specially designed by Wella experts. 

â­ Intense Long Lasting Color
â­ Perfect grey coverage
â­ Oil Replacement Treatment for post-color hair vitality

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Lightest Blonde Hair Color + Developer 309/0**

Preparation:
â­ Press the contents of the tube into a non-metallic dish, add the developer fluid, and mix the two ingredients thoroughly with a coloring brush.
â­ Apply the emulsion to your hair immediately after mixing.

First Time Coloring:
â­ Apply to unwashed hair using the coloring brush.
â­ Ensure all strands are covered evenly.
â­ Comb your hair with a wide-toothed comb for even distribution.

Root Coloring:
â­ Make partings in your hair and apply the coloring emulsion to the roots.
â­ Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion evenly to the ends of your hair.

Development Time:
â­ Leave the color on your hair for 30 minutes.
â­ For root coloring, leave for 20 minutes on the roots and an additional 10 minutes for the entire hair.

Finish:
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo not recommended).
â­ Apply the Oil Replacement Sachet.
â­ Leave on for 2 minutes and then rinse again.

Warnings:
â­ Wear suitable gloves.
â­ Hair colorants can cause allergic reactions. Conduct an allergy test 48 hours prior.
â­ Not for use on persons under 16 years of age.
â­ Avoid eye contact; rinse immediately if contact occurs.
â­ Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Lightest Blonde Hair Color + Developer 309/0**

â­ The formula contains innovative hair coloring ingredients that ensure optimal results.
â­ Enriched with Oil Replacement for post-coloring hair care.

title_en: Koleston Hair Color Medium Brown 4/0 - Rich, Lasting Color
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ Ù…ØªÙˆØ³Ø· 4/0 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙˆØ«Ø§Ø¨Øª
description_en:
Discover excellence with **Koleston** Hair Color Medium Brown 4/0, designed to give you a rich, deep, and long-lasting color.

â­ Intense, water-resistant color for a captivating look that lasts.
â­ Deep-infusion technology for professional results at home.
â­ 100% perfect grey coverage.
â­ Water Protection Factor enhances hair shine and maintains color intensity.
â­ Color Reactivator deposits more color after 15 days to maintain vibrancy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston** Hair Color Medium Brown 4/0:
â­ Prepare the mixture by combining the color cream and developer as per the enclosed instructions.
â­ Apply the color to dry, unwashed hair, starting with the roots and then spreading evenly to the tips.
â­ Leave the color on for the specified time according to instructions (40-50 minutes for virgin hair or full coverage, 30-40 minutes for roots followed by 10 minutes for the rest of the hair for touch-ups).
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water until the water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the first sachet of Intense Gloss Treatment for 2 minutes, then rinse.
â­ After 15 days, apply the Color Re-Activator to wet hair, leave for 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.
â­ After 30 days, apply the second sachet of Intense Gloss Treatment for 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston** Hair Color Medium Brown 4/0:
â­ Color Cream: AQUA/WATER/EAU, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, AMMONIA, TOLUENE-2,5-DIAMINE SULFATE, etc.
â­ Developer: AQUA/WATER/EAU, MINERAL OIL/HUILE MINERALE/PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM, HYDROGEN PEROXIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, etc.
â­ Color Reactivator: AQUA/WATER/EAU, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, etc.
â­ Advanced Intense Color Treatment: AQUA WATER/EAU, BIS-HYDROXY/METHOXY AMODIMETHICONE, STEARYL ALCOHOL, etc.

#Koleston #HairDye #MediumBrown #HairColor #HairStyle #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairDyes #Wella #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover the perfect shade with **Koleston** Hair Color Light Ash Brown + Developer 305/1, delivering rich, deep color intensity that lasts up to 8 weeks. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, **Koleston** penetrates to the maximum for hair that's irresistibly magnetic. The kit includes an exclusive 15-day Color Reactivator for a boost of vibrancy and two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment for color lock and moisture on Day 1 and Day 30. Choose your favorite shade and achieve healthy, radiant hair.

â­ 100% Intense Color
â­ Step Deep Moisture for extended care & protection
â­ Water Protection Factor for more color intensity
â­ Easy of Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply
â­ Color Reactivator to restore richness and vibrancy after 15 days

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston** Hair Color Light Ash Brown + Developer 305/1

Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the dye tube into a non-metallic bowl, add the developer, and mix thoroughly with an applicator brush.
â­ Apply the emulsion to your hair immediately after mixing.

First-Time Coloring:
â­ Apply to unwashed hair using the applicator brush, ensuring no strands are missed.
â­ Comb through with a wide-tooth comb for even distribution.

Root Coloring:
â­ Create partings and apply the colored emulsion to the roots.
â­ Leave on for 20 minutes, then comb the emulsion evenly through to the ends.

Color Processing Time:
â­ Leave on hair for 30 minutes.
â­ The color emulsion may change shade during processing.

Finishing:
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo not recommended).
â­ Apply the Miracle Gloss Treatment sachet, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.

After 15 Days - Reactivate Your Color:
â­ Wear gloves and apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair.
â­ Wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

After 30 Days - Condition Your Hair:
â­ Apply the second sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment.
â­ Wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston** Hair Color Light Ash Brown + Developer 305/1

*Key ingredients include color cream, developer liquid, color reactivator, and intense gloss treatment. (Please refer to the enclosed leaflet for a full ingredient list).

description_en:
Achieve irresistible, long-lasting hair color with **Koleston Hair Color Ultralight Ash Blonde + Developer 310/81**. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments for rich color that lasts up to 8 weeks. With **Koleston Hair Color Ultralight Ash Blonde + Developer 310/81**, enjoy 2-step deep moisture and extended care & protection. Get superior shine and easy application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Ultralight Ash Blonde + Developer 310/81**:
â­ Preparation: Mix the color cream with the developer liquid in a non-metallic bowl.
â­ First-time coloring: Apply mixture to unwashed hair with a brush, comb for even distribution.
â­ Root coloring: Apply to roots first for 20 minutes, then distribute to the rest of the hair.
â­ Development time: Leave the color on for 30 minutes.
â­ Finishing: Rinse until water runs clear, apply the gloss treatment sachet, rinse again.
â­ After 15 days: Apply the Color Reactivator to wet hair for 10 minutes, then rinse.
â­ After 30 days: Apply the second gloss treatment sachet for 2 minutes, then rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Ultralight Ash Blonde + Developer 310/81**:
â­ Rich Color Cream
â­ Developer Liquid
â­ Color Reactivator (for 15-day use)
â­ Intense Gloss Treatment Sachets (for Day 1 and Day 30 use)
â­ Gloves

description_en:
Achieve rich, vibrant, and long-lasting hair color with **Koleston Hair Color Medium Ash Brown + Developer 304/1**. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, **Koleston Hair Color Medium Ash Brown + Developer 304/1** delivers irresistible color that enhances your hair's natural beauty. This kit includes a special 15-day Color Reactivator and two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment for days 1 and 30, ensuring your color remains rich and healthy. Easy to apply, it guarantees complete coverage and shiny, nourished hair.

â­ Rich color that lasts up to 8 weeks.
â­ Deep moisture in 2 steps.
â­ Water Protection Factor to maintain color intensity.
â­ Easy Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply.
â­ Enhanced care and protection on Day 1 and Day 30.
â­ Color Reactivator to restore color vibrancy after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Medium Ash Brown + Developer 304/1**:

â­ **Preparation:** Squeeze the dye tube into the developer bottle and mix until completely blended.
â­ **Application:** Apply the mixture to dry, unwashed hair, starting with the roots and working through to the ends.
â­ **Waiting Time:** Leave on hair for 30 minutes.
â­ **Finish:** Rinse hair thoroughly until water runs clear. Apply the first sachet of Intense Gloss Treatment, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.
â­ **After 15 Days:** Apply the Color Reactivator to wet hair, wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.
â­ **After 30 Days:** Apply the second sachet of Intense Gloss Treatment, wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Medium Ash Brown + Developer 304/1**:

â­ Contains a blend of micro-fine pigments for your desired color.
â­ Moisturizing agents to keep hair soft and smooth.
â­ Color-fixing agents to ensure long-lasting color.
â­ Treatment ingredients that provide shine and vitality to the hair.

title_en: Koleston Hair Color Chestnut + Developer - Shade 305/4
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒØ³ØªÙ†Ø§Ø¦ÙŠ + Ù…Ø¸Ù‡Ø± - Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Ø© 305/4
description_en:
Achieve your dream hair color with **Koleston Hair Color Chestnut + Developer**. This innovative formula from Wella is designed to give you rich, intense, and long-lasting color with perfect grey coverage.

**Koleston Hair Color Chestnut + Developer** offers a unique coloring experience, featuring an Oil Replacement sachet for post-color hydration and protection, leaving your hair with unparalleled shine and vitality. Discover a variety of shades to suit all skin tones and enjoy a safe, transformative change.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Chestnut + Developer**:
â­ Preparation: Press the contents of the tube into a non-metallic dish, then add the developer fluid and mix thoroughly with a coloring brush until well combined.
â­ First-Time Coloring: Apply the mixture to unwashed hair using the coloring brush, ensuring all strands are covered. Comb your hair for even distribution.
â­ Root Coloring: Make partings in your hair and apply the coloring emulsion to the roots. Leave for 20 minutes, then comb the mixture evenly through to the ends of your hair.
â­ Development Time: Leave the color on for a total of 30 minutes (20 minutes for roots and an additional 10 minutes for the entire hair).
â­ Finish: Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended). Apply the Oil Replacement sachet, leave on for 2 minutes, and rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Chestnut + Developer**:
â­ High-intensity color cream.
â­ Advanced developer fluid.
â­ Oil Replacement sachet for post-color hair care.

title_en: Koleston Hair Darkest Night Black Kit 1/0 - Rich, Water-Resistant Color
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø³ÙˆØ§Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù„ÙŠÙ„ ÙƒÙŠØª 1/0 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙˆÙ…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡
description_en:
Achieve rich, water-resistant color with **Koleston** Hair Darkest Night Black Kit 1/0. The advanced color cream from **Koleston** penetrates deep into the hair core, delivering beautiful, rich color with perfect grey coverage. The water-resistant formula leaves your hair brighter and more resistant to water, helping to maintain color intensity. **Koleston's** color reactivator deposits more dyes to re-boost your hair color after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston** Hair Darkest Night Black Kit 1/0:
â­ Step 1: Prepare by wearing gloves and mixing the color cream with the developer bottle until completely blended.
â­ Step 2: Apply the mixture to dry, unwashed hair, starting from the roots to the tips, and leave it for the specified time.
â­ Step 3: Rinse hair thoroughly with water until the water runs clear. Then, apply the first Advanced Intense Color Treatment for 2 minutes and rinse again.
â­ After 15 Days: Put on gloves. Apply the Day 15 Color Reactivator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes. Rinse and style your hair as usual.
â­ After 30 Days: Apply the second sachet of Advanced Intense Color Treatment. Wait 2 minutes. Rinse and style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston** Hair Darkest Night Black Kit 1/0:
â­ COLOR CREAM: Contains a blend of ingredients for deep, water-resistant coloring.
â­ DEVELOPER: Contains hydrogen peroxide to activate the color.
â­ COLOR REACTIVATOR: Boosts color vibrancy after 15 days.
â­ ADVANCED INTENSE COLOR TREATMENT: Provides superior shine and hair care.

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± ÙØ§ØªØ­ ÙƒÙŠØª 8/0 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Discover your perfect shade with **Koleston Hair Color Light Blonde Kit 8/0**. This kit delivers rich, deep color that lasts up to 8 weeks, thanks to its deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments that care for your hair and give it irresistible shine.

â­ Rich, deep color that lasts up to 8 weeks.
â­ Deep-infusion technology for even coloring.
â­ Color Reactivator to boost color intensity after 15 days.
â­ Two intensive hair care treatments: one for Day 1 and another for Day 30.
â­ Easy to use: Squeeze, mix, and apply.
â­ Water Protection Factor for long-lasting color vibrancy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Light Blonde Kit 8/0**:
Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the tube's content into a non-metallic bowl, add the developer, and mix with a brush.
Apply the emulsion to your hair immediately.

Coloring:
â­ First-time coloring: Apply to unwashed hair, ensuring all strands are covered.
â­ Root coloring: Apply the emulsion to the roots, leave for 20 minutes, then distribute to the rest of the hair.

Finishing:
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear.
â­ Apply the first Miracle Gloss Treatment sachet, leave for 2 minutes, then rinse again.

After 15 days:
â­ Wear gloves and apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

After 30 days:
â­ Apply the second Miracle Gloss Treatment sachet. Wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Light Blonde Kit 8/0**:
â­ Advanced hair coloring formula with micro-fine colorants, Color Reactivator, and care treatments.
(Note: For a complete ingredient list, please refer to the leaflet enclosed in the box).

title_en: Koleston Intense Blondes Hair Color - Special Silver Blonde 312/1
title_ar: ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù†ØªÙŠÙ†Ø³ Ø¨Ù„ÙˆÙ†Ø¯Ø³ - Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± ÙØ¶ÙŠ Ø®Ø§Øµ 312/1
description_en:
Get unstoppable color intensity for up to 8 weeks with the **Koleston Intense Blondes** Cream Kit. With deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, achieve a magnetic color that always gets noticed. The exclusive 15-day Color Reactivator and the two Intense Gloss Treatments for Day 1 and Day 30 ensure your hair remains rich in vibrancy and color.

Product Features:
â­ 100% Intense Color
â­ Step Deep Moisture
â­ Water Protection Factor for more color intensity
â­ Easy of Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply
â­ Extended Care & Protection: 2 stages of conditioning (Day 1 and Day 30)
â­ Color Reactivator: Restores richness & vibrancy of color after 15 days

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Intense Blondes**:
Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the dye tube liquid into the developer bottle.
â­ Close the bottle and shake it until completely blended.
Application Options:
If you color your hair frequently (1 to 3 months) with a similar tone:
â­ Leave hair unwashed and dry.
â­ Apply to roots first.
â­ Wait 30-40 minutes.
â­ Apply dye to the rest of your hair and wait for 10 minutes.
Apply all over starting at roots:
â­ Leave hair unwashed and dry.
â­ Apply to roots first and work through all hair to the tips.
â­ Wait 40-50 minutes.
Finish:
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear (using shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the 1st sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment for coloring day. Leave on for 2 minutes and rinse again.
After 15 days: Reactivate your color:
â­ Using gloves, apply the Day 15 Colour Re-Activator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes. Rinse and style your hair as usual.
After 30 days: Condition your hair:
â­ Apply the 2nd sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment. Wait 2 minutes. Rinse and style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Intense Blondes**:
* Actual ingredients may vary based on the specific color formulation. Please refer to the packaging for a complete list.

shortdescription_en: Achieve intense, vibrant color with **Koleston Intense Blondes** in Special Silver Blonde. Long-lasting color and deep moisture for up to 8 weeks.

title_en: Koleston Permanent Hair Color - 8/18 Light Pearl Blonde
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„Ø³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¯Ø§Ø¦Ù…Ø© - Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± ÙØ§ØªØ­ Ù„Ø¤Ù„Ø¤ÙŠ 8/18
description_en:
Achieve a rich, water-resistant, and long-lasting color with the **Koleston Kit 8/18 Glow Lt Prl Blnd Mea**. The advanced Color Cream in **Koleston** helps color pigments penetrate the hair's core for beautiful, rich color and perfect grey coverage. The Miracle Gloss Conditioners provide intense shine and care. The Color Reactivator is used on day 15 to re-boost your hair color by depositing more dyes, ensuring vibrancy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Kit 8/18 Glow Lt Prl Blnd Mea**:
â­ PREPARE: Put on gloves. Unscrew the developer bottle and open the color cream tube. Squeeze the color into the developer bottle and shake until the mixture is completely blended.
â­ APPLY: Start by applying the dye mixture directly on dry, unwashed hair, beginning from the roots and extending to the tips for full saturation. Leave on for the recommended time.
â­ FINALIZE: Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended). Apply the 1st sachet of Advanced Intense Gloss Treatment and leave on for 2 minutes, then rinse again.
â­ AFTER 15 DAYS: Put on the second pair of gloves. Apply the Day 15 Colour Reactivator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes. Rinse and style as usual.
â­ AFTER 30 DAYS: Apply the 2nd sachet of Advanced Intense Gloss Treatment. Wait 2 minutes. Rinse and style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Kit 8/18 Glow Lt Prl Blnd Mea**:
â­ Color Cream: Aqua / Water / Eau, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonia, Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Ammonium Sulfate, Dicetyl Phosphate, Resorcinol, Sodium Sulfite, Celeth-10 Phosphate, Steareth-200, Ascorbic Acid, Parfum / Frangrance, 2-Methylresorcinol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Disodium Edta, 2-Amino-6chloro-4-Nitrophenol, Linalool, P-Aminophenol, M-Aminophenol, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene.
â­ Developer: Aqua / Water / Eau, Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale / Paraffinum Liquidum, Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Salicylic Acid, Disodium Phosphate, Phosphoric Acid, Etidronic Acid.
â­ Color Reactivator: Aqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxycetyl Hydroxyethyl Dimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale, Petrolatum, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum / Fragrance, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Disodium Edta, 2-Amino-6-Chloro-4-Nitrophenol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyethyl-2-Nitro-P-Toluidine, Linalool, Citronellol, Citric Acid, Geraniol, Sodium Hydroxide.
â­ Advanced Intense Color Treatment: Aqua Water / Eau, Bis-Hydroxy / Methoxy Amodimethicone, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Glutamic Acid, Parfum / Fragrance, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Benzyl Benzoate, Edta, L-Histidine, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sodium Chloride, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Magnesium Nitrate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone.

Achieve rich, long-lasting color with **Koleston Hair Color Deer Brown Kit 7/7**. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, this kit delivers irresistible hair color intensity for up to 8 weeks. It includes an exclusive 15-day Color Reactivator to boost color richness and two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment to lock in colorâ€”one for Day 1 and another for Day 30.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Deer Brown Kit 7/7**:
â­ **Preparation:** Squeeze the dye tube into the developer bottle and shake until completely blended. Apply to hair.
â­ **First-time Coloring:** Apply to unwashed hair with a color brush, ensuring all strands are covered.
â­ **Root Coloring:** Apply the colored emulsion to the roots, leave for 20 minutes, then comb evenly through to the ends.
â­ **Processing Time:** Leave on hair for 30 minutes.
â­ **Finishing:** Rinse hair until water runs clear. Apply the first sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse again.
â­ **After 15 Days:** Wear gloves and apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.
â­ **After 30 Days:** Apply the second sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment. Wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Deer Brown Kit 7/7**:
â­ 100% Intense Color
â­ Step Deep Moisture
â­ Water Protection Factor for richer color
â­ Easy Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply
â­ Extended Care & Protection: 2 stages of conditioning (Day 1 and Day 30)
â­ Color Reactivator: Restores richness and vibrancy of color after 15 days.

description_en:
Discover unstoppable color intensity with **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Cacao 305/77**, delivering vibrant color that lasts up to 8 weeks. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments that penetrate to the maximum, this hair color provides your hair with magnetic color that always gets noticed. The kit includes an exclusive 15-day Color Reactivator to boost color richness, plus two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment for Day 1 and Day 30 to lock in vibrant, healthy-looking color. **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Cacao 305/77** is easy to apply and offers superior hair care.

â­ 100% Intense Color
â­ Step Deep Moisture for scalp and hair comfort.
â­ Water Protection Factor for color longevity.
â­ Easy Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply.
â­ Extended Care & Protection: 2 stages of conditioning on Day 1 and Day 30.
â­ Color Reactivator: Restores richness and vibrancy of color after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Cacao 305/77**

Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the dye tube liquid into the developer bottle.
â­ Close the bottle and shake it until completely blended.

Application Options:
If you color your hair frequently (1 to 3 months) with a similar tone:
â­ Leave hair unwashed and dry.
â­ Apply to roots first.
â­ Wait 30-40 minutes.
â­ Apply dye to the rest of your hair.
â­ Wait for an additional 10 minutes.

For first-time use or full coverage:
â­ Leave hair unwashed and dry.
â­ Apply to roots first and work through all hair to the tips.
â­ Wait for 40-50 minutes.

Finishing:
â­ Rinse hair well until water runs clear (using shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the 1st sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment.
â­ Leave on for 2 minutes and rinse again.

After 15 days: Reactivate your color:
â­ Using gloves, apply the Day 15 Colour Re-Activator to wet hair.
â­ Wait 10 minutes.
â­ Rinse and style your hair as usual.

After 30 days: Condition your hair:
â­ Apply the 2nd sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment.
â­ Wait 2 minutes.
â­ Rinse and style your hair as usual.

Cautions & Warnings:
â­ Wear suitable gloves.
â­ Mixing ratio: 1:1.
â­ In case of contact with eyes, rinse them immediately.
â­ Hair colorants can cause severe allergic reactions. An allergy alert test 48 hours prior is recommended.
â­ This product is not intended for use on persons under the age of 16.
â­ Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Do not color your hair if you have a rash on your face or sensitive, irritated and damaged scalp, have ever experienced any reaction after coloring your hair, or have experienced a reaction to a temporary â€œblack hennaâ€ tattoo in the past.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Cacao 305/77**

â­ The formulation contains high-quality ingredients to ensure optimal results, focusing on nourishing and protecting hair during the coloring process.

shortdescription_en: Koleston Maxi Cacao hair color for up to 8 weeks of intense color, with deep moisture and superior care.

title_en: Koleston Hair Color Chocolate Brown Kit 6/7
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ Ø´ÙˆÙƒÙˆÙ„Ø§ ÙƒÙŠØª 6/7
description_en:
Discover rich, water-resistant color with the **Koleston** Hair Color Chocolate Brown Kit 6/7. **Koleston's** advanced color cream is developed to help color pigments penetrate deep into the hair, giving you rich, beautiful color with perfect grey coverage. **Koleston's** Water Protection Factor makes your hair more radiant and water-resistant to help maintain color intensity. The **Koleston** Color Reactivator deposits more color on your hair, helping to reactivate color after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston** Hair Color Chocolate Brown Kit 6/7:
â­ Preparation: Squeeze the dye tube liquid into the developer bottle. Close the bottle and shake until completely blended.
â­ Application: If you color your hair frequently (1 to 3 months) with a similar tone, leave hair unwashed and dry. Apply to roots first, wait 30-40 minutes, then apply dye to the rest of your hair and wait for 10 minutes.
â­ Full Hair Application: Apply all over starting at roots and work through all hair to the tips. Wait for 40-50 minutes.
â­ Finish: Rinse until water runs clear (using shampoo is not recommended). Apply the 1st sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment for coloring day. Leave on for 2 minutes and rinse again.
â­ After 15 Days: Reactivate your color. Using gloves, apply the Day 15 Colour Re-Activator to wet hair. Wait 10 minutes. Rinse and style your hair as usual.
â­ After 30 Days: Condition your hair. Apply the 2nd sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment. Wait 2 minutes. Rinse and style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston** Hair Color Chocolate Brown Kit 6/7:
â­ COLOR CREAM: AQUA / WATER / EAU, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, AMMONIA, TOLUENE-2,5-DIAMINE SULFATE, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE, AMMONIUM SULFATE, DICETYL PHOSPHATE, RESORCINOL, SODIUM SULFITE, CELETH-10 PHOSPHATE, STEARETH-200, ASCORBIC ACID, PARFUM / FRANGRANCE, 2-METHYLRESORCINOL, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE, DISODIUM EDTA, 2-AMINO-6CHLORO-4-NITROPHENOL, LINALOOL, P-AMINOPHENOL, M-AMINOPHENOL, 4-AMINO-2-HYDROXYTOLUENE.
â­ DEVELOPER: AQUA / WATER / EAU, MINERAL OIL / HUILE MINERALE / PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM, HYDROGEN PEROXIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, SODIUM CETEARYL SULFATE, SALICYLIC ACID, DISODIUM PHOSPHATE, PHOSPHORIC ACID, ETIDRONIC ACID.
â­ COLOR REACTIVATOR: AQUA / WATER / EAU, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, HYDROXYCETYL HYDROXYETHYL DIMONIUM CHLORIDE, DIMETHICONE, PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM / MINERAL OIL / HUILE MINERALE, PETROLATUM, PHENOXYETHANOL, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, METHYLPARABEN, PROPYLPARABEN, DISODIUM EDTA, 2-AMINO-6-CHLORO-4-NITROPHENOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, HYDROXYETHYL-2-NITRO-P-TOLUIDINE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, CITRIC ACID, GERANIOL, SODIUM HYDROXIDE.
â­ ADVANCED INTENSE COLOR TREATMENT: AQUA WATER / EAU, BIS-HYDROXY / METHOXY AMODIMETHICONE, STEARYL ALCOHOL, CETYL ALCOHOL, STEARAMIDOPROPYL DIMETHYLAMINE, GLUTAMIC ACID, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CITRIC ACID, BENZYL BENZOATE, EDTA, L-HISTIDINE, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, SODIUM CHLORIDE, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALOOL, MAGNESIUM NITRATE, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, METHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE.

title_en: Koleston Maxi Hair Color Special Silver Blonde Nature 312
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† Ù…Ø§ÙƒØ³ÙŠ ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø³Ø¨ÙŠØ´Ø§Ù„ Ø³ÙŠÙ„ÙØ± Ø¨Ù„ÙˆÙ†Ø¯ Ù†ÙŠØªØ´Ø± 312
description_en:
Introducing **Koleston Maxi** Hair Color in Special Silver Blonde Nature 312, for an irresistible, intense color that lasts up to 8 weeks. Our Deep-Infusion Technology and micro-fine color molecules penetrate maximally for stunning, eye-catching results. The **Koleston Maxi** kit includes an exclusive 15-day color-refreshing cream to deposit more color for that undeniable intensity. Plus, two sachets of intensive shine treatment to seal your hair color â€“ one for Day 1 and another for Day 30. Thereâ€™s always more color to love with Koleston!

Product Features:
â­ 100% Intense Color
â­ Deep Moisturization Step
â­ Water Protection Factor for More Color Intensity
â­ Easy to Use: Squeeze - Mix - Apply
â­ Extended Care & Protection: 2 Moisturization Stages (Day 1 & Day 30)
â­ Color Refresher: Restores Color Richness and Vibrancy After 15 Days

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Maxi**:

Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the color cream tube into the applicator bottle.
â­ Close the bottle and shake until the mixture is completely blended.

Application Options:
For Frequent Coloration (Every 1-3 Months) with the Same Shade:
â­ Leave hair unwashed and dry.
â­ Apply to roots first.
â­ Wait for 30-40 minutes.
â­ Apply the color to the rest of the hair for 10 minutes.

For Full Head Application / Root Touch-Up:
â­ Leave hair unwashed and dry.
â­ Apply color to roots first, then spread over the entire hair to the ends.
â­ Wait for 40-50 minutes.

After Finishing:
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly until the water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the first sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment for the coloring day. Leave it for 2 minutes, then rinse.

After 15 Days (Color Refresh):
â­ Wearing gloves, apply the Day 15 color-refreshing cream sachet to damp hair.
â­ Wait for 10 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair and style as usual.

After 30 Days (Shine Treatment):
â­ Dampen your hair and apply the second sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment.
â­ Wait for 2 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair and style as usual.

Warnings & Precautions:
â­ Wear suitable gloves.
â­ Mixing Ratio: 1:1.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly after use.
â­ Hair colorants can cause severe allergic reactions. This product is not intended for use on persons under 16 years of age. Temporary black henna tattoos may increase your risk of allergy.
â­ If product gets into eyes, rinse immediately.
â­ Do not use to color eyelashes or eyebrows.
â­ Perform a sensitivity alert test 48 hours before each coloring.
â­ In case of any reaction or if in doubt, consult a doctor before using any hair coloring product.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Do not color your hair if you have a facial rash or sensitive, irritated, damaged scalp, have ever experienced any reaction after coloring your hair, or have experienced a reaction to a temporary black henna tattoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Maxi**:

(Note: Full ingredient details are available in the leaflet enclosed with the product).

description_en:
Achieve rich, captivating hair color that lasts up to 8 weeks with **Koleston Hair Color Frosted Chocolate + Developer 307/17**. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, this formula delivers irresistible color with deep moisture and superior protection. The kit includes a Color Reactivator to boost vibrancy after 15 days and two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment for Day 1 and Day 30, ensuring lasting color brilliance. Easy to use: Squeeze, Mix, Apply.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Frosted Chocolate + Developer 307/17**:
â­ Prepare the mixture by squeezing the dye tube into the developer bottle and shaking until blended.
â­ Apply the emulsion to unwashed hair using the applicator brush.
â­ Ensure even distribution throughout all hair strands.
â­ Leave the color on for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly until water runs clear.
â­ Apply the first Gloss Treatment sachet after rinsing.
â­ After 15 days, apply the Color Reactivator to wet hair for 10 minutes.
â­ After 30 days, apply the second Gloss Treatment sachet for 2 minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Frosted Chocolate + Developer 307/17**:
â­ Color Intense Cream with micro-fine pigments.
â­ Developer.
â­ Intense Gloss Treatment (2 sachets).
â­ Color Reactivator.
â­ Suitable gloves.

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ 2/0 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Achieve rich, deep Natural Black color that lasts up to 8 weeks with the **Koleston Hair Color Natural Black Kit 2/0**. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, this formula penetrates to the maximum, giving your hair a magnetic, irresistible color.

â­ 100% Intense Color.
â­ Step Deep Moisture for hair.
â­ Easy Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply.
â­ Extended Care & Protection.
â­ Color Reactivator restores richness and vibrancy after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Natural Black Kit 2/0**:
   â­ Preparation: Squeeze dye tube into developer bottle, shake well, then apply.
   â­ First-time coloring: Apply to unwashed hair, ensuring even distribution with a comb.
   â­ Root coloring: Apply to roots, wait 20 mins, then comb through to the ends.
   â­ Waiting time: Leave on hair for 30 minutes.
   â­ Finish: Rinse until water runs clear. Apply the first Miracle Gloss Treatment sachet, leave for 2 mins, rinse again.
   â­ After 15 days: Apply Colour Re-Activator to wet hair, wait 10 mins, rinse and style.
   â­ After 30 days: Apply the second Miracle Gloss Treatment sachet, wait 2 mins, rinse and style.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Natural Black Kit 2/0**:
   â­ Contains Color Intense Cream, developer, Color Reactivator, and two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment.
   â­ Advanced hair coloring formula.

#Koleston #NaturalBlack #HairColor #HairCare #HealthyHair #PermanentColor #Beauty #SaudiBeauty #SaudiDeals #HairFashion

title_en: Koleston Hair Color Kit Cool Evening Brown 4/15
title_ar: ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ÙƒÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ø¯ 4/15
description_en:
Achieve rich, water-resistant, long-lasting hair color with the **Koleston Hair Color Kit Cool Evening Brown 4/15**. This advanced color cream ensures deep pigment penetration for vibrant, captivating color with perfect grey coverage. Koleston's water-resistant technology enhances hair's radiance and maintains color intensity. The color reactivator helps lock in more color, revitalizing your hair's vibrancy after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Hair Color Kit Cool Evening Brown 4/15**:
â­ Wear gloves.
â­ Mix the color cream and developer thoroughly.
â­ Apply the mixture evenly to dry, unwashed hair, starting from the roots.
â­ Leave the color on for the specified duration according to instructions.
â­ Rinse hair well until the water runs clear.
â­ Use the Advanced Intense Gloss Treatment after rinsing.
â­ After 15 days, apply the Color Reactivator to wet hair for 10 minutes, then rinse.
â­ After 30 days, reapply the Advanced Intense Gloss Treatment.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Hair Color Kit Cool Evening Brown 4/15**:
â­ Color Cream: Contains colorants and ammonia salts for deep color setting.
â­ Developer: Contains hydrogen peroxide to enable the coloring process.
â­ Color Reactivator: Enhances color stability and maintains vibrancy.
â­ Advanced Intense Gloss Treatment: Contains nourishing oils and moisturizing elements for shine and vitality.
#Koleston #HairColor #HairDye #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairGoals #Beauty #HairStyle #SaudiBeauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience unstoppable color intensity for up to 8 weeks with the **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Golden Fall 308/03** cream kit. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments that penetrate to the maximum, this hair color delivers magnetic color that always gets noticed. The kit includes an exclusive 15-day Color Reactivator to boost color intensity and restore vibrancy, along with Intense Gloss Treatment sachets for Day 1 and Day 30 to lock in and protect your hair color. With **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Golden Fall 308/03**, discover more color to love.

â­ 100% Intense Color
â­ Step Deep Moisture
â­ Water Protection Factor for more color intensity
â­ Easy of Application: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply
â­ Extended Care & Protection: 2 stages of conditioning Day 1 and Day 30
â­ Color Reactivator: Restores richness & vibrancy of color after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Golden Fall 308/03**

Preparation:
â­ Squeeze the dye tube liquid into the developer bottle.
â­ Close the bottle and shake it until completely blended.

Application Options:
If you color your hair frequently (1 to 3 months) with similar tone:
â­ Leave hair unwashed and dry.
â­ Apply to roots first.
â­ Wait 30-40 minutes.
â­ Apply dye to the rest of your hair.
â­ Wait for 10 minutes.

Apply all over starting at roots:
â­ Leave hair unwashed and dry.
â­ Apply to roots first and work through all hair to the tips.
â­ Wait 40-50 minutes.

Finish:
â­ Rinse until water runs clear (using shampoo is not recommended).
â­ Apply the 1st sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment for coloring day. Leave on for 2 minutes and rinse again.

After 15 days: Reactivate your color:
â­ Using gloves, apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair.
â­ Wait 10 minutes.
â­ Rinse and style your hair as usual.

After 30 days: Condition your hair:
â­ Apply the 2nd sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment.
â­ Wait 2 minutes.
â­ Rinse and style your hair as usual.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Wear suitable gloves.
â­ Mixing ratio: 1:1.
â­ Hair colorants can cause severe allergic reactions. Conduct an allergy alert test 48 hours before each time you color.
â­ Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Golden Fall 308/03**

â­ May include (refer to enclosed leaflet for full list):
â­ Argan Oil for superior moisture.
â­ Vitamin E for hair protection.
â­ Micro-fine color pigments for color depth and longevity.
â­ Nourishing conditioner for enhanced shine.

description_en:
Discover unparalleled color intensity with **Koleston Maxi**, the hair color that gives you rich, vibrant color lasting up to 8 weeks. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments that penetrate to the core, this formula ensures a captivating color that always turns heads. The kit includes an exclusive 15-day Color Reactivator to maintain color vibrancy, along with an Intense Gloss Treatment for locked-in color and protection. Enjoy healthy, shiny hair with a lively hue with **Koleston Maxi**.

Product Features:
â­ 100% Intense Color
â­ Deep Moisture step for hair hydration.
â­ Water Protection Factor for enhanced color intensity.
â­ Easy to Use: Squeeze â€“ Mix â€“ Apply.
â­ Extended Care & Protection: 2 stages of conditioning on Day 1 and Day 30.
â­ Color Reactivator: Restores richness & vibrancy of color after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Maxi**
**Preparation:**
â­ Squeeze the dye tube into the developer bottle, close, and shake well.

**Application Options:**
â­ **For Frequent Coloring (every 1-3 months):** Apply to roots first, wait 30-40 minutes, then apply to the rest of the hair and wait 10 minutes.
â­ **For Full Coverage:** Start at the roots and work through to the tips, wait 40-50 minutes.

**After Coloring:**
â­ Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo not recommended).
â­ Apply the 1st sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment, leave for 2 minutes, then rinse.

**After 15 Days (Color Reactivation):**
â­ Using gloves, apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair, wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

**After 30 Days (Conditioning):**
â­ Apply the 2nd sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment, wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston Maxi**
â­ Argan Oil for extra moisture and shine.
â­ Keratin Extract for hair strengthening.
â­ Micro-fine pigments that penetrate hair roots for color longevity.
â­ Natural moisturizers to maintain hair softness.
â­ UV protection factor to preserve color vibrancy.

#Koleston #HairColor #HairColoring #HairCare #HealthyHair #ChocolateCream #Wella #SaudiBeauty #HairStyle #ShinyHair

title_en: Koleston Hair Gold Sunset Brown Kit 5/3 - Rich, Water-Resistant Color
title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ³ØªÙˆÙ† ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø´Ù…Ø³ Ø§Ù„Ø£ØµÙŠÙ„ ÙƒÙŠØª 5/3 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙˆÙ…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡
description_en:
Achieve rich, vibrant hair color with **Koleston** Hair Gold Sunset Brown Kit 5/3.

**Koleston**'s Advanced Color Cream ensures color pigments penetrate deep into the hair core for a beautiful, rich hue and perfect grey coverage. Its water-resistant formula enhances shine and resilience, maintaining color intensity. The Color Reactivator deposits more dyes to re-boost your hair's vibrancy after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Koleston** Hair Gold Sunset Brown Kit 5/3:
â­ Get an intense and water-resistent color with the **Koleston** Kit.
â­ Advanced Color Cream penetrates deep into the hair core for rich color.
â­ Water-resistant formula for enhanced shine and color retention.
â­ Color Reactivator re-boosts color by depositing more dyes after 15 days.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Koleston** Hair Gold Sunset Brown Kit 5/3:
â­ COLOR CREAM: AQUA / WATER / EAU, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, AMMONIA, TOLUENE-2,5-DIAMINE SULFATE, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE, AMMONIUM SULFATE, DICETYL PHOSPHATE, RESORCINOL, SODIUM SULFITE, CELETH-10 PHOSPHATE, STEARETH-200, ASCORBIC ACID, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, 2-METHYLRESORCINOL, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE, DISODIUM EDTA, 2-AMINO-6CHLORO-4-NITROPHENOL, LINALOOL, P-AMINOPHENOL, M-AMINOPHENOL, 4-AMINO-2-HYDROXYTOLUENE.
â­ DEVELOPER: AQUA / WATER / EAU, MINERAL OIL / HUILE MINERALE / PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM, HYDROGEN PEROXIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, SODIUM CETEARYL SULFATE, SALICYLIC ACID, DISODIUM PHOSPHATE, PHOSPHORIC ACID, ETIDRONIC ACID.
â­ COLOR REACTIVATOR: AQUA / WATER / EAU, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, HYDROXYCETYL HYDROXYETHYL DIMONIUM CHLORIDE, DIMETHICONE, PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM / MINERAL OIL / HUILE MINERALE, PETROLATUM, PHENOXYETHANOL, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, METHYLPARABEN, PROPYLPARABEN, DISODIUM EDTA, 2-AMINO-6-CHLORO-4-NITROPHENOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, HYDROXYETHYL-2-NITRO-P-TOLUIDINE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, CITRIC ACID, GERANIOL, SODIUM HYDROXIDE.
â­ ADVANCED INTENSE COLOR TREATMENT: AQUA WATER / EAU, BIS-HYDROXY / METHOXY AMODIMETHICONE, STEARYL ALCOHOL, CETYL ALCOHOL, STEARAMIDOPROPYL DIMETHYLAMINE, GLUTAMIC ACID, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CITRIC ACID, BENZYL BENZOATE, EDTA, L-HISTIDINE, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, SODIUM CHLORIDE, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALOOL, MAGNESIUM NITRATE, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, METHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE.

Experience unparalleled accuracy with **Contour Next** test strips. Exclusively designed for use with **Contour Next** meters, these high-performance strips deliver reliable results in just 5 seconds. Benefit from Second-Chance Sampling, allowing you to add more blood to prevent wasting test strips and save money. The No Coding technology simplifies the testing process, eliminating errors due to miscoding. MULTIPULSE accuracy technology analyzes your blood sample multiple times for the most accurate readings.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Contour Next**
â­ For self-testing only.
â­ Do not refrigerate.
â­ Do not use if seals are broken or missing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Contour Next**
â­ High-performance test strips for accurate results.
â­ Requires a tiny blood sample (0.6 ÂµL).
â­ Each pack contains 50 test strips.

description_en:
The **Contour Next SmartLight** Blood Glucose Monitor combines advanced Japanese technology with unparalleled accuracy for your diabetes management. Experience true simplicity and get reliable results in just 5 seconds. Featuring MULTI PULSE technology that evaluates the sample multiple times for precise readings, and the "Second-ChanceÂ® Sampling" feature to help prevent wasted test strips and save you money. The SmartLIGHTÂ® feature illuminates the display and test strip port, ensuring clear visibility in any lighting condition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Contour Next SmartLight**:
â­ Wash your hands with warm water and mild soap, then dry them thoroughly.
â­ Insert a sterile test strip into the monitor's test strip port.
â­ Gently apply the test strip to a blood droplet from your fingertip.
â­ The monitor will begin a 5-second countdown and display your result.
â­ The device automatically turns off after 90 seconds of inactivity or 15 seconds after removing the test strip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Contour Next SmartLight**:
â­ 1 x Blood Glucose Monitor.
â­ 100 x **Contour Next** Test Strips.
â­ 10 x Sterile Lancets.
â­ 1 x Lancing Device.
â­ 1 x User Manual.
â­ 1 x Carrying Case.

description_en:
Experience true simplicity and ease of use with the **Contour TS Strips 2*50 + Blood Glucose Monitor**, designed to make monitoring your blood glucose levels effortless.

The **Contour TS Strips 2*50 + Blood Glucose Monitor** provides accurate and reliable results with minimal complexity. Featuring No CodingÂ® technology, there's no need for manual code entry, reducing miscoding errors.

âœ… **Product Features:**
â­ Easy-to-read display with clear on-screen messages.
â­ 5-second test countdown.
â­ Easy-to-see test strip port.
â­ Simple two-button navigation.
â­ Second-Chanceâ„¢ Sampling to avoid the need for a second prick.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Contour TS Strips 2*50 + Blood Glucose Monitor**:
â­ Wash and dry your hands thoroughly.
â­ Insert the grey end of the test strip into the meter.
â­ Lightly touch the test strip with a blood drop and wait for the beep.
â­ Get your reading after a 5-second countdown.
â­ The meter turns off automatically when the strip is removed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Contour TS Strips 2*50 + Blood Glucose Monitor**:
â­ Contour TS Blood Glucose Monitor.
â­ 100 Contour TS Test Strips.
â­ 10 Additional Test Strips (from original pack).
â­ Lancing Device.
â­ 10 Lancets.
â­ Quick Start Guide.

title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC10 - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØºÙ†ÙŠ ÙˆØ«Ø¨Ø§Øª ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ…
description_en:
Add a stunning finishing touch to your nails with **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC10**. This highly pigmented formula offers rich, eye-catching color and complete coverage even with a single coat. Enjoy a shiny look and long-lasting, vibrant colors on your nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC10**:
â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails and over the base coat.
â­ Allow to dry completely.
â­ Apply a second coat, wait 2 minutes, and then apply a top coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Polish FC10**:
â­ Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Titanium Dioxide [Nano], Benzophenone-1, Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate, Polyvinyl Butyral, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Benzophenone-3.
â­ +/-(May Contain): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 47005 (Yellow 10 Lake), Ci 77266 [Nano] (Black 2), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15880 (Red 34 Lake), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 60725 (Violet 2). [34000014.00]

description_en:
Discover clarity and insight with the **Contour Next Smart Light** Blood Glucose Monitor. Featuring innovative smartLIGHTÂ® technology, it provides instant visual cues for your blood glucose levels using familiar colors (amber, green, red), making results easier to understand and track with exceptional accuracy. The **Contour Next Smart Light** is designed to simplify your diabetes management.

â­ Features the smartLIGHTÂ® for instant visual feedback on blood glucose readings.
â­ High accuracy that exceeds ISO 2013 international standards.
â­ Second-ChanceÂ® Sampling technology helps save test strips.
â­ Free CONTOURÂ®DIABETES app aids in diabetes management and improved glycemic control.
â­ Easy to use with a clear display and large numbers.
â­ No initial set-up required.
â­ Test strip port illumination for ease of use anytime.
â­ Automatic synchronization with the app via Bluetooth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Contour Next Smart Light**
â­ Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water and ensure they are dry.
â­ Insert a sterile test strip into the device.
â­ Prick the side of your finger with a sterile lancet.
â­ Touch the tip of the test strip to the blood drop for automatic drawing.
â­ Wait for the 5-second countdown for the result.
â­ Read the clear result displayed on the screen.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Contour Next Smart Light**
â­ **Contour Next Smart Light** Blood Glucose Monitor.
â­ 5 Test Strips.
â­ 5 Lancets.
â­ Lancing Device.
â­ Quick Start Guide.
â­ Stylish Carrying Case.
