description_en:
The **Contour Care** Blood Glucose Monitor is a glucose monitoring system specifically designed to help you manage diabetes with confidence and ease.

Product Features:
â­ Accurate, affordable, and simply reliable test results.
â­ smartCOLOURâ„¢ technology for easier understanding of blood glucose levels.
â­ Save test strips with Second-ChanceÂ® Sampling technology.
â­ Connects to the free CONTOURÂ®DIABETES app for improved diabetes management.
â­ Easy to use and ready to test straight out of the box.
â­ Stores the most recent 800 test results and provides 7, 14, 30, and 90-day averages.
â­ Works with **Contour Care** test strips and uses a small sample size (0.6 ÂµL) with easy Sip-In SamplingÂ®.
â­ The colored target range indicator can significantly reduce HbA1c and improve patient confidence.
â­ A 30-second countdown screen allows for applying more blood to the same strip if the first sample is insufficient.
â­ The free CONTOURÂ®DIABETES app adds insight and meaning to results, syncing automatically with the meter.
â­ My Patterns in the app helps identify trends and provides notifications of potential causes for glucose results.
â­ Easy sharing of blood sugar readings reports with your healthcare professional.
â­ Accurate test results are important for therapy decisions and correct insulin dose calculation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Contour Care**:
â­ Ensure your hands are clean and dry before starting.
â­ Insert a test strip into the meter.
â­ Use the lancing device to obtain a blood drop.
â­ Apply the blood drop to the designated area on the test strip.
â­ Wait for the result to appear.
â­ Dispose of used test strips safely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Contour Care**:
â­ Blood Glucose Meter.
â­ **Contour Care** Test Strips.
â­ Lancing Device.
â­ Lancets (available separately or with the kit).
â­ Batteries.
â­ Carrying Case.

description_en:
The **Contour TS** Blood Glucose Monitor, enjoy True Simplicity and ease of use to control your blood glucose levels. The **Contour TS** meter uses Contour Â®TS test strips to deliver a truly simple result. Ready to use straight out of the box, with a few easy steps.

Product Features:
â­ Easy-to-read display with clear on-screen messages.
â­ 5-second test countdown.
â­ Easy-to-see test strip port.
â­ Simple two-button navigation.
â­ No CodingÂ® technology eliminates miscoding errors.
â­ Second-Chanceâ„¢ Sampling helps avoid lancing a second time.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Contour TS**:
â­ Wash and thoroughly dry your hands.
â­ Insert the test strip into the meter's port; a droplet symbol will appear.
â­ Use a sterile lancet to puncture the side of your finger.
â­ Lightly touch the test strip to the blood droplet and hold until the meter beeps.
â­ Results are displayed after a 5-second countdown.
â­ The meter turns off automatically when the test strip is removed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Contour TS**:
â­ 1 x Blood Glucose Monitor.
â­ 10 x Contour TS Test Strips.
â­ 10 x Microlet Lancets.
â­ 1 x Lancing Device.
â­ 1 x Quick Start Guide.
â­ 1 x Carrying case.

description_en:
Introducing the **Contour Care Test Strips 50 Pcs**, your ultimate solution for accurate and easy blood sugar management. These high-performance test strips feature innovative technologies ensuring reliable results every time. Exclusively designed for use with **Contour Care** meters, they incorporate Second-Chance Sampling, allowing you to add more blood within seconds if the first sample is insufficient, saving you money and reducing strip wastage. The No Coding technology eliminates an extra step in the testing process, preventing errors from user miscoding and making measurements faster and more convenient.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Contour Care Test Strips 50 Pcs**:
â­ Use these test strips exclusively with **Contour Care** meters.
â­ Requires a tiny 0.6 ÂµL blood sample.
â­ Features Second-Chance Sampling to help prevent wasting test strips and save money.
â­ No Coding technology eliminates an extra step and reduces the likelihood of errors.
â­ Provides results with a 5-second countdown.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For self-testing only.
â­ Do not refrigerate the test strips.
â­ Do not use if seals are broken or missing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Contour Care Test Strips 50 Pcs**:
â­ High-performance test strips.
â­ Second-Chance Sampling technology.
â­ No Coding technology.

description_en:
The **Contour Next One** blood glucose monitor is your ideal partner for smart and accurate diabetes management. This innovative device seamlessly integrates superior measurement technology with user-friendly operation via a smartphone app, providing you with comprehensive insights into your blood glucose levels. Thanks to its seamless Bluetooth connectivity, you can automatically sync your results, track them over time, and understand the impact of your daily activities on your sugar readings.

Product Features:
â­ Seamless wireless connection to the app via Bluetooth technology.
â­ Smart Light indicator provides instant feedback on glucose status.
â­ Second-Chanceâ„¢ sampling technology minimizes test strip wastage.
â­ No coding required, reducing user errors and simplifying testing.
â­ Proven accurate results give you confidence in your readings.
â­ Easily share reports with your doctor.
â­ Test Reminder Plans help identify optimal testing times.
â­ Smart alerts for critical (high or low) glucose levels.
â­ My Patterns feature to analyze trends and patterns in your readings.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Contour Next One**:
â­ Wash and thoroughly dry your hands.
â­ Insert a sterile test strip into the meter.
â­ Use a lancet to collect a blood drop.
â­ Apply the blood drop to the test strip.
â­ Wait for a 5-second countdown to display the result.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Contour Next One**:
â­ Blood Glucose Monitor.
â­ 10 Test Strips.
â­ 10 Lancets.
â­ Lancing Device.
â­ User Manual.
â­ Carrying Case.

description_en:
Measure your blood glucose levels with precision and ease using the **Contour Next Smart Light** meter. This device combines advanced Japanese technology with a user-friendly design, delivering reliable results in just 5 seconds. Featuring MULTI PULSE technology, each sample is evaluated multiple times to ensure superior accuracy, minimizing the need for re-testing and saving test strips.

â­ MULTI PULSE technology evaluates the sample seven times for accurate results.
â­ Second-Chance Sampling allows for applying more blood to help prevent test strip waste.
â­ Clear on-screen messages in multiple languages for a seamless user experience.
â­ No coding technology eliminates errors from incorrect user coding.
â­ Illuminated display and test strip port for improved readability in low light conditions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Contour Next Smart Light**:
â­ Wash your hands with warm water and mild soap, ensuring they are thoroughly dry before use.
â­ Insert a sterile test strip into the meter's test strip port; a droplet symbol will appear.
â­ Use a sterile lancet to puncture the side of your finger and obtain a small blood droplet.
â­ Gently touch the test strip to the blood droplet until the required amount is drawn.
â­ The meter will begin a 5-second countdown to display the reading.
â­ The meter automatically turns off 15 seconds after the test strip is removed or 90 seconds after a test is performed to conserve battery power.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Contour Next Smart Light**:
â­ 1 x **Contour Next Smart Light** Blood Glucose Meter
â­ 50 x **Contour Next** Test Strips
â­ 10 x Bayer Microlet Lancets
â­ 1 x Lancing Device
â­ 1 x User Manual
â­ 1 x Durable Carrying Case

description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness with **Carefree Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent 64 Pcs**. Designed to provide you with superior protection and unparalleled comfort throughout the day, with effective odor control for up to 12 hours. These premium, large daily pads absorb fluids with high efficiency, giving you a feeling of confidence and continuous freshness. Their unique formula contains cotton extract to ensure superior softness on your skin, while their innovative design offers a perfect fit that moves with your body and stays in place. The soft, dermatologically tested top layer allows air to circulate, providing you with a feeling of comfort and breathability. Enjoy added protection with an adhesive strip that keeps your underwear protected. **Carefree Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent 64 Pcs** are characterized by their larger size, being longer and wider than regular daily liners, making them the ideal choice for high-waisted underwear and bikinis. Get uninterrupted protection and freshness with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carefree Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent 64 Pcs**:
â­ Remove the protective backing strip.
â­ Place the panty liner in the center of your underwear.
â­ Change as needed to ensure maximum freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carefree Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent 64 Pcs**:
â­ Soft top layer with cotton extract.
â­ High absorbency core.
â­ Adhesive backing.
â­ Breathable materials for skin comfort.

#Carefree #PantyLiners #WomensCare #Freshness #WomensHealth #PersonalHygiene #SaudiArabia #SelfCare #SanitaryPads #Beauty

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and comfort with **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Unscented 76pcs**. These daily liners feature a breathable, dermatologically-tested cover and a soft feel from cotton extract, ensuring unparalleled comfort for your sensitive skin. Their innovative design provides a secure, stay-in-place fit that adapts to your body's movements, giving you confidence and protection all day long.

Product Features:
â­ Soft cotton extract for a gentle, comfortable feel against the skin.
â­ Breathable and dermatologically-tested, ideal for sensitive skin.
â­ Secure, stay-in-place fit that adapts to your bodyâ€™s movements.
â­ Keeps you feeling fresh and clean throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Unscented 76pcs**:
â­ Peel off the protective backing and place the liner on the fabric of your underwear.
â­ Press gently to ensure it stays securely in place.
â­ Replace as needed to maintain freshness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Unscented 76pcs**:
â­ Natural Cotton Extract.
â­ Breathable, high-quality materials.
â­ Soft outer cover gentle on the skin.

description_en:
Ideal for daily panty protection, **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Aloe** have you covered for ultimate freshness!

Keep that just-showered feeling alive all day long with lightly scented **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Aloe**. These breathable panty liners contain natural aloe vera and allow your most delicate skin to breathe. Dermatologically-tested, they offer a comfortable, soft cover and a secure stay-in-place fit, adapting with your body movement thanks to the perfect fit design.

While pads are suited for that time of the month, **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Aloe** are your solution to feeling clean and fresh down there, every other day of the month, giving you confidence and comfort.

â­ Provides everyday freshness on the days when you donâ€™t have your period.
â­ Features a Comfortable Soft Touch Cover for an extra soft feel.
â­ Stays in place with a Secure Fit Design that adapts with your body movement.
â­ Dermatologically-tested cover for ultimate comfort.
â­ Breathable material allows your skin to breathe freely.
â­ Lightly scented for a continuous feeling of freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Aloe**:
â­ Start with clean, dry hands. Remove the liner from the wrapper.
â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
â­ Wash your hands.
â­ For the freshest feel, change your liner whenever you need it during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Aloe**:
â­ Breathable materials.
â­ Natural aloe vera extract.
â­ Soft and comfortable top layer.
â­ Secure adhesive.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness and protection with **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent** 48 pieces.

Ideal for pre- and post-period days, as tampon backup, and especially for daily panty protection, **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent** has you covered every day!

With a super-absorbent core and a light scent, **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent** gives you long-lasting protection, confidence, and freshness. Their soft-touch surface allows your most delicate skin to breathe, providing a soft, comfortable feeling all day long.

**CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent** are dermatologically-tested, featuring a comfortable, soft cover and a secure stay-in-place design that adapts to your body movement. They are longer and wider than regular liners for better coverage and excellent odor control.

Feel clean and fresh every day with CAREFREE!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent**:
â­ Start with clean, dry hands.
â­ Remove the liner from the wrapper.
â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
â­ Wash your hands again.
â­ For the freshest feel, change your liner whenever you need it during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Light Scent**:
â­ Dermatologically-tested cover.
â­ Breathable material.
â­ Super absorbent core helps to lock in liquids for extra protection.
â­ Odor control.

description_en:
**CAREFREE** Panty Liners Cotton Fresh Scent 76pcs offer unparalleled freshness and superior protection throughout your day. Featuring a breathable, dermatologically-tested cover, a soft cotton-extract feel, and a secure stay-in-place fit, these panty liners provide the comfort you deserve. Ideal for daily use and your special days, they ensure a continuous feeling of cleanliness and freshness. 

**Product Features:**
â­ Ultra-thin and breathable design with a soft cotton-extract feel for all-day freshness and comfort.
â­ Secure stay-in-place fit and flexible design that adapts to body movement.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE** Panty Liners:
â­ Peel off the protective backing and place the liner on the fabric of your clothing.
â­ Press gently to ensure it stays securely in place.
â­ Replace as needed to maintain freshness and comfort throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE** Panty Liners:
â­ Breathable materials for optimal air circulation.
â­ Soft top layer with a cotton-extract feel.
â­ Secure adhesive to keep it in place.

Indulge in the ultimate pampering experience with **CAREFREE Intimate Wash Vit E & Cotton 200ml**. This dual-action wash is specially formulated to cleanse and refresh your intimate area, providing a lasting feeling of freshness throughout the day. Its mild, soap-free formula, enriched with Vitamin E and naturally-derived Cotton Extract, helps maintain your skin's natural intimate pH balance, making it ideal for daily use. Experience the difference and enjoy superior care with **CAREFREE Intimate Wash Vit E & Cotton 200ml**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Intimate Wash Vit E & Cotton 200ml**:
â­ Gently rinse the intimate area with water.
â­ Recommended for daily use for optimal results.
â­ Enjoy a continuous feeling of freshness and care.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Intimate Wash Vit E & Cotton 200ml**:
â­ Vitamin E for skin hydration and protection.
â­ Natural Cotton Extract for added soothing and freshness.
â­ Soap-free and gentle formula.
â­ Helps maintain the natural intimate pH balance.

description_en:
Indulge your intimate area with the superior care it deserves with **CAREFREE** Intimate Wash. Experience long-lasting freshness and a feeling of cleanliness with this innovative formula, specially designed to maintain the natural pH balance of your delicate skin. This wash combines the revitalizing power of green tea with the soothing properties of aloe vera for a unique care experience. Its light, soap-free formulation makes it ideal for daily use, providing you with comfort and confidence that lasts all day.

â­ Provides long-lasting freshness.
â­ Helps maintain the natural pH balance of the intimate area.
â­ Enriched with Green Tea and Aloe Vera for ultimate soothing and hydration.
â­ Soap-free and gentle on the skin.
â­ Dermatologically and gynaecologically tested.
â­ Helps prevent irritation and sensitivity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE** Intimate Wash:
â­ Rinse the intimate area with water, then apply a suitable amount of **CAREFREE** wash.
â­ Gently lather and rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Suitable for daily use for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE** Intimate Wash:
â­ Green Tea: An antioxidant known for its refreshing properties.
â­ Aloe Vera: Renowned for its soothing and moisturizing benefits.
â­ Other gentle ingredients to maintain natural balance.

description_en:
Discover the secret to ultimate intimate care and hygiene with **CAREFREE Intimate Mousse Green Tea & Aloe Vera 150ml**. This dual-action mousse offers superior freshness and hydration with its light, soft texture. Enriched with naturally-derived Green Tea and Aloe Vera extracts, it gently cleanses and softens your delicate intimate area, while helping to maintain its optimal pH balance. Enjoy daily care that provides long-lasting comfort and cleanliness.

â­ Smooth feel and freshness for up to 24 hours.
â­ Light, soap-free formula.
â­ Helps maintain the natural intimate pH balance.
â­ Dermatologically and gynaecologically tested.
â­ Provides a feeling of comfort and confidence all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Intimate Mousse Green Tea & Aloe Vera 150ml**
â­ Use daily as part of your personal care routine.
â­ Apply a small amount to the intimate area and rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Intimate Mousse Green Tea & Aloe Vera 150ml**
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Chloride.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Aspalathus Linearis Leaf/Stalk Extract.
â­ Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (Green Tea).
â­ Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Sulfite.
â­ Sodium Benzoate, Parfum.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and confidence with **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Fresh Scent**. These large panty liners are designed with a super-absorbent core that effectively locks in moisture and controls odor, keeping you feeling clean and fresh all day long. The soft-touch surface and the secure, stay-in-place fit ensure gentle comfort against your skin and adapt to your body's movements without shifting. Dermatologically tested for your delicate skin, **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Fresh Scent** are longer and wider than regular panty liners for enhanced coverage and protection. Enjoy a feeling of freshness and softness every day with **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Fresh Scent**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Fresh Scent**:
â­ Start with clean, dry hands.
â­ Remove the liner from the wrapper.
â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
â­ Wash your hands again.
â­ For the freshest feel, change your liner whenever you need it during the day.
â­ Dispose of the used liner by rolling it up in the wrapper from your fresh liner and throw it in the trash (never flush it).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Fresh Scent**:
â­ Dermatologically-tested soft cover.
â­ Super absorbent core to lock in liquids for extra protection.
â­ Breathable materials for added comfort.
â­ Odor control technology.
â­ Longer and wider design for more coverage.
â­ Secure stay-in-place and perfect fit design that adapts to your body's movement.

description_en:
Ideal for pre-and post-period, as tampons backup, and especially for daily panty protection, **CAREFREEÂ® Panty Liners Plus Large Aloe** have you covered! With a super-absorbent core, **CAREFREEÂ® Panty Liners Plus Large Aloe** gives you long-lasting protection, confidence, and freshness. These contain natural Aloe Vera known for its soothing properties, providing a feeling of freshness while taking care of sensitive skin.

â­ Superior freshness with soothing Aloe Vera.
â­ Super-absorbent core locks in liquids for extra protection.
â­ Soft, comfortable, dermatologically-tested top layer.
â­ Stay-in-place secure design that adapts to your body movement.
â­ Longer and wider than regular liners for enhanced coverage.
â­ Odor control for lasting confidence.
â­ Breathable material for added comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREEÂ® Panty Liners Plus Large Aloe**:
Start with clean, dry hands. Remove the liner from the wrapper.
Place the liner, sticky side down, to cover the center panel of your underpants.
Wash your hands again.
For the freshest feel, change your liner whenever you need it during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREEÂ® Panty Liners Plus Large Aloe**:
â­ Super Absorbent Polymer Core.
â­ Soft, Breathable Top Layer.
â­ Natural Aloe Vera Extract.
â­ Skin-Friendly Adhesive.
â­ Protective Backsheet.

#Carefree #PantyLiners #AloeVera #FeminineCare #PersonalCare #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #NewMom #Beauty

description_en:
Discover superior comfort and reliable protection with **Carefree Organic Cotton Topsheet Long**. Specifically designed for daily use, it offers a feeling of freshness and dryness throughout your day, even on days when your period isn't present. These panty liners feature a 100% organic cotton topsheet and a super absorbent core to ensure maximum comfort for your sensitive skin.

Additional Features of **Carefree Organic Cotton Topsheet Long**:
â­ Provides a naturally gentle and dry feeling.
â­ Helps prevent odor from daily intimate fluids like discharge, menses spots, and light urine drops.
â­ Trusted quality, free from dyes, perfumes, and elemental chlorine bleaching.
â­ Hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested, making it suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Leak Locker Technology to trap fluids and prevent overflow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carefree Organic Cotton Topsheet Long**:
â­ Start with clean, dry hands.
â­ Remove the liner from the wrapper.
â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
â­ Wash your hands for the freshest feel.
â­ Change your liner whenever you need it during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carefree Organic Cotton Topsheet Long**:
â­ 100% Certified Organic Cotton.
â­ Elemental Chlorine-Free Natural Wood Pulp Core with Super Absorbent Polymers.
â­ Waterproof Backing Polyethylene, Polypropylene.

#PantyLiners #Carefree #OrganicCotton #FeminineCare #DailyFreshness #SensitiveSkin #MadeInSaudi #WomensHealth #DailyComfort #PersonalCare

description_en:
Experience instant freshness and confidence throughout your day with **CAREFREE Intimate Wipes Green Tea & Aloe Vera 20pcs**. These specially formulated wipes are designed to provide you with a feeling of instant cleanliness and refreshment, anytime and anywhere.

**CAREFREE Intimate Wipes Green Tea & Aloe Vera 20pcs** feature a dual-effect formula enriched with Green Tea and Aloe Vera extracts, which is gentle on your skin and helps maintain the natural pH balance of your intimate area. They are soap-free and have been dermatologically and gynaecologically tested, making them suitable for daily use.

â­ Instant freshness and quick clean.
â­ Mild and soap-free formula.
â­ Helps maintain natural intimate pH level.
â­ Enriched with Green Tea, Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, and Cotton Extract.
â­ Dermatologically & Gynaecologically tested.
â­ Hypoallergenic.
â­ Convenient pack containing 20 wipes for repeated use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Intimate Wipes Green Tea & Aloe Vera 20pcs**:
â­ Keep the wipes in your bag for daily use at work, the gym, or when you're out.
â­ Use them to maintain your freshness and confidence anytime, anywhere.
â­ Close the pack tightly after use to keep the wipes moist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Intimate Wipes Green Tea & Aloe Vera 20pcs**:

description_en:
Experience unparalleled comfort with **Carefree Organic Cotton Panty Liners**. Crafted with 100% organic cotton and a super absorbent core, these panty liners keep you dry and fresh all day long. They feature Leak Locker Technology to trap fluids and prevent leaks, offering 100% reliable protection. Perfect for days you need extra care without your period.

â­ Trusted quality with a topsheet made from 100% organic cotton.
â­ 0% dyes, perfume, or elemental chlorine bleaching.
â­ Hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested, suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Provides everyday freshness and reliable protection.
â­ Certified by Oekotex and Cotton.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carefree Organic Cotton Panty Liners**
â­ Start with clean, dry hands. Remove the liner from the wrapper.
â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
â­ Wash your hands for the freshest feel, and change your liner whenever you need it during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carefree Organic Cotton Panty Liners**
â­ 100% Certified Organic Cotton.
â­ Elemental Chlorine-Free Natural Wood Pulp Core with Super Absorbent Polymers.
â­ Waterproof Backing made from Polyethylene and Polypropylene.

#PantyLiners #FeminineCare #OrganicCotton #DailyComfort #SensitiveSkin #Freshness #Carefree #SaudiArabia #PersonalHygiene #SanitaryProtection

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and comfort all day long with **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Unscented**. These liners are designed with a soft cotton feel, allowing your delicate skin to breathe for superior softness and comfort. Dermatologically tested, they feature a comfortable, soft cover that stays in place for a secure fit. They are the perfect solution for feeling clean and fresh every day, outside of your period.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Unscented**:
â­ Start with clean, dry hands.
â­ Remove the liner from the wrapper.
â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
â­ Wash your hands again.
â­ Change your liner whenever you need it during the day for a continuously fresh feeling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Panty Liners Cotton Unscented**:
â­ Cotton extract for a super soft feel.
â­ Breathable material for continuous comfort.
â­ Dermatologically-tested cover to minimize irritation.
â­ Perfect Fit Design that adapts with your body movement.
â­ Stay-in-place fit for ultimate security.

description_en:
Experience lasting daily freshness with **CAREFREE** Cotton Feel Aloe Panty Liners. Designed for ultimate comfort and protection for your delicate skin, these breathable panty liners keep you feeling fresh all day long. Featuring a silky-soft, dermatologically-tested cover and a stay-in-place fit, they adapt to your body's movements for confidence in every step.

**CAREFREE** Cotton Feel Aloe Panty Liners are your perfect companion for feeling clean and fresh every day, outside of your period.

â­ Provides everyday freshness on the days you don't have your period.
â­ Ultra-soft cotton feel for unparalleled comfort.
â­ Secure stay-in-place design.
â­ Perfect fit adapts to your body movement.
â­ Dermatologically-tested cover for gentle skin contact.
â­ Breathable material allows your skin to breathe.
â­ Lightly scented for a refreshing sensation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE** Cotton Feel Aloe Panty Liners:
    â­ Start with clean, dry hands.
    â­ Remove the liner from the wrapper.
    â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
    â­ Wash your hands.
    â­ For the freshest feel, change your liner whenever you need it during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE** Cotton Feel Aloe Panty Liners:
    â­ Natural Aloe Vera extract for soothing and hydrating the skin.
    â­ Silky-soft top layer.
    â­ High-absorbency materials.
    â­ Breathable outer layer.
    â­ Gentle adhesive for underwear.

#Carefree #PantyLiners #AloeVera #DailyFreshness #FeminineHygiene #CottonFeel #SaudiArabia #WomensHealth #PersonalCare #FeminineProducts

Experience unparalleled freshness and comfort with **CAREFREE Cotton Feel Panty Liners Unscented**! These liners are designed to provide your delicate skin with maximum care thanks to natural cotton extract, giving you a super soft feel while allowing your skin to breathe. **CAREFREE Cotton Feel Panty Liners Unscented** stay securely in place, no matter your movement, to give you a feeling of cleanliness and confidence all day long. Perfect for days outside your period to feel continuously fresh.

â­ Provides everyday freshness on the days when you donâ€™t have your period.
â­ Contains cotton extract for a super soft and comfortable panty liner feel.
â­ Secure stay-in-place design adapts with your body movement.
â­ Dermatologically-tested soft cover.
â­ Breathable material to keep skin dry.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Cotton Feel Panty Liners Unscented**:
â­ Start with clean, dry hands.
â­ Remove the liner from the wrapper.
â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
â­ Wash your hands again.
â­ For the freshest feel, change your liner whenever you need it during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Cotton Feel Panty Liners Unscented**:
â­ Natural cotton extract.
â­ Breathable materials.

description_en:
Experience all-day freshness and confidence with **CAREFREE** Large Panty Liners in Light Scent. Perfectly designed for pre- and post-period days, as tampon backup, and for daily panty protection, **CAREFREE** offers extra comfort and security. Featuring a super-absorbent core and a soft-touch top layer that allows your skin to breathe, these liners provide exceptional softness and comfort. Dermatologically tested and designed to stay in place, **CAREFREE** ensures you feel clean and fresh every day.

**Key Features:**
â­ Protective film safeguards your favorite panties.
â­ Super absorbent core locks in liquids for extra protection.
â­ Controls odors for long-lasting freshness.
â­ Longer and wider than regular liners for enhanced coverage.
â­ Perfect Fit Design adapts to your body's movement.
â­ Dermatologically-tested soft cover for gentle skin contact.
â­ Breathable material keeps you feeling fresh.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE**:
â­ Start with clean, dry hands.
â­ Remove the liner from the wrapper.
â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
â­ Wash your hands again.
â­ For the freshest feel, change your liner whenever you need it during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE**:
â­ Soft, breathable top layer materials.
â­ Super absorbent core.
â­ Secure adhesive.

#Carefree #PantyLiners #FeminineCare #WomensHealth #DailyFreshness #PersonalHygiene #FeminineProducts #SaudiArabia #SkinCare #AllDayComfort

description_en:
Experience all-day freshness and cleanliness with **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Fresh Scent**. These liners are designed to offer superior protection with their super-absorbent core that effectively locks in moisture and provides excellent odor control. The soft-touch, dermatologically-tested top layer allows your delicate skin to breathe, providing you with exceptional comfort and softness. Thanks to their longer and wider design, **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Fresh Scent** stay securely in place no matter how much you move, giving you confidence all day long. They are the perfect solution for feeling fresh between periods or as an extra layer of protection, ensuring your daily hygiene and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Fresh Scent**
â­ Start with clean, dry hands.
â­ Remove the liner from the wrapper.
â­ Place the liner sticky side down to cover the center panel of your underpants.
â­ Wash your hands again.
â­ For the freshest feel, change your liner whenever you need it during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **CAREFREE Panty Liners Plus Large Fresh Scent**
â­ Protective film safeguards your favorite panties.
â­ Super absorbent core helps to lock in liquids for extra protection.
â­ Odor control ingredients.
â­ Breathable material.
â­ Soft-touch, dermatologically-tested cover.

description_en:
Experience ultimate cleansing with the **KillyS Silicone Facial Cleansing Brush** in Pink, designed for unparalleled comfort and deep skin purification. Its ultra-soft silicone bristles reach deep into pores, gently removing impurities, makeup residue, and dead skin cells. This brush features a specialized head for cleaning around the nose and offers complete pressure control, making it suitable for all skin types. Pamper your skin with a refreshing massage experience with the **KillyS Silicone Facial Cleansing Brush**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Silicone Facial Cleansing Brush**:
â­ Moisten the brush with water.
â­ Apply your favorite cleansing gel to your face or directly onto the brush.
â­ Gently massage your facial skin in circular motions.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water.
â­ Store the brush in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Silicone Facial Cleansing Brush**:
â­ High-Quality Silicone
â­ Durable Polystyrene

The **KillyS** Set Of 5 Makeup Brushes is meticulously designed for precise eyeshadow application, enabling you to create versatile and flawless eye makeup looks. Achieve professional-quality results with ease using these essential tools.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS**:
â­ Flat Shader Brush: For even application of base eyeshadow colors across the eyelid.
â­ Blending Brush: To seamlessly blend eyeshadow shades, eliminating harsh lines.
â­ Angled Brush: To define the crease or apply shadow along the lash line for a smoky effect.
â­ Detail Brush: For applying accent colors to inner corners or beneath the lower lash line.

description_en:
SCENTED HAIRBRUSH, LAVENDER Enhance your daily ritual with our innovative scented hairbrush from KillyS.

The flexible head and pins skillfully brush both wet and dry hair, ensuring a gentle and pull-free experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Hairbrush With Lavender Scent**

â­ Versatile for use on both dry and wet hair, our hairbrush simplifies your grooming routine.
â­ To tackle tangles, begin brushing from the ends, working your way up to the roots for smooth, manageable hair.
â­ Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo, gently removing any hair or product buildup.
â­ Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
â­ Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place to maintain its quality.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Hairbrush With Lavender Scent**

â­ Thermoplastic elastomer

Experience ultimate precision with **KillyS Tweezers Slant Gold Plated 590**. Designed for both professional and home use, these stainless steel tweezers offer a super-precise tip to capture even the shortest hairs, ensuring flawless hair removal and perfect eyebrow shaping.

description_en:
**KillyS Refreshing Blueberry Scented Hairbrush** Elevate your daily routine with the innovative scented hairbrush from **KillyS**. The flexible head and pins skilfully brush both wet and dry hair, ensuring a gentle, pull-free experience for smooth, healthy hair. Perfect for detangling and leaving your hair with a refreshing blueberry scent. Discover the difference with the **KillyS Refreshing Blueberry Scented Hairbrush**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Refreshing Blueberry Scented Hairbrush**

â­ Versatile Use: Suitable for both dry and wet hair, simplifying your grooming routine.
â­ Detangling Tip: Begin brushing from the ends, working your way up to the roots for smooth, manageable hair.
â­ Regular Cleaning: Clean the brush with warm water and mild shampoo, gently removing any hair or product buildup.
â­ Air Dry: Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
â­ Optimal Storage: Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place away from sunlight to maintain its quality.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Refreshing Blueberry Scented Hairbrush**

â­ Thermoplastic elastomer

description_en:
Achieve a flawless, professional look with the **Killys Set Of 3 Makeup Brushes**, meticulously designed to cover all your makeup needs, from daily wear to special occasions. This compact set features three versatile brushes, perfect for beginners starting their makeup journey or professionals seeking high-quality tools.

â­ Powder Brush: For applying loose or pressed powder to evenly set your makeup.
â­ Blush Brush: To add a natural flush of color to the apples of your cheeks with seamless blending.
â­ Eyeshadow Brush: For precise application and blending of eyeshadows to create stunning eye looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Set Of 3 Makeup Brushes**:
â­ Powder Brush: Pick up an appropriate amount of powder and sweep it evenly across the face to set your foundation.
â­ Blush Brush: Apply color to the apples of the cheeks and blend gently towards the temples for a natural finish.
â­ Eyeshadow Brush: Use to apply base eyeshadow color to the lid, then use the tip for blending and diffusing color.

Warnings and Precautions:
â­ Clean brushes regularly with a dedicated brush cleanser or mild shampoo to prevent product buildup and potential bacteria.
â­ Air dry brushes naturally in an upright position away from moisture.
â­ Store away from direct sunlight to maintain the quality of the bristles and handles.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Set Of 3 Makeup Brushes**:
â­ Soft, high-quality synthetic bristles for a smooth, flawless makeup application.
â­ Durable and ergonomic handles designed for easy and precise grip.

The brush features a flexible head and pins that skillfully detangle both wet and dry hair, ensuring a gentle, pull-free experience. Enjoy smoother, more manageable hair with every stroke.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Strawberry Scented Hairbrush**:
â­ Versatile for use on both dry and wet hair.
â­ To tackle tangles, begin brushing from the ends, working your way up to the roots for smooth, manageable hair.
â­ Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo, gently removing any hair or product buildup.
â­ Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
â­ Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Strawberry Scented Hairbrush**:
â­ Thermoplastic elastomer.

description_en:
Discover feminine beauty with the **KillyS Pastelove Green Tea Blush & Bronzer Brush 02**. This premium brush is enriched with green tea extract, renowned for its soothing and antibacterial properties, offering you a unique makeup experience.

The angled bristles are specifically designed for precise application of blush and bronzer products, whether liquid or powder. These bristles help to sculpt your cheekbones professionally, giving your face a defined and attractive contoured look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Pastelove Green Tea Blush & Bronzer Brush 02**:
â­ To contour your face, apply product just under the cheekbones.
â­ Smudge the product into the area with the brush pointing in one direction only (starting at the top of the jawbone).
â­ Make sure the edges are well blended for a natural finish.
â­ Apply blush at the cheekbone line for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Pastelove Green Tea Blush & Bronzer Brush 02**:
â­ Aluminum
â­ Wood
â­ Nylon
â­ Green tea extract

#KillyS #MakeupBrush #Blush #Bronzer #GreenTea #Pastelove #SaudiMakeup #ContourBrush #FaceContouring #BeautyTools

title_en: KillyS Nail Clipper Floralove Collection Pink: Precision & Elegance
title_ar: Ù‚ØµØ§ÙØ© Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„ÙˆÙ ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ: Ø¯Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØ£Ù†Ø§Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Achieve perfectly groomed nails with the **KillyS Nail Clipper Floralove Collection Pink**. Featuring precise carbon steel blades, it delivers your desired nail look with a smooth edge. The ergonomic handle design ensures comfortable use and easy cleaning.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Nail Clipper Floralove Collection Pink**
â­ For best results, trim toenails after soaking them in warm water for 5-10 minutes to soften them.
â­ After each foot bath, gently remove cuticles with a stick or pusher.
â­ Complete your foot care routine with a nourishing foot cream to regenerate and moisturize.
â­ Hold the nail clipper firmly in your dominant hand and position the blade at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently squeeze the handles to trim the nail in a smooth, straight line, being careful not to cut too close to the skin to avoid injury or ingrown nails.
â­ Repeat for each nail, ensuring even trimming to your desired length.
â­ After use, clean the nail clipper with soap and water and store it in a dry place.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Nail Clipper Floralove Collection Pink**
â­ High-quality Carbon Steel.

#KillyS #NailClipper #NailCare #Floralove #Pink #SaudiBeauty #BeautyTools #FootCare #Manicure #Pedicure

title_en: KillyS Coconut Oil Hairbrush for Low Porosity Hair
title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² ÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ø²ÙŠØª Ø¬ÙˆØ² Ø§Ù„Ù‡Ù†Ø¯ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ù…Ù†Ø®ÙØ¶ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø§Ù…ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Every hair enthusiast knows that hair care is a challenge, and care tailored to your hair's porosity is your first step to achieving a 'good hair day.'

The **KillyS Coconut Oil Hairbrush for Low Porosity Hair** is the perfect complement to your hair care routine, specifically designed for those with low porosity hair.

â­ The fine nylon pins combined with integrated bristles effectively comb and smoothen your hair.
â­ While combing, the brush pins gently massage your scalp and stimulate blood circulation, promoting scalp health.
â­ The coconut oil infused in the brush bristles lasts for approximately 6 months of use, imparting shine and softness to your hair.
â­ If you have fine hair that tends to get greasy, try combing your hair from the ear downwards to avoid a floppy, greasy hair-style effect.

**Do you already know what your hair porosity is?**
*   **Low porosity hair:** Has closed scales, making it smooth, slippery, and lacking volume. Styling can be a bit challenging.
*   **Medium porosity hair:** The most common hair type, with slightly split scales, meaning it's not perfectly smooth and is slightly puffy.
*   **High porosity hair:** Has severely split scales, making it prone to frizz and breakage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Coconut Oil Hairbrush for Low Porosity Hair**:
â­ Suitable for all hair types, our hairbrush gently massages the scalp while safeguarding your hair from damage.
â­ Whether on dry or wet hair, it effortlessly brushes your hair, ensuring a soothing and effective grooming experience.
â­ Remember to start brushing from the ends and work your way up to the roots for gentle detangling.
â­ Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo, gently removing any hair or product buildup.
â­ Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
â­ Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place to maintain its quality.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Coconut Oil Hairbrush for Low Porosity Hair**:
â­ Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene 58%
â­ Thermoplastic rubber 30%
â­ Nylon Bristles 10%
â­ Epoxy 2%

#KillyS #Hairbrush #HairCare #LowPorosityHair #CoconutOil #HairMoisture #HealthyHair #HairStyling #HairGoals #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Experience eco-conscious grooming with the **Killys Biodegradable Oval Hairbrush Made From Coffee Grounds**. Designed for superior detangling and a gentle massage, this brush is crafted with sustainability in mind. Comprising 70% natural ingredients, including coffee grounds, it offers an environmentally friendly alternative to conventional hairbrushes. Its thoughtfully shaped oval design is perfect for all hair types, while the ergonomic handle ensures comfort and easy manipulation during styling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Biodegradable Oval Hairbrush Made From Coffee Grounds**:
â­ Versatile for use on both dry and wet hair, our hairbrush simplifies your grooming routine.
â­ To tackle tangles, begin brushing from the ends, working your way up to the roots for smooth, manageable hair.
â­ Clean regularly and store in a clean, dry place away from direct sunlight to maintain its quality.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Biodegradable Oval Hairbrush Made From Coffee Grounds**:
â­ Coffee Grounds
â­ NYLON
â­ Polypropylene
â­ Thermoplastic Rubber

#Killys #Hairbrush #EcoFriendly #SustainableLiving #NaturalBeauty #HairCare #HairStyling #BeautyTools #SaudiBeauty #HealthyHair

description_en:
Achieve a flawless hairstyle with **KillyS** Black Fringe Pins.

These high-quality hair pins are designed to hold your hair securely, making them the perfect choice for most people and all hair types. Whether you need a reliable solution for all-day hold or want to create DIY hairstyles at home, **KillyS** provides the essential tool.

â­ Ideal for keeping hair in place and preventing slippage throughout the day.
â­ Suitable for all hair types and various hairstyles.
â­ Elegant black design blends seamlessly with hair.
â­ Perfect for daily wear and special occasions.
â­ An essential tool for creating diverse hairstyles at home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS** Black Fringe Pins:
â­ Use the pins to secure strands of hair in your desired position.
â­ Strategically place the pins to ensure your hairstyle remains intact.
â­ Can be used to secure wigs or hair extensions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS** Black Fringe Pins:
â­ High-quality metal.
â­ Black coating.
â­ Durable metal design.

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, lustrous hair with the **KillyS Coconut Oil Enriched Hairbrush**. Expertly designed to cater to your hair's needs, this brush combines superior care with effortless styling. Its soft nylon pins and bristles gently detangle, while the brush pins massage your scalp to stimulate blood circulation. The coconut oil infused within the bristles provides deep, long-lasting moisture to your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Coconut Oil Enriched Hairbrush**:

â­ Suitable for all hair types, whether dry or wet.
â­ Begin brushing from the ends and gradually work your way up to the roots for gentle detangling.
â­ The brush massages the scalp to improve circulation without causing hair damage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Coconut Oil Enriched Hairbrush**:

â­ Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene 58%
â­ Thermoplastic rubber 30%
â­ Nylon Bristles 10%
â­ Epoxy 2%
â­ Moisturizing Coconut Oil

#KillyS #Hairbrush #Haircare #HealthyHair #CoconutOil #HairStyling #ShinyHair #HairGoals #ScalpCare #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover eco-conscious grooming with the **Killys Biodegradable Hairbrush Made Of Coconut Shred - Oval**. This innovative brush is crafted with 70% natural ingredients, including coconut shred, making it a sustainable choice for a better planet.

The brush features an oval shape perfect for all hair types and an ergonomic handle for easy manipulation. It's your ideal companion for daily hair care, whether your hair is dry or wet.

The **Killys Biodegradable Hairbrush Made Of Coconut Shred - Oval** is more than just a tool; it's a commitment to our Earth. Choose products that make a difference.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Biodegradable Hairbrush Made Of Coconut Shred - Oval**:
â­ Versatile for use on both dry and wet hair.
â­ To tackle tangles effectively, begin brushing from the ends and gradually work your way up to the roots for smooth, manageable hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Biodegradable Hairbrush Made Of Coconut Shred - Oval**:
â­ COCONUT SHRED
â­ NYLON
â­ Polypropylene
â­ Thermoplastic rubber

#Killys #Hairbrush #HairCare #NaturalProducts #Sustainable #EcoFriendly #HealthyHair #Beauty #EnvironmentalFriendly #SaudiArabia
